title: Fantastic visit!
review: My family, friends and I had the best visit last week at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  The service from the time we arrived and was met at the front desk by Orn, Fon, Bond, Pangko and JT was 5 star!  One of the travelers on our vacation had problems with her leg and we were worried that it was something serious, we went to the front desk and their attention was prompt and considerate as they connected us with a doctor for medical advise immediately. The location is 5 minutes from Bangla Road, and the amenities are top notch.  Our rooms were clean, modern and had nice views. We were a party of 10 and was well accommodated with rooms located near each other.  In the end we finished off our stay with a visit to Ryn Spa and was greeted by Golf and staff. Having breakfast included was a plus and the variety of food was great and delicious My husband and I had an amazing couple romance package, with body scrub, wrap and massage.  Superb!  Kudos, Grand Mercure!…

title: Great employees!
review: I am writing this review because i really hope this will reach the excellent staff!   Ive planned my stay at the Mercure because I am an accor employee in NL so ive orientated my travel throughout thailand around accor chain hotels.   When we arrived here it was our fourth hotel of the month. We got informed about the deposit that was 1000 baht per night. We were staying here for 6 nights so it was a pretty big deposit, maybe a bit too big.  We explained to the frontoffice manager Ann (idk if she is, but if she isnt, she should! Ill get to that later) that it was too much and that it was a big cut in our budget. She found an excellent sollution for us.  Later when we got in the room, there were nice flowers and a nice cake because of our anniversary.   As for the f&b department.. The ladies from the breakfast, they were so nice! As our stay was 6 nights they remembered who we were and greeted us so polite and really friendly every day.   Fast forward to our last day. We asked for a late checkout because our flight was not until the evening. We first heard that it was not possible. We understand that.   Very unfortunatly my partner got sick. -not because of the hotelfood!- as i went to the breakfast for the last time, the ladies recognized me and asked why i was alone, i explained them that my partner was sick. I hope i dont violate any privacy rules but I remembered the name of Ying because she provided excellent service! She got a foodpoison-proof breakfast and employees helped me getting the breakfast to the room!   I was also a little panicked, because we had a plane to catch while my partner is nearly dying and I was not sure if he was able to fly.. and there was Ann again to help me out! She immediately provided us with a late check out and she even wrote a letter for me in Thai with exactly what I needed! I went to the pharmacy with the letter and they helped me splendidly! I received pills for nauseous, stomachache and a supplement for minerals and vitamins.  I have never experience this kind of personal service! Because of the hurry we were in, i tipped a little small.... so IF you stay at the Grand Mercure in nov/dec 19? Please leave a tip in your room for the housekeeping as they deserve it so much!!!!…

review: This is our last day in Phuket. It’s moments like this that I wish I can extend my stay at the Grand Mercure. Our room was spacious very clean, breakfast buffet was a welcome start to the day with an extensive range to choose from. I want to thank Ying  and all the staff at breakfast buffet for their warm hospitality and beautiful welcoming smiles. Batty, Ann, Bond and Fon and all the staff on the front desk thank you for accommodating all our request and queries with great diligence, making us feel welcomed.  It is with great sadness and reluctance to be leaving the tranquility and the service-orientated environment of the Grand Mercure. I highly recommend it for anyone traveling to Phuket.…

title: 环境很好，出行方便
review: We stayed here for 2 nights. The reception staff is very helpful and cheerful esp Ann and Batty. Ann gave us very helpful tips to drive to the Patong old town. She is also very efficient proficient in her job.  Rooms are ok. Pool is disappointing and isn’t as good as in pics. The decor and ambience is mediocre. Breakfast is average. Though the hotel is nice  and comfortable, there isn’t great value for the money. But the location  is great. May be they are charging you more for location than property and services.

title: Good hotel in patong
review: Dear Mr. Asekhri,  Many thanks for your kind comments and compliments of both Ann and Batty.  Decor and ambiance is something i would think to be personal, as different people would be expecting different kinds of atmosphere so it is very subjective indeed.   Yes our location is outstanding but our property is much more than simply "well located"...   Our Team members are dedicated and sincere in their approach and it is for that exact reason i can't agree on our Breakfast being average either...   Again, this is a very subjective matter and it would depend on each and everyone's own tastes and preferences. And with this in mind, our Executive has been working for the last few months and years on constantly improving our offer and selection, offering tastes and flavors for all, from healthy picks to freshly squeezed fruits and vegetables juices, local bites trolley outdoor to freshly made Phuket-style coffees and teas, asian noodle stations or european classics, daily made bakeries and breads by our Pastry Chef Mon', salads and cold cuts, vegetarian specialties as well as Hallal products to fit all diets and preferences...  Following you comments made to Khun Ann, she also took the initiative of offering few "extras" and all i believe would be worth a little more than 3* but again, it depends on each and everyone's judgement and i hope next time we will be able to please you both fully :)  Many thanks again and wishing you a wonderful rest of the year!!  Sebastien

title: Great experience
review: 看了好多评价才选的美爵这家酒店，服务态度都很好，小姐姐还会中文，在这住了3晚，早餐充分考虑到了国人的口味，而且周边出行都很不错，芭东夜市、芭东海滩、江西冷、很不错的位置，而且附近美食超级多，值得推荐的一家酒店，Pimmy & Sita 很不错的，退房时妥善帮我们安排了行李寄存，非常感谢！This hotel is good location in paying. The service is good and nice staff

title: Hefty price tag for small room
review: We only stayed for two nights and paid 520 euros for a Pool Access room. It was ok for two nights but definitely wouldn’t recommend a longer stay just because the room is so small and especially the bathroom is not what comparable hotels offer. You only have one sink in the bathroom and the toilet right next to it with a shower - very basic which is ok, but can’t fit two people in there. Also the lighting is the worst I have ever experienced in a hotel: shaving or make up ... terrible... the staff are friendly and breakfast was good. For a quick stop in Patong great because of the good location. Hint for sun worshipers: our Pool Access room didn’t catch a single ray of sun, so maybe request sunny room when booking.

title: Quite Oasis in the Middle of Patong
review: Dear fipssi,  Thank you for your review and comments. WIth our rooms going all around the property, we could indeed assign a room that is sunnier or not, depending on preferences and we would be happy to do so next time you wish on staying with us for a short while...   Many thanks for you kind comments about breakfast offer and our Team members... very kind of you and very much appreciated!  with Kind regards, Sebastien

title: 30th anniversy
review: Grand Mercure is set a block back from the beach at Patong provides a welcome sanctuary from the hustle of the surrounding streets and the throngs in thongs on Patong beach. We had a pool side room with a private deck you can swim straight off. The room was are lovely with a modern bathroom and a hugely comfortable bed. The staff are wonderfully and genuinely friendly and helpful and as we stayed for a week quickly became familiar with our preferences. The hotel has a very nice bar and breakfast buffet while just out the door is a block of street food and low pressure local restaurants. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and using the hotel as a base to explore Patong and Phuket.

The seafood sauce was the most delicious one I have had in my…

The buffett breakfast was great and a good variety with changed daily so not repetitive.    The staff are very friendly and sooooo helpful.  We would definitely stay here again - hopefully longer next time.   the hotel location is very handy to good restaurants/bars/cafes/massage etc.  I would highly recommend…

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you Tricky4799 and see you again soon :) Sebastien

review: Highly recommended place. Spent 5 days in this resort from 14-18 Oct 2019 fully satisfied with the customer service from ground level, reception to any staff(s). I must say all staff(s) are well trained and always welcome you with smiles and without discrimination, which makes you feel like home. Very Friendly and attentive staffs, no matter whom you meet always greet you with  smile and folding hand “Sawasde ka!“. I myself being in a hospitality business feel this is the only place where all are treated as same. It’s kind of resort where you will be fully satisfied with the customer service and their hospitality, it’s not good to mention particulars names here but I would like to thankful to the lady at reception name Ann and lady with moles(Sorry all the staff(s) are Great))…

title: Fabulous option for couples and families with young children
review: We have just returned from a 7-night stay.  Fabulous from the get-go.  We paid to upgrade to a pool access room and this was worth every cent.  Breakfast buffet is well documented here and doesn't disappoint.  The pools, although somewhat smaller that many you see around Thailand, are well laid out.  We never felt that our privacy was compromised in the pool access, but then very few older children around.  There is a small kiddy pool with a small slide.  Older kids-teens may get bored here after a couple days.  The weekly seafood buffet was the biggest disappointment, skip it unless you want to pay double for what you can get out on the street, with the bonus of waiting around in lines, whilst other guests push in front of you and empty the entire serving tray onto their plate.…

I would like to make a special thank you to Ni...she was so helpful and kind and I will be heading back there ASAP. After arriving back from PHI Phi we had booked another Patong Hotel which couldnt compare so we are checking out to head back to Mercure! Hopefully Ni will be there to welcome us back. x

We are super proud of the team, especially Ni and it is always nice to hear our guests feel the same way. We appreciate the high recommendation and delighted to know you will be back with us. When you are heading back please let us know.   Best regards, Apple

title: Birthday stay
review: The management and staff went above and beyond the call of duty when I unexpectedly fell ill, through no fault of the resort. They organised an emergency doctor, drove us to and from the hospital, called to see how I was progressing, sent us gifts, provided a free dinner in the restaurant, gave us a late checkout and reduced the bill.  In short, they couldn't do enough for us.  During our stay the Management and staff were always professional, friendly, accommodating and compassionate. They treated us like family. We have recommended the Grand Mercure Resort Patong to family and friends. We will definitely be going back soon. We are very grateful for their care during such a stressful time. The accommodation was 5 star and the facilities were fabulous. Forever grateful Walter &…

title: The best service and smiles.
review: Dear Penny F,  Thank you very much for writing such a positive review following your recent stay with us.   We are flattered to know you have appreciated the attentiveness and warm taken care of our team members and please rest assured that we will thank them on your behalf!   We are already looking for your return and to have the chance to pamper you and your family next year. Should there be anything you would like us to take care of prior to your next stay, please let us know.  with Grand regards, Apple

title: Good not Great
review: Visited and stayed in the hotel from 27th to 30th October. Room in superior category is smaller than I thought compared to other hotel nearby. I picked the room when I thought will have a bathtub but our room only have a shower area, similar, I feel the toilet is also smaller than our hotels. Property was huge though to my dismay as we got lost several times as the staircase did not connect us to our rooms.  Bed was big and lovely though with four comfortable pillows and I love to stay there forever. We had a belated celebration for my partner's birthday and the hotel gave us a birthday cake and a fruit basket.

title: Great check in experience
review: I was greeted by a warm and lovely staff member, Batty, who was extremely knowledgeable about the amenities of the hotel and surrounding areas.  She gave me insight into where to go and how long it will take to get there.  I appreciated her attention to detail and her friendly service.  After a long and tiring journey she made the start of my stay very enjoyable.

title: Lovely hotel
review: Dear Lincoln D,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review and for choosing our property!  Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by Isaya brings us a great smile!   Thank you again for placing your trust in our hospitality; we are sincerely looking forward to pampering you again. Please feel free to contact any of us, we will be pleased to assist you with any arrangements you may need!  Best regards, Apple

title: Good hotel but not 5 star
review: We had a lovely stay at this hotel. Everything about it was lovely. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly. The breakfast was great. It was definitely worth it and we were sad when we had to leave.  I would just like to suggest it would be great if the hotel shuttle service did a pick up as well from the drop off points. If we return to phuket this will definitely be our hotel of choice to stay and we would highly recommend it to anyone.

title: Birthday Weekend
review: Dear Naaz30,  Many thanks for the great review of our property!  We are happy to see that you thoroughly enjoyed each and every aspect of our hotel facilities.  Rest assured that we will share your review with all our team members.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more exceptional experience!  Best regards, Apple

title: Honeymoon Trip
review: The hotel overall is good but i guess cannot be counted in 5 star category. Stayed here for 3 nights. The rooms are pretty good but the lighting is too less. Bathrooms are small and they do not have a seperate shower area. You have to climb in and out of the bath tub even for shower. And there is no curtain or door so u will always wet the floor outside the shower area.  Coming to the breakfast they do have indian vegetarian options but its just useless. I guess of the chef is Indian he should know the difference between breakfast and lunch/dinner. There were options like dal makhni and paneer with naan. One day they had poha which was just tasteless. And one day stale idlis with no sambhar or chutney. I guess u should keep only 1 or two items but they should be eatable.  My…

title: Very good hotel to relax near Patong
review: We check in for 2 nights in Patong. This hotel have good facilities and good location near Patong beach and not far from shopping mall.  Thank you Pimmy and Paan for smooth check in and good recommendations

title: Holidays

title: A holiday of a lifetime. Memories that will last forever thanks to Batty
review: Services are very kind and lovely. Specially P'Faii, P'Pon, P'Ann, P'Betty and P'Bond. We feel so welcome and warm like our own home. I would recommend it to everyone who never been in Phuket before to visit this great hotel. Thank you for making us a great holiday.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear SkyundHagen,  Thank you very much for choosing our property and recommending us.   We are glad to receive your compliments towards our staff members, especially front office team, Faii, Pon, Ann, Batty and Bond!   Very much looking forward to welcoming you  back at Grand Mercure.  with Grand regards,  Apple

title: Very nice hotel
review: This hotel is A***. We came to celebrate my son's second birthday. We was given a swim up room which was ideal given my son has long naps so we got to enjoy the pool without worrying. The room was well maintained and room service is reasonably priced and comes literally within minutes. The food here is clean and delish!!!!  The entire hotel is clean and every single staff member acknowledge and greets you, every single day every single time which I find very welcoming.  The pool is spacious and warm, great for kids. But I want to say a huge huge thanks to Batty who has been nothing short of a gem from start to finish, he arranged taxis, and helped us with all the do's and don't. But what really touched our hearts was.. she arranged for house keeping to decorate our bed for my…

title: Excellent service and ambience
review: Took a short getaway for relax and recharge. Hotel is well situated with 24hr marts, restaurant/Kopitiam, fast food, mall, beach all nearby. Room was spacious. Best was clothes drying rail on the balcony. Quiet in the hotel. Restful.

title: The lobby staff is very nice make me feel at home.
review: Dear B317L33,  Thank you very much for your comments! We are glad to hear you had a great time at the property. We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in a near future!   Best Regards, Apple

title: Good hotel and warm welcome
review: I am a tourist from China. The work pressure made me choose to relax here. I feel the warmth of home here, and my body and mind are completely relaxed. The waiters here are very enthusiastic. Attentive service, especially NamFon, Boom, Fai and bat. Unfortunately, the holiday is too short, and I will return to work on Friday. I can only come here for the next vacation.

title: Excellent Service

Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact any of us prior to your arrival.  Warm regards, Apple

title: Nice hotel good staff
review: It’a a good hotel with nice location near patong area. When we check in lobby staff serve welcome drink with pastries very tasty. Thank you Batty, Faii, Namfon and Pimmy for warm hospitality and good recommendations

title: Blissful Honeymoon Stay
review: Absolutely nothing to fault from online booking, pre-arrival correspondence(Philip), check in(Pimmy), actual stay, dining(Pear) and all the way to check out.  We were welcomed warmly and escorted to the business centre for a separate check in. Delicious welcome drinks and cold towels were a godsend after a busy weekend preparing and hosting our wedding back home. Pimmy made us feel at home right away and money can't buy the relaxed mood we were put in after the hectic wedding week. We also also kindly upgraded to a pool access room and we couldn't be more thankful.  My wife and I were delighted by the wedding set up in the room accompanied with a delicious piece of cake and fruit basket. It was so elaborately done up that we could not bear to destroy the team's hard work. After…

title: amazing breakfast, great location close to the town
review: Dear krueger1511,  Greetings from Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  We thank you very much for this wonderful detailed review of our property. It gives us immense pleasure knowing that your stay among us has been a splendid one with the room & sleep quality, the pool, the breakfast selection and last but not least, our attentive and personalized service by our dedicated team.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more exceptional experience  with Grand regards,  Apple

title: Great place to stay!
review: upon arrival we were greeted with fresh towels for our face and drinks and small snacks  The room was clean , modern and spacious  The breakfast was one of the best I have ever had at a resort, they offer a variety of items they even offer amazing fresh green juices . The location was perfect and a short walk to the patong party area . we really enjoyed our stay at the resort and enjoyed the peace considering once you leave the resort, it is the exact opposite out in the city

title: 6 night stay in August 2019
review: Dear Explore547135,  Allow me to thank you for your glowing review of Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience; from room cleanliness and quality , the convenient location, and thank you for your kind note about the breakfast and overall food selection and quality.. very much appreciated.  Once again, thank you for your time and for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  Best regards, Apple

title: Warm hospitality
review: We’ve had such a good time here.   It’s a little pricy I’ll admit, but you pay for comfort and luxury and peace of mind not having to worry about much as you go out and about into town.   The building is clean, the rooms are beautiful, the bed was very comfortable, and our experience was just wonderful here.  We had breakfast at the buffet here twice, both times were amazing! There’s a ton of variety to eat and it’s all so delicious.   We also went to the spa for treatment and got good discounts on the services offered (full body deep tissue + foot massage). I even fell asleep because it was that relaxing!  Again, you pay a little more but you get a lot for it and I would recommend staying here because of the value of every dollar spent here.

title: Great Stay
review: my first visit after 30 years, because I stay in BKK and other hotel in this group. Past few years and last year was in BKK and also enjoyed my stays very much, no different this time. As for this time around was a good relax time for us and have arrange our self a day trip to see the many changes in this tourist island and with and there are many new easy access location with great views. Sad to say there are not many authentic Thai food around. But we still enjoy our stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong. Will recommend to friends if they want to visit.  Thank you to the hotel team. Cheers

title: Could be better
review: Hotel is located in Patong beach one block from the water just behind jungceylon shopping centre. Rooms provided were clean but one could smell the sewer from room 416. Breakfast included in the rate and has a spread of local Phuket cuisine which is a nice touch. Looks like the clientele is mostly Asian with a definite emphasis on the mainland Chinese tourist. Shuttles provided to the beach, jungceylon and to central festival mall in Phuket town (one way only). We used grab to get around and it was fairly good. For the price paid I expected a higher standard.

title: Just Fantastic
review: Dear cpr2exs,  Thank you very much for your kind comments on our Hotel location and also breakfast spread. It is always very nice to hear good things about the most important meal of the day :)  We have already been fixing the issue encountered in the room, it was due to a malfunctioning drain cap in the bathroom and could have been fixed earlier... I am really sorry about that.   As for your last feedback on current clientele, i just want to share with you and the rest of the community that we do not emphasis on any particular clientele, whether European, Asian or North American. Patong and Phuket is world famous destination and we are pleased to be welcoming friends and guests from all around the world.   We have to keep in mind that China, Korea but also Singapore and Hong Kong are "neighbors" and that it only take a few hours flight for guests to travel to Phuket, which might not be the case for guests from Dubai, Sydney, Moscow, London or New York for instance...  We are very proud of the mix of clientele we have achieved so far and are trying to please all.  Many thanks again  Sebastien

title: Fabulous resort for a relaxing stay
review: Ok wow where do I begin? Well after a long flight from Aussie and arriving late to hotel it was a delight to be warmly welcomed by all arrival staff. Concierge and reception were really warm and explained everything for our stay. Everything was spot on and all our holiday inclusions where listed on arrival. Wow what an operation.   My friend and I have been here now for seven days (609) and we have three to go. Nooo!  I don’t want to leave. We have enjoyed our morning buffet breakfast  almost everyday and with lots of changed dishes each morning the Grand Mercure keep you in anticipation of what tomorrow will bring with the buffet.... a great way to look forward to the day. And well the egg station is one of the best iv seen and the staff allure you as you wait for your gems to…

title: Centrally located family friendly resort
review: Dear deanc805,  Thousand thanks for taking the time to write about your fabulous detailed experience and recommending us!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort and enjoyed each of hotel facilities and services. Big thanks to the special attentions and the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Best regards, Apple

title: Super nice hotel and good location
review: Hotel is 5 min.from famous Pathong beach with a lots of people and the water quality there is not so nice.You can find a thousands of shops and restaurants around the Hotel.Personals very very nice and helpful.Big shopping centrum is about 15min walk.We really enjoyed continental breakfast buffee and also the pool area was nice. Nice clean hotel in the middle of everything,beaches shoppes and nightlife of course.👍

title: Simply amazing!
review: Dear Flyer814746,  Thank you very much for sharing your enthusiastic review with us!   We are glad to receive your compliments on our convenient location, our staff members and also our breakfast quality.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!   Best regards, Apple

title: Great hotel and good restaurant
review: I absolutely loved staying at the grand Mercure in Phuket. My stay lasted a week, and it was a lovely experience. What made this experience so incredible was not only the beautiful location in Phuket - near the beach, restaurants and heart of Patong, but the amazing staff members at the Grand Mercure.  During my stay here, I had several encounters with the staff as I needed to find activities (I was not well informed before coming) and because I had thought I lost a valuable personal item of mine in the hotel room.  Helene, along with Oil - the French speaking staff member at the hotel- rallied up a team of incredibly nice staff members and helped me for a few hours until I did find my valuable and needed item, procuring à sense of compassion, and true care for my tiny tragedy…

title: Great Hotel, location and the excellent staff
review: We stay at grand mercure for 2 nights with my family. We had dinner at bubble restaurant is really good and tasty. The staff very kind and take care my children. I booked tour with hotel concierge for City tour with Pimmy and Aunaun with good recommend and nice help. KOP KUN KAPKAP

review: Location is best. Good and clean shopping. If you want to stay in Patong. It is great. Hotel staff, child friendly. They have kids play area, great breakfast. The two bedroom villa with its own private pool.

title: Good Deluxe pool access room and service
review: I stay here 5 nights with my family. the room is really good with nice facilities for my kids. It has nice breakfast in variety of food. Special thanks to Pimmy for nice service and late check out for us.

title: NICE HOTEL AND BREAKFAST
review: Nice location in PatonG and not far from shopping mall and Paton Beach just 5 minutes walk. Hotel breakfast is so good and nice staff 非常好。Pimmy always smile greeting. We will come back here again with my friends. Highly recommended.

We are already looking forward to your return.   with Grand regards, Apple

title: Gorgeous!！简直太棒了！！
review: Whilst the rooms were a little on the small side we couldn’t fault the cleanliness and great furnishings. Our cleaner loved leaving us “towel animals” which always made our day. Breakfast was huge with so much great food to choose from and the pool area was awesome especially the swim up pool bar.

title: Best Service and Cocktails
review: Dear Melandnut,  Many thanks for such a fabulous review of our property.   I am personally delighted to note your satisfaction on cleanliness and creativity "little dolls" of our Housekeeping team and also extensive selection of the breakfast.   Thank you once again for choosing Grand Mercure and see you again in Phuket very soon!  with Grand regards, Apple

title: Golf trip to Phuket
review: I came to Phuket for the American SAT Test. And the test center is far from the hotel. At the day before my test,  in the evening, I told the hotel reception could they call a taxi for me tomorrow. There are many people came to help me. They help me to do the research of the test center and asking the price of taxi for two times. Eventually, they recommended me to book the taxi on GRAB. I'm not really sure to operating. Therefore they helped me to sign in, and booked for me. After they know I'm a student, they refused my fee. A great gratitude for the reception! I recorded their names- Batty, Pimmy. Thanks a lot! The test was really important for me! Next day I arrived very early, and the reception had delivered the breakfast for me already! 酒店人员真的超级棒！…

title: Great Food, Comfy Beds and Nice People.
review: The Grand Mercure Hotel was an excellent family destination due to the relax atmosphere that it presents compared to the unique nightlife further down the road.  I enjoyed laying by the pool where I was taken care of by the staff, particularly Ryan and Miki who was worked non stop to make our stay perfect.

title: Babecue night at Bubbles
review: Dear Michael C,  Thank you very much for all your kind words! We are really appreciative towards each of your comments and happy to know you had fabulous experience at our pool and well taken care by Ryan and Miki.  We hope to have the chance welcoming you and your family back very soon!  with Grand regards, Apple

title: Poolside Rooms!
review: We got a wonderful dinning time at Bubbles restaurant last night.  No where in Phuket offer the same quality of sea food which super fresh and delicious like Bubbles. The restaurant was busy and fully booked!!! We were aware to book the table in advance and I was grad I did. The hotel staffs are polite and well-trained. Restaurant Manager "Warawut" took care us with all time smiley face and recommended the best wine selection which it was supurb!!   We will be back again and again. Anna

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Dear uraiwan v,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience at Bubbles Restaurant!   We are glad to hear you had an amazing experience during our Barbecue Buffet Dinner from the quality of the food to the friendliness and professionalism of our staff. I will surely share your comments with Warawut and the rest of the team.  We are looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future at Bubbles Restaurant  Best regards, Apple

title: Absolutely fantastic experience
review: We had rooms 117 & 118 which were tucked away from the main area and afforded us some cool privacy for our 8 nights. The poolside feature is the best and we enjoyed being able to slip into the water from our own outdoor area. All the staff were attentive and gave us the best service. The Breakfast Buffet is extensive with freshly made juices a specialty. Location is great- just a TBHT 200 cab ride to Bangla Road & Jungceylon if you don’t feel like walking. Most of the guests were from Mainland China and there were lots of families with young children enjoying the pool area, so our earplugs came in handy for afternoon siestas and we found breakfasts and the lobby lounge area quite entertaining. Stepping outside ones own culture is always interesting!

title: Great hotel in a very crowded area
review: This hotel is near the beach in Patong which is a very crowded town. There are rows and rows of street restaurants and small shops and millions of people walking the streets. Hotel itself is nice with an open reception hall (no AC), staff is very pleasant, concierge was awesome, room was clean with good AC but somewhat ordinary. Breakfast was great. In general, stay away from Patong. Find another quieter place in phuket.

title: 50th Birthday Holiday
review: Dear AA03  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us!   We are really pleased to hear you had pleasant stay with us and felt welcome by our dedicated team and we hope to have the chance to welcoming you back here soon.  with Grand regards, Apple

title: Good hotel
review: After a great deliberation we chose this hotel.  Chose due to a good variety of accomodation types.  Booked 2 villas and a pool access room for the family.  Villas and rooms were excellent.  The hotel is in good location.  What let’s the hotel down is just having one restaurant and offering for breakfast. Food was just okay but had to line up for breakfast every day regardless of what time you went there.   We were also surprised in the lack of English understanding staff.  Was good place but not great.

title: Amazing Hotel close to the beach
review: Dear 857darrenc,  Thank you very much for sharing your recent experience at our property!! Hope you will give us another chance and stay with us again in very near future.   with Grand regards, Apple

title: Helpful Staff
review: Beer is very enthusiastic and has a good service attitude.The room is very duty.the swimming poor is clean.the breakfast is delicious.The traffic here is very convenient.It's very square to book at the front desk.

title: Villa room
review: Stayed for 4 days as a group of 5 adults and 2 kids. The 2 bedroom villa was incredibly comfortable and looks much more prettier than the pictures look. The private pool was always warm and inviting. The breakfast was elaborate and interesting. Being close to Patong beach (less than 10 minutes walk) was very convenient as well. Every member of the staff were genuinely interested in making our stay as memorable as possible.  Pimmy and Michael deserve a special mention; their tireless efforts to help with arranging tours, airport transportation and with setting up a birthday surprise, was much appreciated. We’ve always liked the Mercure chain, but this one was truly Grand.  Cannot wait to return.

title: Excellent resort for the family
review: Thank you for a wonderful holiday. Friendly and helpful staff always. We enjoyed the food from restaurant and the swimming pool. Love the Kids corner. Lots of fun and activities for my little one to spend her day there. Special thanks to Apple, who made my little one feel so welcome and taught her how to make a gel candle and paint a clay doll.   Will come back in the near future.

title: 非常好
review: 酒店地理位置优越，环境优美，卫生，带宝宝来非常健康。设施齐全，泳池和餐厅可以给宝宝带来快乐。大堂经理Toey和Beer服务非常好。房间装潢很好，床睡的舒服，给了我们一个舒适的睡眠环境。Spa、台球等设施一应俱全，可以让我们在生活的压力下得到该有的放松。I choose to stay here. Nice service from many reviews, and we got the best service also. 很棒 👍

title: Family holidays in Patong
review: Thank you for your help Paan, Ni ,Nop , Nus, Ann and Batty房间非常棒，服务人员态度很好。酒店干净整洁。提供免费机场接送班车，距离海边，酒吧街都很近，步行约5-10分钟，交通很方便，前台两位服务人员很漂亮。非常完美的一次酒店体验，这个酒店也有SPA ，游泳池很干净 ，早餐也不错有各种各样的菜，每周一，周三，周五 也有自助餐下次来还会再住这家酒店。

review: Fantastic resort close to everything 10min walk to Patong beach. Amazing staff thanks Batty at reception for looking after us so well! Aor by the poolside bar with happy hour cocktails your the best! Resort is very clean and rooms are modern and tidy. Can’t wait to return soon!

review: BOND,BEER, Chen ,Ni is very kind♡ We are from Korea Room is clean the pool was nice the staff were friendly. Varity of breakfast. The hotel is on the good location. We will come back here again in the near future.

title: Gorgeous Hotel with Lovely Staff
review: We adored this hotel. Lovely position, very nice. The staff Ms.Beer were friendly, helpful and lovely. The poolside rooms are definitely the only ones to book. You literally step into the pool as you walk out your door. We loved this place and would recommend it to anyone.

title: Great location, friendly staff, lovely pool
review: Dear Auzziegale,  Thank you very much for such a wonderful review.  I am pleased you enjoyed your stay in our pool access room and will compliment Ms. Beer on your behalf for her hospitality.   Once again, thank you for your time and for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  With grand regards, Apple

title: Nawaf aldaei
review: We chose this hotel because of its location and turns out it was great! Very close to the OTOP night market, just a couple metres away. And the staff was friendly, especially Oil (such a unique name, I know!). The variety of breakfast was also satisfying, although their continental breakfast was just okay (maybe not really their specialty), but their local snacks were good tho. Loved the pool, it was decent, but needs more toys (they only have 1 mini pool slide). Their kids club was okay too, not that big. Tried their Club Lounge, the variety of dishes was not really over the top, we've had better. Also, the room was not that spacious for a deluxe. Overall, this is a great hotel, especially for family with kids.

title: Wonderful Staff and Breakfast!!!
review: Dear kharinuts,  Many thanks for the great review of our property!   Your positive comments are very much appreciated and we are happy to know that our location and the service from our team members fully met your expectations.   We highly value your constructive comments on kids’ activities and overall atmosphere. We have been talking about renovating and expanding this particular area for quite some times. We finally decided to move our Fitness to Lobby Floor, behind bakery shop  and current kids club will be enlarged, taking over current fitness location too. Additional space and activities will be offered to all so for parents to finally relax and spend some quality time on their own too.  Thank you once again for your support, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  with Grand regards, Apple

title: Good service!
review: One of the best hotels in Phuket in terms of location, cleanliness and good handling.  I would like to thank Mr. Bond for the excellent handling we received.  Very good service. Best location. Our room is clean.

review: very good experience in this hotel.Special Thanks to Neung, Nuttawut,Pao. Good pool, My som likes it very much, all of people are very kind, and try to teach My son the tailand language. though IT is difficult for the two years kid

review: my first time here at this well positioned and managed resort this grand mercure hotel one of the accor group of hotels on arrival the experience was first class my room was upgraded to a complete poolside room off the patio into the water. The short stroll to the large super shopping centre excellent thai restaurants very close shops tailors u name it all so close as my wife and I live kuala lumpur Phuket is a very short flight away. I assure all this is my preferred base in Phuket

review: Just had 10 nights at the Grand Mecure and it was faultless.  Everything from the staff, rooms and food was just fantastic. One of the best breakfast buffets ever. This will be our new "go to" hotel in Phuket for sure. They also have a great complimentary shuttle to 3 different venues which was a major plus.

review: This hotel is very well located right in heart of Phuket and near main happening place Bangla Street where all pubs and discs are. Being adjacent to a mall is an added feature. Very near to patong beach

review: We stayed here last week and it was amazing. The most friendliest & helpful staff, brilliant room (pool access room) and the best breakfast buffet I have ever seen! My initial booking was feb 2019 but i had to cancel and the reservations manager agreed to ammend my booking without me paying additional on june 2019 but again i had to cancel my trip to phuket and without batting an eyelash they still agreed to amend my reservation. title: Excellent Staff
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure Patong as a party of 10 people, all our rooms were spacious, super clean and beautifully decorated. The room has all the amenities you might need, this hotel also offers free shuttle buses to the shopping centre and the beach which is really handy. The hotel location is only around 10 minutes walk to bangla road for the nightlife, the night market is just opposite this hotel with nice small bars in.   The only few down falls of this hotel was the long queues to get into breakfast each morning and also the pricing of the drinks around the hotel bar was super expensive!  Overall an amazing hotel and we would definitely stay again!

title: Well located hotel, beautifully decorated with nice and spacious rooms
review: The hotel is well located in the centre of Patong near several commercial establishments. It also offers free shuttles to the beach, Junceylon shopping mall and the further and larger Centrum Festival Shoping Mall.  Plus: -room decoration -hotel design -efficient check-in -free shuttle -10 min walk to Junceylon shopping mall   Min: -to be clear that this is a city hotel and not a resort -breakfast a bit expensive

title: Superb!
review: Dear realadvicer,  Many thanks for your review and for complimenting our Deluxe Pool Access rooms... I wish you could have check out our Suites & Pool Villas too but maybe some other times...   From a "realadvicer" to a young passionate professional, please allow me to share with you that most upscale and luxury resorts in Phuket & Thailand have an "open" lobby... That's pretty much the idea everyone has of a Holiday place & Resort in the tropics i feel but i could be wrong.   The person who designed our property back in 2012 & 2013 is actually a very famous Thai Architect, with project all over Thailand, Asia but also the Caribbean islands... He's also part of our new Owner's project, coming up shortly and from what i understand, same concept will apply....   May is and has always been the hottest and most humid month of the year so maybe it was a seasonal thing rather than design default...   I hope you will be able to reconsider and give us a second chance sometime :)  Thank you Sebastien

title: Exceptional hotel
review: We staying here for 3 days the hotel is clean on the center of Patong. Special thank to Bond,Oil,Ni they help us a lot and always smile. The pool is so cool the room is clean. Lovely stay. We will come back here again

The room was exceptional and the towel animals each day were a lovely touch- big thank you to the housekeepers for taking the time to make these. The location is superb with OTOP markets across the road and just a short walk to the beach, Bangla road and Jungceylon. Would definitely stay here again.

The reception staff are always smiling and are very courteous. Other people moan about the hotel not having aircon in the foyer but its impossible to have it as the hotel is wide open onto the driveway no doors.  Although we hated Thailand I would recommend the hotel to anyone. It is the best by far in Patong

Food- Awesome breakfast  , variety of vegetarians option, multi cuisine including 10% of Indian food, healthy food high energetic option like smoothies  juices so on Highly…

Staff members Ryan, Toi, Phillip and May really stood out to us for being friendly and helpful! Thank you!  We stayed in pool access room 142 which was great- rooms quite small but didn’t really need to be any bigger for us. Very comfy big beds which were made up beautifully daily with towel decorations.  Unfortunately, the reason why I have given my review 4/5, is because of the noises every morning between 8:30-9am behind our room which woke us up. We couldn’t figure out what exactly the noise was but it was metal banging/clanging sounds. We also had a few nights of noisy neighbours banging on…

review: While I was in Phuket I became really sick with a stomach bug. This meant I spent every day in our hotel room and we had to change our plans a lot. This included our phi phi island trip which meant we had nowhere to stay that night. The Mercure straight away said it would be no problem to stay another night even though they were so fully booked and we didn’t need to change rooms. The customer service representative who’s nickname is Oil went above and beyond to check on me. She would ring the room to see if I needed any water or food and we were also given complimentary buffet breakfast everyday which my partner used and I would go down and get a bowl of cereal. Also any room service I needed was complimentary and they would make me simple things that weren’t on the menu if I…

title: Friday Sea Food Buffet
review: Dear 96kirstenh,  Many thanks for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and for sharing such a superb review with us.  I'm delighted by your comments on team's attitude and level of care. We are creating sincere relationships with every single guest so to ensure most personalized service and Grand hospitality at every corners, and it is always a pleasure to note we did create this special and strong link with you.   Thank you once again for your support, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future  with Grand regards, Apple

title: OK Hotel but not 4.5 star
review: The seafood buffet on Friday evening is sufficiently stocked, the products presented are fresh, but they lack originality except for the corner sushis which is pleasant and the oysters from France. seafood is like everywhere else in Phuket cooked rather summarily and without creativity. The service is invisible, no one to clear the plates on the tables, you have to do it yourself by putting your plates on another table, as you can. Good point the wine by the glass is served at the table with the bottle.

title: Amazing place in a fantastic location
review: Dear gcbond,  Many thanks for your kind comments about the food quality and variety. I thought originality or diversity was one of our strength on that particular buffet with specialties from around the world and fresh cold and barbecued seafood stations too... We can always improve and adjust and i will use your comments to discuss with our Chef about possible improvements in weeks to come.  I will also take this opportunity to remind our Restaurant Manager about basics of service... This is the part i am the more concerned about to be very honest!  Once again, thank you so much for the time taken in writing and sharing your views and please do come back next time you have a chance :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Gem in the heart of Patong
review: It is a good Hotel, but defiantly not 4,5 star. It’s close to the entertainment and shopping area. The room we stayed in is Ok and the price is very reasonable. The stuff members are very helpful and friendly. However one of the downsides is defiantly the very bad internet connection, sometimes it works, sometimes it is very slow, sometimes it does not work at all. For a 4.5 star Hotel just not good enough. Another thing what bites me every morning at Breakfast is the very low standard of dress code. In a 4.5 star Hotel I don’t like to see singlets for man in a restaurant.  Tighten up the dress code would be appreciated.

title: Excellent Hotel - Great Service
review: I was there for a conference and we spent alot of time in the hotel. The staff was amazing and they went out of the way to take care of us. Coffee request at the conference venue during breaktimes and the poor guy that got slammed with drink requests still never failed to smile.  I had a very warm reception upon check in from Julie and her team. They are the front facing talents of the hotel and they left a very good impression to the Accor brand. Maybe i should give it a try soon.  Lastly, my room had a nice view from a high floor. The buffet lunch was very good for the first 2 days but there was one weekday lunch where it was quite big difference in options but nonetheless still good.  This hotel does not have beach access but an amazing large pool. They have pool access rooms…

title: Just OK
review: Dear GeraldL917,  Thank you very much for your amazing review!   We are pleased to read your positive feedback! To know you found our team helpful and professional makes us delighted and we will surely share your comments with our team, especially Julie.  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  with Grand regards,  Apple

title: Very good accommodation - great service
review: We have booked 2 superior room on 11-14 April 2019 and have request for connecting rooms way earlier before our booking date. Understand our request is based on availability upon arrival. Smooth check in when we arrive at 3pm Phuket time even though one of the room is not ready yet. No connecting room was given and both rooms is Super queen size bed eventhou we have request one room Shld be a twin bed. But it’s ok also. When we ask about connecting room, to our surprise the reception told us they do not have a connecting room in the hotel. They Shld have told me earlier when we request for it thru phone call previously. It’s a hassle for me to back and fro to my kids room every now and then. Both rooms doesn’t have that fragrance smell that hotel Shld have. My room especially…

title: Pathetic service
review: Stayed at this hotel for six nights. A very nice welcoming, the manager came and greeted us by himself. The room was beautiful, well furnished and very clean. The hotel is very beautiful and so is the pool garden. Breakfast is very good and the pool bar. The service standard is very high but a bit slow at the restaurant. I found it negative that the hotel bar closed to early. I can highly recommend this hotel.

title: Friendly, relaxing and great location with the best facilities
review: Dear Travist3,  We thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property.   It gives us immense pleasure knowing that your stay among us has been a splendid one with warm hospitality, well-maintained facility and the excellent breakfast at our Bubbles Restaurant.   Once again thank you and we hope to welcome you for another memorable holiday in the near future.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Nice stay but the main reception needs air conditioning
review: I stayed 6 nights in grand Mercury, staff are very pleasant, room service is great and overall it was a great stay. I went in April so it was extremely hot, the massive reception doesn’t have air con therefore it became extremely uncomfortable whilst checking in and out.

title: Huge grand property
review: Dear ZohaibHassan93,   Thank you very much for your comments! We are glad to hear you had a great time at the property and found our team fantastic!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in a near future!   Best Regards, Valentine

title: Fabulous Hotel: Best Stay in Patong!
review: This is a huge hotel...very nice staff ... We are staying here for 3days. Ann helped me up in checkin...which was very smooth....she was really helpful and nice. They have free shuttle for Jubgcylone mall...paying beach and city centre Mall...! I recommend this hotel to all if u r staying in Paying..!

title: Had a very nice stay! :D
review: Dear Ravi S,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful review of our property and recommending us.  It is such a great moment to hear you had comfortable stay and were impressed with our staff hospitality and i will surely take this opportunity to thank Ann for her professionalism.  Hopefully, we will see you again soon!  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Love the stay!
review: This Hotel is wonderful! From the moment you walk in, you’re greeted with a nice array of drinks and snacks plus a warm welcome from the staff. They are very informative on things to do and see around Patong. I did not lift a finger with my luggage once I arrived. Hotel view is amazing ! Great hotel restaurants, even the pool bar had delicious food.   Right outside the hotel is a bunch of other food options and open markets within walking distance! Overall great experience with excellent room presentation and room service. I will definitely stay here again with my friends and family.

title: 2nd Day in
review: Arrived at this lovely hotel yesterday and cannot fault it so far,  used spa today and had excellent treatment and already booked another treatment, we came for my husband's 60th birthday which is tomorrow and so far so pleased we did

title: Lovely hotel and awesome service!
review: Dear dIaneC3132,   Thousand thanks for your fabulous review!   We are grateful for each of your comments and glad to hear you had a great time at our property.   Please feel free to contact any of us should you need assistance during your stay.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Perfect location attentive staff
review: We celebrated our babymoon here and stayed at the superior king room. The staff were very welcoming and had great service! There were many pleasant surprises with a surprise cake and fruit tray. They decorated our room soooo nicely. Room was sparkling clean. Did the ryn spa and they were very helpful to explain the treatments. The spa was very affordable for such great treatments. We did not bring our daughter as were afraid hotel was not kids friendly but regretted immediately upon seeing the kids friendly pool and the kids centre! We will defnitely be back next time with our 2 kids!  Thanks you housekeeping, reception team for wonderful and memorable stay!

title: Great vacation place
review: Dear CrystalTay,  Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review following your recent stay at the hotel!   We are grateful to know you had an amazing and memorable experience at the property! There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourself extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the hospitality of our dedicated team, especially Housekeeping and reception team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special for your next visit with your family (hopefully with your daughter), please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Fanastic hotel in great location
review: My 3rd visit to phuket and i am really glad i have chosen Grand mercure.... sumptuous breakfast everything as per international standards lovely pool view rooms me and my family staying in 322 and 321  Thanks to ms. sita the manger here  And every staff member for the memorable stay....love u guys

title: Nice hotel
review: The service is unparalleled. Everyone was extremely nice and helpful. I needed to connect to work and I had some issues. The concierge was tech savvy and contacted his IT department to try to resolve the issues that were related to my own pc and work connection! He also helped booked a really nice dinner overlooking the oct at sunset time. Spa staff very professional. I used the steam room and the pool. We had pool access room. It was definitely worth it since the main pool was small. Room and bathroom is on the small side...  The best thing about the hotel is the restaurant. Breakfast is fabulous with fresh juice station and Chinese, Indian, Thai and western cuisine. Also, I had one of the best curries during my stay in Thailand. I got the crab curry with glass noodles. It was…

title: AMAZINGLY Amazing
review: Dear monae831,  Thousand thanks for this amazing review of your recent stay with us!   We are delighted to hear we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with a professional and helpful service and it is also great to know you have both fallen for variety of breakfast and our Chef's signature dish, Mee Hoon Gaeng Poo (Crab Curry with with noodles)  Please do let u know if you plan a new trip to the island shortly, we will be happy to assist you with any special arrangement you may need.  with Grand regards,  Jutima

title: Great hotel
review: This is coming a month late but better late then never... if anyone is looking for a hotel in Patong please don’t look past this hotel... First time using my silver member status and from the get go we were treated like gold members... We got priority check-in in a nice separate room, their guest relations officer Pimmy was so so good. We stayed for 3 nights and she looked after us so so well. What an asset to Accor hotels. She treated us like we were one of them. Their manager I’m sure his name was Philip and also Julie were great too, Thank you so so much for all the upgrades and making our trip memorable. When we arrived at Phuket airport my husband had decided not to come back to Thailand but after our experience at Grand MERCURE Patong we are defiantly coming back... You…

title: Great Hotel in Patong center
review: Dear kirthi21,  Thank you so much for such a detailed and GRAND review of our property.   We are absolutely pleased to hear about your exceptional experience with us and will surely take this opportunity to thank our entire team on your behalf, especially Pimmy, Philip and Julie who went out of their way to create comfortable and pleasant experience.   We are already looking for your return and to have the chance to pamper you and your family again. Should there be anything you would like us to take care of prior to your next stay, please let us know.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: by far one of the best hotels in Patong and the surrounding areas
review: Just returned after 10 nights in Patong staying at the Grand Mecure Hotel. We stayed in an pool access room which was fab, the rooms not the biggest but acces to the pool makes up for it. The staff are so friendly and go out their way to help you. The rooms are cleaned to a high standard everyday as is the hotel. We were giving complementary access to afternoon tea from 11am -4pm where there was tea coffee sandwiches and fruit available. The pool area also has happy hour from 4pm-6pm the lounge bar from 6pm-8pm. We didn’t eat in the restaurant as there were plenty outside.  Give the Two Chefs a shout amazing food.  Didn’t like Bangla Rd, not for me.  Directly across from the hotel you have Otop which has plenty off small bars and friendly staff.  10 min walk to the beach if you…

title: Amazing hotel
review: The hotel has a Really good location . The staff is friendly ans very available. The food from bubbles ans chouchou is amazing!! The grand mercure was perfect for usa. Housekeeping is professionnal ans the room is very confortable

title: Amazing place. Excellent Service!
review: Dear Fabien F,   Many thanks for the great review of our property!  Your positive comments are very much appreciated and we are happy to know that our location and the friendly service from our team members fully met your expectations and I will surely share your positive comments with Housekeeping and restaurant team for their professionalism as well.   Please do let u know if you plan a new trip to the island shortly, we will be happy to assist you with any special arrangement you may need.  with Grand regards,  Jutima

title: Fantastic
review: My partner and I stayed at the Grand Mercure for 3 nights and had an excellent time. Specifically the hotel was amazing clean. The staff were su[er friendly, and they even helped us to organise some special tours and also a trip to Koh Phi Phi.  Even though it is in Patong, it still provided a serene and comfortable experience away from the craziness of Patong, but also allowed us to interact with Phuket and Patong, then have a restful getaway from the madness.  I specifically wanted to mention Leo and Bond from reception which helped us in so many ways from the amazing hospitality, to making sure our room was perfect.  If you are looking for a luxurious place amidst the madness of Patong, the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong is the place for you. Thanks guys! S

title: Celebrating our 30 th wedding anniversary
review: Dear StuiefromTheValley,   Thousand thanks for taking the time to write about your fabulous experience!   Your positive comments are very much appreciated and we are happy to know that our location and  the services from our team members fully met your expectations. Please stay assured that we will pass your compliment to K.Leo and K.Bond on your behalf.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon and please feel free to contact any of us should you need assistance.  with Grand regards,  Jutima

title: Super Stay in Phuket Patong
review: Great hotel, great service & staff really friendly.  Rooms beautiful, food great & atmosphere at pool & all around hotel very nice.  Great spa too.  My only gripe really was the balconies from the rooms, they arent really balconies, you cannot really stand on them as they are very small, less than a size 5 foot width.  Still lovely views from them though.  We upgraded to a swim up pool room which was well worth the money, it made our stay a much better experience as we like to sit on balcony at night to play cards or have a drink.  Would recommend upgrading to a swim uo pool room if possible (when in one of these rooms you can use the club lounge between 11am-5pm for snacks & drinks for free (non alcoholic drinks) a great wee extra. The whole hotel is spotless, breakfast is…

title: EXCELLENT SERVICE, LOVELY STAFF - EXTRAORDINARY!
review: This is our 5th time to stay with Grand Mercure, simply no hesitate to book this lovely  hotel once our group booked ticket to Phuket every year. U may feel warm hospitality from all staff once you checking-in. Excellent location which is just about 10 mins walk from bar street/ Big C and you can find many street food just at the opposite. Breakfast is great, varied choices for both food and drinks/juices. Pool bar is another attraction as they offer buy one get one free during happy hour (4-6pm) Specially thanks to Audy who made some fancy drink for us :D and definitely cant forget Pimmy and Philip who assist us to check-in and fulfill all our request quickly + Chino and Sebastin who make us just cant say no to this lovely hotel.

title: 100 score hotel, will come back for sure.
review: I satyed at this hotel 4 days in March. The location and breakfast are the best.  The front desk is the worst. When I did my check out I asked for the final bill printed and the recepcion guy dindn't want to give me it.

title: Awesome service especially at the hotel bar
review: Dear severinop423,  Thank you very much for sharing your stay experience with us!   We are pleased to hear you were satisfied with the convenient location of our property and enjoyed the breakfast. Yet, we are really sorry that you had some difficulties with our service upon checked out and please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent future occurrence.  Hope you will give us a second chance and visit us again the future. We remain at your entire disposition shall you need any assistance.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Excellent
review: Love the cooking class, and we do enjoy it very much. Love the BBQ seafood buffet at Bubbles. Love the seafood dinner at Bubbles. Love the friendly and helpful staffs. Love the pool access hotel room.

title: Bliss and Faultless
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks holiday.  The hotel staff are so friendly and attentive nothing too much . The reception staff house keeping and breakfast staff make this place run professionally and efficiently. The location is great . Everything spotless and breakfast is the best so much variety and choice to suit everyone. This was our first time in Thailand and will be memorable holiday thanks to all the staff at this hotel . Hotel management, the staff makes this place what it is Faultless .

title: Amazing friendly hotel
review: Dear miii66,  Thank you very much for writing such a positive review following your recent stay with us.   We are flattered to know you have appreciated with the attentiveness and friendliness of our team members. Please rest assured that we will thank them on your behalf!   Hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in the future.  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: BEST HOTEL EVER!
review: Beautiful people and friendly expclly front desk people name bat bond and Ann they helped me alot and served me very well... 3 night here I'm gonna spend and so far no regret choosing this grand Mercury hotel..

title: Fantastic!
review: Dear Rain Y,  Many thanks for the great review of our property!   Your positive comments toward our team members helpfulness and friendliness is highly grateful. We will share your comments with the team and especially with Bat, Bond and Ann who will surely be pleased to receive your compliments.   We are already looking forward to welcoming you back!  with Grand regards, Jutima

title: Holiday
review: This was honestly the best and most luxurious hotel me and my family have ever stayed in. We were staying in the two bedroom pool villa (yes we had our very own private pool!!) and it was lovely. The staff are extremely friendly and welcoming. We were served by Annie and she was such a lovely person. Highly recommend this hotel to couples and families.

title: Fabulous
review: We visit Patong almost every year and try to stay in different hotels. Absolutely loved the Grand Mercure, would return and highly recommend.   Great location, just a few minutes walk to the beach.   Staff so friendly and accommodating. Superior 1 king bed inc breakfast for 5 days. Nice decor, good shower and comfortable bed, air conditioning cool.  Room servicing prompt with plenty of water provided. The first 3 days of our stay the room was serviced again in the evening with little flowers or potpourri bags on the bed.   Breakfast at Bubbles was fantastic...many options such as the usual eggs which they make to order, asian options, sushi, danishes, muffins, salad, cheeses, pancakes, waffles and a juice station. They do a great iced latte also.   Pool is very nice, however it…

title: Great luxury hotel and great staff
review: Dear Stebbenator,   Thousand thanks for your fabulous review!   We are grateful for each of your comments and glad to hear you had a great time at our property.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon and please feel free to contact any of us should you need assistance.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Good quality hotel and a good location
review: Great luxury hideaway from the business of Phuket  Quiet and comfortable hotel in the busy centre of Phuket. The staff were so very helpful,especially Belle, who helped us sort out a problem with the massage staff. We recommend both the dinner and breakfast buffets.

title: Grand mercure patong review
review: Dear fred19872018,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us!   We are pleased to hear you had a good time at our property and found our staff very helpful. We will share your comments with the team and especially with Belle who will surely be pleased to receive your compliments.   Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact any of us prior to your arrival.  Warm regards, Valentine

title: Good Services and Good Location
review: Stayed for 2 weeks and was very impressed with the hotel overall, the rooms were well appointed and clean and the public areas were equally nice.   The staff were all amazing and very welcoming and helpful, everyone went out of their way to say hello and welcome you. I would like to particularly mention Ryan in the club room who was very helpful and friendly and is a real credit to the hotel. Also the lady who  cooks the eggs at breakfast was great, sadly I did not get her name but she was always ready to cook up my wife's omelette every day to perfection and with a smile.  On a slightly negative note and the reason I only gave 4 out of 5, the sun bed area around the pool was not very clean and in the 2 weeks we were there I did not see any evidence of them them being swept or…

title: Relaxed efficient and friendly.
review: Highly recommended. This hotel is a delight. The staff are fantastic especially manager Jern Jern (Isaya).  The food was fantastic. If you can, recommend the pool rooms. Well worth the money.  If we return we will definitely come back.   The rooms were very clean. Loved the see through shower windows. The beds were great. Very comfy.

title: Lovely hotel with sensational staff
review: Dear firieguy,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review and for choosing our property!  Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by Isaya and the team brings us a great smile!   Thank you again for placing your trust in our hospitality; we are sincerely looking forward to pampering you again. Please feel free to contact any of us, we will be pleased to assist you with any arrangements you may need!  Warm regards, Valentine

title: Perfect
review: We stayed here for the last 2 nights of our holiday - one of which was our 27th wedding anniversary.  The staff were brilliant - can't speak more highly of them.  They made us feel extremely special and made a fuss of us.  We had a pool side room - thankfully it was in a more quiet part of the pool and not facing the main area which could be an issue if you didn't have children.  The main area of the pool is filled with families and kids ie noisy.  Breakfast buffet is exceptional - so many offerings you certainly don't go hungry.  After check out - great use of a shower, towel, locker etc for our later departure.  Location is excellent to be among everything but not noisy.  Pool bar is nice - happy hour a bonus.

title: We loved BBQ seafood DNR!
review: Dear Debbie N,   Thousand thanks for taking the time to write about your fabulous experience!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the special attentions and the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Service
review: Hotel si located 600 m far from Patong beach but has own shuttle. Breakfasts here in Mercure was one of the top I ve ever seen. I higly recommend to book Pool acces. This hotel is perfect in all ways but, what makes Grand Mercure 6 star thing? People of Grand mercure. Receptionist ( expecially Betty:) ) , restaurant staff, gardeners. All people here are amazing, and that s reason why i ll definitely come back."

title: Home away from home !
review: Another amazing stay at our home away from home ,when we holiday in Patong,The Grand Mercure,returning for the 5th time!          From the moment we check in we are made to feel like family.On our bed was a beautiful Welcome Back Home arrangement with red rose petals,a towel origami and a handwritten note welcoming us back, it made us feel very special.         We always stay in a pool access room,clean ,comfortable bed, pillows great ,stayed in room 138 for 5nights .          Buffet breakfast is amazing variety,you could stay for weeks and still not try everything!          A big thank you to TukTa ,housekeeping,for her amazing towel origami’s she would leave on our bed every morning and thank you to Pan for helping us with the purchase of the clay animals that we admire…

title: Excellent Service!
review: Dear cookieMelbourne,   We would like to express our gratitude for your on-going support to our property and for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers!   Knowing we have managed once again to make your stay fantastic makes our job worthwhile and leads us to believe we have fulfilled our mission in creating memorable experiences.  We are already looking for your return and to have the chance to pamper you and your family next year. Should there be anything you would like us to take care of prior to your next stay, please let us know.   With Grand Regards,

title: Very good indeed
review: The hotel and location is great! From arrival to departure it was a pleasant experience. All the staff friendly but i want to say thank you special Sannie, Milky and Noom for being accommodating, the room view is so relaxing and the quality of the pillow and bed is really relaxing, also want to say thank you for the birthday cake and birthday set up on the bed, really appreaciated 😍. Sure i will come back! 🙏

title: Excellent Service and Good Location
review: Dear uglyme1904,   Thank you very much for writing such a positive review following your recent stay with us.   We are flattered to know you have appreciated the attentiveness and friendliness of our team members especially Sannie, Milky and Noom. Please rest assured that we will thank them on your behalf!   Thank you once again for your support, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Not up to it's five star rating
review: I can see why this hotel was a 5 star but gets rated a 4 star/ We were very happy with the hotel. Our criticisms are minor but enough to explain why the hotel does not rate 5 stars. The central courtyard design closes off the city from the hotel very well. The 3 level pool design allows for ground floor rooms to open onto the courtyard/pool area. The main pool had some deficiencies such as green mold under the lip of the deck. On our last day of 12 the mold algae had been scrubbed but only about 90%. The waterfall feature in the main pool never worked which disappointed me because it would have provided excellent neck massage.  The room was quite sufficient save for not enough drawers. We had to use our suitcases since we couldn't entirely unpack. The end tables on either side…

title: Relaxing and enjoyable trip
review: It was with great pleasure to stay at Grand MERCURE Phuket Patong between 5-9 Feb. Started from airport transfer with nice cold towel & cold water provided to quick checked-in at members counter, to spa, dinner at bubbles, room service, spa treatment to the cooking class at bubbles, we had a wonderful and relaxing time.  The cooking class is the highlight of our trip. Recommend to everyone great for family and company team bonding. Started with visit to the local market selecting produce to cook in the restaurant we even bought extra seafood and fruits at the market and the chief is so generous to cook the extra dish for us. We had a wonderful time.  Special thanks to Aey (Ass  Restaurant Mgr) Night (Thai cooking Chief) for the wonderful time at the morning market and cooking…

title: Nice spot great location
review: Dear RinaT347,   Thousand thanks for this amazing review of your recent stay with us!   We are absolutely pleased to hear about your exceptional experience with us. Indeed, we highly recommend our cooking class as it's a great way to discover the local culture, fresh markets, Thai food and spices while having fun learning new recipes!   We will surely thank Aey, Nigh and Ann on your behalf and we are all looking forward to your return!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Excellent location, good facilities
review: My wife and I spent the second half of our Thailand vacation at the Grand Mercure in Phuket on Patong beach. This hotel is located right in the center of everything. You could take a nice walk to bangla road at night or to the Jungceylon shopping center. No need for cabs or tuktuks. The hotel ground themselves are kind of small. They have a nice pool area with a swim up bar and lounge chairs. Located right next to the pool is Bubbles their restaurant. Now I went there once for dinner and I did not like it. See my review for Bubbles for more details. The Ryn spa offers very long massages at great prices. I got a signature Thai massage and it was amazing. The room was very modern looking which I liked and the air condition worked perfect. The room was also always stocked with…

title: EXCELLENT - 5+
review: Dear nick2488,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us!   We are delighted to hear you had a good stay with us and enjoyed the convenient location, the treatment at Ryn Spa and the comfort of the room!   Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great place, excellent service
review: Me and my partner stayed here in December 2018 and we really liked this hotel. We stayed in a pool access room which was lovely. The instant access to the pool off of our own deck was fab. When you book a pool access room you automatically have access to the lounge which is brilliant, it's a little room where you can go sit and have free hot and cold drinks, tasty sandwiches, cakes, biscuits, pastries and other snacks between 11 and 5pm every day, highly recommend taking advantage of this! The room was really nice and comfortable with good amenities. You don't get much sun though on the pool access decks due to the building and the trees but this is the case throughout the whole sunbathing area of the hotel, you'll need to follow the sun around if you want to sunbathe all day!…

title: Love Love Love!!
review: As we a couple we stayed here for 3 nights. it was one of the nicest hotels i have stayed in. staff are very nice and helpful, rooms are really clean and lovely! pool area is great! and the breakfast is good with loads to choose from. it was my other halfs birthday so we got free birthday cake to the room! which was lovely

title: beautiful room and location
review: Dear 276justinel,   Thank you very much for your amazing review!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you had an amazing time with us and enjoyed both the property and the friendliness of our team members.   We do hope to have the opportunity to welcoming you back here in a near future and please feel free to contact us directly, we would be happy to assist with any arrangements you may need.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Excellent hotel
review: This hotel was our choice for honeymoon trip.Duaration from airport around 55 mins by local taxi,there is traffic jam in the late evening. Hotel lobby was beautiful and nice plant. Room was on highest floor with sunset view.Staff really lovely welcome

title: enjoyable sty at grand mercure
review: Dear xuelongyi,   Thank you very much for sharing your comments with us!   We are absolutely pleased to hear you enjoyed your honeymoon trip at our property!  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon. Please feel free to contact us should you need any assistance.  Warm regards, Valentine

title: Nice Hotel
review: Grand Mercure is a wonderful 5 star hotel and well worth booking in Patong. My wife and I stayed here and enjoyed every day of it.
