Excellent breakfast which simply can’t be faulted, good pool bar with happy hour too. We didn’t avail of evening food but we heard it was delicious from fellow guests. The pool and sun beds were fab and there was a good vibe from the overall feel of the hotel. The employees of this hotel are what make it tick obviously, and their warm welcome and smiles were really second to none. The breakfast team (staff) were amazing with robotic precision yet with customer care warmth a priority, simply incredible. Yes this is a pricey hotel but you get what you pay for and although the rooms are not huge I was still satisfied. If I return to Patong I would be…

title: Amazing hotel, facilities and staff!
review: Great hotel, amazing room!  Very nice breakfast buffet with lots of options!  The pool is also very very nice, spacious, sun all day long and beautiful set up.   Special thanks to Phillip, at the reception front desk (for gold and platinum members) who has been amazing since minute 1 at the check-in right till the end of our stay, being so helpful, always being there to cover our special needs.   Paul & Eva

title: Patong Hotel
review: Dear evasZ8285UL,   Thank you so much for your valuable feedback!   As one of valued member, your comments are highly appreciated. We are absolutely delighted to hear we met your expectations and that you felt welcome by Phillip and the team.  We hope to see you again next year!  Best Regards, Valentine

title: Can't Wait To Return
review: The hotel had all the amenities we required. However our room was small.  The  one fault was the slight lips when moving from one area to another, particularly around the pool area.  My travelling companion tripped and fell on one of these which was unmarked.  Luckily she was unharmed.

title: Great Hotel in good area
review: This was our 3rd stay at this hotel & right from the moment we made our booking Sita was in touch with us making sure that everything would be ready for us just the way we like it. From the moment we pulled up at the hotel we were immediately greeted like VIPs, check in was quick and we were personally escorted to our room. When we walked in there was a lovely flower arrangement on the bed along with a photo taken at one of our previous visits and a hand written note welcoming us back. We certainly felt very special. Throughout our stay Sita & Jern made sure we had everything we required. On the day of departure another handwritten note was delivered thanking us for staying with them & wishing us safe travel home. The hotel itself offers everything you could need, large pools…

title: Hotel  Paradise.
review: Enjoyed my 19 night stay from arrival to departure it was a pleasant experience.The Staff can not do enough for you and so polite.A good torture room(Gym} is situated and people actually used it.Good supply of sunbeds with comfortable and clean mattress available. Plenty of pool towels available for everyone,s needs.Pool has good access and handrail and is very clean and at a good temperature.Pool staff very efficient. Restaurant  is very good and can not fault the wide selection  at Breakfast.Bar Staff and waiters all very efficient although bar only seems to be occupied in Happy hour. Miss Dao was very good and the Manager I called Doctor as he sorted my sore throat. I used the attached Deli Chou Chou every day as always good value always helped by the Staff Proc Wan and Dor.

title: Good central location to everything
review: We chose this hotel based on reviews, $$, n location. Service n staff were great. The only downside was the ongoing sewer like smell that came from the toilet. Maybe my expectations were higher than the norm but I was very bothered by the smell.

title: 50th birthday present for my hubby - a james bond fanatic.
review: Highly recommended - kudos to all the staff especially Oil , Sonnie and Audy who always ready to help out in all our needs. Oil for arranging SURPRISE petal flowers  - Khorb Khun Mark Na Ka/Krup - till next time.

title: My birthday trip.
review: Dear Lorna C,   Greetings from Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We sincerely appreciate your beautiful comment and your appreciation towards the great hospitality of our team, especially Oil, Sannie and Audy: We will surely share your comments with them.  Thank you for recommending us and we are all looking forward  to welcome you back very soon!  Kind Regards, Stechia

title: Relaxing time in busy Phuket
review: We've just returned from a wonderful stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong resort. From the moment we arrived at the hotel we were welcomed with refreshments and a cool unique drink with Chou the signature here.  The staff took a personal interest in what our needs were and ensured we were comfortable.   The setting, the amenities and the rooms are fantastic. Thank you for Birthday Message on the bed with welcome rabbits.  The dinner at Bubble restaurant was something i  looked forward to celebrate my birthday.  There are Boston Lobster, Lamb chop and signature dish Salmon tatare. Staffs in restaurant were very polite.   Even a night stay we met so many wonderful and special staff members devoted to their guests.  In particular Khun Oil who checked us in and always welcomed us…

title: The best!
review: Dear Perjer C,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience following your recent stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We are so grateful that you had a delightful holiday with us and that you feel welcomed. Knowing how much you enjoyed your stay is for us the most satisfying feeling and this provide us the motivation to keep giving our best to meet yet exceed our guest expectations.  We are more than happy to hear you had an excellent dinner at our Bubbles Restaurant for your birthday and that you appreciated the hotel in general.  We will share your comments to the entire team who will be surely thankful for all your kind words.  With the hope to see you for another beautiful memories with us!  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Fantastic service and great food Grand Mercure Phuket Restaurant
review: Amazing service and great hospitality the staff at the bubbles restaurant were fantastic especially at the breakfast buffet (Aor ,Rak and the team )  and the dinner at night(Cartoon and her team). Rooms and The resorts extremely clean very central great shopping.

title: Exceeds Expectations
review: Dear Nat7dan5,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and will surely take this opportunity to thank Aor, Rak, Cartoon and entire Bubbles Restaurant team for their friendliness and dedication :)  Looking forward to welcoming you both back! Sebastien

title: A very nice hotel
review: We just came back from our amazing holiday. Accor Plus Gold members.We were treated like royalty from the moment we checked in. We had booked two swim out pool rooms for 8 nights but upgraded to two pool villa rooms. These rooms are amazing and so spacious. The duty manager Nopporn could not have looked after us any better! Being an Accor Member entitles you to visit the afternoon tea room from 11am - 5pm with unlimited soft drinks/Cappuccinos/juice and an array of sandwiches/cakes/fruit/salads and treats though out those times. Ryan ensured my family was well looked after in this room - thank you! All the staff are extremely friendly and only to happy to help you with anything you need. Sebastien the General Manager was very welcoming and again made us feel like royalty -…

title: The best hotel we experienced in Thailand!!
review: Dear bindybum,  What a beautiful and complete review you did here for us!  We would like to thank you for your very impressive review and the amount of information you are giving us which can be useful for our future guests.   Really grateful that you and your family had a wonderful holiday with us, thanks to our dedicated team. We definitely attribute our success to them and shall ensure that your personal recognition is shared with all.   Thank you for recommending us and we are looking forward to welcome you and your family back for another fabulous memories!  With Grand Regards, Stechia

title: One stay was enough
review: it is a great location for anyone who wants to be in the center of everything in phatong beach are but no view from outside although the view of the swimming pools from inside are very nice overall it was a very good experience especially the recieptionists  where very friendly and helpful especially Ann

title: Good hotel with excellent location and nice staff at Patong
review: We couple made a travel to Phuket Patong in mid-Dec 2018 and stayed there for 4 nights. The hotel can be easily accessed to Patong Beach, malls and night market but it still has quiet environment.  Its staff is nice and helpful. This is especially to Miss Oil who advised me where to visit and helped us to rent a car to visit Phuket places including the Old Town, Chalong Temple and the Big Bhdda. Another staff (a lady) also willingly helped me to arrange a car to the airport after our last day. Food at the hotel is also great especially the Friday seafood dinner buffet. We enjoyed much out stay in this hotel.

title: A haven away from the craziness of Patong!
review: Dear siukail2018,  Thank you so much for writing such a flattering review on your recent stay with us. We are very honored and more than happy to learn you have enjoyed everything that we stand for.  Special thanks to Oil for making your stay special and to the entire team for their friendliness and dedication.  With the hope to see you again for a much more fabulous memories!  Best Regards, Stechia

title: One of thr bestest Resort in Patong!
review: It’s been 10 years since I’ve been to Phuket, but we wanted to visit James Bond Island so it was the obvious choice.  Patong is bigger, busier and noisier than ever, but the Mercure is a great choice if you stay here.   It’s a lovely resort, really well run - it’s the amazing team of staff that really make the experience. You really do feel special the whole time you’re there, and the whole team smile and greet you wherever you are.  Special thanks go to the incredibly helpful and charming Ni on front desk, she is a wonderful ambassador for the hotel and a true shining star. Thank you Ni !  Also want to mention Pang at the lobby bar- always smiling and so helpful! Another stand out member of staff!  So... the hotel. Rooms are lovely, spacious, clean and well appointed. Beds…

title: Nice place but dangerous pool
review: Dear DaversLondon,  Thank you so much for your detailed and constructive feedback.  We are more than happy to read you enjoyed stay with us.  We are also glad to see that our team, especially Ni and Pang, as well as the various services available were up to your standards.  We have taken good note of the matter of the pool area and please rest assured that we will implement appropriate actions for improvement.  Thank you for recommending us and we are looking forward to welcome you back for more fabulous memories.  Kind Regards, Stechia

title: GOOD HOTEL AND GOOD LOCATION
review: My parents are celebrating their 40th Wedding anniversary and my husband and I celebrated our 2nd wedding Anniversary. We chose to stay at Grand Mecure Phuket Patong! Best choice ever! This is our 3rd time to Phuket.   Reception was swift. One of the male receptionist was super helpful and attentive. The Concierge team did a fantastic rooming  and he was so knowledgeable!  The staff greeted us sincerely and made my parents feels like VIP! They are attentive, effficient and went the extra mile to ensure we had a fantastic and memorable stay.  Breakfast was great with good varieties of food selection and attentive team members. Housekeeping Team were fast and efficient! They even decorated our rooms.  Front office and reservations team answered my enquiries within the hour.   Come…

title: Don’t settle for less!
review: We arrived in Patong Beach to discover our original booking at another hotel was nowhere to be found. The difference between the original potential hotel and Grand Mercur was night and day and the snafu was a blessing in disguise. You don’t want to settle for less in Patong.

title: Far from what their photos let you believe
review: Dear SADallasTX,  First of all, we would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us!  We are more than happy to read you enjoyed your stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  Looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future.  Kind Regards, Stechia

title: Amazing stay
review: Stayed there for 4 nights around new years eve. First we come there around 3pm and they dont have the rooms ready before 5.30. They gave us temporary rooms which was nice tho.   We stayed in the pool access rooms, 2 rooms side by side. It is a nice idea, but a little weird in use. There is no shower, so after swimming you have to walk through your room to the bathroom to get rid of the chlorine. The terrace should have a power outlet too, for charging your phone etc.   The bathroom had a bathtub, but there was no curtain or glass door to keep the water away from the floor. So most of the time we had a puddle in the bathroom and water drops everywhere from the balcony to the bathroom.   They had a huge problem in 1 of our tooms with the toilet, and they removed it and fixed it…

title: Perfect! Just perfect!
review: Originally we had booked Tri trang hotel but on arrival found that it was completley unsafe- utter dissapointment. We booked our selves  in to the Grand Mercure and upon arrival we were immediately impressed. We received a warm welcome from all of the staff.  The lady at the front desk- Ann was especially helpful. When we were checking in we realised we had booked 2 rooms without breakfast but Ann helped us out by giving us breakfast at a discounted price.  At check in we got to indulge in delicious choux pastry and welcome drinks after which we were escorted to our rooms.  We had no hassle with this hotel at all. Great end to our holiday!  Thank you to all the staff especially Ann at Grand Mercure who made our stay a memorable one.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Amna S,  We thank you very much for this amazing review of the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We are really glad to see that our team, especially Ann, as well as the services available were up to your standards.  Rest assured that we will share your review with all our team members.  It will be an honour to welcome you back for more fabulous memories.  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Amazing and Beautiful Resort
review: PROS  Absolutely BEAUTIFUL resort Property was immaculate and spotless The staff were SO polite and helpful. The service they provided was just so appreciated by my entire family The pool area was great and well maintained with a swim up bar The morning breakfast buffet was AMAZING with so many options. For vegetarians like us we had NO problems find vegetaran options. In fact, there were several great tasting Indian dishes for breakfast which were great tasting The property is ABSOLUTELY beautifully lit up at night We would come back and stay here in an instant the next time we come back. No hesitation whatsover Great location to Patong beach (one street over) and super location to the main strip/street where all the great shops and restaurants are There is a GREAT tasting…

title: Friendly and professional
review: Dear BoroBandit,  What a beautiful and complete review you did here for us!  We really like how you comment about your stay, truly bring us the motivation to keep doing the good work and improve the highlight you explained in your review.  We are also very pleased to read you and your family had a wonderful experience from our amazing breakfast and the hotel's convenient location.  We hope all those memories you had with us will keep you filled with pleasure till your next holiday with us!  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Family Holiday in Phuket
review: Great service friendly staff and amazing massages at the spa. Based in the heart of paying it is nice and close to everything you need. The offer a kids club and babysitting services which helps when you want to get out and explore.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: Dear Lailasfamilytravels,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel and for sharing your experience with us!  We are glad to hear we were able to provide you with a wonderful and comfortable stay accompanied by a friendly and professional service!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more pampering experience in a near future!  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Great holiday - great location
review: We are a family (kids aged 10 and 8) based in Europe traveling to Asia for the first time. We decided to book the Grand Mercure because we read the reviews on Tripadvisor regarding the breakfast (which surprised us as to the high quality and served daily to a very high standard).  Further, we also read about the impeccable service from the entire hotel staff - it was all true! It appears that the Grand Mercure are very selective in their personnel and the hotel is very lucky to have such great employees, from Gift and her front desk team, who welcomed us and greeted us warmly throughout our stay and up until our departure on our almost 2 week stay. We could not fault the entire restaurant and catering team, especially the friendly and helpful staff at the fresh juice and…

title: Amazing Phuket Patong Resort
review: Wonderful resort with attention to detail. We stayed here for 8 nights on our honeymoon. It exceeded expectations in guest service, food service, room amenities and location. We highly recommend Grand Mercure. We especially want to acknowledge Gift, Woody and all the staff. Thank you for making this a wonderful experience that we'll treasure for years to come.

title: Excellent - Friendly Staff, Great Breakfast and Quiet Location
review: Dear 972kirkd,  Allow me to thank you for such an amazing review!  We are pleased to know that all our team succeeded to make your honeymoon wonderful.   Above all, we are grateful for the feedback you shared concerning the excellent service of our team, the food and the convenient location.  Please stay assured we will pass your warmest regards to everyone, especially to Gift and Woody.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more pampering experience in a near future.  Kind Regards,  Stechia

title: Very good hotel. Excellent service, very good food and friendly staff.
review: Patong as we all know is a crazy, busy and noisy place. Grand Mercure is a superb place to unwind even though it is not far from the action.  It is located in a quiet part of Patong, yet just short 10-15 minutes walk to the beach, Jungceylong and Bangla.  Breakfast is superb with lots of choices and constantly refilled. Pool is nice and relaxing. Gym has most of the equipment one will need and not to mention it is opened 24 hours. Room is clean and air-conditioning is strong. Wifi speed is excellent.  The highlight of the whole hotel has to be their staff, everyone is so cheerful and friendly. They really made us feel welcome and special.   Of course, not all hotels are perfect... the hot shower temperatures are not constant especially during the 'peak hours'. Hope the…

title: The (not so) Grand Mediocure hotel
review: Dear Ryan L,  Thank you very much for sharing a genuine coverage of our property!  We are pleased to learn that you had a great experience here namely; at the restaurant during your breakfast, at the pool, the gym and other facilities provided.  Thank you for praising the hard work of our team, their cheerfulness and friendliness. They are ready to make the extra mile so as you can experience the best holiday ever.  We have communicated your constructive feedback about the shower temperatures to the department concerned and we will definitely improve on that.  Look forward to have another opportunity to welcome you.  Grand Regards,  Stechia

title: Not 5 Star Resort
review: Stayed here for 2 weeks. Very happy with everything. 7 min walk to the beach, lots of restaurants and bars nearby. The pool is great, free towels, a bar etc. Absolutely a great hotel, also for families with kids.

title: Grand Mercure Hotel
review: Good Location and spacious lobby.Friendly and helpful staff. Very nice Pool access for the 3 rooms. My family total enjoy the stay at Grand Mercure PhuketGreat compliment high tea. Walking distance to Major Shopping mall

title: Very good hotel, fantastic staff
review: Dear Climber52075239856,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review following your recent stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience and found the hotel amazing, your room nice and you appreciated the friendliness and helpfulness of our team.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Good Hotel and great staff
review: Loved the hotel , loved staff who smiles all the time. When i get to the hotel i was very sweaty and tired. They immediaetly got cold glass of water, they served this tasty drinks.. Ann ( reception staff) very kind and served us so well. She even got me this tasty drink leaves , written the instruction to how to make it and left it in my room before we depart. I would love thank Ann and staff for making us welcome and making our stay delightful. Thank you again.

title: Very good hotel a good location in Patong
review: Dear 230haticet,  Thank you so much for writing such a heartfelt review on your recent stay with us.   We are more than happy to learn that you had a wonderful holiday here and thank you for praising the genuine service of Ann for her dedication and friendliness. We feel so proud that the team succeeded in providing you an exceptional service.  We hope to welcome you for another memorable holiday in the near future.  Best Regards, Stechia

title: Nice staff
review: The hotel is very well located and the rooms are spacious. We were a group of 91 and we all enjoyed it very much. The service was very good and it was smooth for our entire group. A receptionist called NAT was very helpful and helped everything go as planned.

title: Awesome Hotel
review: We have stayed at his Hotel a number of times when in Patong. The hotel is positioned allowing easy access to all areas of Patong. Directly across from Otop markets, easy walk to beach, many local restaurants. Inside the hotel you are silenced from the craziness of Patong. Very new and well maintained. The staff are all exceptional and will do anything to help and make your stay more comfortable. The ‘Bubbles’restaurant is amongst the best. The breakfast is outstanding and we always enjoy the Seafood Buffet night. The in-house Bakery is also worth a visit. We will definitely be returning to the Grand Mercure Patong

title: Wonderful 10 day stay
review: Dear Thailandtania,  Greetings from Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  We thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property.  It gives us immense pleasure knowing that your stay among us has been a splendid one with the convenient location, the excellent food at our Bubbles Restaurant and bakery shop.   Once again thank you and we hope to welcome you for another memorable holiday in the near future.  Kind Regards, Stechia

title: Good Hotel and good staff
review: Grand Mercure provided everything I look for in a 5 star hotel; beautiful decor, efficient daily room cleaning, welcoming staff, well equipped small fitness area, spa, restaurant and picturesque pool. The staff especially represented Thailand as the land of smiles. The hotel is located within walking distance of the beach and a vibrant night market. I would recommend Grand Mercure without hesitation

title: The best
review: Dear Kim B,  It was a pleasure to have you at Grand Mercure Phuket patong!  We are happy to see that you thoroughly enjoyed each and every aspect of our hotel facilities.  Rest assured that we will share your review with all our team members.  Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more exceptional experience!  with Grand Regards, Stechia

title: Stunning place
review: The Hotel Is good and good Location.The staff Is friendly and helpful . I want to say thank you to Noom,Batty,and Mouse for good Service.Also the Bell man Is good Service. I will come back agiab Next Time

title: Delightful stay
review: We stayed here 9 nights. Plenty to say. Centrally located, walking distance away from Bangla road and close to plenty of shops and restaurants. Beware though, this is not a resort, given its location in the heart of a very busy town, it’s a luxury hotel with apartments, a gym, Ryn spa/massage (at a cost), sauna, bakery, bubble bar, beer bar, restaurant, pool table and a very long swimming pool with swim up bar. The rooms are clean and service impeccable.   The first night we arrived around 11 pm, our room had a strong moldy odor about it, presumably from air conditioner. We were too exhausted, and slept off regardless. The next morning, while discussing trips with reception, mentioned it in passing. They were immensely apologetic, immediately offered to take us to other vacant…

title: Great Hospitality with Warm smile
review: Dear tripculture912,  Thank you for taking your time to review us on TripAdvisor.  We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us and for  your appreciation towards Oil for her professionalism and friendliness.  We are looking forward to welcome you back to Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more exceptional experiences.  Best Regards Stechia

title: Grand Mercure Patong – Always Exceeding Expectations
review: This is my 3rd visit to Phuket. We spent 4 days at Grand Mercure and enjoyed the experience. 1) As Muslim this hotel provides decent Halal breakfast. From the Indian, Thai and vegetarian. What I love most is the egg Benedict - perfect for me. The fresh juices and tradition Thai beverage serve during breakfast. But My complement goes to all the service crews. They are superb, w/out fail greet the guests warmly every time.  2) the reception staffs are very professional and friendly. My Husband injured his left knee just before the trip and need aid to walk. They offered me help and show sincere care towards our needs.  I truly touched by the extra mile service. ❤️ 3) overall this hotel is nice and convenient to all major attractions.  The hotel provides one way shuttle service…

title: That special something
review: Dear LinAmran,  First of all we would like to thank you for taking the time to share your review following your stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We appreciate to hear that you had a wonderful time with us from the professional service to the last choice at the breakfast! Mr. M is pleased to know that he contributed in making your day with us memorable.  Saying so, we would like to put forward our sincere apologies for the disturbance caused nearby your room. Please rest assured that we will look into the matter closely and implement the appropriate actions for improvement.  We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you again soon for a much more fabulous experience.  Best Regards,  Stechia

title: Excellent location
review: This year, which is my 8th trip to Thailand, I brought reinforcements meaning my son and his partner came with me to Thailand. As always, my 14-day stay came off without a hitch. The hotel limo driver was at the airport waiting for us to arrive from Bangkok. After collecting our bags, we were off to Patong where the hotel is located right in the heart of everything. I once referred to The Grand Mercure as “An Oasis in the Heart of Patong.” Nothing could be truer. The reason I say this is shopping, the beach, hundreds if not thousands of restaurants and night markets are all within a 5 to 20-minute walk. There are many luxury resorts all over the area surrounding Patong and Phuket, but you will need taxis or Tuk Tuks to go anywhere. Not at The Grand Mercure. The hotel provides…

title: Excellent location, friendly staff and welcoming
review: I stayed 3 nights in this hotel from 11 December to 14 December 2018. Ni (Staff Member) at the front desk did my check in. I requested Ni not to allocate room next to Elevator or cleanlng room. She allocated room just opposite to cleaning room. The room number was 405. When I opened the room I felt very strong smell and it was due to  mould developed in around bathroom vanity pan, skirting board in the looked like never been cleaned and no treatment of mould. Ni came with me upto the room which I appreciated very much. I asked Ni if she felt smell but she told me she did not feel smell. I sought an appointment with General Manger to raise smell and mould issue. I spoke to Duty Manager Ms Gift first. She changed my room which was much more better. I found Ms Gift is pro active,…

title: Great hotel and great location
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure for my sons wedding. They went above and beyond to make our holiday wonderful. Thank you to all the lovely staff as they were all amazing. Huge range at buffet breakfast to accomodate every nationality.

title: Beautiful Hotel with Amazing Staff
review: Dear KarenK1965,   Thank you once again for choosing our property for your last vacations!   We are glad to hear everything went well and that you have appreciated both the large breakfast spread and the friendliness of our team members.  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in the future and we take this opportunity to wish you a Merry Christmas and plenty of good things for the new coming year!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Above and beyond...
review: I highly recommend this hotel. The location is in the heart of Patong. The facilities (rooms, pool, fitness centre, restaurants) were always clean, tidy and comfortable. The staff were amazing always smiling and offering their assistance.  We were helped by Mr Bond, Ms Beer and Ms Pang and they were exceptional.

title: Just Good
review: Dear Shivani M,   Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property!   We are pleased to hear your comments and will surely share them with Bond, Beer and Pang!   May we also take this opportunity to wish you and your family a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year 2019.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  Warm regards, Valentine

title: Good property and great staff
review: Its a good property at walking distance from beach, mall, bars and great staff.  There are not enough options for vegetarian Indians but hotel is opposite to a big and clean Indian restaurant.  Room is small but well equipped, nice pool.   Best part of the hotel was its staff especially guest relationship manager and executive chef.

title: I can't wait to go back
review: Dear Jatinder24,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us!   We are glad to receive your compliments towards the team attentiveness and also pleased to hear you enjoyed the convenient location of our property.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Great location and good hotel
review: My friend and I stayed at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong from November 16-21st and it was amazing. The hotel is  5 minutes from the beach, 10 minutes from one of the malls and across the street from the night food market where we ate Pad Thai a few nights for 100 Baht.  It is close to everything you may need. We stayed at one of the pool villas. It was nice having our own pool. From the moment we arrived until we left we received first class service. The staff was so friendly and helpful. I had the opportunity to have a Thai boxing lesson with Pom. He was friendly, professional and was a great instructor. We also received great service from the restaurant and Business Center, and front staff. Specially want to recognize Stechia for helping me put together my friends surprise…

title: Perfect location
review: Dear LarimarXO,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review following your recent stay at the hotel!   We are grateful to know you had an amazing and memorable experience at the property! There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourself extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very friendly staff except front desk
review: When we arrived we were presented with lovely treats and fresh juice. Our room was nice, but there were rooms next to us and they preferred to leave their doors open and let the children run between. We don't have children and intended on being relaxed for 2 weeks. So we spoke to reception and they moved us immediately, no fuss at all. We had the breakfast buffet once, as didn't go for it when booking. There is an interesting selection of food, very heavy influences of Asia, so not everyone's cup of tea for breakfast (no pun intended). But there is cereal and toast etc. The pool bar 'Bounce' did nice cocktails and the guys working there are absolutely lovely. The hotel is kept very clean and it is in a really great location. It ticks all the boxes for being near everything, but…

title: Best hotel in Patong
review: This is a fantastic hotel. My wife and I just spent a few nights at the Mercure, at the end of our holiday. The staff at the Mercure really go the extra mile. We were so impressed with this hotel. Great service, lovely pool. Best breakfast buffet in Phuket! We will definitely be back!

title: Definitely worth staying here
review: Dear MurrayI11,   Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with an excellent service and with a variety of facilities. Your comments have been shared with the rest of the team who are delighted to hear you have appreciated your stay!   Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Absolutely AMAZING !!!
review: I had a pleasant stay at this property. I would like to thank duty manager Ms Beer for her help during my stay with a few items. I arrived at 10h30 which as ahead of my check in time of 14h. The staff was friendly, seating me during the check in and offering me a light refreshment and pastry. I was issued my keys and taken to my room. Because of some issues, I was upgraded to a pool access room. The room was nicely laid out and clean. The room had nice tea and coffee facilities, as well as free water (4 bottles that were 500 ml each, replaced daily). All areas of the hotel are nicely maintained. The pool was quite nice. Other hotel guests were decent people. You feel safe leaving your belongings in the pool area while swimming. The bar area is nice. There is a nice sitting area…

title: Great hotel will be back
review: Dear rsharmany,   It is a great pleasure to read your wonderful experience with us and we would like to thank you for sharing it with us!   We are really happy to know you enjoyed every part of your stay specially thanks to the warm welcome you received from our team and especially Ms. Beer and please rest assured, we will pass on your warmest regards to her!  We hope to have the chance to welcoming you back to our property in the near future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Craft Bar Lounge
review: Me and my wife spend 12 days at  GRAND MERCURE HÔTEL. First of all the hotel is very well located you don’t need to rent scooter or car to go around to do shopping, the beach or even to Bangla road That is the main road for night out... The hotel is super clean rooms are great, spacious and very comfortable, the breakfast is outstanding so many choices of local or European food, they also have large selection of healthy food and juices done “ à la minute “. The staff is extremely kind, helpful and very professional... I would like to congratulate them all especially YEN and SAI for the best MORNING WELCOME !!! At the front desk everybody is also very attentive to details and very helpful get the to organise your trip to phi phi island or your elephant trekking... you’ll be very…

title: Top notch service, professional and proactive!
review: Held an event for 61 people over the past week. From meetings to room allocation down to the minor details of themed coffee breaks. Just want to give special mention to Khun Ward, Bee, Oak, Nic and Aor. They are always smiling and ready to provide us with the best when we need.

title: 2nd time here! 5* service
review: Dear zhapalang_peekures,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us!  We are delighted to know you had a business trip with us at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we would like to express our gratitude for the positive feedback given on the warm welcome you received from our friendly team and on the comfortable rooms as well!   We look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Can't fault this place
review: This hotel is amazing! Stayed for five nights and loved it! Chose to come back as we knew the standard was high! Breakfast choice is awesome even for the fussiest of waters! Loved the Thai cold coffee at breakfast!  Location of this hotel is spot on for bars and places to eat! If we come back to Patong, we will definitely stay here and big thanks to June who never stopped to be inventive with towels on the bed! Had rabbits, a dog, a elephant, crab and fishes... awesome and THANK you!

title: A sanctuary in the heart of busy Patong
review: Dear Angela H.   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your last experience at the property!   We are glad to learn you had an amazing 2nd trip and was still impressed by the level of the standards. We will surely share your comments with June and the team!  We would like to take this opportunity to wish you and your family a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year 2019!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Service
review: Travelled early November 2018.  Booked two pool access rooms. Cannot fault this place. Central location, close to the beach and shops. Very friendly staff, made us feel very welcome.  Clean rooms and grounds. Nice breakfast with a variety of cuisine.  Hope to come back there soon.

title: It´s a good hotel
review: Good hotel but a little expensive for what you get. The staff was really nice and helpful, so a big plus to them! The restaurant had really good food aswell, so definatly try it when you are there. And the daytrip-packages they can book for you is really well sorted out for people that I guess likes high standard, I took the one to Rachai island and I recommend you to try it also. So these things I really recommend.   My room was superb, I got upgraded to a junior suite. So the room was very nice. Bed was perfect, big balcony and so on. So i really appreciated my room alot and appreciate the upgrade - big thanks for that!  Anyhow I felt this hotel was more for families, the pool area was ok and I wanted a better bar-area since I travelled by myself and I enjoy hotel-bars.   So…

title: Great stay
review: We stayed at Grand Mercure for our honeymoon and had a good experience. The room size was quite small and cramped but clean. Had a pool view. Services were good. The breakfast spread was so elaborate we couldn't choose what to eat! Location is excellent, right in the middle of the busy market. Overall, a decent stay, but we may not choose to stay again.

title: Loved this hotel and staff
review: This hotel is superbly located - 5 min walk from Bangla road. The rooms were big, nice and pool facing. The hotel staff were amazing - very well organized and helpful. They helped us with late check out also.   Further, one thing which I would like to mention that they have a superb chef - and they serve super delicious food. Do try if you have some time.

title: Great phuket trip
review: I stayed in the grand mercure with my friend in phuket. I received excellent service from betty, Anne and sita. They were all very welcoming and ensured that I had a very good stay. I would recommend the grand mercure hotel again to friends that would like to stay in phuket.  Excellent staff especially betty!!!

title: Good for the price and location.  Service, food, and room quality, not so much.
review: Let's start with the obvious and that is this "five-star" hotel near Putong center for such a competitive price must be a great deal.  Yes, it is if you can put up with some mediocre service, boring breakfast menu with average to below average quality, and tired room.  I mean, come on, do you really expect real 5-star service, a WOW breakfast experience, and newly refreshed room for that price?  Not in that location obviously.  So my expectations were set quite low.  And so I was not too disappointed to find that the service, food, and room were 3-star quality at best.    We arrived at 2:20pm driving a rental.  Parking is free as advertised.  They basically direct you to self park near the exit area.  When we pulled up to the lobby entrance, we had to take our luggage out of the…

title: Second time Back- it was as good as the First!
review: My family and i just recently returned from staying at the Grand Mercure. It was fantastic! We stayed in a swiming pool access room, which had access to a club lounge where its open between 11-5pm and they serve all types of sweets, drinks, cheese, fruit, sandwhiches. It is fantastic, worth the money you spend. Upgrade thAt room, you wont regret it :)   The staff are lovely, which is why we came back. We had such a beautiful ‘welcome back’ welcoming and was Greeted by Sita and the staff. They go above and beyond to make our stay as perfect as the first. The breakfast is Amazing and quality of food is fantastic. Extremely clean, you always see people working so hard to assure everything is topped up, clean and friendly smiles. We also made use of the babysitting and kids room,…

title: Lovely hotel
review: My wife and I frequent Phuket and recently stayed at the Grand Mercure Patong hotel and enjoyed it very much. The hotel is clean and located near the beach, shops and eateries. Most notably are the service staff who were very helpful and always there to help. Special thanks to Ying at the Bubbles restaurant for excellent service. We will certainly stay here again at our next visit to Phuket.

title: Craft Beer Lounge
review: My wife and I stayed at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for the last 4 days of our honeymoon and were extremely happy with our decision to stay at this hotel.  They definitely provided the 5 star service they are rated with.  All of there staff was extremely helpful and kind no matter what was being asked of them.  If we ever come back to Phuket, we will definitely be staying here.  We were especially happy with the service we were provided at their Craft Beer Lounge and their worker Dao, she made our stay that much more special and taught us some of the Thai language.

title: High quality stay!!
review: Dear kraemerk20,   Many thanks for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Dao's hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: My Second Fabulous Stay
review: This location was conveniently close to everything we needed whilst still being a quiet and peaceful hotel. Great facilities, helpful and keen to please staff and the hotel has a high level of cleanliness. We had no issues. We always stay in the mecure in different countries and would highly recommend.

title: Decent hotel with perfect loaction
review: Very friendly staff. We stayed here for 7 days. We were two families and our request for adjoining rooms was easily fulfilled. Room service was very nice. Pool area was clean and well served. Location was perfect as it was close to everything and also not very crowded. Good restaurants around. In house cafe and bars were really good. Check in and Check out was very convenient.  Rooms are bit small but I guess doesn't matter much for few days.  It would be great to add some more activities at the hotel and some more entertainment tools in room like iphone docks or bluetooth speakers.  Breakfast was generally good but didn't change much during the week so we got bored. Items didn't look very innovative. Vegetarian options were less and Indian food was hopeless.  If we visit Phuket…

title: Tourism
review: It was a very nice property. It was very convenient in every respect. Neat and clean rooms. Close to the main hub. Staff is very much welcoming. We enjoyed thoroughly during our trip. Breakfast buffet was also aweaome

title: Execellent and memoriable stay with Grand Mercure Phuket Patong
review: Dear ankity136,   Thank you so much for your nice review!   We are glad to know you had a great stay with us and enjoyed the convenient location, the large spread at the breakfast and the warm welcome from our team members!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Perfect location and perfect staffs
review: I would like to thank all the staff and management of the hotel for making my recent stay a memoriable ones. This is my first time to Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and they have made my stay a 5 star! Staffs from all over the hotels (Front desk, business lounge, Bubbles Restaurant and housekeeping) have made my recent stay a great one and memoriable one. The staff really take into account your personal preference (I.e I love Cappuccino, and the remember it after my first order at the restaurant during breakfast and offered me a take away during my check out!). All the staffs are friendly, helpful, and genuine in their job. You can feel them personally although you don’t know them in person. The housekeeping have always made my day be making a decorative figurine from towel (each…

title: Great Hotel
review: Grand mercure patong is wonderful place. Location is perfect... you can go to the Patong beach in 10 minutes on foot. And all staffs are very kind. Especially Kids club staff and the rounge staff Far were very excellent ^^ I will come back again.

title: Stunning hotel, friendly staff
review: Love love love this hotel, the staff and the amenities. The rooms were beautiful and clean, the breakfast at Bubbles was totally amazing and nothing was ever any trouble for the staff.  My only reason for the 4 stars was the terrible design of the bathroom. Any water pooling in the edge of the bath, flowed straight onto the floor causing awful flooding anytime we had a shower. You had to remember to shut the blind after housekeeping, because people could see straight through to you sitting on the toilet or having a shower(we were in ground floor pool Access room) and the lighting was terrible.   Other than that, we would definitely stay again. The location is perfect for beach, shopping, night life and just getting out and touring around. But enough away to be quiet from the…

title: Most memorable stay
review: Me and my partner stayed only one night in grand mercure hotel, however with the service of Jern & Nampun we had most amazing stay!! We had warm welcoming at check in and our room was upgraded to private villa room from pool access room!! It was our anniversary stay and the room was decorated with beautiful flowers and welcome fruits :) for our next trip back to Phuket,  we will definitely stay with grand mercure again!! Thank you for your warm hospitality :)

title: Worst Experience Ever!!!!!
review: Dear Sightseer64099723339,   Thank you so much for taking from your valuable time to share your thoughts with us!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the special attentions and the friendliness of our dedicated team and in particular from Jern and Nampun!  Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Amazing Hotel and Staff
review: House keeping had to be called six times in one day in order to come and clean the room as we was there for nine nights. The whole room including bathroom and tables had ants and insect crawling all over. When I complained to the manager he asked to send the house keepers in again to clean the room which would not prevent them coming out of their holes and gaps again. This issues needed treating not cleaning over and over again. Staff did not take any action nor were they bothered. Had to cut the holiday short by five days and leave as it was getting unbearable.

title: A wonderful 30th Anniversary
review: The hotel and staff were AMAZING. All the staff were exceptional: special mention goes to Far, Nan and Pod who were always helpful and attentive.   The hotel is in a very good location;  - very close to Jungceylon (major shopping centre) - very close to the beach  - close to the hustle and atmosphere of Patong, but far enough away to get some respite.   All the facilities at the hotel are perfect. The hotel; - was always very clean  - has a great pool - and the most amazing breakfast   The hotel was fantastic, would stay here the next time I’m in Patong.

title: Great Hotel with Amazing Staff
review: The hotel is very good at the center of busy Patong in Phuket. Beach is 5-7 minutes walk from hotel, and it is few minutes walk from Bangla and Jungceylone Shopping Mall next to many shopping places. The best thing I liked about the Hotel is food and the staff service at restaurant, in particular I remember Ms Aof, was very helpful during breakfast. I will recommend Grand Mercure.

title: Wouldn’t stay anywhere else!!..
review: Dear Jugnoo S,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to know you had a great stay with us and we would like to express our gratitude for the positive feedback given towards Ms. Aof and the team!    Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact our team directly, we will be more than happy to assist with any arrangements you may need!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Bubbles restaurent
review: What an amazing resort we loved it there!!.. Buffet breakfast had everything you could want plus more very clean and fresh, room service amazing, drinks and happy hour was spot on, hotel pool, rooms everything was faultless and I’m very fussy about where we stay and here ticketed all the boxes.  Location was perfect, staff were all friendly and helpful really enjoyed our stay!!. Thank you 🙏🏼

title: Thailand Holiday
review: Dear Tasha P,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review following your stay at the hotel!   We are grateful to know we ticketed all your expectations! There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourself extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: WONDERFUL STAY
review: Yen was fantastic. She and her staff were so good and kind to us. We arrived from an overnight flight at 10.30 am, we were starving!. The breakfast staff were closing up, but were so pleased to help us. .

title: Good hotel and location
review: The hotel is located in Patong, you can walk to many places easily. Rooms are clean and new. They are smaller probably because they are newer. Breakfast is decent and the buffet offers plenty of food choice (eastern/western/local specialities). Gym is quite small but I’ve only seen one person used it. Pool is smaller than the marketing pictures. Since there are so many things to do around there we didn’t use it.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear KikiK6,   Thank you very much for sharing your comments with us!   We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your overall stay. We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in the future.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Room Had Bugs and Smelled
review: Great staff, great welcoming, especially from Betty, Pangko,milky and front office team is very nice and hotel has the best location and near any establishments. This hotel is a jewel in phuket. Way on how they welcomed us it was amazing, staff is very helpful

title: Excellent!
review: Dear V5185NQandreab,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us!   We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful stay with us and found our front office team really friendly. We will surely share your feedback with Betty, Pangko and Milky and thank them for their professionalism.  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Patong Vacation
review: My friend and I only stayed here for 2 nights. The first night I woke up with bug bites on my feet and legs. My friend also said she had bites in the same places. On top of that, as soon as we entered the room, it smelled like a basement and it seemed like the smell got worse as the day went on. The next morning I told the front desk and they said they'd do a deep clean in the room after we left for the day. When we came back, the room smelled the same. I would 100% NOT recommend this hotel.

title: Grand property, courteous staff, excellent service; Bubbles restaurant needs a mention.
review: If you have been looking out for a good, relaxing family holiday, I recommend Grand Mercure Phuket, Patong. Right from the point we stepped in, we felt taken care of. Ann at the front desk did everything to make us feel comfortable; our personal thanks to her for accommodating our requests. The rooms are extremely well maintained, the decor is inviting, the pool side a pleasure to rest and enjoy your drink. The staff at the property needs a special mention - from room service to restaurants. Bubbles is an excellent place to have your family dinner and have a relaxing time. Food that comes along is excellent too. Breakfast options are wide and wholesome too.

title: Relaxing Hotel at the vivid Patong Beach!
review: Dear ngghosh,   Allow me to thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you all had a wonderful time with us and found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the friendliness of our dedicated team! We will pass on your best regards to Ann who will be surely pleased by your kind words!   Again, thank you for all the compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us again!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Nice anderen calm place in Phuket!
review: If you need a relaxing place away from the crowded Patong Beach, I can recommend the Grand Mercure Hotel.  The hotel offers everything you need for some relaxing days, even if it's a 3 minute walk to the vivid Patong Beach with its bars and restaurants.  You can enjoy the big pool area, a beer at the new Craft Beer Lounge or the nice dinner, especially the Oriental Buffet in the evening with traditional Thai food.  All in all we had a nice stay and I want to mention the kind and attentive stuff in every part of the hotel. If you're looking for a nice place to stay at the Patong Beach, I can absolutely recommend the Grand Mercure Hotel.

title: Bubbles restaurant
review: Dear Mario P,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us!   It was a pleasure meeting you! We are grateful to hear you had a great experience with us and we hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Perfect and Relaxing Family Holiday
review: The Grand Mercure Hotel was a relaxing and calm place for exploring the vivid Phuket. From the hotel it's a 3 minute walk to the Patong beach, thus the hotel is in a great location. I can recommend the Oriental Dinner Buffet in the evening with traditional Thai Food. We were amazed by it! You can also have some relaxing moments at the huge pool with a small bar with drinks and cocktails. Especially I would like to highlight the attentive stuff, which was courteous and friendly at all the time.  If you're looking for a nice place to stay at the Patong Beach, I can absolutely recommend the Grand Mercure Hotel.

title: Not too bad
review: Nice hotel. Breakfast was average as I had better breakfasts at other hotels before.  Jungceylon mall is about 15 mins walk.   Pros 1) comfortable bed 2) friendly and helpful staff  Cons 1) water pressure and heater not consistent 2) a bit far from beach area

title: Grand Mercure
review: Dear VONinSG,   Thank you very much for your constructive review!   We are happy to hear you had a nice time at our property and really enjoyed the breakfast here!  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here.  Warm regards, Valentine

title: Excellent
review: First time to Phuket and had a great stay in Grand Mercure. Their staff are very nice and helpful. We spent much time in the grand club of the hotel every afternoon for high tea. We like Far very much and she's so adorable. Will be our first choice if we come back to Phuket.

title: Awesome experience
review: Dear Escape17769089344.   Thank you very much for reviewing our property!   We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your first trip to Phuket at our property and found our staff very friendly! We will surely share your comments to Far and thank her on your behalf.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!  Best regards, Valentine

title: We’ll be back!
review: Very good hotel.  Excellent location.  Cordial, co-operative and very helpful staff at Front Desk, especially Ms.Ann.  Beautiful swimming pool. 3 minutes walk to Patong beach.  Good Restaurants and market around. We are going to come back again...   Loved the stay.

title: nice
review: it is a nice place to spend several days here. And it’s lucky to visit the GRAND CLUB. Miss Far is warm and very helpful. I am very happy to stay here for 3 days. The view is very good and my room have a special swimming pool.

title: Lovely stay - would recommend!
review: Dear Curious06985032862,   Thank you very much for your review!   We are happy to hear you are having a good time with us. We will surely share your comments to Ms. Far!  We wish you a great end of stay with us and please feel free to let us know if you need anything.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Customer Service
review: Love this hotel. Just got back from our stay yesterday and will definitely miss it.   Here’s what we found -   Check in - Welcoming lovely staff. The drink and little sweet treat given on check in with cold towels was delicious! I do think you are asking way too much for a deposit for the rooms though and to have it based on how many days you stay is a bit crazy. It’s like punishing those that stay longer? 1000 baht per day is the deposit required in cash or credit card. It was just a bit of a shock to me, I’ve never paid that much before. I know it gets refunded after your stay, just seems like a lot. We had three rooms, we arrived early and they had two ready for us to check in early which was nice. On our departure they let us check out at 2pm for free instead of 12pm. We…

title: Great location friendly staff
review: Dear aleisha_89,  Many thanks for taking the time to write about your full experience at our property.  We are grateful for each of your comments and we hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Hotel
review: Recently stayed here for approximately a week.  Had a pool villa, a few issues with the room and pool which the staff went above and beyond to rectify.  Service of the staff was outstanding.  Restaurant (Bubbles) also very, very good. Ate there for dinner one night and was very impressed with the great food.  All round, great service, staff were very friendly and accommodating. Yes, definitely recommend.

title: Quiet oasis
review: Hotel is located in a pretty quiet location, but if you want to go to Patong beach it is just about 15-minute walk so this is a very good compromise. Service is very good, very smooth check-in and check-out process, all staffs are very friendly. Swimming pool is quite small but it is not a big issue. We stayed at deluxe pool room whereby room size is decent, room is clean but on the last day the cleaners forgot to provide us with floor mat and top-up the toiletries, and the towel was stained. Food spread for breakfast at Bubble restaurant is pretty standard with egg station, asian food section, western food section, middle eastern food section, fruit section, and bread section. It is a pity that the hotel does not serve more of local Phuket or Thai food. In the fruit section,…

title: Golfing
review: Very central location, good service and ambience. Clean rooms, nice pool area and near to local shops and not far from Beach. Good breakfast choice Special mention for very friendly staff in front office Ann, Ni & Batty for being helpful to our group

title: hug hotel
review: Dear JiteshShah,  Thank you very much for your review!   We are pleased to hear you had a good time with us and found our team to be friendly and helpful. We will surely thanks Ann, Ni and Batty for their dedication!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon. Best regards, Valentine

title: Do yourself a favour
review: i was there for holiday and the hotel was in very good location the stuff was so friendly and kind i really have a good time there the room was nice but the pool area a bit small but hug the pool bar is incredible if u are looking for some where to stay please check this hotel

title: Great hotel with friendly staff.
review: Dear Jane J,   Thank you very much for your lovely review and for recommending us.   We are absolutely grateful to hear all your comments and to know you enjoyed your holidays entirely.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon.  Best Regards, Valentine

title: The most amazing hotel in Thailand.....
review: And the most amazing staff as well.  It’s my 3rd time and they have never let us down. The hotel located centrally and is close to the beach. The room is lovely and even been upgraded to the pool access, my favourite room of all the time! Great selection of breakfast and importantly they care about their guests so much since they celebrated my friend’s birthday on the same day as the hotel’s general manager’s birthday too! I shall be returning next year. Love you all! Alex. Xxx

title: Cosy
review: Pros: Room was very cosy and the staffs were helpful. Love the bed. Cons: The current of the water wasn't strong (save the earth yea)Went during the monsoon, where we had to experience power trip in the hotel. But it was all around the town so can't blame the hotel.

title: Outstanding service
review: During my stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong I had received excellent service. On behalf of myself, and my husband, we would like to thank you for the efforts you have made to go above the five star training to making our stay a memorable experience. Your attention to detail of our likes and dislikes, preparations in ordering our favourites and patiently waiting for our return  to give us that personal service, truly lived up to the GRAND MERCURE promise of the best experience in Thailand.  And thanks to Far and Jame of the coffee VIP club, the receptionist, chiefs and all other staff for their dedication and excellence service skills. In addition, to the fantastic service the hotel was absolutely breathtaking. The interior design was modern with a relaxing ambiance. The…

title: Wedding Anniversary - 1st time to Thailand
review: LOCATION: This was our first time to Thailand, we stayed here for a week. The resort is perfectly situated close to the main road, local shops & bars. Jangceylon shopping centre & Banzaan Market are only a 5-10min walkaway even Patong Beach 🏝   ROOM TYPE: We had a poolside room 142 which was perfect for cooling down after a long day out in the heat from sightseeing & shopping. Rooms were cleaned every day & were always spotless.  The amenities in the bathroom were great. We had a king size bed, which was super comfy aircon was fantastic which was much needed. Minibar has a great selection. Room was perfect for us, but the highlight was having the pool just outside your balcony the water temp was perfect. We came with another couple, they were right next door, we could always…

title: I wouldn't stay anywhere else!
review: This is by far one of my favourite hotels in Thailand - and I've traveled over a fair few times!  Amazing, Friendly, polite staff in all aspects of the hotel. I always felt like royalty, even if I was just popping down to get some breakfast. We had a minor issue in our initial room and instantly were moved to a lovely poolside room without hesitation. A great place to relax and close walking distance to everything in Patong.

title: Excellent hotel
review: This hotel is very well placed, just off the main road through Patong. The rooms and facilities are excellent. The pool area is nice, quiet and sun loungers are always available.I would recommend the breakfast, there is a exceptional amount of choice for all dietary requirements and they cater for all cultural needs.

title: AMAZING STAY
review: Great place to stay...a choice well made..perfect location, warm and courteous staff, cosy beds and a great dining experience. All things needed for a amazing holiday are under this one roof. Special mention and a thank you  to " FON"  and " NAS" for making our checkin and checkout so smooth and efficient, to the ever helpful and hospitable staff of the "BUBBLES" restaurant who put up a lavish spread and to the chef who made Indian "samosas" and " veg spring rolls" especially for us. Thank you so much. Thank you to the  room service staff who put up so much and cleaned our rooms as and when required and made it spic and span with a terrific smile and also to the staff members of the pool bar who took excellent care of our children with delicious snacks when we were in the pool.…

title: Lovely establishment
review: Dear Seema B,  Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review following your stay at the hotel!   We are grateful to know you had an amazing and memorable experience at the property! There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you had a wonderful time with us and found yourself extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the friendliness of our dedicated team! Please stay assured that we will thank Fon and Nas on your behalf.   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Food very yummy
review: Stayed here for a week and from the time we stepped into the establishment we were impressed from the facilities they had to offer to the room itself.We had a poolside access room and while it was on the smallish side, it had everything we needed including a lovely welcome on our bed made from flowers and a cute little towel elephant that I did not have the heart to open up!The mini bar was stocked and refilled daily if we used anything from there.We had lovely breakfasts with everything from an egg station to muffins to a cold station with cold cuts, cheeses, salads alongside with all the usual hot Asian foods. There were also vegetarian options and a honeycomb where the honey was dripping into a saucer - delicious! There were several yogurt options and fresh milks. Outside…

title: Good Hotel Perfect Location
review: Dear onlyqob,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review of our property!   You made our day very special with all your words of praise and please rest assured that we will pass on your warmest regards to the team!  Many thanks again and we hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in 2019!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: The only hotel to stay in Phuket!
review: Having stayed in this hotel several times before, I am still extremely impressed with the service and location of this hotel in Phuket. Staff are genuinely friendly and helpful. The facilities are great. Of course the breakfast, it always lifts our spirit to step into the spacious restaurant for the fantastic buffet to start the day! Highly recommended!

title: Resort layout is poor
review: Dear HweeHall,   Thank you so much for your valuable feedback!   As one of our returning guest, your comments are highly appreciated. We are absolutely happy to hear we are still meeting your expectations throughout the time.   We hope to see you again next year!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Good hotel
review: The resort lay out is very poor. They have different 8 buildings with separate lifts. We were in a group and got rooms in different buildings so it was inconvenient for us. Rooms were available at 12 when we reached but were given only at 2pm. We had booked king bed rooms,  the receptionist said if we choose separate beds we can get rooms at 12. Rooms are very small and though the pool area is good but you cannot enjoy the pool area as layout is not convenient. However breakfast is superb. The only reason to be happy to book this hotel. Even if you are staying anywhere must try the breakfast.

title: Excellent experience
review: Very nice hotel, all the staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms are great, minibar prices not extortionate either. The breakfast buffet is excellent, definitely something for everyone there. Good location too.

title: in the middle of city
review: Dear kstill0101,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with a friendly service, a nice and cosy room and also with a fabulous breakfast to start the day perfectly!   Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: BRILLIANT HOTEL .. AMAZING STAFF
review: Cannot thank the wonderful staff members Bond and Toey enough.. you met our every wish, made my whole family feel welcome and important.. with your lovely smiles and willingness to go above and beyond .. no request was ever a problem. Rooms, pool, gym, breakfast, spa - ALL AMAZING. Location is central to shops and beach.. walking distance... Would definitely stay again!

title: Celebrating 10 years of bowyz trip with gijesh and tarak
review: Dear Orania E,   Thank you so much for your enthusiastic review following your stay at the hotel!   We are grateful to read you had an amazing and memorable experience, there is nothing more encouraging than knowing you found yourself extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to the friendliness of our dedicated team especially Bond and Toey!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: a FANTASTIC place to stay
review: Excellent hotel  Good property  Lovely location   Impressive   The staff were very good   Namely Milky and Sunny   They went out of their way to assist, smiling all the time, absolutely on top of their jobs.  Good work, mercure must be totally privileged too have staff like them   Wishing them all the best for their careers.

title: amazing travel in Grand Mercure Phuket Patong, Patong, Thailand
review: Dear ninotchka F,   Allow me to thank you for all the compliments expressed in your review on your wonderful experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our friendly team, brings a big smile to our face! We will surely pass onto your warmest regards to Milky and Sunny who are indeed dedicated to please our guests.   We hope to see you again in 2019!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Holiday in Patong
review: great hotel , friendly helpful staff and awesome food ,  the hotel is perfectly placed with food drink and shopping with in minutes walk . great family friendly pool  pool tables and ping pong to keep the kids entertained

title: Good Breakfast
review: my holiday there is good,  the swimming pool area is clean but the room was not clean properly but i like so much with breakfast to much varian and i want to say special thank you to mr. michael the one who work at the restaurant then thank you for hospitality youre very kind.

title: Superb experience
review: Dear Trail821079,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback with us here on Trip Advisor! We will surely share your kind comments to Mr. Michael for his professionalism and friendliness!  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in the future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: We Had An Amazing Trip!
review: Beautiful hotel, really fantastic. Totally recommend it. They have rooms are right on the water of the pool. Everything was clean, and the staff was friendly. Also the Muay Thai classes they offer through the hotel (with Kwang) were actually good. Couldn’t say enough good things.  Looking forward to going here again!

title: first class hotel, great staff, amazing food
review: Dear PrJason,   Many thanks for the great review of our property!   We are delighted to learn that you enjoyed all the features of the hotel including the entertaining Muay Thai classes by Kwang, the refreshing pool access rooms along with a friendly service!   Thank you again for sharing your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to Phuket in the near future.  Best Regards, Valentine

title: Great Hotel with great staff
review: My boyfriend and I spent 9 days at Grand Mercure and it was amazing! The staff here is very friendly and helped with suggestions of things to do while there. Special mention of Faw, Ryan, Audi and Mike from Bubbles restaurant. The breakfast buffet is a must to include! They were all very attentive and nice. The hotel is in a good location  as well. I liked that it was not on the main road but literally just a few minutes away and in walking distance. Seeta and Batty at the front desk were very nice and accommodating when we needed a late check out. I would definitely stay at this property again while in Patong! We didn’t want to leave but until next time Phuket :)

title: Great hotel well managed
review: Great place with easy access to lots of activities and good gateway to browse around. Facilities are nice and staff friendly, it all really contributes to great holiday spirit. Breakfast is good too by usual Accor standard.

title: excellent over all, and i mean over all .. been there 3 times
review: Dear Nicolas D,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to hear we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with a friendly service, a convenient location and also with a good breakfast spread to start the day perfectly!   Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please feel free to contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: EXCELLENT LOCATION AND GREAT HOSPITALITY!!!
review: Stayed 3 times there. Once with daughter and twice with the family. The pool access room was excellent. best are the staff .. from reception till the management. i usually get annoyed with hotel staff in far east but i never had an issue here.

title: Amazing stay at Grand Mercure
review: Dear Fudino F,   Thank you very much for your comments and for your loyalty towards our property!   It’s a real pleasure to know we have managed to meet your expectations on your third visit and we hope to have the chance welcoming you back here again in the future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Can't thank enough to the team at Mercure Patong. The team went out of their way to make our trip a wonderful one. Oil, Nas, sita, Phimthip- you guys are a great asset to the hotel. All staff at the hotel always had a smile on their faces. Highly recommended. Sebastian- the GM of the hotel we give you a big thumbs up for having a great team at this great hotel.

title: What a lovely stay!
review: My husband and I checked in on 23rd September to Grand Mercure Puket Patong for 4 days and what a wonderful stay it was!. First, the front desk supervisor,  Ann was such a gem, allowed us an early check-in  and personally led us to our room. Then a special mention of Ryan of Bubbles Restaurant who was so helpful and extremely informative and attentive to us in promoting the buffets and helping us decide. It was a great stay and we will surely come back here for 5 star stay again. Definite recommendation.

title: Great stay, great staff
review: Dear Jini62,   Thousand thanks for this fabulous review of yours!   It makes us truly delighted to read how fabulous your stay was. We will surely share your comments with Ann and Ryan and thank them for their dedicated work!   We are already looking forward to your next stay with us. Should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us anytime!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: My home in Phuket!
review: We went to grand Mercure for a weekend and couldn’t ask for a better weekend! The service was perfect from start to ending, always greeted by employees and the front office team was great! Will definitely be back again!

title: Not so Grand
review: Dear Myriam S,   Thank you very much for your great review and compliments towards our team members!   We are glad to read you truly enjoyed your stay from your arrival to your departure. We also appreciate your comments about our warm service!   It makes us delighted to know you will choose to stay with us again and we all look forward to your return.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Relax club
review: Grand Mercure is always my favorite hotel in Phuket. The hotel is very nice and comfort with good location and the staff are very nice, especially the front office staff, who is always very friendly and helpful. Grand Mercure is excellent hotel, although sometimes a bit pricy. Very recommended hotel in Phuket!

title: Good Hotel and Staff But...
review: Let me explain our visit from the start. After a stressful journey from the airport, we finally arrived at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  When I looked at the photos of this place, I knew it would be our choice. The entrance hall is grand as the photos on Tripadvisor and is the interior is nicely done. We were greeted by the front desk staff and shortly after they took us to another room for checking in (said we are VIPs? No idea...)
