Check in was smooth, the staff explained everything in details and we were offered wet towel, a drink and cookies. We were happy with the complementary snacks and drinks on each day of our visit. We thought it was a nice touch. We would like to praise the female staff at the lounge (for the complementary snacks/drinks). Unfortunately we didn't…

title: An enjoyable weeks stay
review: Great hotel and facilities although sometimes things don’t always go to plan but the staff at reception were always there to assist.  A special mention to Jern. For a quiet night in why not have a drink at the bar during happy hour. Dao, Pang and Add are there to mix you a cocktail and on some nights you'll be treated to some quality musical entertainment.  Peter S

title: Great central place
review: Dear Navigator817391,   Thank you very much for your nice review following your recent stay with us!  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and recommend the signature cocktails at the bar. We will share your comments with Jern, Dao, Pang and Add who will surely be pleased to read your positive feedback.   Should your travel brings you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us for any booking arrangement you may need.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: An oasis of calm and peace in Patong
review: Hotel was great. Very clean, lovely swim up bar and pool area. Great places to eat and drink just outside of the hotel driveway. We had breakfast included and the food was very plentiful and very diverse.

title: Memorable stays at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong
review: Dear Chris B,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn you enjoyed all the features of the hotel including our refreshing pool, the swim up bar, the great location and also the great spread at the buffet breakfast.   Thank you again for sharing your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to Phuket in the future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Club House
review: Stay several time in Grand Mercure Puket. Hotel is good, room of pool access is excellent, nice club house, the food & beverage is nice, and the service of Ms. Far is very good, her smiling is so lovely.

title: Pleasant stay
review: Dear Cindy H,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback with us!   We are happy to hear you always have a good time at our property and especially appreciate the friendliness of Ms. Far! We hope to see you again very soon!  With Grand Regards,  Valentine

title: Fab hotel in a great spot
review: As it’s the monsoon season, it has been raining quite everyday in Phuket. Luckily there’s always something to do in the hotel - Gym, Spa, Hanging out at the craft bar playing pool. All these without stepping out of the hotel.   Location wise pretty good, convenience store, eateries and massage shop just right outside and it’s a 10 mins walk to the Beach or Jungceylon.   Staffs were pleasant and engaging. Always checking to see if we are alright.  Room was good too except I find the lightings too dimmed for my liking. Ohhh and it’s thoughtful to have a small balcony for you to hang your clothes.

title: highly recommended
review: Dear Yiyun C,   Thank you very much for your positive and encouraging review!   It's great to see you felt comfortable in the property thanks to all the facilities available on the spot! We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in the future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Pleasant Stay
review: Stayed a week at this hotel. Lovely clean room, super comfy bed, very quiet. The hotel is in a great spot, walk to the beach and main shopping centre or you can use the free shuttle service. The staff were extremely pleasant and helpful. Buffet breakfast was excellent, lots of choice including local Thai delicacies. The pool was very large with a pool bar. There was a rail to dry your wet swimsuits outside on the balcony which I thought was great.

title: Grand Mercure - Phuket
review: The Grand Mercure - Phuket is just a short walk to the beach and shopping mall. The central courtyard contains a large pool with swim up bar. The breakfast buffet had a wide variety of food suitable to all.  The majority of rooms have a shower over the bath however the bath tub is very deep making getting into the shower quite dangerous. The rooms were cleaned daily however they're on a small side by Thai standards.  We had to ask the pool guys for lounger cushions on a daily basis as they only placed a few out - first world problems. Happy hour by the pool was between 4-6pm.  Great hotel

title: Exceptional Stay ..........yet again.
review: Dear stevegfromnz,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us following your recent stay at our property!   We are glad to hear you had a good stay with us and especially enjoyed the large spread at the breakfast buffet! Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us ahead so we could find a room with a shower if that suits you best or if you need any special arrangements!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Superb Hotel for a good relaxation
review: As repeat guests at this hotel, we were not disappointed at the exceptional service and treatment we received. From arrival to departure and during our stay, we felt so comfortable and relaxed. All staff were friendly, happy to assist with any request. We celebrated our 30th anniversary during our stay and so glad we did. The service and hospitality we received was fantastic. We also ate breakfast and dinner at Bubbles restaurant and it was a gastronomical delight. I would no doubt stay here again and thoroughly recommend anyone visiting Patong, to stay and dine her. A credit to management and staff for their excellent service.

title: Nice hotel!
review: Dear Born66,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback on both our restaurant and hotel page!   We are absolutely delighted to hear you were still satisfied and impressed by the property and above all by the personalized service you received. We will surely share your positive and rewarding comments to our team members.   We are already looking forward to your return, please feel free to contact us anytime, we would be happy to help with any arrangement you may need.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very generous hotel
review: It a great hotel. Staffs are friendly and the environment is nice . Room considered spacious and clean. Pool is nice. The location of the hotel is convenient. You can get everything  within a short walk .

title: Amazing Hotel
review: The hotel staff was nice and friendly, and the entire hotel was beautiful. The food and drinks options were great. The hotel offers a number of activities that can be done on-site at the hotel, such as Muay Thai, cooking classes, etc...My friend and I took a muay thai class with Pom, who was amazing. It was one of my favorite parts of our stay and our time in Phuket. You should definitely take a class with Pom while in town. The hotel was located very close to the beach and some very nice beach restaurants. I highly recommend Grand Mercure.

title: GREAT HOTEL
review: Dear Sam R,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with us and fellow travelers!   We are beyond grateful for all your comments and happy to hear you enjoyed the friendliness of our team members and specially Pom, who is indeed a great coach of Muay Thai!   Once again, thank you for recommending us and for your words of praise. We hope to have the chance to welcoming you back here in the future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Step Step
review: Great hotel and highly recommended. Staff were outstanding and could not have been more helpful. Every request was handled efficiently and effectively. Food was also of a high standardIt was a pleasure to meet them both and be greeted with their warmth and friendliness each morning. Our room included breakfast, the selection was vast and quality good

title: A luxury resort at a convenient location
review: Dear sinamanda,   Thank you very much for this fabulous review following your recent stay at our property!   We are thrilled to read you had such an amazing experience at our resort. It will be a pleasure to share your kind comments with our team members. The breakfast is indeed vast, serving both western and eastern specialties!   We look forward to welcoming you back! Please feel free to contact us directly for any assistance you may require.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: sosososo good!
review: We stayed there for 5 days, the location was very convenient.  Some of staff at the front desk are not very helpful and polite.  There is only one restaurant in the staff without any choices.  The breakfast is just OK and it is no surprise.  An exceptional experience is the waiter called BOY whose is the hospitality to us all the times.  This is the reason to recommend to stay in this hotel in the future.  I would say thank you very much to Boy who is very nice and kind guy.  Boy is the best in the hotel where we met.

title: Perfect place for a relaxing visit.
review: My partner and I booked a single bedroom pool-villa for 8 nights. The villa is well kept and spacious (including a large, luxurious bathroom). During our stay, we decided to book a Thai cooking class which was excellent. We would like to commend the customer service of all involved, particularly Joe who made the experience very enjoyable and friendly. We would definitely recommend this resort to anyone looking for a relaxing getaway though who would still like to be close enough to delve into the busy action of Patong beach.

title: Muay Thai Intro Class
review: Dear Kristofer1992,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us following your recent stay at our property!   We are delighted to hear you and your partner enjoyed the comfort of your private pool villa and also had the chance to experience the Thai Cooking Class with Joe. He is indeed very friendly and passionate of the local culture!   We are looking forward to welcoming you in the near future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: A good location for a relaxing stay in busy Phuket.
review: FANTASTIC!!! Pom, an energetic, fun, and engaging instructor, takes you through the basics and gets you ready for combos and sparring. Great workout, so come prepared to give it your all! Offered twice a day, morning and afternoon.

title: We loved our stay here
review: Dear Amy Z,   Thank you very much for your lovely review following your Muay Thai classes!  It makes it grateful to hear you enjoyed yourself during these classes and felt entertained by the energetic Pom!   We hope to see you again for more training!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: So good
review: My partner and I stayed for four nights in this hotel.  It is located on a side street close to the centre of Patong Beach business district.  It is only a block away from Patong Beach.  There is a street food  market and plenty of shops near the hotel.  The service from the staff was excellent and accommodating. The staff that we dealt with were very friendly and spoke English well.  In summary we had an enjoyable and relaxing stay in Phuket.  Next time we visit Phuket, we will definitely stay in this hotel again.

title: Grand mecure Patong
review: Lovely hotel, very friendly and accommodating staff. Not far from the busy streets and has good amenities and would stay again!    Gym is 24 hours which is a modest sized gym and they also have some Muay Thai classes (optional paid for extra)

title: Gregg Goes
review: Dear skua21,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us following your recent stay!   We are delighted to hear you had a great experience with us, from the accomodating staff to the convenient location without forgetting the nice activities available at the property!   We look forward to welcoming you back here in the near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: RYN SPA
review: Great hotel with excellent staff and amenities. Excellent location. The rooms are a little small but the pool access room makes it very enjoyable. The breakfast gets  a little busy at 9 am but is well managed. The Saturday night banquet is well worth attending. Great sea food.  Regards   Gregg Goes Director  AusStyle Roofing

title: Amazing!!
review: Dear Gregg G,   Thank you very much for yet another review on our Hotel Page!   We are glad to hear you had a good time at our property and enjoyed the direct access to the pool. The Seafood Buffet are indeed one of our guest favourites!   We are looking forward to welcoming you back here in the future. Please feel free to contact any of us should you need any assistance.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Precious experience in Thai boxing
review: Thanks ORN four your traitement massage ,excellent teams ,reception it s good the room of massage very clean , all it s professional, thanks for take care of me, i wish you a good luck and progression

title: Great Reservation Team And Front office team
review: This Review is posted before the Stay. First of all I select this hotel with on phone with After talking with Nice Person Milky. He acknowledged All my requests Regarding to Accor Member and Given Me club lounge Acess complimentary in my booking. So If Say if I select this hotel for My Coming stay that all credits goes to Mr. MILKY.       Another Great person Whom I talk with Reservation Manager is Chinorot Khaesawang, I had not seen so cooperating staff Starting from Front office team and with Reservation Manager Chinorot.         I was Facing an issue With date Ammendment from Make My Trip as they were not responding Fast, But Mr. Chinorot confirm my date Ammendment on Mail With Me direct on My Mail. That is truly 5* Hotel where I get proper Response for My bookings.       …

title: Pool access room July 18
review: Dear DILPREET SINGH B,   Thank you very much for your lovely review on our Reservation and Front Office Team!   We are happy to know you have been well taken care of by the team and specially by Milky and Chinorot. Should you need any further assistance from us, please feel free to contact us in order to have everything ready prior to your arrival!   We are all looking forward to be welcoming you to our property on the 20th of September!   Best Regards, Valentine

title: Great location and resort
review: We stayed in the pool access room opposite the bar for 12 nights. Like most who stay at hotels in Thailand, me and my partner were having a holiday rather than travelling. We spent 3 nights in Bangkok and 12 here. Hotel is really nice can't fault anything really. Hotel staff are so pleasant and will go out their way to help you with whatever it is you need. This goes for almost every Thai we met on holiday. Friendliest people we have ever met. Same can't be said for alot of other nationalities that holiday in Thailand. Rooms are small but nice and have everything you need. Bed mega comfortable. A tip for anyone looking to book a pool access room, I would advise not to spend the extra money as we didn't get any sun in our terrace throughout the stay, and don't think any other…

title: Excellent hospitality
review: Dear Davidsmart0606,   Thank you very much for your detailed review of our property!   We are happy to hear you really enjoyed the service from our team members and the comfort of your room. As per the sun exposure in the deluxe pool access rooms, the one located near the bar usually gets the morning sun and the one near the spa area has the afternoon sun and thus, are the sunniest.   Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us directly, we would be pleased to find you a sunny room :)   Best regards, Valentine

title: Vacation
review: Great location, great facilities and clean. Staff is what makes this place amazing. I actually got sick from an outer place in phuket and they assisted my husband in calling a doctor and also calling the room phone a couple times to check up on me. I wish I knew the receptionist lasies name but she actually came and bought me flowers and a get well note and offered us everything and anything to make me more comfortable. Also offered us a bfast box as we were checking out the next morning. We had a pool access room which was nice and that comes with afternoon tea (served in a room, different items daily) which was also really good and an extra bonus.   Only negatives for grand mecure is   very very hard bed..to the point we got 5 extra donnas to try soften it. They tried to…

title: Slightly overpriced for the quality of the hotrl
review: The rooms are small and bathrooms maybe smaller than most hotels. The bathroom are also not very clean with black spots around the sink area and shower area.   Ceiling also has some spots in the bedroom.   We had to change rooms on our first day

title: Great Hotel & Location
review: Fantastic staff & service. Highly recommended. Room was ultra modern with great view to pool area with excellent balcony.  Excellent furniture & fittings. Breakfast was included in my room selection & well worth the money, pay in advance to get reasonable discount. Short walk to Patong beach & famous walking street for a adventurous night. Fantastic pool area & bar facility  Overall a great stay & will be back. Hope you get a chance to visit.

title: Stunning hotel and phenomenal service
review: Dear FV1023,   Thank you very much for your comments and for recommending our property!   We are enthusiasts while reading through your comments to see how enjoyable your experience was, from the warm service from our team members, to the comfort of the room, without forgetting the convenient location of the hotel.   The team is already looking forward to your return, please feel free to contact us for any arrangement you may need!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Good location and clean environment
review: Thailand Hotel review - stop 4 @grandmercurephuketpatong  Grand Mercure Patong (2 nights) The only reason for this location was to be closer to the airport and we wanted a hotel to relax and unwind before heading beach home so facilities were important. This hotel is located right next to the hustle and bustle that Phuket offers with walking distance to street markets but once you in the resort it’s calm, peaceful and offers great facilities. We had a pool room, so a patio that allowed you to walk into the pool and if you wanted to join the bigger swimming pool you could walk out and enter via your pool. There is a Spa that offers massages at the poolside and a great coffee shop with delicious pastries. Since we opted to enjoy the hotel grounds we chose to have dinner and…

title: Excellent Service
review: Dear sumayaa2017,   Thousand thanks for this amazing and detailed review!   We are thankful to receive so many words of praise specially coming from a valued Le Club Member. It was great having you both staying and enjoying yourselves at our property.    Once again, thank you for your kind comments, we hope to have the chance welcoming you back soon!   Warm regards, Valentine

title: A wonderful experience at Grand Mercure
review: Stayed at Grand Mercure for four nights and found that it is amazing, cozy and neat. This hotel has all what it needs, kitchen, pool, fridge, TV, air conditioning, everything I needed. The staff are amazing and very helpful especially Eddie. Very good breakfast variety.  A lot of other facilities like gym, sauna, massage. I definitely recommend it for everyone seeking privacy in a great environment. This is a amazing experience.

title: Grand Mecure Ryn Spa massage
review: Dear 13904098558,   Thank you for taking from your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!  We are delighted to learn you have appreciated all the facilities at the property and the friendliness of Eddie and the team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly!  Best regards, Valentine

title: A very good stay
review: Had a full body massage and facial which was fantastic at Grand Mecure Phuket. Lasted 3 hours and was worth every penny  Very calm soothing and relaxing Therapist name was Pa  Ask for her if you visit you wont regret it!

title: Worth while
review: Dear jungayle,   Thank you so much for your lovely review on our Ryn Spa!   Your positive feedback is highly appreciated by all the team and specially by Pa! It was a pleasure having you here with us and we hope to have the chance to welcoming you back in the future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Excellent!
review: Nice hotel with good facilities, very central to bars and restaurants.  The food was average, good breakfast spread.  Spa is expensive but worth a visit.  Staff was very helpful and efficient.  Will stay again.

title: Great service and quality hotel
review: The staff were very accommodating, polite and service was brilliant. Very typical of Thai culture-always smiling and helpful. Will definitely be back. Thankyou particularly to North and Kie at the Bounce Pool Bar!!! Service and friendliness impeccable.

title: Great service!
review: Dear clanbalfour,   Thank you very much for this lovely review!   We are happy to know you highly appreciated the service from our team and specially from North and Kie at the Bounce Pool Bar! We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in the near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Memorable experience: unique and peaceful
review: No words can explain how good the services are. Very accomodating staff. They manage to suprised me on my birthday by putting a happy birthday greetings in my room with a small piece of cake, Which is a great effort by the team.

title: Another amazing stay at the GM Patong
review: Dear Lenville13,   Thank you very much for this nice review and for choosing our property to celebrate your birthday!  We are really glad to hear everything went well and that you had a very special time with us!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in the near future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: A chic oasis in Patong
review: From start to finish we loved Grand Mercure Patong. Staff are the life of any customer focused building and grand mercure is blessed with some of the very best. Whether it was breakfast service, poolside drinks, drivers, security and house keeper they were all polite, beautifully in appearance and friendly. They really helped make great memories.   Room cleaned every day, all water, tea and coffee replaced as required. Showers powerful and beds are top quality. Slept well every night.  Breakfast choice is Vast. Picturesque view. It did get busy around 9:30 but staff worked very had to seat everyone as soon as possible.   A few extras we appreciated were, cool towels, welcome drinks and small snack at initial check in. They also prepared a small birthday surprise with my friend…

title: Highly recommended!
review: Clean rooms, great location and wonderful staff!  Breakfast is excellent.  Nearby:restaurants , bars, mini markets, hard rock cafe, hooters, and 10 mnts walk to the beach.  The hotel provides a shuttle bus to beach.

title: Excellent service
review: Dear Afaq R,   Thank you for your review following your recent experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  We are very grateful for each of your comments and delighted to know you found the breakfast spread excellent and could enjoy the convenient location of the property!   Once again, thank you for your kind compliments and for recommending us, we look forward to welcoming back in a near future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Well priced for a more comfortable hotel
review: I can only say so much about this hotel. The location, the amenities, the service...beyond praises! I have stayed in hotels in different countries, and Grand Mercure Phuket Patong has exceeded our (mine and my husband’s) expectations...even with a little bit of a language barrier....their smiles mean a long way. The hotel was very clean (lobby, dining area, rooms, the pool) and friendly and accomodating staff. I just mentioned to Jern Jern, our receptionist, that it was my husband’s birthday...she had the bed decorated with a greeting and a birthday cake! I never even arranged for her/staff to do that! She has gone above and beyond to help us in every need we had. The place was already paradise but with a friendly staff, nothing can beat that. Can’t wait to come back with my…

title: Great service
review: Dear cux11,   Thousand thanks for this wonderful review of your recent experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  Our team is delighted to learn we managed to make you feel relaxed, surprised and satisfied! We acknowledge your positive comments towards "Jern Jern" in making your stay an special one for you and your husband!   We are already looking forward to your return, please feel free to contact Jern Jern or any of us should you need any assistance.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Best assistant guest relations manager
review: We had a pool access room and it was quite spacious and comfortable.   Before you read on, please note that this is not a complaint specific to this hotel as it happens anywhere and this should not stop you from booking the hotel. It is a reflection of our personal experience and a reminder to be careful with your security.  We enjoyed the pool access, though on one occasion returned to our room to find other guests sitting on the chairs on our balcony. When we approached them, they didn't care and moved to the next balcony, which is where our friends were staying. When we contacted staff, they sent out security immediately, though the other guests had left. Given we were there with our 2 year old daughter, we felt a little uncomfortable about security. Our balcony door also…

title: Warm hospitality and privileged welcome as Accor Platinum member
review: My husband and I enjoyed our short stay in Grand Mercure Phuket. Khun Julie and Oil have given us a warm welcome when we arrived. Our room was upgraded and there was a lovely welcome gesture for Accor member. The hotel is in a good location, near to Patong beach, JungCeylon Mall and other shopping areas. We could choose our welcome drink from a list at the bar. We decided to try the Phuket Rum Mojito and it is a lovely cocktail not to be missed.

title: Amazing stay
review: Dear claudiapauldebelder,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your last experience at the property!   It is always a great pleasure for us to welcome and serve one of our valued Le Club Platinum Member and we are delighted to hear you felt heart-warmed and privileged during your stay with us!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here soon, please feel free to let us know if we can be of any assistance.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: SERVICE, CONVENIENCE AND COMFORT
review: Amazing stayed at the Grand mercure Phuket patong. The decorations in hotel mixed traditional and modern in the same time. Food and staff were all amazing even when breakfast time was a bit busy.      I love happy hours on the pool side bar , Belgian guys fell in love at healthy juice station Mook at the Bubbles restaurant was so funny and lovely to talk with. She made very nice taste of detox and anti-aging juice. We dined at Bubbles restaurant, good place and excellent food.  Thank you the Grand mercure Phuket patong for good service , Mook and all staff members for such a memorable holiday.

title: Phuket
review: Dear Pratrick J,   Thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review!   It was a pleasure having you here and learning you had an amazing stay made our day! Also, we are pleased to hear you were highly satisfied with Mook's service and kindness at Bubbles Restaurant!    We are sincerely looking forward to welcoming you back in the future! Please do not hesitate to contact us directly, our team will be pleased to assist you with any arrangement you may need.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: great time!
review: 1st trip to Phucket and absolutely loved every minute of it. Hotel was clean, staff was super friendly especially Aff (she works the breakfast buffet and the tea time) and the hotel was in a perfect location for us to explore the area. If you stay opt for adding the breakfast buffet definitely worth it (makes it things easy for you in the morning), and provides you with a opportunity to try a multitude of food.

title: Best hotel stay in Phuket
review: The room is spacious, facilities are new and the breakfast in the morning has a huge spread! The staff make the hotel very homely and warm. Milky and Khun Noom served our every request even though it was late in the night, even heating up our cold take away food for us. I'm definitely going back if I'm in Phuket again.

title: Good
review: Dear jujubang,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel and for sharing your experience with us!   We are glad to hear we were able to provide you with a wonderful and comfortable stay accompanied by a professional and friendly service, especially from Khun Noom and Milky!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more relaxing experience in a near future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Good deal hotel
review: We are in the full access room. I am having a dreamlike holiday. The Grand Mercure Phuket Patong Hotel is perfect in every way, the staff are friendly and the food is delicious, especially the Club Lounge, and the delicious desserts and Ms.Bowling coffee are fantastic. It is an unforgettable taste.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Boyoung L,   Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!  We are delighted to learn you have appreciated your Pool Access Room, the dessert at the Club Lounge and also the professional service from Ms. Bowling.   We do hope to have the opportunity to welcoming you back in a near future and please feel free to contact us directly, we would be happy to assist with any arrangements you may need.   Best regards, Valentine

title: At Odds
review: Check in very late at night, and hotel provide a welcome drink and treats which are very tasty after a late night flight! Location of the hotel is very convenient, in terms of the price of the hotel, the room is clean and hotel has the swimming pool which is good for kid to play. The room has a balcony, however you cant barely walk out, so it’s a large window rather than balcony. It is definitely a good choice at Patong area.

title: Nice and fun
review: We enjoy this hotel very much.  Many people because hotel is big but OK. Beautiful and good breakfast. I like omelette and fresh fruit. Staff is nice. Hotel is in Patong area and I like because we can go to night club.

title: Worth staying here
review: Dear tlai336,   Thank you very much for your lovely comments towards the resort!   We are happy to learn you had a good time with us and enjoyed the breakfast spread and the friendliness of our team members! We hope to have the chance welcoming you back here in a near future!  WIth Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Perfect Resort
review: I really enjoyed the stay here with my Girlfriend. There was a particular staff who was specially kind to go all out to help us look out for taxis at night when we couldn’t find one. His name at Nutt. Do look out for him! He’s a great guy.

title: Great Hotel!
review: Dear Chung J,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review following your recent stay at the property!   We really appreciate your comments toward Nutt and will surely pass on your warmest regards to him and post this review in our staff quarters! Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us, we would be pleased to welcoming you back!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Excellent Hotel, Location & Staff
review: Stayed with a Group of 10 people,5 rooms. Hotel take care for guest well. Just the Room size and the bathroom size is small. Rest the corridor and the lift also is averagely made and maintain . Right from the lobby , bar , pool area , breakfast, gym outdoor all is perfect and awesome . Same feel or factor not found in corridors, lift and rooms. Was emailed hotel requested at least 2 or 3 Rooms out of 5 Rooms needed at floor Also at the time of check in requested this . Unfortunately not get it . Not as such activities found for children's /kids.

title: Great place and great service
review: I’ve spent the better part of the week at the Mercure and I was absolutely blown away by Bond and the resort manager Sebastian. They went above and beyond to assist me in every possible way. I would definitely recommend this property for a family holiday

title: Great Find
review: Dear zubairp2016,   Thank you very much for taking the time to share your thoughts with us on Trip Advisor!  We are thankful for each of your comments and will share them with all the team.   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in the future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Lovely hotel
review: We moved here after being in Phuket for one day and it was a great decision! The staff are very friendly and the hotel is very clean. The pool is beautiful. The rooms are like new. The buffet breakfast each day was also delicious, and the location was perfect! If ever back in Phuket, we know where we are staying again!!

title: Amazing hotel and excellent service!
review: Dear Lauren B,   Thank you very much for choosing our property in Phuket!   We are glad to hear you felt comfortable with us thanks to the friendliness of our team members and enjoyed all the facilities! We indeed hope to have the chance welcoming you back in the future, should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact any of us!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Sebastian & Marisa
review: Just spent 2 weeks at the Grand mercure patong great hotel staff were AMAZING went out there way to help would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Thailand Lynn Douglas from Scotland.

title: Good enough if you are with the lads
review: The hotel was adequate for the time we spent in Phuket. There is a line of bars outside of the hotel everything is close by.  The rooms where small and the bathtub/shower was very difficult to get in and out of (they have a rail for support).  Staff was polite and accommodating.

title: good food well served
review: first time to come here. it's a beautiful hotel. The buffet on Wednesday is good. The stuffs of the bubbles restaurant is so nice! Thank u all including Ying, Ryan Windell, Jame, Nan, Far and Mindmind!

title: Nice dinner at bubble
review: Dear Cjiuki,  Thank you very much for your great feedback!  We are really pleased to hear your positive comments towards the quality of our buffet and also towards the staff! We will surely share your comments with all the team and thank them for their friendliness!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you both back soon!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Amazing stay
review: Thanks for excellent serving ying, nan, jame, ryan, far, mind. Delicious food and nice music. Thank you!!  좋은 음식과 멋진 음악 감사합니다. Ying nan jame ryan far mind  감사합니다.  그랜드머큐어 파통비치 쩔어요!!!! 꼭 오세요ㅎㅎ 잘 먹고 잘 놀고 갑니다^^

title: Just perfect
review: Dear 태규 황,   Thank you very much for your comments and for your appreciation towards the team!  We hope to have the chance welcoming you back for one of our buffet nights soon.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Very satisfy except the initial check in issues faced
review: Was asked to provide the same card I sign up and paid for the hotel rooms booking. No information was given so was shocked when asked to provide it. I owned up to 7 cards so can’t expect me to bring all along when travel.

title: Highly Recommend
review: Dear kcwong13,   Thank you very much for taking from your valuable time to share this review with us!  We appreciate when our guest communicate with us while they are still at our property and thankful you gave us the chance to improve your experience right away to make it a more comfortable and enjoyable one!   Please feel free to contact us should your travels bring you back to Phuket, we would be pleased to assist with any arrangement you may need.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Fabulous hotel
review: Amazing breakfast, great location, friendly staff. Great stay! Overall was good experience. Jungceylon shopping, banzaar market, and patong beach are only 10 mins walk. Well done Accor! Highly recommend to anyone that visit Patong area.

title: Best Resort I've Ever Been To!
review: Dear Mira M,   Thank you very much for your review regarding your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to know you had a wonderful stay with us at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we would like to express our gratitude for the positive feedback given on the great spread at the breakfast, the convenient location and also the friendly staff!    We are all looking forward to welcoming you back for many more pampering experiences in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Service was great!
review: Third time here. Like coming home. We were upgraded to a pool access room as we were gold status. This also gave us access to the lounge for snacks, and drinks between 11-5 pm. Breakfast was great, plenty of choice and the dinner menu diverse. A couple of theme buffets during the week were also offered. All in all great service with happy staff. Can't wait to come back.

title: Mr subhakant
review: Excellent location, great fasciitis, very polite and helpful staff and great food. Located close to all good hangout places like beaches night market and others. Enjoyed great breakfast. All front desk and staff are superb

title: Decent Hotel
review: Dear subhakantp,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to know you had a wonderful stay with us at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we would like to express our gratitude for the positive feedback given on the warm welcome you received from our friendly team and on the great facilities available here and few steps away!   We look forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Brilliant stay!
review: We family stayed there for two nights.  From 1st June to 3rd June 2018. Rooms are spacious. Especially the tv is big size with hd. We were watching French open and enjoyed. The staffs are very polite and humble.

title: Great service
review: Dear Soundar S,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your last experience at the property!   We are happy to know you appreciated our well appointed room, the great choice of TV channels and above all we are grateful for the feedback you shared concerning the professionalism of our team members!   Thank you once again for your support and for placing your trust in our hospitality, we are looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: pool access room
review: Thank you all so much. We had a wonderful stay at Grand Mercure Hotel for 7 days. We got to know the manager and bar staff at the pool. The reception staff were also so helpful, genuine and nice. The food, hygiene and warm welcome was amazing and we would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!  And a big special thanks to Mr Rise, Sita and Jern Jern!  Thanks again from your friends in Ireland, Brendan & Siobhan

title: Rather ordinary
review: Long wait to check in and also to check out. The property is ageing and everything is over priced. Expensive rooms that were small dark and dingy. The bathroom had blown lightbulbs and was not very clean. Breakfast rather ordinary but the coffee was great. Staff were friendly. It seems the hotel is geared for roll in roll out Chinese tourism.

title: Decent Hotel
review: It's a nice hotel with a few miss. The location is not great. Beach is 5-7 min walk and Bangla road is 8-10 min walk. So if you're with family and don't like to walk much to the nearby eateries then you would have to take a cab for such short distance.   The rooms are small, food is average, the pool is small too. The best part is the staff. Special mention to 'Billy' from the restaurant staff. He was very attentive and went out of his way to please us. Which i believe is true hospitality. The check in & check out was smooth. Would recommend to try other options that are closer to the beach.

title: Just Prefect!!!!
review: It located central of Patong and close to Juncelong shopping mall, Bannzan seafood market, Bangala road and some of night market! Nice lobby with modern decoration and quickly check in. We stayed at pool access room with wonderful swimming pool and comfortable room. Bubbles restaurants had great breakfast with different types food. It was suit for different country people. It has a Chinese staff, who’s name was Billy, he always had friendly smile to welcome us! And another staff’s name is Jacky, all of questions which we had, he always had patience to explain it and it helped us a lot.  We definitely love this hotel and we will come back next year!

title: Helpful staff, amazing food and the best hotel interior I have ever seen!
review: Dear HuangMM,   Thank you very much for your detailed review following your stay at our property!   We are really pleased to hear you enjoyed every aspect of your stay, from the convenient location, the comfort of the room and facilities and also the friendly service from our team members; I will surely pass on your warmest regards to Billy and Jacky!   Feel free to contact us prior to your return next year, we would be happy to assist with any arrangement you may need.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: #lovethailand
review: This was hands down the best hotel I have ever stayed in.  From the amazing room which was serviced daily with an unheard of attention to detail to the food which could not be faulted, our stay here was absolutely perfect.  The happy staff that are always willing to help stood out for me along with the facilities found inside the hotel so that you almost never have to leave. These include an incredible spa, world class pools, a café, two bars and an amazing swimming pool.  I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone, especially my fellow South Africans!

title: When can I come back?
review: I stayed here for 9 nights as an Accor Plus member. We arrived at 10pm and had the most wonderful check-in.   We were upgraded to the Deluxe Suite. It was so lovely and spacious with ample balcony space. We used the pool a lot too which was so lovely and warm. The hotel also gifted us with various things during our stay, from sticky rice, fruit, Thai treats, and fantastic towel animals!  The hotel was like an oasis in the desert. It was complete luxury compared to the buildings and streets outside. Although Patong was lovely, it was quite removed from my hometown, so it was really comforting to come back to the hotel.  If I really have to be critical, there was huge kitchen space with so many cupboards, but yet so little space in the bathroom/wardrobe. It would have been lovely…

title: Awesome place middle of Patong
review: Dear Katie S,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review!   It was such a pleasure having you both here with us and learning you enjoyed yourselves so much made our day special! We have well noted your comments, appreciate your input and will share them with our management team, to be considered for the next refurbishment phase :)   We are sincerely looking forward to pampering you again in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Exceptional customer service
review: What can i say about this hotel... First impression at the Lobby was so nice I been welcome so profesionally . The room was perfectly clean and delicious breakfast. I will come back and highly recommended for this hotel. One of the best.   Special thanks to khun Julie for good take care during our stay.

title: Bubbles.. fantastic service
review: Dear Talaychan N,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to hear you had an awesome stay at our hotel and enjoyed the room, the breakfast and specially the friendliness of professionalism of Khun Julie!   We hope to have the chance welcoming you back at the property very soon!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: WOW !! Treated really Grand !!
review: Based on my first visit to the property, I stayed at Grand Mercure Patong this year as well. The entire stay was made very comfortable by the hotel staff. It is a majestic property with lovely pool view from the room's balcony. The rooms were very comfortable, clean and well managed. The hotel staff provided a very personalised assistance and they were always ready to help as and when asked for. Excellent ambiance, a wide variety of breakfast buffet and proximity to the city center makes it an ideal place to spend time. Thank you Grand Mercure team.

title: Absolutely no complaints
review: We had the opportunity to spend 5 nights at the Grand Mercure. It certainly lives up to its 5 star rating and we could safely say it is the best accommodation we have stayed in our 10 or so years holidaying in Phuket.  Breakfast was great with Ryan and his crew providing many different choices each day. The hotel staff were absolutely brilliant and each one, without exception, would welcome us with a smile and a greeting every time we made eye contact. Hotel is immaculately clean and well maintained.  Although not on the beach, it is only about 5 minutes walk the Patong's famous sandy beach.  Would highly recommend.

title: Excellent 5 Star Hotel with Amazing staff who went the extra mile.
review: What can I say about the Grand Mecure Phuket? Probably one of the best hotels we’ve ever stayed at. This was our first trip to Thailand and we went for our Honeymoon.   We were greeted so warmly by Sebastian the hotel manager. The staff were simply amazing, we landed so early in the morning and hadn’t booked breakfast. The staff not only found a way to see that we were served but also ensured we saved some money in the process.   We would especially like to thank Pangko, Bat, Natty, and Fangky for surprising my wife with flower petals and hand crafted towel animals on our bed every day, for giving us VIP access to the day bar, for arranging our day trips to Phi Phi island and Bangkok. Thank you for going out of your way to open up your conference centre for filming and for…

title: Great second time stay, will definitely be returning again
review: Dear Oliver,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review and kind comments.  We are all delighted to hear you both enjoyed your stay so much!  I will surely pass on your warmest regards to Pangkao, Bat, Natty and Miss Fang and also hang a copy of your review in our Staff quarters, so for the Bounce & Spa Teams to feel special too :)  We would love to have you back next year and until then, wish you both a wonderful time back home.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Location and Great Service
review: Thoroughly enjoyed the room and the service from Grand Mercure Patong. The staff were excellent, always warm, smiling and helpful. Accommodated our requests. We would like to give a special thank you to Khun Beer, the duty manager on shift. She was extremely helpful and attentative making us feel like we were valued guests. We enjoyed the location and 5 star quality of the hotel so much the first time that we returned a second time for a week and were not disappointed. We will keep coming back. Thank you all the friendly staff at Grand Mercure Patong for making our stay so enjoyable. Thank you for the special gift, it was a great surprise.  From Khun Yajai & Dr Steller.

title: Wonderful hotel
review: This place is fantastic.We were booked in to a pool side room but because we were staying for 7 days they upgraded us to a one bedroom villa with its own pool. The room was excellent with a huge bathroom and separate lounge. My only complaint was that there were a few mozzies but they provided a can of fly spray which helped.   The breakfasts were of a good quality and a great variety.  The service was second to none. Everyone bent over backwards to provide whatever service you required.  The location was near on perfect. Food and shopping was very close and if you wanted to go to the beach is was a very short walk.  I would recommend the Grand Mercure to anyone. Will be staying there again should we go back to Phuket

title: Wonderful Service and Appointments
review: I stayed in a double bed suite. The room was very clean, beautifully decorated and spacious enough for two people. The location was ideal, as it was just around the corner from all the busy commotion, shops and restaurants. There is a delicious Indian restaurant across the street I would recommend. I can't rave enough about Grand Mercure's bakery inside the hotel. It had delightfully rich, high quality pastries   and coffee. The bar downstairs is not always staffed, but you'll find it's probably better to go outside the resort for drinks, as the bar inside the resort is about double the price of most places in the area. Lastly, I want to commend the staff for procuring a taxi for me very early in the morning when it is rather difficult to find one. The concierge is very…

title: Relaxing trip with nice room
review: Dear Prettipetite,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience at our property!   We are really pleased to hear about your positive experience at ours and specially with our concierge team. Chou Chou Deli Shop is indeed one of the highlight of the property offering fresh French pastries and unique tastes.   We hope to have the chance to welcome you back at the property in the near future, should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us anytime!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: H E A V E N
review: Room is nice with pool view, balcony is not a balcony at all, there is no space to even stand but it is ok.  Near to food and drinking place and easy to travel around using grab app.  Not as easy to get the exact pick up location if it is not prominent.

title: The poool and the location!
review: This was our second time in Phuket and our first time at the Grand Mercure. We picked this hotel based on past traveller’s reviews and because it is the only resort style hotel in the Patong area.   We stayed here for 8 nights for our Honeymoon in a superior king room. Check in was quick and efficient. The Welcome Drink and cold towels were a nice touch.  We LOVED how the layout of the hotel was thoughtfully planned and executed. Every room has balcony windows that look into the pool courtyard, making every waking morning pleasant and quaint.   Our room didn’t come with the daily breakfast buffet but coupons may be purchased for a discount. It came to 350 bhat, just under $15 CAD a person. Selection was good and it has a beautiful setup too.   The hotel also offers a daily FREE…

title: Uncomfortable
review: Dear yaya_beachbum,  Thousand thanks for your wonderful detailed review, it is very much appreciated and always a pleasure to see our guest bringing such wonderful memories back home.  We could not be more pleased to know you had a heavenly stay here and found yourself extremely delighted comfortable at the property.   All the team would love to welcome you back in a near future, and please feel free to contact us directly anytime, we would be pleased to assist you with any arrangements you may need.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Breakfast
review: Amazing breakfast.. we didn't stay at the hotel but great experience the 2 time we went for breakfast..all food was very fresh..me and my wife are food critics.. and we couldn't find anything wrong..from taste to presentations..amazing staff also..we were greeted by SANNIE..ONE of the front desk staff..very professional..very welcoming..always smiling!! Also the detouc juices..u just have to see it for your self.. not the greatest pic..lol

title: Pleasant Stay Close to all.
review: A very enjoyable stay of 1 week. Just 10 minutes walk from the famous bangla road walking street and patong beach. You cant be disappointed with this hotel. It has its own pool gym business centre. They have a kids nursery too. Breakfast was a wide choice fit for all. Rooms were very spacious and clean. Would recommend and stay here again myself.

title: very good hotel
review: Dear Himz1981,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are really flattered to hear you had an amazing and pleasant stay and enjoyed the convenient location of the property!   The team is looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future! Should you need any assistance prior to your next visit, please feel free to contact any of us, we would be very happy to assist you!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great service!
review: A really good hotel for calm and quiet rooms that are really good The breakfasts are excellent .. Service is really good Excellent food .. Good service ... Quiet at night There is a writer two minutes walk from the hotel ... It is a 10-minute walk from Patong Street A good and reasonable price for the change Personally if I went back there I would look for a hotel closer to Patong because the truth is 10 minutes walk tiring

title: Beautiful hotel and helpful staff
review: Dear Mohammed N,   Thank you for taking your time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us!  We appreciate your comments concerning the quality at the breakfast and also for the great atmosphere here at the hotel! Our hotel is indeed 500 meters away from the beach but you might want to use our complimentary shuttle bus to the beach should you wish to visit us again!   Please feel free to contact any of us should you need any assistance.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful resort. Wonderful staff!
review: We stayed here for our 20th wedding anniversary. First impression was - big, clean and modern. The staff greeted us with a beautiful smile and warm welcome. We had emailed ahead and let them know it was a special occasion. Our room was made up with a beautifully romantic setting.  Breakfasts were delightful. The resort catered for everyone. Fresh and delicious- great way to start the day.  We had an issue with our room which the duty manager (the lovely Beer) resolved immediately with little fuss or bother. She could not do enough to help us. So polite and professional.  Only downside, if you could call it that, is that it does not have direct access to the beach. They do provide a free shuttle however.  Highly recommend.

title: Friendliest resort in the world
review: Dear l0vethedrake,   Many thanks for this review and congratulations again on your 20th wedding anniversary!    It was great having you both staying and enjoying yourselves at the property and we hope you will soon be back celebrating other happy events!   We will share your comments with rest of the team and specially to Beer on your behalf and hope to have the chance welcoming you back in the future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful property, wonderful staff.
review: It’s a bit like going to Disneyland as this resort has the friendliest staff in the world, from the gardeners, housekeeping,  bell boys, reception, concierges, bar staff, lounge & restaurant staff. Absolutely amazing they are so helpful & kind. Very good spot close to everything in Patong.

title: Great hotel with friendly, smiley staff
review: After a long flight and an early arrival we got a lovely welcome with cool drinks, a cold towel and delicious choux pastries with purple icing.  Even though we arrived early morning, there was no long wait for our room so we were able to start our holiday straight away.    The property is contemporary in cool creams and greys so you feel relaxed as soon as you walk in.  Room are contemporary - great showers, wifi, and TV.  We always buy water from the local stores for our room but actually didn't need it as they keep you well stocked up.  Beds are huge and comfortable with great pillows.  There are lovely, unspoiled, views of the mountains from the walkways around the hotel and the hotel itself is beautifully lit at night.   When we arrived in our room there were only 4 hangers…

title: Accor Hotel in Patong falls through the crack
review: I had a nice stay in a friendly hotel with good atmosphere. A nice traditional style. Excellent staff, very friendly, always helpful & smiling.                                                              Thanks to Sita Chaytri & other staff members for making my stay pleasant. Special thanks to General Manager Sebastien for putting Cocktail night for all the guests.    Amazing food at Bubbles restaurant which I really enjoyed. Nice snacks at Grand club for Accor members. Very convenient location.                                                                            I stayed here for the 8 nights and definitely will chose the 'Grand Mercure' again on my next trip to Phuket.                                                                                                      …

title: Amazing Hotel 😍
review: Nice hotel and staff is very helpful and all Time smile and in service all the time and  big thanks for reception staff ANN and duty manager Beer  I am very happy for stay in this hotel My next trip cannot stay in another hotel

title: Too expensive for poor quality -mold and cigarette smoke in room
review: My friend and I recently had 7 nights at this hotel. Our room had mold all over the walls and in the bathroom. It smelt bad. The room was small. The beds were comfortable. The staff were friendly. Housekeeping often didn't come until late in the afternoon eg 5 or 6pm, despite asking to have our room mage up at midday because we had run out of toilet paper. We also had an issue with people smoking in rooms near ours, and then the smell came through our aircon. We asked if the could be reminded it was a non smoking room, but the staff didnt want to, or didnt know what to do. So we had to spend the holiday breathing in other peoples smoke, or we could open the door of our room, but then the aircon turned off and the mozzies came in. It was not an enjoyable stay at all. I would not…

title: Loved it!
review: Dear RLewy,  Please kindly accept my sincere apologies for the disappointing experience at ours. We are doing our very best to keep humidity level in rooms at its lowest but it is challenging at times, especially in between season like we are now. I am very sorry once again and wish we would have reacted faster and offered you to switch rooms. That would have also helped with issue caused by neighbors smoking on nearby corridors.   As for the service in room, and after checking with our Housekeeping Manager, it seems you have requested on numerous times not to be disturbed, as you wanted to sleep longer and relax in your room (as records show) On the first morning for instance, you simply asked for 3 bottles of water. Room was made up between 9.00 and 10.00 am on 2 other occasions and later in the days when a request was made for our team to come back later once again.   It comes down to maybe miscommunication and i wish i could have been informed, so to assist and avoid unnecessary frustration on your side.   Once again, we are all really sorry and hope you would reconsider and offer us a second chance to welcome you at grand Mercure in near future.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Just Perfect
review: This Hotel is beautiful and centrally located.  The breakfast was good and I would recommend adding it.  (You can book the room with or without.)  We had a problem with our room, but management quickly and happily fixed it. The pool is awesome! The rooms are nice and the beds were decent.  As you check in you are greeted with cold towels and a lavender drink.  The hotel had a live band in the lobby bar which was a fun way to start the night.

title: Nice redort for holiday in phuket
review: This Hotel is an ideal place to stay as it is found in the heart of Patong, the renowned tourists destination in Phuket.  Upon arrival we’re welcomed by the lovely staffs and the check in process was smooth and quick, we’re handed with a refreshing cold towels with a purple drink that signifies the brand. After that one of the staffs escorted us going to our room and she’s very nice but I badly forgot her name.  The room itself was splendid, it was equipped with basic amenities that everyone needs. The room was not spacious enough but will give you total comfort. As you open the window, you will be welcomed by a nice view of the hotel itself. Even the hotel is almost in the middle of Patong you’ll still at peace.  The breakfast was huge, there’s a lot of options for you to enjoy…

title: Perfect location during Sonkrat Festivities
review: Excellent service, great pool and bar service after long day at the beach. Perfectly situated during the New Year Festivities! Easy walk across the road to join in but should you want to escape the bustle take 15 minute taxi ride to access Freedom beach, Paradise beach or Kata beach for a fare of between 400 to 500 baht one way.

title: Amazing Grand Mercure
review: This hotel has it all Amazing rooms ✅ Amazing staff ✅ Amazing food  ✅  Amazing pool Location ✅ Wifi excellent ✅ Suits honeymoon - couples - families - business - disabilities  DETAILS First tip get an ACCOR ADVANTAGE PLUS CARD BEFORE YOU BOOK You get one night free - priority checkin upgrade if avail and here is the BIG ONE 50% off every food bill including the three special buffets they do a week - saved a fortune  You can even order from restaurant and get delivered to pool food and drinks and get discount but not if you order from pool bar 🤭 Breakfast was 470 baht each but with card for two The breakfast selection was huge - of course eggs anyway -but with every international choice of foods all fresh - and vegetarian options  Standout was the fresh juicing Station - blends…

title: Very Good Hotel
review: Dear Janine P,  I am not quite sure where to start... It is not everyday we are seeing such review of our property!! Shall you be looking for a PR role in Phuket, please note we would seriously be considering your request :)  A thousand thanks for this AMAZING review and the time taken in sharing it with the rest of the community. It is very kind of you and i am really pleased we were able to touch you heart and the heart of the ones you care most about.   I will as our Talent & Culture Manager to print a copy of it onto our Staff board and will surely pass your warmest regards onto Jern and Penny, for their friendliness and outstanding work.  Once again, thank you!! You will always be home at ours...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: 9 Night Break
review: I stayed at the Grand Mercure Hotel Patong Beach in Thailand for 12 days in March. Having stayed at this hotel on previous occasions, I can recommend the Grand Mercure hotel to anyone wishing a very comfortable stay in a 5 star hotel in Patong. The hotel staff were very friendly and professional and would go out of their way to ensure that my stay at the hotel was a 5 star experience. The food was excellent, the amenities and the room were meticulously clean. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent and friendly service and convenient location
review: Dear Christopher B,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review!  We very pleased to note you enjoyed both our services, room amenities but also cuisine.   Looking forward to welcoming you back soonest!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great location!!
review: We stayed at this hotel for 10 nights. It was our first trip to Thailand and it’s location was great, being only minutes away from bars, places to eat, shops, supermarket and a short walk to the beach.  We had a Pool Access Room which I would say is a must! It was nice to have some quiet time away from the main pool which could get quite busy. The only downside is that the rooms are a bit small, especially lacking in storage space! I requested more coat hangers from reception and they were sent to our room immediately. Lighting is also poor in the rooms especially when getting ready in the evenings. We had breakfast in the hotel every morning and this was usually a very busy time, but varied depending on what time you went for breakfast. Sometimes you had to wait a few minutes…

title: wonderful expereince to stay in Patong
review: Dear Helen D,   Allow me to thank you for choosing our property for your first stay in Thailand and for taking the time to share your valuable thoughts with us!    There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you had a wonderful time with us and found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort with all the facilities along with a warm service.  Again, thank you for all the compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us again!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very pleasant!
review: The receptionist, Ann (from Thailand) & Annie (from Taiwan) they were friendly & nicely to check-in for us, arranged our local tour carefully, checking details for us.  That makes us warm and relaxing for our trip here.  Room is clean everyday with sunshine, swimming pool is good, food is good too.  This is the first choice to stay for first time visiting in Patong.   Only one thing to complain is my room too far to the lobby. :P    Hopefully to be here very soon.

title: Impressive services, wonderful breakfast and convenient location!
review: Dear E's L,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Ann and Annie's hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Superb accommodations in Phuket at Grand Mercure Hotel
review: We arrived at the hotel approximately 9am and checked in...we were taken to our room by 11.30am which was very helpful as check in time is 2pm! We were given complementary breakfast whilst we waited for our room to be prepared. Staff prepared our room as soon as possible to ensure we did not have to wait around after a long journey!  The only issue we had was that the wardrobe was too small. It is a single wardrobe and when we complained about it we were informed that all superior rooms had wardrobes which were the same size as ours. Myself and my husband were not happy but the manager Sebastian handled the situation really well. He was sympathetic, understanding and very professional. He offered to upgrade us to a deluxe suite in 3 days time when it would become available free…

title: Amazing staff - Great location
review: I just had to write a review about our stay at this hotel.  My wife and I were here from 23 to 30 March to celebrate our 36th wedding anniversary.  I have to say it was an amazing experience primarily due to the great service of the staff.  When we arrived we were given a lovely drink on check in.  Ni at reception was lovely and did all she could to make us feel welcome and at home.  I have to thank her supervisor Ann who worked tirelessly behind the scenes to instil a high level of quality in her staff.  We were shown to our superior double room which was not quite up to our expectations as it did had quite a small balcony.  I mentioned this to the front desk and I have to thank manager Nas who agreed to upgrade us to a suite on 7th floor. The suite was wonderful and spacious…

title: 14 nights - Pool Access Room
review: Dear MKundra,   Thank you so much for taking from your valuable time to share your thoughts with us on your recent stay!   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Nas, Ni and Ann's hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly, we would be glad welcoming you back!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Great stay
review: As an Accor member, we chose this hotel as it is the only one in central Patong. It has the best location, close to everything for walking. Would have loved to give them 5***** but it was just a little lacking in certain points. Staff were lovely and friendly, Tib made us feel special everyday with her surprises on the bed, she was an absolute blessing the morning I had food poisoning (not from Hotel). She was lovely. The breakfast staff we also very caring and the Club Lounge staff were very attentive. We had a pool access room, great sized deck area, but this left the room a little too small for the length of time we stayed as it could do with more storage. Most pool access rooms with club access, have a portion of 'privacy' unfortunately ours was directly opposite the…

title: PERFECTION!
review: Really nice stay at Grand Mercure - welcoming staff and I was upgraded to a fabulous suite as a Le Club member. The pool was nice to chill out at in the morning. Good location to go check out the nightlife but still tucked away like a little oasis from the nightlife in Patong!

title: The best
review: My second time staying at this amazing resort, I honestly wouldn’t stay anywhere else in patong. The location is still central but not too close to bangla so the resort is very peaceful at night. This resort is honestly so stunning, There are no tricks or editing in their photos, it is actually this beautiful in person. The buffet breakfast has such a wide variety of food and it is all fresh and delicious. My biggest satisfaction about this place is that it is so clean! And your room is always attended to no matter what time of the day. Customer service here is second to none. They truly do pride themselves on making sure your stay is nothing but perfection with them. I would like to personally thank Julie and all of the staff here for making me and my boyfriend feel so special…

title: Best guest experience in Patong
review: This hotel was super sensational! Especially the staff! We were taken care by Milky, Sannie, Saya & Billy who provided excellent customer service throughout our stay! Thank you and we will come again!

title: FANTASTIC STAY
review: Dear travelislandgoddess,  Thank you so much for writing such a positive review on your recent stay with us!   We are really glad to learn you enjoyed your stay and everything we stand for. We will surely thank Milky, Sannie, Saya and Billy for their professionalism and friendliness.   Thank you once again for your support and for placing your trust in our hospitality, we are looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: The staff are all super helpful !
review: This was really a property i missed out, beach is very close even a morning walk to thge beach refreshes you, have a good swimming pool which goes around the whole property and is accessable even from the ground floor rooms if you are planning,.fantastic breakfast with all delicasies, excellent rooms with good view ,good gym, and the best part is the accessability to the city from the hotel, if you want can try varieties of sea food just a step out of the hotel, the whole of the hotel staff is super especially the banquet staff the lady from france ,

title: UNDECIDED
review: Dear Deepcoc,   Thank you for taking from your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us! We are delighted to learn you have appreciated the breakfast quality and all the facilities available at the property.   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Just okay
review: Stayed at this resort because of pictures. It was honestly one of thee nicest resorts I’ve been too. Upon arrival, we were greeted and serviced so welcomed. The resort provided two drinks and a small cream puff what it looked like. Our room was on the second floor, top of the villas (which is a great view IMO).   This resort is really close to the night markets, DA HOOD, and Patong Beach strip/ actual beach.  What I really enjoyed about my stay was that when I needed to checkout, I asked for a late checkout, they were able to provide us with a 1pm instead of 12pm. Another thing, we were able to still hang out at the resort, get in the pool, shower and leave to the airport since our flight wasn’t until 7pm.   There’s a restaurant, cafe and buffet(which costs extra). It was…

title: The best
review: Check in with Pimmy was quick and easy. She escorted us to our beautiful room.  Housekeeping every day were perfect. Joy at Chou Chou was lovely. There was a good variety at breakfast and the staff at breakfast were very pleasant.   All staff we came accross even the porters were friendly.  The pool was very nice to swim in, not freezing cold like a lot of pools.  If i had to find one complaint it would be that as a non smoker i found there to be a lot of smokers.  Celebrating our anniversay was made more special by the touches from the Grand Mercure.   Thank you for a wonderful stay.

title: Wonderful stay ♥️
review: Dear Donna T,  Thank you for taking your time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Pimmy and Joy 's hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Loved it!
review: We stayed there 7 days for our honeymoon and it was amazing! The hotel prepared a very warm welcome to us. Very friendly and professional staffs! From the receptionists Saya san, ありがとうございました。Sannie&milky thank you for being so nice to us until we checked out. And Audy the bartender in the pool bar, thank you for recommending beautiful places for us to see in patong. Thank you for being so friendly to us. We really appreciate it. And the Ryn spa, we had the best massage ever!! We hope we can come back to this beautiful hotel again.

title: Recommended to everyone with every taste
review: Dear Setsuko i,  Allow me to thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you had a wonderful time with us and found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to special attentions and the friendliness of our dedicated team! We will pass on your best regards to Saya, Sannie and Milky and Audy who will be surely pleased by your kind words!   Again, thank you for all the compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us again!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Excellent!
review: Can't beat the location of this hotel. Just far enough away if you want to escape the crazyness of patong but close enough if you want to get involved. Great friendly staff always very helpfull. The room is great. Comfy beds, cleaned daily. Room service is awesome cant fault it. The breakfast is deffinetly one of the best I've ever experianced! Deffinetly will stay here again when we return.

title: Relaxing Stay
review: We had a pool access room and it was very convenient since we can use the pool any time we want to as long as you will not disturb your neighbors. Room is cozy has a comfortable bed and very relaxing ambience. Restaurants offer buffet dinner and a la carte menu during the day. They have pool bar which offers good drinks during the day. Cafe near by the lobby is a good choice for afternoon tea as well.

title: Average Hotel - look elsewhere if you want 5 Star
review: Dear Rhylle M,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review!   It was such pleasure having you here with us and learning you enjoyed yourselves so much! Also, we are pleased to hear that you were really satisfied with our restaurants and bars!    We are sincerely looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly, our team will be pleased to assist you with the arrangements   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful and safe property
review: I didn’t love this hotel stayed here for 4 days with a friend and it was rather average. The 2 redeeming factors were the location - very central and easy to walk to Bangla Road and the beach- however the street it’s in is noisy rather dirty and surrounding areas are unkempt. We had the pool access room and that was a nice to have - and the pool bar was nice too. However - the pool bar was way too close to the kiddies pool and they made so much noise .  There was a nice variety for breakfast , however on all mornings they were short staffed and so many dirty tables left with food and plates - food on the floor . Rather disappointing and gross. I wouldn’t recommend this hotel - maybe if you have a family/kids that love swimming and will utilise the pool access room all the time .…

title: Great hotel along with great service!
review: Dear Kanger30,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review and encouraging note despite the few issues encountered.   We are sorry to hear you were not satisfied by your stay. We have shared your comments about the experience you had at the breakfast to our Food & Beverage Experience Manager to improve this particular matter.   Concerning the kids disturbance, we are indeed a family friendly property and we recommend for those who are seeking calmness to relax on the sun loungers located at the opposite side of the kids pool.    In another hand we are happy to read your comment towards the convenient location and also the comfort of the Deluxe Pool Access Rooms.   Thank you once again,  Valentine

title: Extra caring for hotel
review: I spent a week at the Grand Mercure. I didn't have much experience in Phucket, so I was very appreciative of all the advice and knowledge the staff provided me with. The beds were firm. The bathroom was pretty large, with a nice bedet and a spacious sink and tub. The soaking tub is fairly high. I'm 5 feet tall so it was a little challenging getting out. Expect to see see large bugs every once in a while and try not to freak out. You have to expect it because the hotel has an "outsidish" concept.   I toured the pool area. It was very picturesque, though I never swam in it. The beach is bit of a walk (approx 15 min). It's not the nicest beach in the area but it's very easy to get into a cab and go somewhere else. Always have the hotel recommend the taxi. The cafe inside the hotel…

title: Amazing location, great pool and gym!
review: We spent 10 nights in Phuket and had an amazing time at the Grand Mercure. We loved the gym facilities and the pool. Rooms were clean and functional.
