There was a great restaurant just across the road, and there were a heap of little bars nearby. Not as close to the beach as the advertising would suggest, but only a short walk.

title: Really good hotel and fantastic staff with great service
review: Dear laurenkate12,  Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to hear you had an amazing and pleasant stay and enjoyed the convenient location of the property!   The team is looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future! Should you need any assistance prior to your next visit, please feel free to contact any of us, we would be very happy to assist you!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Nice Stay at Phuket
review: Really good hotel from the moment we got in, staff have great local knowledge and are very friendly.  All the staff would greet us in the morning especially my little boy,, whos face lit up every time!!  Staff went out of their way to ensure we had a milk bottle steriliser, and anything that we wanted was provided.  In the night the room service was fantastic.  When the bar staff saw my little boy in the pool they asked if we wanted an inflatable.  This is a very family friendly place.  It really felt that we were being looked after and this made a big difference to us.  The breakfast and hotel restaurant is also great.  A very big thank you for making our stay pleasant.

title: A pleasant Surprise
review: Nice room, though not any thing extra ordinary. Very nice and helpful staff at front desk, in the Restaurant, and a very good room service. Little mosquito problem, and the front desk staff helped with some insect repellents too. We also had carried some type of Repellents with us for travel in Phuket . The Breakfast had many choices of food and juices, etc. As a whole it was a nice and comfortable stay

title: A home away from home
review: Recently I stayed at a Mercure hotel in Catania Sicily and was very disappointed. I decided to try again and booked the Grand Mercure in Phuket.  I must say that I was happy I gave Mercure a second chance, as my stay was wonderful from a very comfortable room to excellent staff who were very professional, friendly and helpful. The location was great for town and beach life.  My special thanks to the Duty manager, Mr. Nopporn Jitwarin, who went out of the way to make my stay special and rewarding.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone going to Phuket.  Carl M Valenti

title: Gratefully❤️
review: At the time my family visit Phuket check in at Grand Mercure, my father suddenly very ill, when we ask for help, the hotel staff make a very good decision to send my dad to hospital and this few minutes already save my father’s life. All the hotel staff show their professional and care, they arrange for translation and help us to settle even when we move to the other hotel. This hotel make me feel home. Thankyou for GM Mr Sebastian Tronchet Guest Relation Manager Ms Sita Chaytri All the staff ,Thankyou very much. And our family planning to travel again.  Guest Zoe’s family

title: Not a five stars
review: Dear Ngo Ching W,   Thank you for spending some time to share your recent experience at our hotel on Trip Advisor!   First of all, we would like to send all our best wishes for recovery to your father and we sincerely hope he is now enjoying a good health.   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you have felt at home while you were staying at our property. We indeed care a lot for our valued guest health and well-being and we would have done anything possible to help and assist your family in this sensitive moment.   We do hope your next stay will be a more relaxing one :) Feel free to contact any of us directly, we would be glad to take care of any arrangements you may need.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Absolutely loved!
review: I booked it cause it should be the only 5 stars in the center of Patong. The reception was great and they gave us an upgrade to a charming garden villa. That made us away from the lots of Chinese children in the hotel. When I comment that this hotel is only a four stars I means that I do not know another 5stars with a billard and a sports screen in the only bar or paper tissues on breakfast or dinner buffet. We got linnen napkins on request and always a friendly service, even I had better ones in Phuket and with less issues in their English language.

title: nice Hotel but location not ideal
review: Dear masmiguelDusseldorf,  Many thanks for your review and kind comments about our reception area and team... I am very pleased you could enjoy the comfort of our One Bedroom Villa thanks to the complimentary upgrade...  It is sad this gesture was not fully appreciated however, looking at the given and average 3* rating !  Please rest assured the issue we encountered with our Laundry supplier has now been fixed and i hope you would reconsider and eventually give us all a chance to redeem ourselves and offer you a true 5* experience after all.  with Grand regards,

title: Exceptional
review: Have a wonderful vacation with Grand Mercure hotel! First of all, Thanks for GSO  'Jern Jern' she is very kind and helpful! When i checked in, the view of the room was not good. One of the concierge staff assisted me to contact to Guest services, then Jern Jern called me back. She did quick follow up and assigned my room as best as she could. Also when I approched at the desk again for ordering breaky box, she remembered our room number and asked for the room status. She is lovy and kind, most wonderful!  OHM from Pool bar, he is wonderful and careful !  During 2 days, he recognized us. Love him :)  Housekeepers from room 520 were so fantastic! Thanks all!  Breakfast was superb, Some of staff i mentioned were so fantastic, great location, will be back :)

title: WHAT A MAGNIFICENT RESORT
review: Grand Mercure is certainly now one of my favourite resorts I have visited.  From the friendly reception staff, restaurant staff, cleaning staff - everybody here is friendly.  The cleanliness of this resort is impeccable.    The location was just far enough away from all the hustle and bustle yet close enough to walk to if we wanted.  The restaurant for dinner served wonderful seafood and the daily breakfast with fresh cleansing juices were just what we needed.  We were lucky enough to be upgraded to a one bedroom private villa with a plunge pool - this made my holiday complete.  After spending 7 days in Chumphon - with absolutely no baggage - lost at airport for the whole duration of my holiday  - 5.5 hours NE of Phuket and being isolated - coming to this resort made my holiday…

title: Absolutely perfect!
review: Dear Tracey P,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review and rating. We are all very pleased you loved our Pool Villa so much and i will certainly share your comments with both our Housekeeping, Front and restaurant teams!  LOVE is all we need and on behalf of our team, i thank you for your kind and heartfelt message!!  Hope to see you both again very soon! Sebastien

title: Top of the range
review: We stayed here for 5 nights at the end of our honeymoon. The hotel is gorgeous, impeccably clean and every member of staff we met we found to be very friendly and helpful. There is a great swim up bar and a lovely pool area, complementary pool-side towels and lots of very comfortable loungers.  Location wise again is fantastic, 5 minutes from the beach and 5-10 to all the night life you could want on Bangla road! The hotel itself is like a little haven among the hustle and bustle of Patong. We were lucky enough to be upgraded to a single bedroom villa - and oh my goodness it was absolutely beautiful!! We were even given a delicious ‘honeymoon cake’ from the patisserie within the hotel.  The club lounge offers free afternoon tea style food and soft drinks/tea/coffee from 11-5pm,…

title: Nice bubble from busy Patong
review: Dear Tina W,  Many thanks and congratulations on your Honeymoon again!!  It was great having you both staying and enjoying yourselves at our property and i hope you will soon be back celebrating anniversaries too :)  I will share your message with rest of the team and thank them for their dedication and care... Incredible is what we are aiming for and i am pleased we made it happen for you!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great hotel in the heart of patong
review: My wife and I spent 2 weeks recently at the Grand Mercure Resort at Patong beach Phuket Thailand. Everything about the resort was excellent . Our room was a deluxe king pool access which was good size, very comfortable bed and the pool access straight off our private balcony was well used.  Or room attendant was good at her job, friendly and very helpful, even leaving special made up towel animals on our bed each night. The buffet breakfast which was included was all you could possibly ask for and very yummy, and was well organised by the front staff which went overboard to attend to your needs. The location of the resort was well placed, not directly placed in the busy and loud front beachfront area but a comfortable walk 1 street back more quieter.  Free WIFI and access the…

title: Extremely amazing!! 给力！
review: Nice experience!! We ordered Phuket set, and we really LOVE it!! Tasty food and good service. So impressive 💓 May is very friendly and having a good humor. We will come back for sure! 超级美味！！我们点了普吉当地美食套餐，除了荤菜，还有普吉当地的甜点，叫Ow Ew(banana jelly爱玉冰) 服务员都很热情，尤其是May。 下次还要来！赞👍

title: Fabulous hotel in the heart of Patong!
review: Dear BabyJ G,   Thank you so much for your kind comments and 5* score!   We are glad to know you had a great time at Bubbles Restaurant with May and enjoyed our unique Phuket Set Menu. We are looking forward to your return for more lunch and diner experiences at the restaurant! I seize this opportunity to let you know that we have amazing buffet diners every Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays that are a must :)   See you soon and best regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel
review: We spent 3 wonderful nights at the Grand Mercure Phuket in January. Overall the hotel was excellent. The check in process was smooth and efficient. With many staff on the front desk, we never had to wait for anything. As a Platinum Accor Plus LeClub member we were upgraded to a suite room on the top floor, overlooking the pool. The room was nicely furnished and well appointed and had everything we needed. Bed very comfortable. Plenty of complimentary bottled water - always a plus. The hotel grounds are lovely, set around a lagoon pool with swim up bar. Very relaxing and tranquil.  Bubbles restaruant, also poolside was sensational. The seafood buffet was excellent. Breakfast was very good with cooked to order omlette. With our Accor Plus card it was very worthwhile dining in the…

title: Super Hotel in Patong
review: Very good staff .beautiful swimming pool.good location .comfortable bedroom. Great breakfast.nice well coming.high speed wifi connection.good air conditioning.near the patong  beach and street.we stayed  four nights.

title: Quality, Quiet Resort in the middle of Busy Patong
review: Dear shahriyarn2018,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us on Trip Advisor!   We are glad to hear the positive experience you had at the property and that you found both the product and the service to be great! Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please do not hesitate to contact any of us directly, we would be pleased to help you with any arrangement you may need.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: A lovely, quiet Resort in busy Patong
review: We were only able to spend 3 nights at this wonderful hotel in Patong, but from arrival to departure we were well looked after. We highly recommend this resort, the atmosphere is amazing, the staff are incredibly helpful and accommodating, the rooms are top shelf and the food is delicious. We have been treated like royalty during our stay and wouldn’t hesitate to stay again.

title: Very good
review: Hi MiguelDeg,   Thank you so much for your very nice review!   We feel extremely honored to receive all your kind comments and thankful to hear the special experience you both had at the property!  Should you or your sister come back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us directly, we will be pleased to assist you with the booking.   Best regards, Valentine

title: IT's a wonderful holiday experience! By Oat&Gift
review: Thai are known as the kindest person in the world and the employee from the Grand Mercure are no exceptions. They are always very attentive and answer to our demands. Tour service provided by the hotel is very simple as you can directly order shows, tours from the reception front desk. Pick-up is made in front of the hotel which is very conveniant. Specialities from the restaurant are delicious. We also tried the Oriental and SeaFood buffet organized on wed and Friday and meals are delicious. Very good experience.

title: decent hotel but they broke my wife's hair iron...
review: Dear S147XOeric,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a fabulous review of your stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong! It is always a great pleasure to receive such feedback and I am sure other travelers will appreciate your input and recommendation.   Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our friendly team, brings a big smile to our face! review: ทุกอย่างที่นี่ ดีมากๆครับ ใช้คำว่า perfect ได้เลย ตั้งแต่ก้าวแรกที่เข้าไป พนักงานให้เกียรติและดูแลเป็นอย่างดี ยิ้มแย้มแจ่มใส ทำให้เรารู้สึกไม่อึดอัด ห้องที่เข้าพักเป็นห้อง superior suite มีทุกอย่างครบครัน มินิบาร์ของเยอะมาก เอาเป็นว่า ขอบคุณทาง Grand mercure เป็นอย่างมากกับทุกๆรายละเอียด มีทั้งความสุข สนุก เรื่องเซอไพรส์  ขอบคุณพนักงานทุกคนของที่นี่ รวมไปถึงผู้บริหาร ที่ฝึกพนักงานของเค้าได้อย่างดีมาก แล้วพบกันอีกแน่นนอน / Love you Grand mercure!

title: Good but could do better
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure for a week for an important meeting/convention. The room and amenities were fine but there's quite a few things they can do to definitely improve this place. Here's a small list, among others: - room must be maintained better - telephone unit wasn't wiped clean and had a bad smell - table counters were not wiped properly and there were grimes in the toilet/bath - the shower was over the tub and they had no mats available; thus, it was very slippery and could potentially be a hazard  They did have some redeeming features though: the conference area was very good and the staff - particularly Ink - attended to every single bit of our needs.   Overall, it was okay. If they make some adjustments, it could easily be great.

title: Great staff
review: Stayed in November for the first time of many visits to Phuket. Very nice hotel and very close to everything you need. You could stay a month and not eat everything at the buffet breakfast, was the best i have ever seen times two. Had a Dentist appointment and they made sure the taxi knew exactly where to go (Kata beach) before i got into the car. If you want exceptional customer service, you need only ask. Worked in the hospitality industry for a long time, and this was everything i needed. If you need anything ask for Julie who is the front house manager. She is the goods!

title: Beautiful
review: Dear jeff b,  Many thanks for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you had a wonderful time with us and found yourselves extremely comfortable in the resort thanks to special attentions and the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Again, thank you for the kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Wonderful Stay!!
review: Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Pool, spa and dining facilities were wonderful! Spa treatment was amazing. Had a great stay and highly recommend. Would definitely stay at this resort again and for longer next time! :)

review: Dear keithtimmeadows,   Thank you very much for your wonderful comments and 5* score!   We are pleased to learn you had a great stay with us and enjoyed the service and facilities available at the resort! We are all looking forward to your return, should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us anytime.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Good location close to the Patong Beach. Cooperative staff They even got our breakfast packed when we had to  Leave early morning for a flight. Ambience is beautiful . Buffet breakfast was fresh and yummy.

title: Good value with great staff
review: Dear Noorie6,   Thank you very much for your nice review following your stay at our property!   We delighted to hear you had a very nice time with us and enjoyed the helpfulness of our team members and their little attentions and also the quality of the breakfast. We hope to have the chance welcoming you back in a near future.   Please feel free to contact us should you need any assistance for your booking!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Comfortable stay, Housekeeping on down side
review: I brought my team for our team retreat. It’s been awhile since I came to Phuket, so I decided to stay at Grand Mecure. The hotel looks new , the rooms are of good value. Special compliments to Ann who check my team in, she was very helpful and detailed. We had some request and she patiently help us . Ann really went the extra mile to check if all is well with us during our stay, it is staff like that who makes us want to come back.  Stayed in a villa, very cosy and private. Place near shopping area, convenient for food too.

title: Gem of a Hotel in Phuket
review: Dear Syam60,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review and for choosing our property for your team retreat!    Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our staff and in particular by Ann brings us a great smile! We were glad to be part of this special occasion and to know it was a memorable one!  Thank you again for placing your trust in our hospitality; we are sincerely looking forward to pampering you all again! Please feel free to contact any of us, we will be pleased to assist you with the arrangements!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great location
review: This was our second destination in Thailand. The hotel is quite centrally located in Patong city but quite far away from all other sight seeing locations like James bond island, Krabi, Phuket fantasia shows etc. Reception staff was courteous and concierge was not so impressive as they expected them to be tipped. The breakfast spread is very average. They could have added little more international menu. House keeping is pathetic you need to literally ask for Soaps shampoo body wash towels etc since amenities in particular are not refilled or replaced. The room size is also a down side as they are quite small for the amount you pay. Also since the corridor is open it creates lot of disturbance during windy days. Lot of room for improvement. May not opt again

title: 2 night stay in busy Patong
review: Stayed for 2 nights with my husband, the hotel is fabulous, clean, friendly staff, spacious comfy rooms etc. The hotel is in a perfect location for seeing Patong, in walking distance of shops and the beach and nightlife. They have happy hour in the afternoons but I found the cocktails to taste to sweet with not much alcohol so only had them once! We didn’t eat at the hotel so can’t comment on the food. The pool area was the only thing that let it down for me, it was really shaded so not good for sunbathing, but being a walk away from the beach we went there instead. Patong in general is not the nicest area of Phuket so we were happy to leave after 2 nights to go elsewhere

title: Comfortable stay in Patong
review: Dear rhianyn,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!   We are delighted to hear you have appreciated many aspects of the resort and that you had a lovely stay at the property! Your feedback has been shared with our Food & Beverages Team in charge of the pool area to improve our services.   Please feel free to contact us whenever you desire to return, we will be absolutely glad to assist you with your arrangements!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Wonderful stay. Wonderful Christmas
review: Grand Mercure proved to be a lovely central stay in Patong. Only a short walk to the oTop market and bars, and not far from Bangla Road. We had no issue with any noise during our stay. All staff were willing to help with smiles. I have also left a review at Booking.com. Our only discrepancies were that there was often hair left in our room after a service, and that some staff were concerned about how issues were being handled by management. Breakfast was of a good standard however a little expensive (220 baht) compared to some other five star properties in the area.  If you are after an upgrade, you must ask to see the prices- our receptionist seemed to think that we were after a free upgrade when we asked if there were any villas available, she said that they were fully…

title: Vacation Paradise
review: Beautiful and welcoming property. Front desk staff, amazing. Resort with home feeling. Lovely pool. Rooms with nice views. Excellent breakfast. Seafood par excellence. 7 to 10 minutes from Patong beach. 10 to 15 from Bangala Road. Opposite hotel pop up bars, restaurants, massages and tourist type shops. Though close to the outside good vibe, hotel peacefully tucked away. Enjoy best of both worlds. Thanks F&B team for catering to suit our taste and needs. Thank you Sebastien Tronchet for making our family holiday special and memorable.

We are sincerely looking forward to pampering you and your family again in a near future. title: Second time around
review: We haven’t been to Phuket for 3 years. Our last visit, we also stayed at the Grand Mercure, so we thought we would frequent it again.   Sebastian, the general manager,  looked after us, as we had stayed there before. He upgraded us to a larger room, which was really appreciated.   I don’t know how to say this any other way, but we are so glad that we returned to this hotel. The staff were sensational, especially Sita, Yen, Audy and Ohm. They couldn’t provide a better service. They were professional, but also personable.   The rooms were beautifully kept, the food was A1 and the pool was always clean. You can’t ask for more. I wish more Australian hotels were presented the same way.   The easy thing about all this is, it takes the hassle out in finding another hotel when we come…

title: DEFINITELY THE BEST IN PATONG!!
review: The resort is lovely.  They genuinely service all their customers with a smile.  We stayed in a suite which was impeccable with ambiance and cleanliness.  The location is ideal. Close to the action of Bangla Rd.however allows for tranquility when needed.  We took advantage of their spa treatments.  It was the most relaxing day we had there.  The breakfast is plentiful and with an array of options to suit all palates. We met the General Manager who was so personable and kind. Sebastian, thank you for making an amazing trip unforgettable. When we return, Grand Mercure Phuket Patong is the only option...

title: Lovely stay. Will come again
review: As Accor platinum member, I have stayed at Sofitel on many occasions.This was my first time I stayed at Grand Mercure.we booked their best, a beautiful two bedroom villa.The check-in was very welcoming.Ms Ni checked us in, she was amazing, made us feel right at home from the get-go.Mr Sebastien the hotel GM personally welcomed us, what an amazing leader, no wonder the staff is so caring and guest service oriented, a good leadership rubs on to the staff.The breakfast was amazing, lots of choices, fresh fruits, fresh juices and lot more.The housekeeping was top notch.The location is great, everything is close by including the famous Bangla road.The hotel is an open concept, the entire property is very well kept with perfectly manicured landscaping.Every time I would go thru the…

title: Very Small deluxe rooms, no good vegetarian option, good location
review: We stayed at Grand Mercure Patong for 4 nights in deluxe rooms with pool access. Compared to the price we paid (Around $1000 for 4 days) these deluxe rooms are very small compared to other properties in this part of the world. The checkin was smooth, receptionist were polite, but the bell boys seem to be arrogant. They also didn't help us in keeping the luggage back in the car when we were checking out. The breakfast was not for vegetarians. The options were very limited and also not properly cooked. We eat eggs so we have to eat omelette for all 4 days of our stay. The location is though good and near to Patong Beach. If you want to stay in this hotel, book superior rooms which is probably half the price we paid for deluxe rooms and eat outside. There are lot of cheap and good…

title: Coming of Age at The Grand Mercure – A Jewel in Patong
review: Dear techankur,  Many thanks for the time taken in sharing your thoughts and experience with us.  I am very sorry about what appears to be a disappointing experience at ours and wish we could have discussed those matters together while at the property.  Please note i have shared your comments with our concierge team last Friday already and we will work on improving service from the moment guest enter to the moment they leave... A good and sincere farewell is important and definitely a good wake-up call thank you.   As for the room size and variety of our breakfast, i wish to share a few things with you if you do not mind... You recommended future guests to maybe look for alternatives while we do have plenty here to offer :)  Deluxe in other parts of the world might indeed be bigger in size but none would offer direct and unique access to the pool. Our Deluxe are 28sqm plus an additional 6sqm for the sundeck. A vast majority of our guests enjoy those very much as they are by far our best sellers.  For those preferring tranquility and space, our Suites could be an option (62sqm and balcony), our one or two bedroom villas another (115sqm and 220sqm respectively)?  There are plenty of options for everyone to chose from i can ensure you.   As for vegetarian options at breakfast, we have lately very much improved our offer for guests with specific diet or not. Guests looking for vegetarian options, european delicacies, asian bites but also Hallal or Glutten free products would be pleased at ours as we are trying to cover all sort of cuisines and tastes.   Yes we could always improve, but as a vegetarian, you could have easily daily from greens and our salad corner, cereals stand with 4 different kinds of milk (though Vegan might not really like this option), our entire sliced and whole fruit station, our lovely bakeries made with French butter, our Indian/Oriental corner with 2 specialties rotating daily, our Cheese Board, Local Phuket treat with coconut cakes and jellies or our Belgian waffle and pancake station outside... Daily we would also have vegetarian fried rice or noodles and porridge... Maybe it is simply due to the fact we are not marking those clearly enough and that might be confusing...   Anyway, i wish we could have offered you a relaxing and enjoyable time... I hope some other times :)  Merry Christmas and wishing you and your family a wonderful holiday season.  Sebastien

title: Great stay
review: This is the 5th time I have stayed at this wonderful resort and I have written several reviews of this amazing place since they opened less than 4 years ago. I have seen how they have grown from a hotel searching for its identity, to a 4 star hotel well on its way to becoming a 5 star hotel, to it becoming an “Oasis” in the heart of Patong, to now where I would say it knows quite well what it is and what it isn’t.  First the property is immaculately maintained and pristine clean everywhere you go. Second, the quality of the food has improved ten-fold over the last 4 years and they have wonderful evening dinner buffets on Monday, Wednesday and Friday at Bubbles Restaurant which is where they also serve a great breakfast. A special thank you to Cartoon, Aey, and Margaux and so…

title: Awesome hotel
review: Merry Christmas Ted L and thank you for yet another AMAZING REVIEW :) You are family to us Ted and i wish you and your loved ones a Merry Christmas and plenty of good things for the year to come...   with very kind regards,  Sebastien

title: Overall A Great Stay
review: I received warm welcome since arrived at lobby from staffs including security and reception. Staffs are helpful and informative. Room is comfy and spacious. Normally when I visit Patong, I will stay at Avista Hideaway Patong but after I received great experience here. This hotel will be another option for me when I visit Patong. ;)

title: Great location, great service
review: This hotel is like an oasis. It is right next to all the nightlife, and only 7 minutes to the Patong beach, yet it was so quiet in our room (707) that we could have been miles from the centre of the action! The hotel is certainly top class for Phuket, and is on a par with many in major Western cities. Plenty of choice at breakfast, both Asian and Western, and a great pool, and plenty of eating choices if you wish to eat at the hotel rather than eat at the many local eateries. We had a problem with our driver picking us up at the airport, but 1 call to the hotel resolved the matter within minutes, which was indicative of the support provided by the friendly staff to their guests. We really enjoyed our stay and still cannot quite believe how close to the "action' such a quiet…

title: Easy walking to most
review: Dear Richard T,   Many thanks for your 5* review and comments. It is always a pleasure to receive such positive feedback!   There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you both had a wonderful time with us and found yourselves extremely comfortable in this oasis thanks to the peaceful facilities and as well with the friendliness of our dedicated team!   Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly, we would be glad to assist you with any arrangements you may need!  We wish you and your family a Merry Christmas & Happy New Year 2018 in advance!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Amazing room, pool and food
review: The room was large and comfortable.  The staff were extremely helpful and the restaurant food excellent.  We enjoyed the pool and the pool bar often saw us at Happy Hour.   The prices for drinks were good and as an Accor Plus member the meals were cheap.

title: The warm rains of November
review: Dear Tony D,   Thank you once again for taking the time to review our property!   It makes us delighted to learn everything were up to your expectations during your stay from the comfortable room, to the friendliness of our staff without forgetting the excellent quality of food available at Bubbles Restaurant!   We are all looking forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more pampering experience!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Place, Great Service, Great Location
review: This hotel was a fantastic bargain at the price we paid (£78 for a deluxe pool room).  Our room had direct pool access, was tastefully decorated, and had a very comfortable bed.  The patio had two loungers and steps into the pool.  Unfortunately we were only here for one night.  We had a half board deal and got a really excellent lunch thrown in too.  The staff by the pool were lovely and my only criticism would be that both check in and out were very very slow (but pleasantly conducted).   Pros Amazing view Quiet area Lovely room and balcony Helpful and responsive owners (ie will help with taxis)  Cons None for us. Loved this. I suppose it’s a bit far from the beach, but there are much better beaches than Patong on Phuket and the neighbouring islands.

title: Amazing place to stay in Patong
review: The hotel is very welcome! Friendly and helpful staff.. room is clean and well maintained..Very good location and a beautiful swimming pool.. the breakfast and dinner have a good variety and good price.. I would definitely stay there again when in Patong.

title: Lovely hotel with great location 😃
review: Dear Guilherme d,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to hear you had an amazing and relaxing stay at our hotel and enjoyed the hidden and serene hideaway of Patong! Our team also cherishes your appreciation towards the friendly atmosphere of the resort.   We hope to see you again in 2018!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel
review: Just spent 4 days at this hotel and it was excellent, fantastic location within walking distance to beach, Bangla Road and loads of restaurants and bars nearby. Hotel provide free wifi and transfers to beach. Rooms are quite small and one let down is little storage but very clean. Pool is lovely, the swim up rooms looked great so will definitely book this next time! All in all really good hotel and fantastic breakfast. Very much enjoyed our stay

title: It is one of the better places in Patong, however it does have its flaws.
review: Dear MirrenBuddie,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review!   It was such pleasure having you here with us and to learn you enjoyed yourselves so much! Also, we are pleased to hear that you will be back at the property to try our unique Deluxe Pool Access Room!   We are sincerely looking forward to pampering you! Please do not hesitate to contact us directly, our team will be pleased to assist you any arrangements you may have.    With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Perfect location in Patong thailand , awesome pool, good food and amenities
review: The location is great, a short 5 min walk from the beach and 15/20 min walk to Bangla Road/Banzaan night market (a night market with a great selection of street food) and lots of shops and restaurants on the way there. There is an amazing restaurant right across the street from the entrance of the hotel on the right corner which has amazing food, although some may say it’s not the most authentic, but  I thought it was fabulous with the friendliest staff.  The rooms were great over looking the pool, good air conditioning and comfortable beds. As the hotel room doors are in an open corridor watch out for ants, we made coffee and the suger attracted a lot of ants from the hallway, nothing too bad, it was just a surprise. And the TV had very limited English channels, not that you’ll…

title: Staff Made the Difference
review: One of the nicer properties in Patong, conveniently located, only a 5m walk to the beach and far enough away from the loud Bangla nightlife.  Pool area is wonderful.  Restaurant staff and food are excellent.  Rating might have been less, but for the outstanding service provided by all of the staff.  They expediently resolved an issue with my room and would not rest until they ensured that everything was comfortable.  Special thanks to Julie for her hospitality and willingness to make things right.  The staff truly made the difference and make this a special place to stay when visiting Patong Beach.

title: Birthday Trip!!
review: We were there for 2 days.Great experience.Communication with reception staff  very nice and cooperative.Rooms are very spaceous with star facilities.Bath room settings are good with all kits.Location is very helpful to beachside tour and shopping

Should you wish to return to the resort, please feel free to contact us directly, we would be pleased to assist you with any arrangements you may have.  With Grands Regards, Valentine

title: Fantastic Stay
review: This hotel was a wonderful mixture between great food and beautiful place. Close to the beach and mall within walking distance. Also, shuttle bus that takes you to certain places. GREAT vacation and stay. Beautiful lobby area, pool, and rooms.

title: Truly Grand !
review: Grand Mercure in Phuket Patong is one of the best places to stay when in Phuket. Very conveniently located to many attractions, entertainment venues, restaurants and shopping centres. Excellent staff and amenities made my experience truly grand, especially the great service from our chauffeur Nat, front of house staff Ann and Ryan at the restaurant. We were there during the Loy Krathong festival and the hotel had organised a grand buffet with cultural programs, that was a truly unique experience. You can be in the best destination anywhere in the world, but what makes an experience truly grand is when you are treated to impeccable hospitality which the staff at Grand Mercure know how to provide.

title: Very accomodating friendly staff, Great location - pool not so big
review: Dear Ajit P,  Thank you very much for your review, it is very much appreciated and always a pleasure to see our guest bringing such wonderful memories back home.  We could not be more pleased to know that the efficiency and the assistance you received from our team members made your stay memorable! Also, it delights us to hear you found yourself extremely delighted with the special evening during Loy Kratong Festival!  All the team would love to welcome you back in a near future, and please feel free to contact us directly anytime, we would be pleased to assist you with any arrangements you may need.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great stay with kids
review: Fantastic location, walking distance to all Patong has to offer, including beaches, so many local shops, restaurants, bars and Jungceylon.  The staff were amazing and very accommodating only to happy to try to meet all things request of them.  The food at the restaurant - only had buffet breakfast was always fresh and plenty of it.  Rooms really clean and wonderfully air conditioned.  Free daily hotel bus to take you to the beach, Jungceylon and Central Festival shopping centre.  You can pay a small amount of money and it will take you to Naka markets on the nights they are on.  Pool looks much bigger in the photo and on a hot day standing room only.

review: Check in was great you were greeted with a cold rosemary infused towel and small dessert, hotel lobby is very well made with shiny tile and open concept view. Rooms were smaller than the multiple hotels we had been staying at but fair sized and and very clean. Where i started being disappointed was with the shower, the finished of the washroom was beautiful but after every shower we had a puddle in the washroom due to no shower curtain of shower door. Another thing that was inconvenienced was while i was in the city my friend came back to the hotel and asked for a room key as we only had one due to one having to be placed by the door in order for the lights and AC to work, they questioned him about my whereabouts and why he does not have a key and made him promise that i will…

We would like to express our most sincere apologies for the difficulties you experienced during your last stay with us. Please rest assured that we took note of the concerns you have raised for immediate improvements. On another hand, we are delighted to know you enjoyed our lobby and the convenient location and hope you will give us a second chance to better serve you in a near future.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel but needs improvement...
review: Just left the Grand Mercure Patong after 7 enjoyable nights.  Had a pool access room and loved the ability to step off the balcony in to the pool. Needless to say, spent plenty of time in there...  Facilities and room were great and the staff are always so helpful and friendly!  We enjoyed the wide selection of foods at breakfast each day and were also provided with complimentary access to the club lounge with free food and drinks between 11am & 5pm each day.  Location was very central with lots of shopping and restaurants at the doorstep.  Will definitely go back to this resort.

With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Good stay in Patong
review: This hotel has so much potential great location the rooms are really small and shows lots of wear and tear... be prepared to walk as this hotel is massive and the layout is kinda different with limited elevators it took us almost 10 mins to get to the room... some of the staff almost felt like they were in prison working here so the customer service was not the greatest... now for the good stuff this hotel is on a side street so you are away from all the noise and lots of amenities like restaurants laundry and 7/11 Bangla Road is a 10 min walk hooters is 5 mins and the breakfast was good only problem is we would get there and find the buffet empty I Guess they did not want to make food closer to the end...

title: Lovely Hotel
review: This hotel has the perfect location. Great little bars on the doorstep and only a short walk to the beach or busy nightlife. Hotel is very clean, rooms very comfortable, the staff are really helpful and the pool is stunning - loved the pool bar! Would definitely stay here again

title: Great
review: Dear Steddie69,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with an excellent service and with a variety of facilities.   Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very good service
review: Just a lovely hotel. We had a pool access room which really is the only way to go if you can afford to. Staff are very friendly, food is great. The staff even surprised me with Happy Birthday on arrival. I have no idea how they knew!

title: Nice environment, friendly staff
review: Dear Matty,   Thank you very much for your nice review!  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your Deluxe Pool Access Room and the special attention from our team to make your stay an enjoyable one. Please feel free to contact us directly should you wish to return to the property!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Location and Good Value for Money!
review: The hotel is clean, environment is nice and modern. Staff service is great and they very pleasant too...  Good location, quiet room and have a lot of restaurant near the hotel.  Swimming pool is average, breakfast is average

title: Lovely hotel and awesome buffet
review: A lovely and clean hotel, close to the heart of Patong. Whilst the area is in the busy part of Patong, the hotel is quiet. It is very big and has a good gym, huge pool and cafe. When you arrive, the welcome drink and choux pastry was a nice touch. Our room was small so I’d recommend the ones on the ground floor with pool access. They have good cocktails and they’re cheap in happy hour. The dinner buffet is absolutely outstanding.  We were enjoying some cocktails by the pool where the mojito's were amazing. Made with local award winning rum distilled at the Chalong Bay Distillery, a place you can visit, enjoy a bite to eat and tour the facilities. The chocolate and mint mojito a clear standout, made with Hershey’s sauce and the passion fruit mojito, also very good.   Whilst…

title: Good location,amazing pools
review: Dear aroundtheclockfoodie,  Thank you so much for sharing such a magnificent and detailed review of the hotel and restaurant! It was a pleasure to have you both during your holidays and hopefully we will have the chance of meeting again soon.   We are very pleased to see how much you enjoyed your stay and your night at Bubbles Restaurant! Fantastic review like yours are a great source of motivation for all of us and we are grateful for each of your words!  Please feel free to contact us directly when you plan to come back to Phuket, we will be happy to assist you with any arrangements you may need!   With Grand regards, Valentine

title: Fine place but could do better
review: we had a pool room which had a verandah with 2 lazy boys and an umbrella.The pool had steps leading from our room and was like a canal winding under bridge walkways into the main pool area.Because we stayed for 14 nights we also had use of a lounge area which also provided juices,coffee,tea and savouries and sweets. This area was available to  us between 11am and 5pm.The hotel also provides a courtesy shuttle to go to Patong beach,Jungceylon or Central shopping centres.We took the shuttle twice to Central from where we caught a taxi(about 200 baht) to the weekend market near Phuket city.The shopping here is amazing with fresh food available as well.500 baht for return trip to hotel.The staff were all very helpful and friendly.

title: Great hotel 👍🏻
review: Dear Linda N,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your last experience at the property!   We are glad to learn you have enjoyed your Deluxe Pool Access Room, the Grand Club Lounge and as well the great location of the resort!   We hope to have the chance welcoming back in a near future and we remain at your disposal should you need any information!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Best relaxing holiday ever!!!
review: Checked in at the hotel for a week-long conference. Check in was fine but since the reception was in an open area, it tends to be quite hot especially around that time in Phuket. It would be better if cooling fans were available. Rooms are ok but should be better maintained: smelly telephone units, table counters are not clean and have grimes and dirt, shower was on the tub without mats so it tends to be very slippery. Conference facilities are good though and they attended to our requirements quite efficiently. Would I stay again? Probably not.

title: Nice hotel in central location
review: This was a nice hotel right in the heart of Patong. Everything is walking distance. The staff were friendly. Breakfast was reasonable. The room was pretty good. Never had a problem getting a sun lounge by the pool. Seemed to be quite a lot of families and little kids. But didn't bother me too much as they were mostly by the pool. The only thing that annoyed me was the temperature of the swimming pool. It was really warm. No relief from the heat. However I am assuming because Patong is soooooo hot that this is as cool as they can get the pool?? Overall a very nice hotel for the price.

title: Highly recommend...
review: Dear lisadQ9504XT,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!   We are delighted to hear you have appreciated many aspects of the resort and that you had a nice stay at the property! Please feel free to contact us whenever you would like to return, we will be glad to assist you with your arrangements!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great location with super helpful staff !
review: Stayed here for 5 nights in August with family. Everything was wonderful from the moment we arrived to when we left. At check in...hotel provides welcome drinks and little desserts. Room was nicely decorated. Bathroom was good, has a bath with a shower. Breakfast was absolutely amazing...lots to choose from. Fresh detox drinks, fresh waffles and pancakes, a huge variety of food and fruits to choose from. Loved the breakfast. Hotel is in a fantastic location...lots of halal restaurants near by. Near the beach,shops and restaurants. Highly recommend and would come back to this hotel.

title: Amazing!!!
review: Dear sweet_lubz,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to hear you had an exceptional and relaxing stay at our hotel and enjoy the hidden and serene hideaway of Patong! Our team also cherishes your appreciation towards the breakfast variety and the new health corner available at Bubbles Restaurant!   We are looking forward to having the chance to pamper you and yourr family again!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: 👍🏼Grand Mercure Patong👍🏼
review: Great location- everything is just within walk (e.g. convenience store, restaurant, exchange, Thai massage…) Just a few minutes walk to the Patong Beach. The staff is very efficient and helpful (e.g. midnight check-in, little gift). The pool is also very clean. I love sleeping in the convenient beds- not too soft or too hard.  However, the pool is not so fancy as it seems on the website (not too wide, and close at 7 p.m. which is too early for excited travelers)

title: Best stuff
review: Best experience at this hotel i loooved it and the stuff that working especially ( Watcharin Promdes ) they are the best thank you ,you made my vacation be lovely and we will come back for sure ❤️.......................................

title: Fantastic hotel, great location and helpful staff
review: Dear Manar F,   Thank you for taking your time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Mr. Watcharin Promdes' hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Excellent
review: I've been to Thailand 3 times in 5 years and I have to say this hotel is by far the best I've stayed in.  The facilities are top notch. Nothing is ever too much for the staff and you're close by to shops, spas and nightlife.  To make things even better, they surprised me with a nice cake etc on my birthday. You'd think this is BAU but it's surprising how many "top hotels" have forgotten this in the likes of Dubai and Mexico.  Highly recommended!

title: Awesome!
review: Dear Safi I,   Thank you so much for spending some time to share your recent experience at our hotel on Trip Advisor!   We feel extremely honored while reading your comments and thankful to hear the special experience you had at the property! It makes us delighted to learn everything were up to your expectations during your stay and that it was a memorable one thanks to our team members!    Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with any arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel close to beach and Jungceylon SC
review: First of all let me thank everybody from Hotel Grand Mercure, Phuket, for making my holidays a memorable one. I stayed in Hotel Grand Mercure for 4 nights from 2nd August to 6th August 2017 with my family of 7 Adults, 2 Children's and 2 Infants. A very memorable stay. Hotel staff was very cooperative and really took care of us.  When you spend so much time and money on Family Holiday, it really becomes more memorable, if we get a good Hotel to stay. Holiday becomes memorable if a good service is provided by the Hotel and there response time and in all these things, I give 100 % marks to Hotel Grand Mercure, Phuket. It was a flawless stay. I am working as Vice President with Aditya Birla Group(one of top 10 group company in India) in India and have traveled in many countries and…

title: Question
review: Hi Grand Mercure Phuket Group  I had a lot of search in booking and trip advisor  , and finally I chose Grand Mercure. I have some questions. I want to know how much you get for the deposit? And Are there hairdryers , toothbrushes And iron in the rooms?

title: ABSOLUTELY MAZING!
review: Dear Cute_Narmin,   Thank you very much for choosing the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for your next holidays!   The amount of the deposit is THB 1,000 per night, whether by credit card or by cash upon check-in. The later option is often picked as there will be no bank transaction and you will get your money back upon check-out! This amount is a provision for miscellaneous charges you may have throughout your stay; you will be able to sign the bills at any outlets and without carrying money around.   As for the hairdryers, we do have one in each room, however the toothbrushes and iron are available anytime upon request!   Should you have more questions or need any assistance, please feel free to contact us  directly, we would be happy to assist you.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Seafood Buffet
review: I would first like to thank all the amazing staff at the Grand Mercure especially Fon at the concierge desk, it really made our stay an amazing experience. They out did them selves on every level. We can not fault a thing, the food was amazing all the chefs and staff at bubbles need to be commended on the attention to detail. We will returning in april 2018.  It is the perfect resort!!!  Marko and Maxine

title: Wonderful Getaway
review: Dear Marko N,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  Our team is happy to learn we all managed to make you feel relaxed and satisfied! We acknowledge your positive comments towards "Fon" in making your stay an amazing one at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are already looking forward to your return in 2018, please feel free to contact Fon or any of us should you need any assistance.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel in super good location
review: Very Delicious and well worth it! My boyfriend loves seafood and I don't eat shell fish. I was concerned about paying the $ and not having options. They surprised me with a lot of fresh options. Not to mention all the great seafood for my BF

title: Great location!
review: The hotel is walking distance to bangla street and the beach. It's about 5-10 mins walk. Staffs are friendly.  However the aircon was faulty during the night and the technical staff took about an hour to get it fixed. Other than that, the extra bed was terrible, you can practically feel the spring. Asked for a change and the second one came still the same.  The pool is somewhat too small to cater the crowd as well :(

title: Short Stay in a Top Hotel
review: Had a one night stay in this Hotel on 21/8 & it was like an oasis in this City. Check was great-room was fantastic & value for money,it would be Number 1 in Patong The location was just out side the main area & this made it really quiet & relaxing

title: Great Location & Great Hotel
review: Dear reg s,   Thank you very much for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are beyond happy to know you enjoyed your short escape! Your compliments have been shared with the team and we’re truly honored to receive such kind words!   Should you wish to return to our property, we would be pleased to assist in any arrangements you may have.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Location - Friendly Staff  and excellent service
review: This is an awesome hotel right in the heart of Phuket town. Walking distance to the beach, restaurants, shopping and pubs. Nice breakfast with comfortable setting, lovely pools and the room is nice and cosy. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a hotel at the heart of Phuket.

title: Amazing hotel for my first time in Thailand
review: Dear Gabtan,  Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to know you enjoyed to be in one of the most convenient area of Phuket, our hotel is indeed ideally located within walking distance to Patong beach and its main attraction. Our restaurant team have been working recently to enhance the experience at breakfast and we are glad to see many of our guest satisfied!   Should you wish us to arrange anything special prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great location
review: We stayed here for 14 nights in July to August. It is a very lovely hotel, very clean and comfortable. If you have just the standard room be aware that the shower is in the bath and it is quite high to step in & out off. Would not be suitable for an elderly person or someone with bad knees or mobility problems.  It has only one pool which could be very crowded in high season. The only complaint I can make is that they have all the ashtrays directly in front of the lifts doors so if you are a non smoker and someone is smoking waiting for the lift, when you exit it you get a face full of smoke,  which is not very pleasant or healthy. We had a very pleasant stay and all the staff are friendly and helpful our housekeeper Path was awesome so pleasant and friendly. 😊

title: Spot on in every way
review: From stepping in the foyer which is beautiful, to saying goodbye a week later,  everything we experienced in this hotel was fantastic for it's price point. It is in an excellent location in my opinion as it is just out of the hustle and bustle of the main strip of Patong,  although there are plentiful bars,  shops and restaurants just across the road.  The walk to the Shopping Centre is easy with things to do and see on the way.  The staff were all beautiful.  Helpful and friendly. Credit to Chico the trainee manager from Mauritius. These guys work hard, long hours and still have a smile for their guests. The buffet breakfast had lots of choice and great quality too.  The bedrooms were clean,  well kept and comfortable.  I really could not fault this hotel.  Would return if I…

title: 3 Days stay here is a good experience
review: Dear GiniGoldCoast,   Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts with us on your recent stay with us.   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Chico's hospitality! Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly, we would be glad welcoming you back!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Great spa!
review: ประทับใจในการมาพักผ่อนในช่วงวันหยุดยาวที่ผ่านมามากครับ ประทับใจตั้งแต่ตอนมาเช็คอินเลย พนักงานดูมีความเอาใจใส่และยิ้มแย้มทุกคนครับ ในส่วนของห้องพัก มีความใหม่และสะอาดมาก ประทับใจที่ รร.เลือกใช้ผลิตภัณฑ์ของ Ryn Spa ซึ่งีกลิ่นหอม สดชื่นมากครับ ... ขอบคุณ Grand Mercure Phuket Patong Resort & Villas ที่ทำให้วันหยุดของเราเป็นช่วงเวลาที่แสนพิเศษ

title: A luvly property
review: เรียน คุณ ATIWAT,  กราบขอบพระคุณเป็นอย่างยิ่งสำหรับความคิดเห็นและข้อเสนอแนะของท่านเกี่ยวกับการเข้าพักที่ Grand Mercure Phuket Patong ทางโรงแรมรู้สึกยินดีเป็นอย่างยิ่งที่ทราบว่าท่านพึงพอใจในบริการของเรา  เราจะนำความเห็นของท่านแจ้งให้ทีมงานทราบ และมั่นใจว่าความเห็นตอบกลับนี้จะเป็นสิ่งที่ทำให้ให้ทีมงานทุกคนเพียรพยายามปรับปรุงคุณภาพการบริการอย่างต่อเนื่องตลอดไป  ขอขอบพระคุณอีกครั้งที่กรุณาร่วมแบ่งปันประสบการณ์ และเราหวังว่าการมาเยี่ยมเยือนในครั้งต่อไปของท่านจะเป็นที่น่าพอใจเช่นเดียวกับที่ผ่านมา  ขอแสดงความนับถือ Guest Relations Team

title: Grand mercure
review: Staff is very professional and courteous. Only thing that was a turn off was the group of guests we encountered. On multiple accounts we saw guests with children encouraging their kids to remove their clothing and urinate in the flower beds next to the pool. Maybe hotel etiquette needs to be reminded?

title: A bag full of Memories to cherish
review: Dear Hiep B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!   Despite the issue you mentioned, we are delighted to hear you enjoyed the service from our staff. Please rest assured that we are working on improving this situation and that our Pool Team is now walking around the pool to avoid such occurrence.    We do hope that in spite of this incident, we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future to better serve you.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Good choice
review: Right from me booking this hotel to getting there, all my needs were rightly taken care off by the staff. The booking was through the Accor Site and was smooth as always. I always book a few activities in and around the city I stay in. So I shot them a few emails and I got a prompt reply with all the options I had with their relevant price details. Asked them to book the same and they promptly agreed with the convenience of paying once I reach the hotel. My Airport Pick up and Drop was also arranged for the hotel with a post payment option. On arrival, the check in was smooth and fast. My invoices and bookings were in place. So were my check in forms. All I had to do was sign. The Villa I had booked was heavenly. The private pool in my villa was clean and the whole decor in the…

title: Hotel with smiling staff
review: We stayed in one bedroom pool villa for 2 nights, overall was great, the room was exactly the same as the photo on website.  Air con and water pressure were good, no complain on that. Breakfast: there are many type for us to choose and the staff there were very nice.  What I don't like: 1. Channel 12 and 15 wasn't work well in my room, I told the staff already, but no feedback, they just sent someone to check, not a big deal but both channels are my fav. 2. Mosquito in the room, this may be the down side of pool villa I guess. 3. Staff didn't introduce the equipment in the room like how the air con adjustment works, where to turn on the fan, what is my internet access user/password, so I need to ask those in the lobby.  4. Took some times to find the way to the lobby and lounge.

title: Loved it!
review: It was a remarkable and wonderful experience for both of us staying in this hotel. All the staff are super friendly and helpful and they are smiling all the times. We were so surprised when we checked in to our room and saw that they have put up with a birthday decorations and a cake for my hubby. We really appreciated all the little details and effort they put in making our stay a memorable one. We will definitely recommend all our friends about this hotel.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: This is a lovely hotel with wonderful staff. The breakfast was very good, the location is great. The only negatives we found was the lighting in the bathroom was very poor, and the pool is quite small so became quite crowded at times, especially when large inflatable toys are allowed in it.

title: First class treatment and hotel
review: Dear 662Annie662,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!   We are delighted to hear you have appreciated many aspects of the resort and that you had a lovely stay at the property! Your constructive feedback has been shared with our Management Team who highly appreciate your comments. We are at the moment replacing each light bulbs in the hotel to improve this matter and to be part of our sustainable development program as well!   Please feel free to contact us whenever you desire to return, we will be absolutely glad to assist you with your arrangements!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Excellent location, staff, food, and pool
review: Everything from check in to check out was a breeze and a credit to all the stff we had the pleasure to interact with.   We were lucky enough to get upgraded to a poolside room which was awesome and i highly recommend it.   Room was spacious and clean, food and drinks from the poolside bar tasty and reasonably priced.   Far enough away from the madness of Bangla road where you don't see or here the action going on but close enough to take the 10 minute walk there if you wish.   I have no hesitation in recommending the Grand Mecure to anybody staying in Patong.

title: Great experience and customer service
review: Dear dwhitey66,   Thank you for taking the time to write such a fabulous review of your stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong! It is always a great pleasure to receive such feedback and I am sure other experienced travelers will appreciate your input and recommendation.   Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our friendly team, brings a big smile to our face! Our Deluxe Pool Access Room are indeed a great option, with an exclusive "dive-in" experience to the pool and private sunbeds on your terrace!   Thank you again for placing your trust in our hotel, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Loved every mintue
review: I stay at various Grand Mercure Hotels in SE Asia because they are all excellent.  The staff is welcoming and multilingual.  The food was amazing, and the AC, water pressure/hot water, and Internet were all excellent.  The staff printed out three of my future boarding passes for free and checking in and out was fast and smooth.  Love the Grand Mercure Hotels.

title: hotel
review: i had stayed here for 9 nights it would have too be the no#1 place i would ever stay at if i ever go back too thailand i will be staying here i wanted to propose too my partner and they had helped me throigh it all with decorations, plans and just organising everythijng i will never forget the stay i had here and i hope i will be back soon the staff are too die for anything you need they will help you with. i couldnt of asked for any better thank you

title: I will return!
review: Dear JasonM1995,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this wonderful review and for choosing our property for your most special event!   Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our staff, brings us a great smile and makes our job worthwhile! We were glad to be part of this special evening and to know it was a memorable one!  Thank you again for placing your trust in our hospitality; we are sincerely looking forward to pampering you both again, and why not for your first anniversary :) Please feel free to contact any of us, we will be pleased to assist you with the arrangements!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Good property but few hitches
review: Stayed at the hotel for 3 nights and had three rooms because there were seven of us. Very clean environment and very friendly and attentive staff, from front desk to housekeeping. Happened that my birthday was on 24th June and they even send a birthday cake to my room to surprise me. Thank you! Opted for the breakfast buffet spread throughout our stay. Food was fresh and variety was above average.

title: Faultless
review: Dear Dick W,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us and for choosing our property for your holidays!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations! Your comments have been shared with the rest of the team who are delighted to hear you have appreciated your stay and the bespoke service from our friendly and attentive staff.  Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, feel free to contact us anytime, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Superb!!!
review: Above average property to stay in Patong beach area . Took their pool access room but found them really small in comparison with other hotels in the same vicinity . Bathrooms are also small . Staff not so cordial . Pool is awesome and all public areas are beautifully designed . At least 15 to 20 minutes walk to Soi Bangla and Jungceylon  mall is there so if u want to be more central then this is not the right choice .

title: grand property, nice pool, family friendly,compact size rooms
review: loved the stay in nice clean pool view rooms, would recommend higher floors, the breakfast spread was interesting. we loved lounging in the pool side area. The property is located off  the hustle of  patong beach strip. The staff was courteous and cooperative to take care of our needs. The room i stayed was quite compact , if you are looking for a spacious layout then you check rooms before making a reservation. Overall it was nice staying at this property

title: Awesome hotel
review: It was 1st trip to phuket with  family .. from 18th May to 23rd May 2017 ..  We stayed in this hotel and it was our best choice .. The hotel is on a very good location and beautiful made with all good eminities and the beauty of this hotel is their warmth staff .. We had no problem in phuket in spite language problem ..The hotel staff were so courteous that they guided us in every way needed .. The best thing I liked they see the advantage of their customer .. breakfast was huge .. the hotel cleanness is excellent .. room service is prompt ..   the pool is clean .. The hotel has shuttle service to the beach and the mall ... daily on various timings very punctual ..   They also hv kids play room .. I would suggest all the travellers to stay at this hotel without any fear ... For…

title: It's the little things that count....
review: Dear Mr. Dalmia,    Thank you so much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with an excellent service and with a variety of facilities.   Your comments have been shared with the rest of the team who are delighted to hear you have appreciated your stay and the bespoke service from our friendly staff.  Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Birthday holiday
review: we stayed in the superior suite for 5 days... with a 2 year old..  1. they accomodated our need for a smaller thin cushion like mattress for our daughter including all her other amenities... 2. while i was struggling with my umbrealla in the rain beside my rented car one of the guards outside rushed up and opened it for me!! 3. we left a few hundred in cash in the room on checking out.. they duly returned it.. what honesty!! 4. my e mails and enquiries were always promptly replied!!! a great experience all in all!!

title: A Little Disappointed. Good Location.
review: Dear Abdullah S,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are pleased to hear that our caring and professional team managed to exceed your expectations in every way and made your stay memorable!   Again, thank you for staying with us! We are all looking forward to welcoming you back very soon, please do not hesitate contact us directly, we will be happy to take care of your arrangements.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: travel with friend
review: we had a great stay in this hotel,from checking in,room accommodation,food breakfast,and pool was awesome,staff are very helpful and polite,it is very accessable to the malls,bars,resto and beaches,for sure we will stay again once we visited phuket.

title: Careless service
review: Dear aisha e,   Allow me to thank you for all the compliments expressed in your review on your wonderful experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to know you appreciated our well appointed room, the extensive buffet breakfast as well as our lagoon pool. Above all, we are grateful for the feedback you shared concerning the solid service you received here, it means a lot for us!   Thank you once again for your support and for placing your trust in our hospitality, we are looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: An excellent short escape. Thank Jeanny and New
review: I am staying in grand mercure from 25 June 2017 to 29 June 2017   I was in the shower  and asked house keeping for bathing gel  I called after 15 minutes that I haven't received  bathing gel I called reception and women told me we are busy as all guests in hotel are bathing will take time after that I waited for another 45 minutes no body came to give me 2 shower gel  after one hour I came out  and went to reception was been told by lobby manager said sorry for service delayed and we said service not done only very careless attitude from hotel management.  Grand mercure is not willing to take care of in house guests inconvenience and careless and unapologetic attitude  I would suggest don't stay in this hotel as they are not able to handle the occupancy  My trip spoiled of 3…

title: Another Great Stay
review: Actually my visit to Phuket was unscheduled at all. Last minute book Thai and Grand Mercure Pathong for 3 day 2 night.  Me and my friends were beyond satisfied with the hospitality of your staff : Jeanny ( trainee from Korea in reception ) who helped us check in. We wouldn't know she was a trainee if we did not ask " r u Thai !". She 's so proffesional as a real front desk agent . With smile, she great us , Sawadika, hello sir mam , welcome to Grand Mercure Pathong , Phuket. You may Takesit , please. How may I help you?  I remember those sentence came out from her mouth as a trainee .... well done Jeany. I proud of you. After that, welcome drink and cake was on the table.  Second : Ms New , the pregnant lady at the small lounge and restaurant... you go girl, your sincere really…

title: Fantastic stay at the Grand Mercure in Patong, Phuket!
review: Dear kaih c,   Allow me to sincerely thank you for the wonderful comments you shared in regards to your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   Reading about your exceptional experience and the bespoke service provided by our most valuable asset – our friendly team, brings a great smile to our face and makes our job worthwhile. We will surely pass on your warmest regards to Jeanny and New! Thank you also for complimenting the two types of room you tried and as well the convenience of our Grand Club Lounge!   We are looking forward to your next visit! Should you require any arrangements, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel and staff
review: Stayed here for 5 night, got upgraded to a suite. Very clean hotel and the staff are excellent. Every room overlooks the pool. Perhaps the pool could have been wider, and the bathroom lighting was a bit subdued, but the breakfast is one of the best I have experienced, and the staff could not do enough for us. If you are going to Patong, stay here!

title: Birthday and Anniversary
review: Dear Brian E,   Thank you so much for writing such a positive review on your recent stay with us. We are honored and glad to learn you enjoyed everything we stand for.  We pride ourselves in delivering a professional and warm service to our guest and are beyond happy your stay with us were provided with just that and more!   Should your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us directly, we would be pleased to assist you with the arrangements!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Few days in Patong
review: I would recommend that you check out clearly what your expectations are before making a reservation.  We are here for 15 nights for celebrations and too date have been less than impressed. Lengthy delay in arrival even at 4.00pm in afternoon and after three tries our key access finally workedWe have to make many requests for basic services.  Room is tired and small with the external door unable to be locked it is pool access so feel relative safe.  Some rooms have sun but some are in shade all day. Management should enforce their rules with people accessing the pool and spitting. In restaurant and pool it is very rude and an insult to the staff. We will discuss our issues as it is most unusual for shovel of this star rating to be disappointing.   Staff are very pleasant and…

title: Good location, full of facilities
review: Dear Yve W,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts and most importantly for giving us the opportunity to better serve you while you are at the resort!   Firstly, we would like to reiterate our most sincere apologies for the delay on your check-in day and the issues you encountered during the beginning of your stay. We have thankfully managed to upgrade you to our Pool Villa and do hope you are now enjoying your stay to the fullest.   Nevertheless, we wanted to thank you for your nice comments towards the professionalism and the politeness of our staff and as well, the nice spread at the breakfast!   Again, thank you for giving us the chance to show you our hospitality and we remain at your disposal as always.   We wish you a very comfortable and enjoyable end of stay with us!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Lovely!!!
review: Decided to spend a few frantic days in Patong before we went to Kata for less activity. The Grand Mercure was an excellent choice and so was the pool side room, straight out of the room into the pool is the only way and 2 permanently available poolside beds. When doing this in May,June ask for rooms 107 - 113 they get the sun from around 8am to 1.30pm. Some of the other rooms are in shade all day and while it's 30deg it's feels a little cool in the corners. Breakfast is excellent, service great and as always the Thai people are happy friendly and helpful. We got lucky early in our trip and the hotel was quite with only couples .... when the families arrive the kids do get to having pool fun and the noise echoes around the Grand Mercure due to its design.....keeps the Patong…

title: Can not rate this hotel high enough!
review: We were lucky enough to spend 8 days and to be honest we wish we were still there! This is the 4th time I have stayed at this hotel and it will continue to be my hotel of choice for future visits. From the moment you step foot in the hotel you are greeted warmly and staff can not do enough to help you. Check is is fast and front desk staff are wonderful. We were lucky enough to have our room upgraded which was such a surprise! Our room had a big living area with a TV, dining room, a huge bathroom with rain shower, deep free standing bath and plenty of storage, huge master bedroom with flatscreen tv, 2 toilets and a balcony which overlooked the resort pool. House keeping is wonderful and if you have any additional requests they are very fast and helpful. Our family (2 adults plus…

title: Very good and nice sea food buffet
review: Excellent sea food buffet and special mention for Sarah a very cute french girl who take care of us during all evening. The food is fresh and very good. I recommend this buffet even you are not sleeping in this hotel.

title: Overall a pleasant stay
review: I have the pleasure to stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  The image of the property looks relatively new, with nice cosy pool.  As a Le Club Accorhotels elite member, I was felt welcome at this property.    This is my first stay at this property and be prepared as it is quite a distance from the airport, the hotel is near to a beach and there are quite a number of eateries outside of the hotel within walking distance.  The hotel also provide free scheduled shuttle to Jungceylon and Central Festivals.    The hotel is nicely organised with resort ambience.  Rooms and surroundings are clean.  The pool are nice and breakfast range are quite good.    Some of the things that the management might want to look into is that there are certain market's clientele that tends to wear…

title: Great Stay. Delivers What it Promises.
review: I stayed here with my parents (both aged 67 and in good shape) in the "off season" (May 2017), and this hotel delivers what you see on the website.   When in Phuket, I normally prefer to stay in a place that is a bit more secluded, but my parents wanted to be "in the action" at Patong.
