This hotel is perfectly located in Patong to experience the vibe of the bars and shops in the area, and you can walk to everything, including the beach which is about a 10 min walk away (or they offer a free shuttle to take you there or to the shopping mall 3x per day).   Every staff member we interacted with was attentive and lovely. They added an extra bed to the 2 single bed room.. 3 of us fit there comfortably, but it was a bit tight. we weren't in the room that often though so it didn't…

title: Great Hotel But..
review: Need to give credits to the hotel staff members who are trying their best to maintain the hotel quality.   Unfortunately the "tourists" need to learn how to read the guideline i.e. not allow to wear slippers or sandals inside the pool, spitting is not allowed, do not waste food and etc. I even witnessed that they tend to talk or shout at the hotel staff. They really need to learn how to behave when they travel out. This is not their country.

title: Holiday in Phuket
review: We liked our stay here. Staff were lovely. Pool was not nearly as big as photos suggest and a large number of guests from china meant not much activity in pool area. Breakfast nice.on request the lovely young lady at reception let us stay in our room until 4: sooo appreciated.rooms a little small but overall a very nice stay. I was pleased that it was not in immediate access to Patong action but only a block away so best of both worlds.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Dear geng2012,   Thank you very much for your review posted here on Trip Advisor!   We are glad to learn you liked your stay at our property, the breakfast spread at Bubbles Restaurant and as well the convenient location; near the main attractions of Patong but still in a more quiet area. It's pleased us to let you enjoy the room more longer whenever it's possible from our side!  Feel free to contact us when your travel brings you back to Phuket, we would be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Ok/Good, but definitely NOT 5 star.
review: The hotel is new and stylish, the size of the room is not big but overall it is good. The breakfast of the hotel is good, and the food we ordered for room service is great either. I will definitely choose to stay in this hotel if I visit Phuket again.

title: Central Patong
review: Dear jpangpang,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts on your last stay.   We are all very pleased to hear about your satisfying experience and please rest assured that your comments will be passed to our Food & Beverages team!   Should you wish to visit us again, please feel free to contact our team directly.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: No longer worthy of five star rating and expensive
review: We've stayed in 5 star hotels in most parts of the world and this hotel was generally a let down. I'm not one to usually see the negatives but with this hotel I just couldn't help it. We paid a substantial amount of money to stay here especially given the time of year (May, beginning of quiet season), and I have stayed in far better hotels for a lot less money. I believe the issue is that it is an Accor brand hotel, so it still has that 4 star "chain hotel" feel. It's good, but somehow feels cheap underneath. Accor should stick to what they know, not 5 stars.  As the previous reviewer wrote, the staff are ok, however they're nowhere near up to 5 star standards. It took usually 2-3 calls and up to an hour just to have an ice bucket delivered to our room every night (they don't…

title: Great Hotel
review: Great central location in Patong, just minutes away from the OTOP Market and a nine minute walk to the beach via The Hard  Rock Cafe and about a 12 minute walk to Bangla Street and the Jungceylon Shopping Mall. If you want a comfortable Hotel with great service, the Grand Mecure will be just what you are looking for.  Our room was great, very clean and well serviced.  We had a stand out balcony, we did try to upgrade to a pool access room but they were fully booked until the 5th of May, a week after our departure. We had breakfast every day which was included in our price for our 11 night stay.  Full buffet choice, something for everyone. The pool was good and the towel service was good as well.  The reception was very good and we were made to feel very welcome from the moment…

title: The perfect hotel- in every aspect
review: Dear marilynjane1953,   Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us!  We are delighted to know you had a wonderful stay with us at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we would like to express our gratitude for the positive feedback given on our comfortable room, the convenient location and the attentive service you received!   Once again, thank you very much for your kind feedback. Should you wish to return to Phuket, our team will be more than happy to assist in any arrangements you may have.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: EXCELLENT STAY
review: We reach there around 9pm for our 3 night stay. They upgraded us to a pool access room. We finally reached our room after a long walk, got our 2yo boy to sleep and then opened the bedroom window. Well, it was the most beautiful thing. 2 pool chairs, with a walk in pool at our disposal. We were thrilled! We ordered room service that came promptly and crashed for the day. Over the next 2 days, i couldn't find a single hole in their hospitality- From great food, a lovely buffet spread with great variety, great housekeeping (they got us a baby cot without having to even remind them). Cleanliness is impeccable, staff is courteous. The swim in the private access pool was heaven. Our kid just didn't want to come out. Good location as the Patong beach is a short walk- we only went to…

title: Great hotel in a very good location
review: i stayed 6 nights in Grand Mercure Phuket . it was very pleasant experience/ want to visit again soon. i love coffee shop at Lobby . all staff very friendly / professional in dealing . Rooms are good but water spread in all bath room .  Nice location . easy to approach malls and cornich.

title: Good time~
review: Dear ABDULWAHEEDQURESHI,   Thank you very much for your review on Trip Advisor!   We are glad to learn you had an excellent stay with us and could enjoy Chou Chou Deli Shop during your stay! Please feel free to contact us directly should you wish to visit us again, we would be pleased to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Outstanding hotel
review: We have spent one week in this hotel, everything was perfect from the moment we were welcomed at the front desk to our check out. The staff here is very hospitable and professional which is always a sign of great value.   Our room was very nice, big, and clear, with a direct access to the pool. We spent very good moments in this hotel, it was very relaxing. We tried the restaurant and it was very tasty, definitely a great value.   I don't regret to choose this hotel, everything was perfect, we will come back for sure.

title: 5 star resort
review: we stayed in March for 8 days - the resort right in town so close to everything  - 2 blocks from beach but our pool great - deck chairs very comfortable - gym was great and we had breakfast included and was lots too choose from everyday - the staff were all very friendly and the resort was very clean and tidy - our room was a suite with plenty of room - 2 tvs - and large bathroom with bath - our room overlooked the pool -

title: wonderful experiences at mecure
review: Staffs are very hospitable and facilities are wonderful.  Pimmy and Jern are unforgettable staffs that gave us warm welcome.  Our room had direct access to the pool so that my kids enjoyed swimming anytime they want.

title: Great stay
review: We stayed 5 nights in the pool access room. It was a fantastic hotel, rooms were clean and nice a bit on the smaller side especially with a cot in the room. Pool access is great but can't get into the main pool you need to get out and back in which was a little annoying. Staff were very friendly and helpful, check in was smooth and easy  Definitely recommend this hotel

title: Seafood Buffet Night here is a MUST
review: Dear Jack-150115,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts with us and other travelers here on TripAdvisor!   We are all delighted to know you had a great stay with us, appreciated your private Deluxe Pool Access Room and the friendly service delivered by the staff at the resort!   It would be our great pleasure to welcome you again should your travels bring you back to Phuket!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: five star
review: when we come.reception are very warm welcome. and company us to the room .  in room all are perfect and clean,  we can sleep very very  well, .in the morning there are  fresh air.around hotel  and can do joging near sea side. and have good breakfast in the morning.

title: Another great holiday in Phuket
review: Dear 976lier,   Thank you very much for your wonderful comments and 5* score!   We are pleased to learn you had a great stay with us and enjoyed the service and facilities available at the resort!  We are indeed looking forward to your return, should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us anytime.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: It indeed was a Grand Stay..!!!
review: It was my 4th time staying at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and I did really enjoy my stay. Thank you for Mr. Sebastien, GM Grand Mercure Phuket Patong, Ms. Sita and the team and also Mr. Chino and the team whom have made my holiday a wonderful and memorable one. I will definitely stay again there for future holiday in Phuket.

title: Great Location, Very Friendly Staff
review: Its a beautiful property. I happen to get the ground floor room which has its other end of the room opening into a swimming pool (i found it to be cool) along with a nice sit out. Room are big enough for a couple stay with kids plus has the usually coffee/tea tray, minibar, bathtub, large TV along with options to connect usb, safe/locker,etc.etc.  Wifi was free and work well too. Breakfast spread at the buffet was awesome with a variety of options.  Found the staff to be very helpful.  Patong Beach (nice and clean) from this property is less than 10mins walks plus there are plenty of streetmarkets/eating joint close to this property  Traveled in Apr2017 for three nights. We got mix weather rain, sunshine.. :)

title: Below Average / Bad service
review: Dear AntonyAliyath,   Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us on Trip Advisor!   We are very grateful for each of your comments, and delighted to know you had a comfortable stay with us through all the services and facilities we have on offer. Please rest assured that your comments have been passed on to the team and are highly appreciated by all of us!  Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us and for recommending us as well! Should your travels bring you back to this vibrant city, feel free to reach out to us directly, we would be pleased to assist you with the arrangements.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Lovely hotel with friendly staff
review: We stayed here from 7/4/17-14/4/17 Nice rooms. A little on the small side for s family of 4 however we managed.  There was a friendly kids club which my daughter looked forward to attend everyday. During the Sonkgran festival the hotel staff made a special effort to ensure we all had a blast! We splashed water on staff and vice versa. Staff made a game in the pool where guests were permitted to play fun wrestling in the pool too. Great music was also playing around the pool. A special thank you to Wat and Sarah in the breakfast restaurant for arranging Soya milk and gluten free bread on a daily basis for my allergy needs. A big thank you to staff on the front desk who made our stay very special. Please see attached photos!

title: Wonderful Holiday
review: What an absolutely fabulous stay, having stayed previously many years before we was treated like VIP’s from arrival and the Hotel manager even took time out to greet us, Pleasant check in staff and a beautiful hotel.  The hotel is in a great location away from noisy traffic and just a few hundred meters walk to the Beach, plenty of bars and restaurants just outside the main entrance.  This is and remains my number one choice for any future trips to Phuket. Thank you Grand Mercure for making our short holiday special left feeling very relaxed.

title: Disappointed
review: This is our 2nd stay at the Grand Mercure and probably our last. We are staying as 3 groups with 3 separate rooms. Our check-in was delayed until nearly 4pm without explanation while repeated enquiries were met with "just another 10 mins." It would have been nice if someone had followed us up while we waited in the lobby rather than expecting us to line up each time and ask a new staff member if our room was ready. This is particularly difficult when you are travelling with 2 small children (3 & 6). Once we finally got into our room there was a dehumidifier in the corner - perhaps there was a leak in the room?  Housekeeping in the rooms isn't great with rubbish left in bins and other people's belongings remaining in the fridge.  For some reason the Wifi isn't working in 2 out of…

title: Absolutely Amazing
review: Dear Nick L,  Thank you for your review and please kindly my most sincere apologies for not only the slow check-in experience but also the time taken in responding to your review.  We have yesterday welcomed a our new Executive Housekeeper and i made him aware of your comments too and the fact we need to focus on what matters most...   Please do not hesitate to contact me directly next time you plan on visiting Patong! I would be delighted to personally look into your reservation and ensure that all necessary steps are taken in making your second visit a most memorable one, at last.   Thank you once again,  Sebastien

title: Great stay in Patong
review: We have just returned from Phuket and this fabulous hotel. Our daughter, who is disabled and wheelchair bound travelled with us. On arrival we were greeted by Sebastian, the general manager, He assisted checking us in with Nas, and recognising our situation, upgraded our room to provide us with more space, which was very much appreciated. The hotel was spotless throughout; all staff were extremely helpful and friendly; breakfast choice was extensive, as were bar and restaurant menu. It is well located for restaurants and the beach, all within a short walking distance. We simply cannot fault this hotel in any way, and are looking forward to returning in the near future. Thank you so much Sebastian to you and your staff. We take home many happy memories.

title: Great stay
review: Stayed for 4 nights in one of the Pool Access rooms. I highly recommend going for this room as it provides access to a secluded part of the Pool away from the crowds. Makes it easy to just unwind and swim. Breakfast was excellent with plenty of options. Ordered room service twice and food and pricing was really good.  Close enough to the beach and all activities around Patong.   Overall a great stay and I would definitely stay here again if I visited Phuket again.

title: First time to Phuket
review: Dear KSG007,   Thank you very much for spending some time to share your feedback with us on TripAdvisor!   We are all delighted to know you had a great stay with us, appreciated your private Deluxe Pool Access Room and the food options available at the resort!   It would be our great pleasure to welcome you again should your travels bring you back to Phuket!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel
review: First time visit to Phuket.Grand Mercure turned out to be an excellent choice.Had good price on pool access room.Highly recommend this room type.Everything you need.Just make sure to get a room that gets the sun so use of your deck is worth it.Resort is an oasis in the hustle and bustle of Patong.Buffet breakfast was excellent and staff throughout friendly and helpful to meet your needs

title: Great room!! Great location! Loving our stay!
review: Dear ian h,  Thank you very much for your flattering review full of kind words and for sharing your thoughts with fellow travelers here on TripAdvisor!  We are glad to learn you appreciated the comfortable Deluxe Pool Access Room and the convenient location that you nicely called an "oasis"! Also, our team is very proud to know we have been able to provide you with a great professional and friendly service!   Please feel free to contact us directly if there is anything we can assist you with on your next trip to Phuket! We are all looking forward to welcoming you back!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: pretty good
review: After staying in 8 different hotels in Thailand, this was one of the nicest. Great service on arrival, cool face cloth and some drinks. We stayed on a suite on the top floor over looking the pool. We booked it at least six months in advance and got a good deal. Definitely would stay here again, however Patong is not the nicest area in Thailand. Many thanks!

title: A night away
review: Disgraceful service on arrival and reception was no better. The deal i had booked included breakfast but reception denied that was the case. The entire experience was supposed to be a great night away for us. Yhe grand mercure made it a nightmare. Bill mason

title: Very quiet and convenient hotel in hectic Patong
review: Dear Souths1,  Thank you for your comments and review.  I am obviously very sorry about this episode and misunderstanding. We have had to manage a few similar issues over the last few weeks, coming from a connectivity problem between our online partner and our own booking platform but thankfully, this had now been fixed and i understand you were quickly given the breakfast you had booked and paid for.   A 1-night stay is a very short period of time for our team to make to really express itself and share the passion around... Please fell free to contact any of us directly next time you stop over Patong, we will be more than happy to assist and pamper you both at last.   with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Excellent Spa
review: Well I travelled alone and picked Patong and this hotel. Patong was a wrong pick as too hectic and too touristic but this hotel is like an oasis in this hectic touristic village. I can recommend it due to the great inner park and pool arrangement. Pick a pool access room if you can - they are really nice. Then you can also use their lounge. I loved the breakfast. Massage is too expensive - you can get likewise for half the price in a better massage studio in Patong. Beach is a bit too walk but accessible - still I stayed mainly in the hotel as it was nicer there.

title: The hotel that for your value vacation
review: The hotel itself is good, it's a high standard for a package holiday type hotel.  It's not especially fancy but the service is good, the accommodation comfortable and the food lovely with a good mix of East and West. The Ryn Spa however is something else - wow The therapists are excellent, the atmosphere calming, the service wonderfully thoughtful - amazing.  Patong itself - is mad! It's neon and loud and buzzy and tacky - it's like Blackpool on Acid!!! It wasn't my image of Thailand but if you are looking for action, you are in the right place. For something a bit more sophis I'd head to Kata from what I saw

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Victoria1513,   Thank you very much for sharing this detailed review with us!   We are grateful to learn you enjoyed the professionalism of our staff, the comfort of your room, the great variety of food served at the restaurant and especially your great experience at the Ryn Spa!   We have recently created a dedicated page for Ryn Spa on Trip Advisor, please feel free to share your comments with other Spa Lovers as well!   Should there be any arrangements we can assist you with in the future, we would be more than happy to help you.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Amazing Villa and Stay
review: Grand Mercure is a great hotel. Recently stayed with my friends. Sebastien was kind enough to bump us to the two bedroom villa and we had an amazing stay. The staff was very helpful with vegetarian food and Sita at the guest relations desk was very helpful and warm. We had an amazing stay and didn't realize the time pass by. Would definitely recommend this place with friends or family. Pool is very large and passes through the whole hotel. Only drawback is that there is only one restaurant which has some flies.

title: I like it!
review: Dear Rohitbhotica,   Thank you for spending the time to share your recent experience at our hotel and our restaurant as well on Trip Advisor!   We are truly delighted to learn of your pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your kind compliments towards the professional and helpful service you received here and as well as our flexibility in extending special menu that cater to your dietary preference, your kind appreciation and recognition means the world to us!   Please do reach out to us directly should you wish to visit us again, we will be pleased to take care of your arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Do yourself a favour and stay elsewhere! First time stay and last ever!
review: Hotel is very recent, I was welcome by ``Nas`` at the reception and he was very attentive to my needs and offer me room options that I like. I felt very secured to stay a that hotel. Pool and restaurant staff were very plaisent. Breakfast was great.

title: Grand Mecure
review: Dear Danbank69,   Thank you very much for your kind feedback posted on TripAdvisor!   Your kind notes about the impressive service delivered by our staff and especially by Nas and as well your wonderful experience at our restaurant are truly delightful news for us.   Thank you for placing your trust in our hospitality and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for many more pampering experience in a near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Grand Mecure vacation
review: My niece recently got married in Thailand, kata, and a lot of my family members including myself stayed here at the grand mercure but I have to admit this hotel falls very short of a 5 star hotel. In fact I wouldn't rate it any higher than 3 star if that. My poor experience started when my husband and I had 2 cocktails at the hotel outside bar. The bartender didn't present us with a bill to sign and with the commotion I forgot to ask to sign for the 1 cocktail before I went up to my room. That night as my husband was returning to the hotel he was stopped by security, and told to follow him without a reason why. Still not understanding why security was holding him, he was taken inside the hotel in an empty area (it was about 11:30pm) and told to sit down as he made a phone call.…

title: Fantastic!
review: I stayed here for several days to train Muay Thai nearby in Chalong. I was on level 7 in an absolutely beautiful room. It was big, clean, secure and comfortable. Had a bath and balcony overlooking the pool. Toiletries and water provided each day. Overall feel was peaceful and luxurious despite being in the heart of Phuket walking distance to shops, markets and Bangla road.  The pool looked inviting and was very big (I didn't actually use it). Small but reasonably well equipped gym with cardio machines, weights pulley machine and selection of dumbbells. I didn't eat at any of the restaurants but did have some snacks in the hotel club which were very nice.  The staff were friendly and helpful, including organizing a driver for me one morning, and changing my bank notes into…

title: Hotel
review: Dear Kassper22,   Thank you for spending some time to share your recent experience at our hotel on Trip Advisor!   We are flattered to hear you had an fantastic and relaxing stay at our hotel and that everything were up to your expectation during your Muay Thai training! Our team cherishes your appreciation towards the comfortable Suite on the 7th floor, the peaceful atmosphere at the hotel and especially the friendliness of each of our staff!   We are all anticipating your next stay and are indeed looking forward to having the chance to pamper you again!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Short and Sweet
review: We stopped in the hotel Grand Mercure in march 2016. Its a Fantastic hotel, great service, swimming pool right outside our room.  a good location in resort,staff were very friendly and helpful.  Would stop there again.

title: Great place, great location
review: Dear 1joesoap,   Thank you very much for taking the time to recall your stay at our hotel and sharing the experience with us!   We are glad to hear we were able to provide you with a wonderful stay at the beautifully appointed Deluxe Pool Access Room accompanied by a professional and friendly service!     On behalf of the team, I would like to extend my greatest gratitude for placing your trust in our hotel and for giving us the chance to continue pampering you in the future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Paradise
review: This property is located a short distance to Patong beach and Bangla Rd. Hotel staff were friendly, accommodating and very attentive to our requests.   I stayed in a superior king room however, if I were to stay here again I recommend the pool access room as it has a balcony with sun lounges and provides a more relaxed vibe by having your own private space without interruption from other hotel guests or noisy children.

title: Beautiful oasis amongst the beautiful chaos
review: We loved this hotel, the staff and the facilities. Fabulous location, within walking distance to the hot spots including the mall, beach and Bangla road. After the craziness of Phuket beach and Bangla, we were thrilled to come "home" to this little oasis. Great restaurants and bars also in very close proximity.   The staff were so friendly - always remembering my little boys name, even my parents who were actually staying at a different hotel but visited us regularly.   No issues at all. Great breakfast, loved the various happy hours at the pool bar and lobby, and even sampled their seafood buffet night which was well worth the money spent. Rooms are a little on the small side but very comfortable. The little sofa converts into a bed for the little one. I hate the whole shower…

title: Nice hotel, close distance to everything.
review: Dear Gracie_in_JHB,   Thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are flattered to hear you had an exceptional and relaxing stay at our hotel and enjoy the hidden and serene hideaway of Patong! Our team also cherishes your appreciation towards the friendly service you received here at the hotel.   We are looking forward to having the chance to pamper your family again!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very Good but not Perfect
review: The facilities and hotel was beautifully kept. The rooms could use a little updating as the bathroom sink and counter was a bit stained and the tv was fuzzy and not clear. Easily overlooked though. If you are into party hardy than Patong is for you. Nightlife is everything here. The hotel was good because it was away from the night scene but still close distance to walk and feel safe. 7-10mins walk from beach. Right around the corner from bangla road. 10-15mins walk to the jungceylon shopping center. I'd say don't take taxi or tuk tuk to beach or shopping center as they all over charge. Download the grab taxi app and you'll have drivers who will actually use the meter and not charge a fix rate. Overall I would go back to Patong only with a group of friends as I didn't feel like…

title: Good hotel
review: If you decide to stay there, spend the extra baht on the Deluxe Pool Access Room.   We stayed 6 nights in the superior room and it needed maintenance. That was room 447, things were coming off and needed repairing in the bathroom and also balcony. So be aware.  The bathroom in the Superior room isn't as good as the Deluxe as you are pretty much showering in a bath tub.   Room service needs to work on their game if they want to be a 5 star hotel.   Beautiful rooms however, and lovely to stay here with nice staff.  Deluxe Pool access room 142 we stayed in, which unfortunately the bathroom had a smell from the drain so this is clearly needed maintenance job for these rooms, I can only imagine other rooms if these two aren't up to scratch.   Food was pretty average for authentic…

title: **AMAZING** - READ THIS REVIEW AND STAY HERE
review: We stayed at grand mercure for 5 nights in march 2017. We took pool access room which was small but nice and modern.   Pros Wonderful staff, helpful and lots of smile Great location Kids room was small but good staff. We hired one of the staff for couple of hours snd she was great. I believe she is the supervisor of kids room.  Cons There was plumbing issues and the room was smelly. Staff came to fix the issue but shouldn't have happened in the first place  Lots of mosquitoes and couldn't enjoy outdoor pool side as much as we would liked to

title: Amazing trip
review: Loved the location, the staff, the rooms. We loved Thailand, by far the best holiday/adventure we have ever been on and I can't fault a single thing about this hotel. We will definitely be coming back.

title: Great location, decent staff
review: We decided to stay in this hotel from Mar 8-14. We were 6 couples, 12 adults. Mr. Chino, the manager was great in confirming rooms and airport transfers with me. However, once getting to the hotel at 4am, we waited about 30 minutes to sort everything out. The front desk had very little information about all the emails we had exchanged. Luckily, another manager appeared and helped sort everything out for us. Be advised that if you get in before 10am, you will not be able to check in, unless you reserve another room for an extra day before.  PROS-The hotel is super nice, not too big and in a central area. Close to shopping and bars. The rooms are a good size. Bathrooms are good too. Glass wall into bathroom has a shade for privacy if needed.  -Front desk staff always tried to…

title: Good hotel
review: uge complex, clean and modern rooms. Solid hotel and approx £160 per night good value. Overall nothing to complain about, except perhaps for the location - next time we'll stay somewhere closer to the middle of Patong.

title: It's the people that make this resort so special
review: This resort like many others in Phuket is a very comfortable, well appointed and with all the luxuries that come with a resort of this quality.  It is well situated within a short walk of restaurants, bars and shopping.  What sets the Grand Mercure in Patong apart however, is the people.  Helpful, thoughtful and always smiling.  I stayed at the resort over my birthday and it was a pleasant surprise to find a birthday cake along with a hand written note delivered to my room.  Although I was flattered by the gesture, I was more impressed that someone had actually noticed.  I will definitely stay there again on my next trip to Phuket.

title: Excellent Hotel in Phuket Patong Area
review: Dear Alan G,     We feel extremely honored while reading your review here on Trip Advisor, and thankful to hear the special experience you had at our property. It makes us delighted to learn everything were up to your expectations during your stay, and that it was a memorable holidays thanks to our people!   We are glad to have you as our valued guest and are indeed looking forward to welcoming you back for many more memorable stay.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Noeme
review: Mostly Grand Mercure hotels that I visited are all very clean, always the locations are perfect. Hotel management & staff are polite and very attentive to your needs. Bubbles restaurant are great place to start your day.

title: Value for money
review: Dear Noeme1203,   Thank you once again for sharing your comments with us!   It makes us glad to learn everything were up to your expectations during your stay at our property! Thank you for praising our staff politeness and attentiveness and as well the great choice at Bubbles Restaurant!   We are indeed looking forward to welcoming you back for many more enjoyable stay.   Best regards,  Valentine

title: Cozy, Modern, With a Great Location
review: We arrived the hotel around 12pm and not allow to do early check in but hotel staff were very nice. They brought me to washroom to take a shower and change clothes first. The location of the hotel is very close to the Patong beach and shopping malls. Apart from this, I like the pools and enjoyed my cocktails, Passion fruit mojito on the pool side bar while I was doing sunbath :)

title: Lovely resort in patong , away from the hustle
review: Dear archunt,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts after your stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are very much pleased to hear you had a great time and that we managed to reach your expectations in every way. On the other hand, we would like to extend our apologies for not being able to give you your room before the normal check in time as we were facing a full occupancy.    Please feel free to reach out to us directly should you wish to visit us again in the future, we would be happy to assist you!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Exellent choice
review: If you are looking for a hotel to get some rest and recreation in between, and after all your Phuket activities, this hotel will deliver.   Although not located along Patong Beach, it is only a 10 minute leisurely walk to the beach that can be combined with shopping and eating.  Conveniently located across the street from the hotel are numerous eating places that seemed popular with the tourists, it also has nearby nipa hut bars and nightclubs so you don’t have to walk very far for your nightlife.  Also nearby are an extensive array of shopping stalls, souvenir shops, convenient stores and massage parlors that will meet all your shopping needs.  This hotel is modern and clean with an open air lobby area that has some great lounge chairs to enjoy the breeze.  A nearby coffee and…

title: Marvelous !
review: I stayed here coming from a NYC flight that requires 23 hours flight. I honesty don't know how to express myself about this hotel. I had amazing experience by Julie (kemika chaitongrak) who is the presentation of the Grand Mercure brand! And should be valued!  Excellent client service and skills. This is truly an example of customer service and I will tell you, that I will never forget Julie ! She welcomed myself and partner almost to a home. Staff is wonderful and always reliable. I can truly say I will be back to visit my friends at grand mercure, Phuket. Thank you for all your kindness Julie you are extremely wonderful!

title: nice hotel for family with kids
review: Dear David M,   Allow me to thank you for the lovely words of praise expressed in your review, memorable experiences like yours are what make our job worthwhile!  It is a real pleasure to know you found your stay at our property to be marvelous and that you enjoyed the impeccable service you received from Julie and team that made you feel like home!   Thank you again for placing your trust in our hotel, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future! Should you need any assistance on your next visit, feel free to contact Julie or any of us, we would be very happy to assist you!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Once again, great!!!
review: Stayed for 3 nights. 2 kids age 5 and 7.  As the weather is very hot we spend a lot of time in the hotel instead of going out. They loved and enjoyed the kids club. For 550 Baht, they get to choose 5 activities, such as batik painting, clay paint, mix and match necklace and hair plaint. The staff are friendly and fun too Location - walkable to beach. we walked in the morning about 7am, where the traffic is better and less dusty. Hotel food is decent. We spend most meals in hotel. They serve different variety of thai food. Tried their Monday night buffet. Pretty good. There are restaurants nearby hotel too. Kids want to be back!

title: Brilliant hotel, excellent location
review: Dear eveyeo,   Thank you for acknowledging our efforts in making family stay comfortable at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   Our team is happy to learn we managed to make all your family satisfied and that you enjoyed the local cuisine at Bubbles Restaurant.   We hope to have the chance to welcoming you all back in a near future!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel
review: This was our second stay at this resort and again it impresses.  Staff are friendly and efficient, facilities excellent,location excellent.  You would never know you are in the hustle and bustle of Patong behind the facade of this resort,it is peaceful.  Great all round and will definitely get my business again.  Thank you for a great trip.   See you again

title: Great Hotel in Patong
review: The rooms are really nice and offers all the necessary comfort . Located just front a huge pool , where you can relax and a cocktails at the bar . We had many and it really gives us good times. The location is also perfect ,next to a night market and various restaurants. We will come back for sure

title: Overpriced
review: Overpriced resort hotel in busy area of Patong that is within walking distance of beach and lots of stores. Not a great value for the money. Had problems in the room which were reported but not addressed. Wall light fixtures loose in the bathroom and wouldn't stay straight and blind between the bathroom and the rest of the room wouldn't come all the way down! Staff friendly enough and some good local run restaurants across the street with excellent food.

title: Honeymoon visit
review: Dear William T,  Thank you for your review!  Please note that we have already addressed the few issues you correctly pointed out and i simply wanted to apologize for the disappointing experience...   Please feel free to contact me directly next time you plan on visiting Patong again...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic hotel - would definitely recommend for Phuket
review: So no matter where you stay in Phuket everything is going to have the mozzies and sea town vibe. The grand mercure is a great hotel and the staff are very friendly and helpful! The rooms might be coming up for a refurb I think or they just aren't looked after meticulously. The location is great not far to junceylon and bangla is about a 10min walk. Definitely worth getting pool access if you want to tan on your own balcony. Villas are amazing for privacy but lack the sun so you would have to use main pool if you want to tan and swim for the day   Will be back for sure One of the best hotels in Phuket

title: Excellent place to stay!
review: Dear Ltravel1,   Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us!   We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed the warm welcome extended by our team, the central location, and as well the privacy of our unique Pool Villas! On the other hand, we truly appreciate your constructive feedback and will look into it to improve the overall quality.   Thank you once again for your support, we are looking forward to welcoming you in a near future!  Best regards, Valentine

title: fantastic hotel
review: This was our first time in this hotel and staying in Phuket, I had a brilliant time here. Thank you for the awesome hospitality from the beginning to the very end. Especially Ms Sissuda. She gave us all over 100% for hospitality and service she provided was outstanding. She arranged everything we asked for perfectly and was so polite to us and other customers. Thank you very much and we will deffo be staying here again when we come back to Phuket.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear mrbillipo5,   Thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your recent stay with us.   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations in every aspects of your stay and specially thanks to Ms. Sissuda's hospitality!   Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you need to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact our team directly!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Our Home Away From Home
review: I just stayed here with my family this past week and I have to say it was great. The hotel staff are very friendly and helpful, the restaurant serves good food and is well priced, and it is located in easy walk of the street markets for all the shopping you can imagine and Bangalo Rd for the night life. Would definitely recommend this hotel , big thumbs up.

title: The worst place ever
review: Dear Debbie R,   We would like to thank you for writing such a wonderful comment here on Trip Advisor with fellow travelers on your recent stay with us and for recommending us!   It is a real pleasure to know that you found our resort to be a great choice to stay, enjoyed our central location and appreciate our friendly and professional team!    We sincerely hope to have the occasion of welcoming you back in a near future!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Room 210
review: Me and my girlfriend stayed at the Grand Mercure for 8 nights and it was honestly the best experience from start to finish. A few days before I emailed the hotel saying that it was my girlfriends first time in Thailand and I wanted to make it special for her. Valentine from the hotel promptly responded to my email and helped me. She arranged for floral decorations to be put on the bed upon our arrival. I also booked a private dinner and couples massage at the spa. As I was going to arrive before my girlfriend, Valentine even arranged for a transfer to the airport for me to pick up my girlfriend and also a bouquet of flowers to take with me. She was very pleasant and professional.  I arrived a few hours prior to my girlfriend and proceeded to check in. Upon arrival I as greeted…

title: Excellent hotel
review: We stayed here for ten nights. The staff is excellent. Very high service level in all departments in the hotel. We stayed in a pool access room. If you book one of those rooms you need to be aware of the fact that over half of these rooms have no sun at all. We got one of those rooms, complained and got a new room the next day.   Very Nice pool area, with many sunbeds for those who are staying in rooms without pool access.   The restaurant is also very good.   Location is excellent. Quiet, but still close to bar/restaurant area in Patong.

title: Great location...loved the continuous pool.
review: Dear Christian G,   Thank you for the kind words shared in your review, it was a pleasure having you as our guest!   I am delighted to hear you had a great stay in one of the Pool Access and that our team exceed your expectations! I take this opportunity to let you know as well that we have now a dedicated page for Bubbles Restaurant on Trip Advisor, and we would love to hear of your experience!   We are looking forward to welcoming you back at the resort in a near future!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Comfortable
review: We had a great weekend at this hotel. Being regular Accor hotel stayers, we received an upgrade to one of the rooms that opened onto the pool.   The room was great. The bathroom was everything you want, the bed was comfortable...had no trouble sleeping. The hotel staff were friendly and accomodating and nothing was too much trouble.

title: Great Hotel. Amazing SPA....incredibly family friendly facilities
review: Dear cavie71,   Allow me to thank you for taking your valuable time to share your thoughts on your most recent stay with us and for your loyalty towards AccorHotels!  We are delighted to learn you have appreciated the great location of our hotel, the comfortable room and bathroom and as well the friendly and professional service you received from our team.    Again, thank you for your kind compliments you had given us. Should you wish us to arrange anything prior to your next visit, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Definitely 5 stars
review: My wife and I stayed for ten days at the end of February '17. Hotel was very full, mainly with Chinese, but I guess it was the tail end of Chinese New Year.   However staff coped well with the numbers and were always pleasant and helpful. We booked a Deluxe room with its own sun deck area and private access to the pool, I highly recommend this.  Breakfast was inclusive which was good, plenty of choice, food topped up regularly.  My wife had a small accident whilst there tripping over some steps, nothing serious but ended up with cuts and bruises, the hotel staff first aider acted promptly and it was a nice touch from the management to present her with a bouquet of flowers the next day, thank you, it was much appreciated.

title: Beautiful property in the heart of Patong
review: I recently stayed at the Grand Mercure and had a fantastic stay.  I was there for 7 days and enjoyed every bit.  The hotel is situated about a 10 min walk from the beach but has a lovely pool that stayed relatively windy (a good thing) throughout the day.  The lobby is open & quite lovely.  I had quite a long day of travel (for not a very long flight) and everyone was helpful and kind when I arrived.  If you don't already know, this property (well Patong, actually) is about an hour + from the airport, so book that time into your travel itinerary.    I stayed in a club room and would highly recommend this, if it's in your budget.  I was on the top floor (no one stomping around above you) and had a rather large balcony.  I had a over-sized chair, a table and chairs and I STILL…

title: Nice and decent stay
review: Stayed in the deluxe room. Fairly clean and well-kept. Staff are friendly and generally nice, as with most Thai establishments. Good location too, easy to talk out to shops and massage places. Don't go for the massage at the hotel, i think it's overpriced (THB1800 compared to a THB500-600 nice one outside)  Pros: Good location, clean.  Cons: They wanna charge for everything! (had to pay a deposit of THB1000 just to borrow an adapter for my charger).

title: Excellent Location, Good for Families
review: Dear EatTravelSleepHappy,   We would like to thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are happy to receive your positive and constructive comments from an experienced travelers like yourself is extremely important for us and we will surely look into respective areas accordingly.  Thank you again for placing your trust in our hotel, we are looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful hotel ground & a wonderful stay
review: we are a family of 2 adults & 2 kids, we booked 2 rooms pool side, but when we checked in we realized it's not connected with an internal door, we were disappointed, but Ms. Apirom Boom, the manager was very kind to upgrade us to a 2 bedroom villa with a private pool.  Overall excellent location, breakfast, service, pool. Good for families.

title: I felt home away from home
review: Dear wihaad,   Thank you for choosing the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for your last family holidays!  It is a real pleasure to know you found our hotel to be an excellent choice to stay and appreciate our beautifully designed 2 Bedroom Pool Villa.  We hope to have the occasion of welcoming you back in a near future!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Amazing
review: Have the poolside room, absolutely love it. Sometimes does get annoying when people get into the pool at 6-7am and start screaming and yelling infront of the room instead of them going into the common area pool. No english from them so cant tell them to quite down a touch for a sleep in. Staff are great! Very friendly and very helpful! Breakfast has a good selection of food to choose from. Things like the Gym and spa are in easy access areas on ground floor, better than most hotels hiding them away on random floors. Would highly recommend hotel and recommending spending a little extra for the poolside rooms or even a private villa.

title: Great location. Great hotel
review: Dear Dylan H,   Thank you for your support and for sharing your valuable comments with us!  Please rest assured that your words have been shared with our team who are pleased to learn about your recent experience.   It delights us to hear you found yourself extremely comfortable with the hotel layout and also got to experience the nice deluxe pool access room. Thank you as well for letting us know about your concern with the disrupt in the morning. We already informed the Management Team who will take actions as from tomorrow morning to avoid such disturbance.    Your support truly means the world to us. Should there be any arrangements we can take care of on your future visit to our hotel, we would be more than happy to assist you.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Paradise- an honest review.
review: Stayed here with some friends from Ethiopia. The staff were very efficient, helpful and courteous. Upon having a slight medical issue the manager arranged transport to a local hospital. We would also recommend their transport services, while you can get cheaper they were on time every time. Will stay there again.

title: Great hotel with a couple of cons
review: Dear jnygtr97416,   Thank you for your recent visit and for having taken the time to write about your great experience at our property.  We could not be more pleased to know that the efficiency and the assistance you received from our team members made your stay more enjoyable!    We are all looking forward to your next stay. Should you need any assistance, please feel free to contact us directly.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Paradise in Patong
review: I am the sort of person who will not make a single hotel booking before reading at least 50 tripadvisor reviews, so when i have a good experience i always like to make the effort to review for others.  Quite honestly, this is one of the best hotels i've ever stayed in. Entering the lobby of the Grand Mercure instantly makes you feel calm after driving through the hustle and bustle of Phuket. The staff are immaculate and instantly welcome you from the second you arrive.  We decided to book a pool with a pool access room and this was definitely the right decision, the lady who checked us in escorted us to our room and gave us all the information we needed.  Rooms were immaculate (i'm an avid checker of bed sheets and showers when away!)  clean and comfortable. You're supplied with…

title: Best hotel experience in Thaïlande with real premium services
review: In Phuket you have the choice for premium hotels and services especially in Patong area. But if you are looking for a 100% satisfaction (location, premium services, high quality room, calm, nice equipment, charming, and perfect breakfast) ... must come here ... ;) From the welcome to the check out everything is premium. Also the location is exceptional and you have friendly minibus renting with driver who can bring you where you want just in front for a not so expensive price (as private car for you and your family only). Congratulations to the Grand Mercure's team.

title: Really nice hotel with very pleasant staff.
review: Dear tonin92,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! It is always a pleasure to receive compliments from such a contributor to the platform and i can ensure you we are all honored and very pleased about this very kind review of yours!  Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next time around, for a returning guest's special offer and added benefits too :)  Thank you and see you back at Grand Mercure very soon! Sebastien

title: PHUKET
review: Came here on a holiday trip with friends and when we got to the hotel, everything was smooth besides just one hiccup we had with one of the rooms, but the receptionist quickly helped us with sorting out another room for a reasonable price as well. So we were very satisfied with the quick reactions of the staff. The rooms were also very nice, very comfortable, and very clean. The lobby had a nice bar and pool table right next to it which was nice to chill at after arriving late at night after so much travel. Overall, would definitely recommend this hotel to other people and would have no problems staying here again the next time I visit Phuket.

title: Great location
review: Dear peoplered,   Thank you for spending the time to share your recent experience with us!  We are truly delighted to learn of your pleasant stay at our property. Should you require any further assistance or special arrangements on your future visits to Phuket, I would be more than happy to personally assist you.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Good Location Value of Money
review: This hotel is a very good hotel for stay in Phuket with a fantastic pool and other activities. This hotel is not having any view to sea. Patong beach is very near hardly 10mins walk from hotel. There are lot of restaurants around hotel even an Hard Rock Café. Breakfast served is very good. From airport it may take 45mins with min traffic.

title: Good hotel
review: I thought the hotel was ok and clean. My husband loved their buffet breakfast. Not sure about the location though. We visited  when  the King died so entertainment  was limited. I would rate the place good

title: Amazing staff, beautiful resort
review: Dear paul1623,   Allow me to thank you for your last visit at our property and for sharing your review here on Trip Advisor.   We are pleased to hear you could enjoy the resort despite the unfortunate timing and very sad passing of His Majesty The King and wish to thank you for your understanding.   Should you wish to visit us again, please feel free to contact us!   Best regards, Valentine

title: Perfect Location
review: Me and my husband stayed here for 5 nights in November 2016. We absolutely loved the facilities with an amazing pool and bar. The breakfast buffet was delicious. We found the front desk staff professional and friendly, with particular mention to a front office staff member Sita who was kind and very helpful when we had a few small issues with our room. We also got to meet the food manager at the hotel, who was also very friendly and diplomatic. When small things didn't go to plan during our hotel stay, we found that the staff went out of their way to rectify the issue quickly and make sure we enjoyed ourselves. I would definitely recommend it to other travellers

title: Lovely stay
review: Dear Lokiny,   Allow me to thank you for your review, memorable experiences like yours are what make our job worthwhile!  We are delighted to hear you appreciated the convenient facilities, the quality of the  breakfast buffet and foremost the helpful and courteous service you received from our team! Stay assured that we will thank Sita and Wat our Food & Beverage Manager for their dedication and friendliness!   Thank you for recommending us and we hope to have the chance to welcoming you back very soon.  Best regards, Valentine

title: Excellent hotel in a great location
review: We enjoyed our visit to Phuket/Patong, moreover we enjoyed our visit to the Grand Mecure. When we checked-in, I was impressed with the quietness of the hotel; in the mix, but a little off the beaten path (minutes from the beach). We were escorted to our room (a little small) which was a nice touch. I wanted to unpack my suitcase, but there were only two hangers in the closet. Instead of complaining, we headed to Happy Hour only to find two drinks being offered. We settled for their signature drink that was far too sugary for our taste.    The next morning, I was startled by screaming children in the morning. I thought no problem; I will go outside and write or maybe even read. I couldn’t do either because the neighbors found it necessary to play water volleyball in the pool in…

title: Family vacation Jan 2017
review: Staff has been great from the minute we arrived.  As a member of Accor Hotels, I was taken to the priority check in counter.  Check in was a breeze, staff were helpful.  We booked 3 rooms in total and the hotel up graded the superior room to the deluxe pool access room, and we thanked the hotel for that.  Would be nice if the lady staff at the Grand Club room acknowledge us when we greeted her.  I might be sensitive, but I couldn't help noticing she only smiled & greet caucasian.  Either way, this is a nice hotel and I will return.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear YasmineD88,   Allow us to extend our gratitude for the kind words expressed in your review!  We pride ourselves in delivering exceptional service, and are beyond glad your visit with us were provided just that and more. We are delighted to learn you had appreciated the personalized and professional service at the counter.   Thank you for placing your trust in our hotel, all the team is looking forward to welcoming you and your family back for many more pampering experience in near future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: One of my best hotel experiences!
review: My wife and I stayed for almost two weeks at this hotel. Perfect spot for us with a short walk to beach and plenty of massage places closeby. Also close to downtown.  Clean hotel. Good rooms.   Staff are amazing, always smiling and we always felt a warm welcome throughout our entire stay.   Everybody spoke English - even our sweet cleaning lady.  Pools both as big and as canals. Lounge area for a quick lunch snack.  We got sick during our stay (no blame on hotel) and staff was so observant that a fruit package was delivered to room with a card wishing for good recovery. Fabolous. I have never experienced this before and we have been travelling a lot.  We had room 129 with a terrace. Perfect.

title: Awesome hotel!
review: Dear Jacob H,   Firstly, I would like to express my sincere gratitude for sharing your thoughts on the recent experience you had with us!  Thank you very much for your kind words and your review full of compliments. We are very grateful to learn of your pleasant experience and especially your appreciation on the high level of service you received.   We look forward to welcoming you back to the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong soon!  Best regards, Valentine

title: Great location, but average hotel
review: I travel abroad quite often, so I've really come to know what I want out of a hotel and I must say that Grand Mercure Phuket Patong exceeded every expectation I had. When we first arrived, after 24 hours worth of flights, we were greeted with local tea, cream puffs, and cool face cloths. We arrived several hours earlier than our scheduled check in time, yet they were able to get us into our room right away which was wonderful. The accommodations were most splendid and I particularly liked how the hotel staff gave us unlimited  bottled water throughout the duration of our stay. The spa is also phenomenal and extremely affordable. It was honestly probably one of the best, if not the best, massages I have had to date. While the breakfast was extra, it was beyond worth it and…

title: Phuket Trip 2016
review: We stayed in this hotel for five nights and we had a pool side room and it was a little  small but comfortable all the same, pool was good and romantic in suset time, relatively private and clean. Restaurant good and pool side bar and lunch options were also good

title: Great location but inconsistent with customer service
review: Dear amirzati,  Many thanks for this 5* review! Very pleased you liked both our Pool Bar and setting and we already look forward to your next visit :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Generally ok, but not great.
review: We stayed 7 nights in pool access rooms, the hotel was lovely and centrally located to everything. One thing to mention to the westerners is the breakfast is more geared to Asian taste buds, there was omelettes, toast and pastries, bacon was tough and dry. The staff were lovely, very polite except the male reception staff that I dealt with the morning of the 22 Jan, I called to advise we were checking out and if our bags could be collected. Well, was I in for a shock! I was rudely responded with we are busy and have no staff and hung up on, I was furious. When I arrived at the reception desk there were 2 male staff and a female, I addressed all three with the dealings I had over the phone. Both male staff did not admit to who it was that I was speaking to, the female staff…

title: Hotel and Staff Amazing
review: The location is not too bad with shuttle to the beach and the mall, but it was only single way (outward). The  drainage in the bathroom was not great, the water overflew from the edge of the bathtub. The pool looked nice but we didn't use at all.

title: Luxury 3min from Bangla Road
review: Dear jingstyle,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts on the recent experience you had.  We sincerely regret to learn certain expectations of yours were let down due to an issue with the drainage in the bathroom. We would like to apologies and thank you as well because feedback like yours allows us to look into further improvement.   I remain hopeful you will decide to give us a second chance on your future visit to Phuket. Should you decide to do so, please feel free to reach out to us directly, we would be pleased to help with the arrangements.   Best regards, Valentine

title: Great place to stay in Phuket
review: We visited Phuket with my husband and three children ages 15, 13 & 11. We stayed here for four nights. This hotel is centrally located. It's close to beaches, restaurants and shops. Everything is walking distance. Patong beach area is a little crazy and hectic, so staying at this hotel was great. It is modern it is away from all the madness but yet close enough to walk to. My kids loved hanging out in the pool before dinner. We had breakfast included and were very pleased with the selection. The hotel rooms were modern and very clean. Nice decor and bottled water was replenished everyday. They also provided toiletries, toothbrushes, toothpaste, slippers and robes. On some nights there was live music in the lobby. The lobby is very nice to hang out in. Overall, I would say this…

title: Service of hotel and stAff
review: Dear travellingveggiemom,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful 4* review... We are all very pleased to hear you all having a great time and holidays at Grand Mercure!  I will surely share your review with rest of the team tomorrow morning, it will be a nice way to start the day and a busy Chinese New Year week :)  Thanks again and wishing you a very Happy New Year! Sebastien

title: Amazing as a returning guest!
review: My experience was nothing but absolutely amazing , with the wonderful hospitality of the warm staff starting upon entering  and a special thanks to the most ethical and honest duty manager Napporn  Jitwarin and the rooms manager Kemika Chaitongrank - the lovely complimants including the stunning upgrade left us breathless ! Definately a hotel to be for the perfect and most comfortable vacation !  The Chamda family .

title: Wonderful 3-night Stay
review: Dear Chamda Family,   Thank you for sharing your amazing experience with us on Trip Advisor, your comments are highly appreciated by all our team and especially Napporn and Kemika.   We are glad we managed to provide solid service and that you had a relaxing time enjoying yourself in Phuket!   All our team is already looking forward to your return! Should you need any arrangement, please feel free to contact us directly.    Best regards, Valentine

title: Perfect for family holidays
review: Great hotel in Patong, they upgraded us to the Pool Access and the pool is lush just on step from our room.  Staff (everyone!) are very friendly and always smile along with attentive to our needs.  Thai buffet on the first night and then Grand Seafood buffet on Friday, both evenings was very good and everything is fresh!  Seb the General Manager came to us on our arrival, sometimes on half way throughout our stay and at the end as well just to make sure our stay is smooth as much as possible.  Definitely coming back again!  THANK YOU!

title: Very Relaxing Holiday with Family
review: We stayed in this hotel for five nights. We reached there on Saturday night and was first of all very warmly greeted by the hotel staff.Our room was allocated on the fifth floor and had bit of a walk with our child however the hotel staff tried to find us a closer room but no luck. The staff was very friendly, polite and respectful. We found all the amenities and our room clean and hygienic. We had issues with the plug and the converter socket but we managed to resolve. The swimming pool and kids corner is fab.  The restaurant breakfast, dinner and bar facilities are excellent. I tried two different mojitos both excellent. Last but not least on our last day we were given 5 minutes free massage and we were very impressed by the techniques used so we ended up doing 2 hrs various…

title: Thought it would be grander...
review: Dear Danu2119,  Thank you very much for the few minutes taken in sharing your experience with the rest of the community.  Very pleased your entire family felt at home with us and i will surely pass your kind thoughts and thanks to them at the operation meeting today :)  Really great to see such comments about our Food & Beverage quality and offer!  Thank you so much and see you all again very soon, Sebastien

title: Dirty room, over priced, average service
review: Spent 1 night here in their superior room, which is their basic room. Check-in went smoothly but I expected something a little more given the cost of the room. The bathroom seemed a bit small for a resort but provided the necessary amenities. There were also stains on the couch. The room was a non-smoking one but it doesn't matter when there's an ash bin right outside the room. Also wasn't too thrilled that breakfast was not provided complimentary - seems like most other resorts do.  We did take advantage of the complimentary shuttle to the beach, but the driver deviated from the schedule and did not stop at the beach first - he didn't really have an answer as to why when asked. The hotel is a <10 minute walk to the beach anyways which is very convenient.  In the evening, we…

title: Relaxing in Patong with friends
review: Dear Alan P,  Thank you for your comments! I am really sorry your 1-night stay was somehow spoiled and i will surely go through all issues mentioned with our Team this morning.   There is only one way forward and feedback like yours will surely help us improve overall standards shortly... a good reminder of what is expected from a 5* hotel and Team, even for such a short stay.   Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Relaxing Oasis in the heart of Patong
review: The room was dirty - stains on the floor and the bathroom. The housecoat provided had stains on it as well. Bed comfortable. View just looked at the rest of the hotel and not very nice. Staff was okay, not particularly friendly.   There must be better places to stay for the same price point in the area.

title: Holiday Getaway
review: Newly build and good rooms !! Very clean property nice build !! We just went there with out whole family to celebrate my Mamu's 25th anniversary and the stay was just amazing. The pool was amazing and View was very nice from the room to the pool side

title: Spending money and Grand mercure
review: Dear sobbyj,  Thank you so much! It was great serving you all and we are very pleased you loved your experience at Grand Mercure so much!  Please do not hesitate to call us directly for the 26th one :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Visit
review: Hey everyone, how much money would you recommend (just for food drinks etc, i wont be doing much shopping) for 10 nights in krabi and patong? also of course what are your room tips for this resort??  Thanks :)

title: Lovely hotel, great location , limited pool area
review: Hi Emily M and thanks for your message and inquiry...  Depending on the style of cuisine you would be after (local or not so much), a meal would probably cost you anywhere between 200 & 400 THB. It is a lot less expensive in Krabi, as it is easier to step away from Beach road and snack at little local places there, where Thai food or street vendors would usually sell a meal for about 100-200THB only (Thai food).  But you can still find a lot of western-like restaurant and bistrot and prices are also very decent.  Soft drinks are inexpensive but Beers, liquors and wine are about the same price as it is in Europe for instance.   With a bit of shopping, a good breakfast and a few other meals and drinks, i would say about 1,200 to 1,500 per day. Tours and Excursions are what cost the most as a day trip to one of the island nearby would probably range between 2,000 & 3,000 THB per person.   Good luck and see you around very soon.. Sebastien

title: Great pool, good food, average hotel
review: I stayed at the hotel with my family for 2 nights. We had an excellent stay. The hotel is centrally located. A bit of a walk from the beach, but restaurants and the mall is close. The hotel runs shuttle service to the beach, mall daily so distance wasn't much of a hassle. The staff is responsive and the breakfast was great.

title: Not on the Beach....
review: We were looking for a hotel that is on the beach.  This hotel is  Not on the Beach.  The staff were pleasant.  The lobby and rooms were a bit dated.  Overall,.....just okay....but not great.  I will admit the location is good.

title: Great Hotel, Great Staff
review: Dear jimsnelling,  Thank you for your 4* review! I understand it might have been quite frustrating for you to stay in a property a few minutes walk away from the Beach, yet a Beach Resort you might have expected (direct access to Beach, sea view..etc).  We have a few sister properties that might suit you better for your next visit, like the Pullman Panwa, Novotel Kamala or even up North at the Pullman Arcadia on Naithon Beach.  Thank you anyhow for the kind words in regards to our friendly and pleasant staff & service.  It was a pleasure having you around and i hope the rest of your holidays went very well too!  with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Great Christmas Weekend!!!
review: The Poolside rooms are amazing, the breakfast is great, the staff are warm and accommodating and is in a really accessible location away from the hustle and bustle. Definitely recommend this Hotel, I will be back!

title: SOLID 4 stars
review: Dear Rova1979,  Many thanks for this very nice review of our property and definitely looking forwward to your return sometimes soon :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: 5 stars all round
review: We spent last 4 days of our Thai Holiday at the Grand Mercure Patong.   The hotel complex is big and was quite full when we stayed there but was very quite. The location is excellent and just a few blocks from the beach or jungceylon mall and the crazy Bangla road. They have a free transfer to the beach and mall (drop only) but I would suggest you to walk and explore the streets... as actually, both locations are very close..   Check-in was quick and the front desk task was very courteous and helpful. We were given cold towels and welcome drink which was perfect after a 4-hour ferry and transfer ride.  We booked the standard room and it was perfect, a little smaller than the ones we stayed in Bangkok or Krabi but nothing to complain about. It had everything you need and all…

title: At the edge of a busy street
review: Hotel is located at the edge of a busy street. Stayed here for 4 nights. Hotel staff were friendly, they escort you to your room. Good variety of welcome drinks and cold towel provided at check in. Nice rooms. Bathroom a bit small by usual standards and has a glass screen with a blind which lacks privacy. Very nice pool, only 1 restaurant. Breakfast spread was good. Drop off to beach, Jungceylon Mall and phuket town provided (no pick up). Beach is a few hundred meters away. Very close to Hard Rock and 2 good restaurants just outside the hotel.

title: A nice hotel in Patong centre
review: Dear ramneek25,  Many thanks for this 4* review and recommendations given to future guests too.  We very much appreciate the few minutes taken in doing so and hope to see you both again next year!  Happy New Year, Sebastien

title: best phuket experience
review: Hotel location is quite central. Although it's a big complex, hotel is actually quiet, especially the pool area. Buffet breakfast has a large selection. As a SPG member, we were upgraded to direct pool access room upon arrival, and we really enjoyed the swim once stepping out of the room. A very relaxed stay indeed!

title: Grand Mercure -- An oasis in the heart of Patong
review: Dear QiaoQiaoLondon,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating! It is always a pleasure to welcome much valued members of our Le Club AccorHotels - i think that is what you meant :)  Please let me take this opportunity to wish you and your loved ones a very Happy New Year and plenty of happiness in years to come...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: very beatiful
review: the hotel is amazing. we stayed in the pool access room. the room space maybe a bit compact if you are looking for spacious room. but it is just nice for us. on the first night one of the light in the washroom was not working since there are other lights we did not make any remark to the counter. to our surprise the next day, after we are back from our activities, they have fixed the light (maybe the room service made a remark) and we are very happy. be careful of mosquitoes at night if you were to hangout at your balcony. overall it is a wonderful hotel. one of the best i've stayed for the price. will definitely come back soon.

title: Great
review: The hotel staff are excellent! The hotel room was very nice, clean, spacious and comes equipped with all of the usual amenities (except an iron, the hotel provides this service for you). The room service is great and very inexpensive and it is 24 hours with rather fast delivery times (under 30 minutes). The bounce bar is nice although it would be nice if it stayed open later than 19:00. If you have tours booked the front desk will call to let you know they have arrived. The hotel provides complimentary bottled drinking water. The mini bar has a nice selection of things for fairly cheap prices. The king bed was extremely comfortable as well. The location is literally 2 mins walk from a major shopping and food area. Maybe 100 baht for taxi to the beach or 7-10 minute walk. Highly…

title: Super Birthday!
review: Dear toriacool1,   Many thanks for this wonderful review and great comments about room, amenities, services and the great location we are enjoying... with Grand regards, Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: one night in patong
review: Firstly our room was very clean and cozy, bathroom/shower is great and the pressure is very good! We loved the bed! Breakfast is also very nice and heaps of choice (maybe not too much for vegetarians or vegans). Highlight was my birthday dinner which the staff helped make very memorable!! Got a nice cake and very cute bed message out of petals and flowers and towel bunnies!! 10/10 Service. We had massages at the Ryn spa as well which is very professional and clean! Dinner at bubbles restaurant is also tasty. Really just enjoyed the place a lot. Very close to all the action and the beach. Would come again!

title: Great Experience
review: Dear The_littlest_tourist,   Thnak you so much for such a superb review! I am always very pleased on such a positive review and can't thank you enough for sharing your experience. Glad you loved our arrangement on your birthday, spa and dining experiences. I will definitely share you comments with staff to encourage them for providing even better services. See you next year hopefully, Thank you/ Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: Good hotel in center of Paong  !!!
review: very nice hôtel in a good location.  nice room who smells humidity a little.  swimming pool access was great.  nice choice for breakfast. the staff were nice.  people in the hotel were a bit noisy.  lots of kids.  was great for one night discovering the creasy town of patong.

title: Great experience
review: We have just checked in at grand mercure phuket.... We got a very great welcome by the staff...along with an honeymoon cake.. The the experience so far is amazing... We are here for 2 days shall update my complete review on my checkout

title: Great hotel to stay in....
review: Dear Sumeet V,  Thank you very much for this superb review and 5* rating! It was nice opportunity to greet and meet with you upon checked out. It's always a pleasure to receive feedback on our rooms and our attentive service. Hope we will see you again next year../Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: Lovely hotel, great location
review: It is a great place to stay in Phuket, very near Patong's Nightlife  area with all comforts a super luxury resort, only thing it lacks is the food choices for vegetarians. The best part about this hotels the Pool Access rooms, either you be with your friends or family it is a must stay property.

title: Superb Stay!
review: Dear 93saketc,  Thank you very much for this superb review and 5* rating! Always a pleasure to receive positive comments about our rooms and overall location of the property itself. We will look into vegetarian menu as suggested. Looking forward to welcoming you back very soon.../Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: Third year and same feeling
review: Great location with a short walk to the shops and bars and also to the beach.  The staff are friendly.  Great choice for breakfast.  Lovely pool with lots of choice for a sunbed....never busy.  The rooms overlook the pool area.  Clean comfortable room.

title: I wish we had stayed longer
review: We only stayed a single evening but this was a really good stay. From check in to check out it was a good experience. If your in town for the beach be advised that its a good 15 minute hike but from what we saw of the in town beach front hotels it is worth being a bit off the beach. The Breakfast buffet was very good.

title: Excellent
review: Dear GRB3,  Many thanks for this great review and 5* rating! It is always a pleasure to see guests of ours enjoying themselves so much...  See you again soon, Sebastien

title: "Great location and hotel"
review: Excellent hotel, clean and staff super kind and smile. The room is quite nice and amenities also very good!   Special mention for Khun Manu FO manager, very helpful and kind, and he team are amazing!   Thank you

title: Wonderful service.
review: Dear 11111111brasil111111,  Thank you for your time and for choosing Grand Mercure during your recent stay in Patong! Khun Manus will surely be pleased to see he made an impression :)  Many thanks and see you again in 2017! Sebastien

title: A definitely 5/5 property
review: This was probably the first time i stayed at the Grand Mercure , Patong , Phuket .... and i am sure this will not be the last ..!!  a lovely hotel , with a lovely ambience , and "Apichaya" Front desk staff that goes out of their way to see that you are made to feel at home . From the moment you step it in , this hotel becomes a home away from home .........
