She made every moment worth it - She indeed belong to the Land of Smiles ....... every service there is done with the warmest of smiles !! my all time favorite ...  Rooms are good and spacious, well maintained and room make up at your timing. The hotel is near to many local shops and a walking distance to Jungcelon Mall, Bangla waking street.  !!! I'll be back soon.!!!

title: Attention to detail
review: Currently staying at this property and here for a couple more days. Everything has been great. The room and the pool are outstanding. Breakfast has a great variety and is very very fresh. The location is excellent and the staff are so friendly and helpful. On arrival we requested a sunnier room and this was done without and problem or drama. Highly professional and very customer focused. Thank you Grand Mercury!  5 stars from me!

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear rrispoli,  Thank you for this 5* review and compliments! Very pleased to hear we could assist and ensure you both with a wonderful experience in Patong. We will ensure that our staff will keep the service standard and include personalized service as well. Looking forward to welcoming you back in very near future./ Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: Perfect!
review: Excellent... modern conveniences and amenities... nice place... very taste breakfast... good choice for our honeymoon trip... loved the standard of the hotel. the location of the hotel is perfect. the staff were very helpful and friendly...

title: Worth the experience!
review: Dear Konstantina K.  Many thanks for this very kind comments and superb 5* rating.   Always a pleasure to see our guests have great quality of stay and enjoy good food at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong/ Sumontha (Executive Assistant Manager)

title: Loved it !
review: Very good hotel! Comfortable room, great swimming pool, very friendly staff ande delicious breakfast! My advices: their hamburger and mango margaritas! Both are simply amazing. We both had issues with our credit cards and the reception people saved our trip

title: Wonderful time 20th Nov to 23rd nov
review: Checked in to grand mercure phuket on at about 11am on 20th Nov and although the counter girls were not interested in serving us and left us to wait for about 10 mins without a smile or asking how they can help, we were finally attended to by a nice gentleman (forgot to note his name). He quickly checked us in and even joked with us. Except for some hiccups with housekeeping we were overall pleased with the room and facilities. Would not hesitate to stay there again

title: Amazing Hotel in Patong, Phuket
review: Period: Oct 2016 Duration: 3 nights Room type: Superior Room, 1 King Bed  Location: Very good. Close proximity to everything. There is a very nice restaurant (san sabai) just across the street for your daily fix. Patong beach & Jungcelyon mall is just 10 minutes walk away.  Room: Spacious, modern, new and clean  Service: Helpful, friendly & courteous  Remarks: I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends and family. Would love to stay here again if I were to visit Phuket again.

title: Relaxing holidays in Phuket
review: Dear purplestorm666,  Many thanks for this very kind comments and superb 5* rating.  Always a pleasure to see guests of ours enjoying themselves so much at Grand Mercure...  Once again, thank you and see you again in 2017 hopefully! Sebastien

title: Amazing Sanctuary
review: Had stayed for four nights in second week of November 2016.after check in thought to have dinner out side in near by restaurant but failed.From next morning tried hotel it self,and surprisingly find lot of vegetarian dishes,even Jain food too !really it was a good experience and front office staff extremely helpful! Especially SITA , how nicely she helped us lot!

title: Great value high standard
review: Dear Mukesh J,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review.  I will surely pass on your warmest regards to our Restaurant Team as well as Miss Sita, who is once again making a difference and going beyond to please & surprise our guests even more...  Thank you and looking forward to welcoming you back soon... Sebastien

title: Beautiful place
review: Spent 4days 3night at this hotel with pool access. It's a very clean and peaceful place. Mins walk to paying beach only! It is very convenient, highly recommended! Was also quite impressed to see their villa in the hotel itself.

title: Good location : Small rooms
review: Stayed here for a couple of days while moving around Thailand.  Check-in was super smooth and professional.  We were given a small refreshing drink, which I believe is called Butterfly Pea... I'd buy a whole truck load of bottles if I could; its was lovely.  The hotel has a spacious drive where you are dropped off right outside main reception.  The reception area is very spacious and the bell staff take care of your luggage for you.  There is also a very nice bakery / sandwich shop within reception, a bar area, playing live music or a pianist at times, which is most enjoyable.  The rooms are small though.  I am sure there are bigger rooms or perhaps suites, however I think on average, most rooms are fairly tight and small on floorspace.  Its adequate tho, given you do not go…

title: Truly Amazing Hotel
review: Dear Tartan T, Many thanks for your review and glad you liked our Butterfly Pea iced tea so much!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Ideal getaway accommodation
review: Great welcome with cool towels, refreshing drink and light snack. Lovely rooms with cute towel animals. Brilliant set up of a bed of roses on my birthday as well. Facilities are awesome and the buffet breakfast is amazing. Would recommend to EVERYONE.

title: Excellent Hotel , great rooms, great service , clean pool
review: Dear MoniqueJS,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! We are very pleased to see how much you enjoyed yourselves and i will surely take this chance to thank our Housekeeping and Kitchen teams on your behalf.   Thank you once again and see you back at Grand Mercure very soon :)  Sebastien

title: Perfect trip!
review: My wife and I stayed here for 16 nights. After a brutal 24 travel day from San Francisco, the check in process was painless and we were in our room within minutes! The attention to detail in this resort is on point! Staff also left a cake in our fridge for my birthday along with a very thoughtful note. The location is perfect as well.... not too close to the craziness of Bangla road however close enough to be there after a quick 10 minute walk. We love it here and wouldn't dare staying anywhere else! Thank you staff of the grand mercure for exceeding our expectations!

title: Craft Bar
review: Dear Christian G,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of our property. It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves so much, especially after such a long trip and we are all looking forward to eventually welcoming you back in near future...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Amazing family holiday
review: Great bar to relax. Dining available with Tapas menu as well. Sasikarn our waitress was great and very attentive. It was a always a pleasure to casually dine and enjoy a cocktail. I would definitely stay at this Hotel again. Staff are friendly and helpful. You are also away from the hustle and bustle of Patong Beach but close enough to enjoy a visit to the action.

title: One week in Phuket, Patong
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure Patong for 6nights. We cannot recommend it enough! It was one of the best hotel stays we've had. We received the friendliest welcome with welcome refreshments. After our quick and easy check in our bags were taken and we were shown to our room. We were staying with our daughter who is 4 so they made up a bed for her out of the sofa which was great. Room was clean and modern. The hotel has free wifi throughout and had great signal. Buffet breakfast had a great choice for everyone. Food was all yummy and service was great. All the staff at the hotel we're amazingly friendly. Our daughter loved greeting them all each morning. Pool was a great size and the swim up bar very cool. They even had a area for kids that had a slide which my daughter got much…

title: Excellent Holidays
review: Dear Jess2987,  Thank you very much, you made our day and i am delighted to note that your daughter had such a great time with us. I will also take this opportunity to thank both our service and culinary teams for their professionalism and friendliness!  Many thanks again and see you all back at Grand Mercure very soon! Sebastien

title: Holiday in October
review: My fiancé and I stayed for a week in October, when checking in our buffet breakfast wasn't showing up in the system the receptionist was a little rude and didn't do any investigations on her behalf, we sorted it out once I showed evidence but felt the whole situation was an inconvenience for her.  I wasn't very happy with the superior room location as there was a tree blocking our view and the room itself was a little outdated, needed a bit of maintenance but still in good condition. Buffet was excellent but the food variety was poor regarding the room service and bubbles restaurant.  Overall hotel was nice and I must say they did look after us, we would come back and stay.  Regards, Nicolle

title: propably one of the best in patong
review: Dear Nkatene,  Thank you very much for your review and glad to hear you will consider Grand Mercure again in future... Please feel free to request a different room, floor or building next time you visit... it could be a little in advance or simply upon check-in :)  Thanks and see you again very soon, Sebastien

title: Revive and relax
review: Overall I am satisfied by this hotel.The staff are amazing very helpful and friendly to us. Our room deluxe pool access  was nice but I did have some issues with the humidity all our clothes were almost wet!! I understand that this is a room with pool access but this was beyond normal and it did smell a bit. The breakfast and dinner delicious .the location is very good not far from the mall and bangla street or the beach.

title: One Night Stay
review: Dear pearlan,  Many thanks for this wonderful review...  I am very pleased that despite high humidity level experienced, you could still enjoy your selves so much and  will surely take this opportunity to thank our staff on your behalf!  Thank you and see you once again in 2017, Sebastien

title: Very relaxed clean and modern
review: Sit back and relax and let the pampering begin with a fantastic check in. The staff greet you with some amazing chilled tea, face towels and a warm smiles from the heart. The room was cosy and comfortable with great beds. The staff leave who clean the room do a great job leaving the room nice and chilled for the tropical climate. The swim up bar is a slice of heaven and cocktails could not be more than what I have imagined. The buffet breakfast had plenty of choice and covered a wide range of continental and Asian.   The day spa was fantastic I experienced a beautiful foot srub and relaxing body wrap massage. The location is perfect to be in the middle of the happening areas of Patong and still have peace and tranquility. Over all I would rate this hotel very highly and will be…

title: Really Pleasantly Surprised
review: Booked the Grand Mercure because I am an Accor member and it looked like a nice new hotel. On arrival check in was very quick and I was escorted to my room which was a suite.  It has  a nice lounge room, dining area, separate bedroom and a large bathroom. Big screen TV's in both the lounge and the bedroom and a large balcony. There was also a second toilet off the lounge room. The room was on the 7th (top) floor and I had a nice view across the pool area. As I mentioned it is a fairly new hotel so everything is in great condition. Bedding is nice and comfortable and the towels were crisp and white. In room WiFi was of a good speed too and free as I am an Accor member. I had dinner on the first night in the restaurant because I arrived  fairly late (well for me anyway) and didn't…

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Garyjwills,  Many thanks for this very detailed and amazing review!! very much appreciated indeed! It is always a pleasure to see great feedback about both cuisine, service and facilities and I thank you on behalf of our team for taking the time to do so.  I have heard about the sanctuary as well but didn't get a chance to visit them yet... so i guess that will be next on my to-do list... Pretty sad to see the way they are treated at times, no only in Phuket but around South East Asia in general... great initiative indeed!  Once again thank you and looking forward to welcoming you back soon :) Sebastien

title: Not Bad.
review: This hotel is beautiful and the location is great we stayed here 8 days , the staff where very friendly and nice to talk to, our room was very clean we had the pool access room which was great and must say it was not facing the restaurant we had more privacy by been on the sides our room was small and the lighting was not the best . I don't understand why there is not enough draws to put your clothing away which they could improve by add more. The pool was beautiful and clean great swim up to bar as well , the restaurant where we had breakfast was fantastic lot of variety and fresh food . Location is great because you can just walk up to the main drag Bangla rd  and to jungceylon shopping complex where there are lots of restaurants as well I can say grand mercure is great for…

title: Over rated
review: Stayed in late September and i honesty would have given it a 3-4 star, but i thought the service recovery action was pretty well done therefore give a 5. Long story short, emailed the hotel asking for a limo to pick me up, but they missed it of course. Having taken a late flight into Phuket and shocked at the overflow of people in the immigration queue (2 hours we waited), eventually got out of the airport at 2AM. Being a bit annoyed and having to turn on my roaming to query about the pickup, at the end had to take flag a taxi down. The manager was nice enough to offer us a comp buffet the following day but after being sitted down at the restaurant, decided to have a la carte. I knew we had to pay for dinner at this point, which i didn't mind as we agreed to the buffet…

title: couple stayover
review: Dear speakingof,  Many thanks for this 5* review and very detailed explanations.  It is review like yours that are allowing us to improve our services but also own selves and i am delighted to see how well we could recovered from what is usually consider "beyond repair" - if I may say.   I am very pleased you could enjoy yourselves after all and will be more than happy to assist you personally with your future visit and reservation...  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Just so so
review: Like: Location is good, close to restaurants. 10-15 minutes walk to Jungceylon. There is a very good restaurant just opposite to the hotel entrance. Very tasty and cheap.  Breakfast is good with quite wide variety. Not so like: Swimming pool. I think about 50% of the swimming pool area is for the pool access rooms, the remaining part that can be used for other room guests is indeed very small and very narrow. Room itself is quite small, but is fine for me. Bathroom shower area has no shower curtain which makes the whole bathroom wet after shower.

title: Clean, comfortable, safe, and lovely friendly staff
review: Dear MrMcB,  Thank you very much for your review and thoughts.  I will surely pass your regards onto our Chef and his team too, for a job well done at breakfast.  As for the swimming pools, all three are actually open to all patrons... The design was made so that rooms on the ground floor would have direct access to it but those pools are not private and can be used by all indeed.   Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Leisure trip
review: Only stayed here for 1 night while passing through Patong but it was a great little gem compared to all the other places in the area. Lovely room. Staff were genuinely very sweet and helpful. Decent breakfast with good selection and very good value.

title: Brilliant!
review: Dear Alivia P,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review and 5* rating!! You made our day and it will be a great pleasure to welcome you back anytime soon :)  Sincerely, Sebastien

title: Simply amazing private villa room
review: Hotel was clean and very enjoyable. Everything was very close to with good restaurants , money exchange, convinence store and laundry just steps away from the hotel .   The hotel  also offers are pretty good breakfast with omlettes made to order. With a variety of thai and english dishes and also fresh waffles and pancakes which were the best part of my breakfast.

title: Memories we'd rather forget...
review: Walking into the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong from the chaos, smells and dirt of Phuket was a sigh of relief.  It was like entering another 'civilised' world.  It is situated in the heart of Patong yet was very quiet.  Walking distance to Bangla Road, Patong beach and the Jungceylon Shopping complex.  We had a pool room which was great but as we required interconnecting rooms we were moved to the villa with private pool.  It would've been easier if they gave another pool room as both rooms on either side of ours were empty for the duration of our stay.  Nonetheless, the villa was great but we felt it was a bit secluded for our liking.   However, it was very spacious, with two bedrooms both with their own bathrooms which were quite spacious, a lounge/dining area which was set up…

title: "Amazing hotel."
review: Dear Staci1825,  First of all, thank you very much for sharing your experience with us, even if it wasn't a very positive one it appears.  We have had a few issues related to guest's health in the past but never such food poisoning case... and this despite us serving up to 500 covers at breakfast daily and well over 150,000 each year.   We have always been very attentive to guest's comments and requests and i am so sorry we somehow failed this time, both from an internal communication as i wasn't aware but also service mind.   I do understand how sensitive and frustrating the entire situation must have been to you & your family, and once again wish to express my most sincere apologies.   You might never give us another chance to serve you but if I may, and shall you decide on doing so, please do not hesitate to let me know as i surely look into your own reservation details myself, ensuring you all with a most pleasant stay, after all.  with most Sincere regards,  Sebastien

title: Simply Tip Top Service
review: I have stayed at this hotel for four nights and it was really amazing accommodation.   "Beer" Reception she is so kind and well speak English and able to help us at any time. For my birthday she make me surprise with birthday cake. Moreover, the room has an incredible pool view.   Food is a wide selection in the breakfast. And good location this hotel is a center of patong area.  We'll be back

title: Extremely nice property with exceptional customer service
review: Dear Maryam H,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and kind comments about our Team spirit and khun Beer most particularly. I will surely thank her on your behalf.  Once again, thank you and see you back at Grand Mercure very soon...  Sebastien

title: Good hotel.
review: Stayed a night last week during the mourning of their late king.  Customer service was top rate, always smiling and nothing was too troublesome.  Room was clean and bed very comfortable. Wifi was excellent but TV not much too watch during the funeral of their late king. Bathroom came with nice and clean bathtub.  Free high tea at VIP lounge from 11 am to 5 pm was great. Was given late check out till 2 pm so we stayed at the VIP lounge as our flight was at night.  Had our lunch, dinner and breakfast at the hotel. Food was great and staff were attentive and friendly.  Very convenient location with shuttle service to the beach and malls. Definitely a top choice to stay in Patong area.

title: Beautiful Hotel in a great location
review: We stayed at this hotel for a week and it was a great stay! I would highly recommend a pool access room, it wasn't noisy for us and was a great place to relax. The staff were really helpful and were happy to help us change our room type after our travel agent had made a mistake. Breakfast had a huge range of food and an egg station that makes your eggs anyway you like. I would recommend getting there early as it can get busy. We had a couple of dinners at the restaurant at night which was amazing. We had a few drinks at the pool bar which was fun because they had a part where you can swim up to. The location of the hotel is really good, there's the OTOP market across the road from the hotel and Jungceylon is only a 10 minute walk. Patong beach is also a close walk and so is…

title: Great hotel .
review: Dear oyster_bug,  Many thanks for this wonderfuly review! We are all very pleased to note you had a most relaxing stay with us and by the pool Bar :). looking forward to welcoming you back in 2017.  Sebastien

title: Good central hotel
review: This is a great hotel the pool was lovely . The breakfast selection is huge . The room was lovely and clean .  The location of the hotel is excellent right near gungleclyon shopping centre . The pool is not deep .

title: Grand experiance
review: Dear JonB75,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and great comments about both breakfast selection and the great location we are enjoying...   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great experience!
review: We stayed at the hotel 4 nights. it is a good hotel. we ordered the pool access room, since when we got this type of room was overbooked - we got the villa with private pool.  for the price we paid, the villa is amazing. but we wanted to extend our stay by one night, and the price was just too expensive. we really didn't think that this price was worth it.  the location is great, in patong, close to everything. the breakfast is amazing.  the only down point is the price of the rooms, if we wouldn't find a deal on booking.com, we would never go to this hotel - for the asked price, one might find something better.  the review of the rooms only refers to the villa, havent seen other rooms.

title: Great location and service
review: We stayed for 12 nights in a pool access room, unfortunately it rained most of the time and we couldnt utilse the pool. Staff were great,  very helpful.  Room was small but clean. My daughter was sick for several days and unfortunately we were room bound...this made the constant cycle of the same movies abit frustrating and when we ordered room service it was wrapped in plastic wrap and the food had become soggy  (not good for a burger). Spa was great.

title: AMAZING HOTEL WI THE BEST LOCATION ON PATONG
review: Me and my wife had great days in Grand Mercure for our anniversary , everything was great .they do his best for my anniversary, with the flower and cake , the staffs are very friendly, and try to do their best for you. location is best we didn't pay for taxi, beach is near , also Bangala road is near . again I chose here for my next trip to Patong.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Hamed A,  Very pleased to hear about the lovely stay you had on this very special occasion... Thank you very much for your kind words and rating and we will hopefully have the chance of welcoming back at Grand Mercure very soon...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Holiday
review: Great hotel. Would definitely come back. Only down side is that the pool is closed at 7pm. Apart from that everyone is very helpful and it's close to all the action! Food is good and swim up bar is a great place to hang out.

title: Our getaway
review: We are at present staying in the hotel which is located next to O'Top market and it's many bars.The hotel is modern with nice pool area and all the staff are very friendly. It's only a ten minute walk to the famous Bangla Road and its raucous night life.The hotel also runs a shuttle bus service to the jungceylon shopping complex several times a day. This is the first time my wife and I have stayed and are very happy with our choice of venue,we have only been here a few days and have three weeks still ahead of us. If you are looking for a good hotel in the quieter part of town this the place to be,and highly recommend this hotel.The rooms are not overly large but we'll appointed. The only criticism is the small amount of cupboard and drawer space available.

title: High standards of service, great location and amenities.
review: Had a great stay in Grand Mercure. From the the moment checked-in, I've received warm hospitality and smile from their staff.   The room that I booked was overlooking the swimming look and it was really a good view. It was clean, spacious and it even had a small sofa in it. You could open the window that is overlooking the swimming pool and it acts like a small balcony.   Go for their spa and massages (called Ryan Spa) as it was top notch if you can afford to spurge a little bit. There's a bar by the pool and a small gym as well. Basically you could stay in the hotel itself and find yourself tons to do as they have a bar, pool table and they even show sports on a projector as well.   Opposite the hotel are some small shops and restaurants where you can grab something to eat and…

title: Great experience
review: What a wonderful hotel. I stayed 3 nights. Staff extremely polite and professional. Very clean premises. Great service. Exceptional Thai massage and great Thai box teacher Diaa. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Fantastic
review: Dear Safariyat56,  Thank you for this very kind review! I will certainly shared your thoughts with Diaa and rest of fitness team and they are indeed doing an excellent job by offering different kinds of activities to guests too.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: This time brought our teenagers
review: I cannot fault this wonderful hotel and the incredible staff.  We just spent 10 nights at the Grand Mercure Patong and it really ticked all the boxes.  Their attention to detail and caring ways are tremendous.  The location is superb. The rooms comfortable, clean and modern, the food truly outstanding....we had the Asian buffet twice during our stay and it was incredible.   All 5 of us became sick whilst we were there (we ate out at many different places around Patong, so I'm certain it wasn't the food from the hotel that caused it). Anyway, Valentine and his team were incredible.  They checked on us regularly, sent flowers to our room to cheer us up and a plate of cookies when we had recovered, as well as extra sanitation steps to ensure cleanliness of the rooms and bathrooms. …

title: Great choice in Patong
review: Dear John K,  It is so very nice of you to have taken a few minutes of your time to share your experience with us and others... We are all very pleased we could assist and somehow make it a comfortable stay for you all despite the annoying conditions you were all in.   Valentine just went back to her hometown for a short break and hopefully, we will see her back at Grand Mercure very soon as she's really an asset to us, just like Chino and the rest of the Front office that assisted you throughout!  Many thanks again and see you all back at Grand Mercure very soon... Sebastien

title: A good choice in Patong
review: Stayed here 3 nights at the beginning of a longer Phuket holiday with my husband. This is a great choice for couples and families;  close (10 min walk) to the beach and main shopping areas, restaurants, massages etc just outside,  and a wonderfully quiet hotel and great service. Rooms are clean and comfortable; the beds are quite firm but after one night i was used to it. If our room was any indication they are starting to need a bit of maintenance,  especially the wet areas, but still fine. The pool was pleasant but small and could be a little crowded at times,  but i loved the swim up bar. The breakfast buffet was great,  plenty of choices for everyone and efficient service. I only had one other meal here, one lunch,  which was fine. Two for one cocktails at happy hour also…

title: Nice hotel but the service level upon check-in might need a re-look
review: Dear Pannie77,  Many thanks for this 4* review. We are all very pleased to hear about a satisfying experience and rest assured i will take this opportunity to thank both our Housekeeping, Bar and restaurant teams for their friendliness and professionalism...  Once again, thank you and looking forward to welcoming you back in 2017! Sebastien

title: Great Hotel but customer service needs a bit of improvement
review: Stayed 3days 2 night at this nice hotel. Overall, i would said it is a nice experience with great facilities. No regrets.   The only things that put me off was the customer service of the check-in girl whose face was so black that she could almost stand side-by-side with the legendary Justice Bao.   She couldn't find our reservation and ws clearly frustrated with the process as the system was not showing our reservation. The finale straw came when she interrupted our group conversation rudely, despite we were trying to be nice and helpful to her. I think perhaps it's not her day but she shouldn't do it on the guests.   But overall, the stay was fantastic except the check-in process.   I would hope to try the hotel soon again.

title: A good hotel, but service standards can improve
review: We stayed at this hotel during our honeymoon in early September 2016 for 7 days. The view of the hotel from our room day and night was delightful as the decoration is wonderful.  The room we had was super clean and well equipped. We surely invite everyone to stay there for sure but have to notice also the following.  Advantages. The hotel provides Free shuttle to the mall close by (which is right behing the hotel so you can walk also), free shuttly to Patong Beach - you shoud try it and come back walking to  the hotel via Bangla Road at night time or take the parallel road adjacent to it which is full of market stalls with clothes and other (the end of Bangla road takes you to the mall). Also it provides free shuttle to Central (mall) - sorry to tell you but from the hotel when…

title: Great hotel, Central Location
review: Dear worldvisitor85,  Many thanks for this very detailed and wonderful review.  We are very pleased to hear about your lovely stay and thank you also for the comments related to possible improvements in term of both service and offer.   I will surely thank our Kitchen team for their superb work and display during Buffet nights... I will also remind them to work on both variety and set-up as i do believe there are plenty options for Europeans (like you & I). It might simply be due to the fact that those are not visible enough to all... We have cold cuts and cheeses of premium quality, the classic English breakfast items we are all fond of and of course, outstanding bakery items such as croissants, waffles, brioches as well as 3 or 4 different quality of breads... If you add to this the cereal station, the fruits and juices offered and the few salads we call "Oriental" like tabouleh, Greek feta salad and other greens, there is really plenty for "us" to chose from.  Very valid point, thank you very much once again and rest assured we will work on those immediately.   The pool temperature is something a little more surprising for me i have to admit as the main pool temperature never ever went below 27*... regardless of the rain or sunny conditions... This morning, it was at 29* despite heavy rainfalls last night.  The weather outside is much much higher than the temperature of the pool, hence the felling of freshness entering in it i would think.   In regards to the 7,000THB you were asked for as deposit, please kindly that is a standard operating procedure for all Accor Hotels properties in Asia and that this amount represent 1,000THB per each night spent. It is not debited but simply blocked in order to cover miscellaneous expenses you and your partner may have had throughout the stay... receipt from Mini Bar, Spa, buffets and/or tours can then be deducted from that amount upon check-out.  I am sorry you were not informed earlier about that policy and will surely remind our team about the necessity of doing so, especially when a patron like yourself is giving us a chance to do so via email.   Once again, thousand thanks for this amazing review!! We are all very much looking forward to welcoming back at Grand Mercure very soon...  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: pleasant stay
review: when i booked the hotel, i emailed them for some special requests. they were very helpful, easy to communicate with, very happy with the response and it made my stay extra special. i really enjoyed our room, the staffs were friendly. hotel breakfast was bit let down. i would highly recommend guests check on their website, we found this really good promotion, for couple 1 hour massage each, 5 course private dinner at the roof top with private chef and waitress. loved it.

title: Exceptional!!! Didn't want to leave
review: Dear Tracy Y,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay.   We are pleased to hear our caring and professional team here had managed to exceed your expectations. In addition, it is great to learn that our Romantic Dinner & Spa Package made your stay even more comfortable and special!   Should you wish to visit us again, please feel free to contact our team directly!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Not a good choice
review: Looking for a place to stay in Patong? Look no further!! From the moment we set foot in the grand Mercure we felt at home the service from the staff is exceptional they went above & beyond to make our holiday a memorable one we wouldn't stay anywhere else now we have found this place the quality of the meals in the restaurant is beautiful the pools are amazing the swim up bar is the cherry on top! The location is fantastic short walk to everything or they run a curtosey bus to central Phuket, jungcelyon & the beach it honestly doesn't get any better than this place, I have stayed at other big name resorts that are close by but the grand Mercure far surpasses these I can't put into words for you how great this place was you really need to go see for yourself you won't be…

title: Great hotel, friendly staff
review: Dear Jacqueline P,  Thousand thanks for this beautiful and very touching review! It is was a real pleasure to have you all three staying with us for such a long period of time and we are all delighted to note we could somehow enhance your overall experience of Phuket!  Thank you and see you again very soon... Sebastien

title: Great hotel for the price
review: Stayed superior room but room condition was bad and staff's attitude was worse.  I can open other room with my room key. I can't feel safe. TV remote control was missed so that I have to watch long hotel promotion film until staff bring it back. But it was very long stupid discussion with him. He thought that I lost it.  Elevator touch panel can't work properly so that I asked hotel lady to help but her attitude was rude. I can't believe this is Thailand.   It was my horrible experience at that hotel.

title: Good location and comfortable
review: I was here for 7 nights on holidays. The room we had was small to cramped. We would definitely go back but would upgrade to pool access room with out a doubt worth the extra money. We didn't eat at the hotel as we went out for all meals exploring

title: Very comfortable base from which to explore Phuket
review: 3rd Level, I found the room very peaceful and no noise. Very comfortable bed and excellent air conditioner which was needed.  Mould found in the shower/bath, however, I overlooked this due to the tropical climate.  Housekeeping staff were excellent as I had a few accidents and needed their attention.  The swimming pools were very relaxing.  Lovely tranquil environment sitting on deck chairs looking around at the healthy tropical plants.  I took the buffet breakfast one morning, was a little disappointed with the lack of 'Western' food and the bacon was too thin and not tasty.  I took dinner in room a few times, the hamburgers were adequate but not exceptional.  The concierge staff were very helpful and assisted me.  I saw many families relaxing with their children in the pools,…

title: Excellent experience
review: We stayed at Grand Mercure for 3 nights. Excellent property, the view from our room was super. The location is a big plus point for the hotel, you get out from the lobby and you land right in the middle of the market. 5 minutes walking and you reach the Patong beach. Food in the restaurant is a bit expensive but very good taste. Staff is very helpful and cooperative. A tip: Hire a motorbike from the shop located right at the entrance of the hotel, you get all the freedom to explore the island.  I definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Definitely not 5 star
review: Cons: - upon arrival we were checked in to our room which had not been cleaned. Hairs all over floor and couch. Dust and dirt in cupboards and draws. Toilet smelt strongly of urine. Requested another room. Shown to second room and had strong smell of wet carpet. Third room shown ok. - took 2 requests to get basic cutlery to room (1 hr) - powerpoint not working next to bed - tv cant be turned below volume 12 (moderately loud) which was annoying as my partner wanted to sleep and I could not watch tv as was too loud - breakfast ok for a day or 2 but gets boring as same every day   Pro's  - friendly and helpful staff - good location   Overall this hotel is more like 3 star and not worth what it costs. Could (and have in past) paid half this amount and get same quality. Will…

title: Amazing Service, Location & Overall Pleasure
review: Dear Matt B,  First of all, kindly accept our most sincere apologies for the annoying concerns you rightfully pointed out. It is embarrassing but kindly rest assured that corrective actions have been taken already.  Luckily our team responded quickly and could assist you in switching room as requested... Giving us a chance to react to a situation or help you improve your overall experience is all we are asking for and i thank you for that opportunity given to do so.   The three rooms you mentioned about have all been checked and and are now back into our room inventory.Thank you very much once again.    I however found both the 2* rating and latest comments about value for money to be little severe if I may say. If you remember correctly, you did not move twice but simply once as our Front office Supervisor offered you the choice between 2 rooms that are almost next to each other (#634 & #637).  It was a good initiative and its purpose was simply to make sure you would be entirely satisfied with the switch. Our Supervisor also automatically upgraded you to Club status which meant complimentary access to our VIP lounge daily.   As for the value and Hotel rating itself (3*), i am a little puzzled about these other options you mentioned about, at half price of ours? Properties that would offer you friendly service and care (especially when you are facing unpleasant issues); properties that would offer such tranquil and serene atmosphere as well as meals and breakfast options like we do. You mentioned about the variety offered at breakfast and while other properties might opt for additional rotations (on a smaller and less qualitative selection), we chose to offer everyone the largest selection of American, Continental, Oriental, Diet & Vegetarian as well as Asian specialties there is... so to give every single guest of ours a vast array of tastes and flavors to choose from.   We are importing butter from Europe so to prepare fresh and delicious bakeries & croissants on daily basis (all bakeries and breads are in-house made). Our cold selection offers fresh Atlantic salmon (chilled), sushis & sashimis, salads and greens as well as Brie and 2 other kinds of hard and semi-hard dough cheeses imported from Europe...  Those are plated next to our cold cuts selection where again, costs are not spared and Italian salami, ham as well as chicken and smoked turkey slices are also on display. The Hot section is the one where rotations are mostly taking place, switching from fried noodles and curries to rice and other Thai dishes daily (10 dishes in total)... not forgetting the classics, such as sausages (2 kinds), beans and potatoes (English style, also rotating). To add spices, we created an Oriental corner with Vegetarian curries and Naan bread to once again please the very few guests of ours who would like a little change early in the day. If you add 4 different kinds of juices & 6 different kinds of sliced and whole fruits set on shelves, to the fact we are the only Hotel in Patong that does not charge extra for a real espresso, cappuccino or Iced tea, then it makes it i believe a very well suited breakfast to the vast majority of our patrons we are welcoming and serving daily.  We are all very sorry for all the inconveniences caused to you. We have in the past been able to turn things around if i may say and create fantastic connections and relationships with patrons following earlier disappointments... I sincerely hope you will be two of them and in future, giving us a chance to redeem ourselves and welcome you back at Grand Mercure... That is what we are hoping for and please rest assured i will be personally here to assist you, shall you change your mind and decide on visiting us once again...  Sincerely,  Sebastien

title: Wow what a beautiful Hotel
review: This is just outstanding, if you can afford a room around the pool do so, but if you cannot no problem as there are plenty of shaded or unshadeed pool beds. Best breakfast in Patong the staff are outstanding as they are in Thailand, but here they just seem to enjoy their work, they went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable. we stayed there seven nights.

title: Overall Good and would recommend!
review: Dear Q6062GOrobertf,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts after staying with us at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are pleased to hear that our caring and professional team managed to exceed your expectations in every way. In addition, it is great to learn that our Deluxe Pool Access Room made your stay even more memorable and comfortable.   Please feel free to contact us directly should you wish to recreate another memorable experience, our team will be pleased to assist you.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Treated Like ROYALTY here!
review: Room: Our room was overall pretty small but was clean and modern. Had a small balcony and we had to pay 1500 thb a night to have an extra person stay in the already small space. Everything worked well and the bed was comfortable though!  Hotel: The pools were beautiful and a great place to relax in the sun. The staff was friendly and helpful. The restaurant was average. We had very bad food poisoning on the beginning of the trip and it was either from this restaurant or the food we ate on a tour. Also, this hotel is not on the beach, but rather around 5-10 minutes walking from.  We also booked airport transportation from the hotel and it was very overpriced, would recommend not doing this.  Overall would recommend!

title: Quiet hotel in Patong
review: We booked a swim out pool room following our wedding in a nearby location. The room was conveniently located away from the main traffic areas to provide privacy and some peace and quiet in an otherwise bustling location! Our room had a comfy king size bed, a beautiful rain shower, plenty of shampoo, conditioner, soap, bath gel and toothbrushes etc and an abundance of fresh towels. The sun lounges on the deck outside the room were used daily. It was a great way to return to your room and be able to jump straight into the pool! Fabulous!

title: Awesome Hotel
review: We stayed here for 4 nights for our 2nd honeymoon as we got a good deal on expedia.The hotel is located 10 minutes walk to Patong Beach & Bangla street but far enough that it is not crowded or noisy.    A minor complaint that we have is at times we have to contact housekeeping & front desk multiple times to get our room cleaned or to get service. However, the hotel management found out about it & did their best to migitate the situation. We appreciate their gesture.   We will definitely consider coming again.

title: Wonderful Stay
review: Stay was enjoyable and perfect. Check in was a Breeze as everything in order though booked through hotels.com. Staff generally very polite and courteous, eager to assist genuinely. Room was adequate albeit small. Recommend to have pool access which was fantastic. Direct into pool outside your patio area was a blessing. Breakfast was with many selection and more than sufficient to choose from.

title: New well managed property with friendly staff and some teething problems.
review: Dear AweJames,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   I am delighted to hear you appreciated your Deluxe Pool Access Room and most of all the dedication of our staff for making your stay a memorable one.   In the meantime, we remain hopeful we will get the chance to welcome you in the the near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Worth to stay
review: New well managed property with friendly staff and some teething problems.  Pros & Cons:  1. Take the pool access rooms. Period. If in groups or on honeymoon take the pool Villas.  Rooms are just "adequate" in size.  Bathrooms have structural and design problems. Bathroom ligiting and room lighting is inadequate. Room 109 mixer is erratic Why is the towel rack on top of the loo? Bath tub glass shower screen could be longer, the tub edges need to slant inwards to stop the water from seeping all around. The lighting is very very poor The basin area needs to be re-organised.... very very tacky.  The area in front of the loo, where the phone hangs......mabe a painting or a mirror.....?  Hey no glasses in the bathroom to put my toothbrush in ....?  2. Rooms are well organised though…

title: Staff who care!
review: When arriving the hotel, greeted by friendliness hospitality with welcome drink small bites. Overall check in process was quick, handle by super helpful ground staff. He explained to us the promotion discount on the breakfast, etc then guided us to our room.   Wanted to upgrade our room but unable too due to the peak season and all room were fully booked. We were escorted by the same staff to our room and the room was great, spacious, cozy with visible bathroom! Downside of our stay was the water heater is inconsistent.  Location: was great and walking distance to Patong beach and the major restaurants and of course few mins to Bangla Street.   Swimming pool: although is small but is a great pool and it doesn't matter for us as we spent most of our time at the beaches.   Car…

title: Excellent family hotel
review: We had booked a single standard room for a week, when we were checked in to the room we noticed the room wasn't properly cleaned, missed some towels and other things. We felt unhappy with our choice. We made some comments to the staff and were then sought up by the hotel manager who met up with us and explained that they really just wanted us to be happy. They actually upgraded us to their big suite, which was very, very generous! The room was amazing, real big, perfect balcony! We couldn't ask for more. This just shows how the staff of Grand Mercure will do anything to make sure you are happy!  Pool area was nice, shadowy but of course you could find your good sunny spots.  Hotel breakfast was varied, but it seems as if they had problems with flies around the sweets.  We even…

title: An Excellent Hotel at Patong Beach
review: I have stayed at the Grand Mercure hotel Patong Beach 3 times ,it is an excellent, family friendly hotel in Patong Beach. I have been a member of the Le Club Accor loyalty program for17 years and have stayed at many properties ,the Grand Mercure Patong is the best hotel I have stayed at. The hotel is 5 star for cleanliness, the staff are so friendly and nothing ever is a problem for them . I would highly recommend the Grand Mercure Hotel Patong Beach to anyone wishing to stay at Patong Beach in Thailand. The hotel is a credit to the management and the Accor group

title: Dream holiday
review: Absolutely loved our stay ! Staff were amazing treated like royalty , also did the all day cooking class where the chef enzyne ( absolutely lovely and so fun and welcoming ) takes you out to the seafood markets and site seeing and to the rum factory ! And later on to cook some tasty treats and dinner !  The breakfast had so many different choices to choose from and also French pastries made on site by the wonderful French chef Paul ! It was also my birthday whilst we were here and I had a special cake placed in the hotel room for when we arrived back from the days travels ! We come back to Thailand every year and normally try a different hotel each time but I now believe we have found the best and will just stay here from now on !!  Thank you so much grand Mercure

title: A very good hotel
review: If you Look for an international hotel, this is the right ONE. Big, clean and full of facilities . A beautiful swimmpool ,lobby and spa . Staff is Also very kind and gentle, maybe too Young . Rooms are big ,clean and Wi-Fi Word everywhere..a Luxury but affordable hotel. Enjoy it

title: Great Service and nice hotel !!!
review: Dear Niky E,   Thank you very much for sharing your positive feedback with us!   We are delighted to learn that we were able to reach your expectations by providing you with an excellent service and with a variety of facilities.   Your comments have been shared with the rest of the team who are delighted to hear you have appreciated your stay and the bespoke service from our friendly staff.  Should you require any arrangements prior to your next visit, please contact us directly, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: 3rd Time Back and Fantastic
review: The front desk staffs are excellent and meticulous. A birthday cake and a bundle of roses were all we need for my wife's special day. Good job to all the staffs for putting in great effort to make this hotel a memorable place to stay. Angela, thanks for the hospitality for my wife. I look forward to another stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.

title: Honeymoon!
review: Arrived at the Hotel after long flight! Was welcomed with a cake with Happy Honeymoon! Room cleaned every day to a high standard. Robes and slippers and even a umbrella all provided in your room and free wifi throughout the hotel. Free safety deposit box in your room. Bubbles restaurant is really good would recommend spring rolls and carbonara pizza! You can also get room service. Wasn't so keen on their oriental night there wasn't a wide range of food! Across the road from hotel are shops and a few bars. If you go the hotel turn right and then right this takes you along to Bangla Road we loved it there it's great for nightlife! It's 200 BHT for tuk tuk instead of the drunk walk back lol. We visited Kata Beach for one day this is a lovely beach with clear water and you don't get…

title: Great Stays
review: Dear Donna W,   We would like to thank you for choosing to stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong to celebrate your honeymoon! There is nothing more encouraging than knowing you both had a memorable time with us during this special occasion!   We are delighted to learn that you both appreciated all aspects of your stay and that you enjoyed yourselves in Phuket!  Once again, congratulations on your honeymoon and please feel free to contact us directly if we can assist you with any arrangements prior to your next visit.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: NICE AND HIGH QUALITY
review: We were greeted personally by the manager and a glass of refreshing tamarind juice. The staff is so attentive and friendly. The manager noted our stay as a special couple treat holiday, then arranged us a complimentary access to Executive Lounge throughout our stay. The room was also ready with a generous fruit basket and cakes. The hotel located few mins walk from Jungceylon Mall, 5-7 mins walk to Bangla road where all the happenings and about 7-10 mins walk to the beach. Shuttle is provided to these locations. Overal is good hotel but don't expect a resort feel staying here.

title: Amazing hotel
review: We are a couple from TAIWAN. It is the 3 time that we stay at  Grand Mercure Phuket Patong. Why I come back again? Just because this hotel is NICE AND HIGH QUALITY. Especially there is a front desk lady SITA , she is so kind , service so well , we have been good friends.  When she saw me, gave me a big big smile and a good room .She also promised me,  will give me a better room when  next time. Now I know, I will be back certainly . Thank you SITA , Thank you Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.

title: Khan Battery jhang visit this hotel
review: Dear joyce283,  Thousand thanks for this 5* review and very kind comments towards Khun Sita. She is indeed doing a fantastic job in serving and making guests feeling just like at home.   I am very please your 3rd visit was yet again a memorable one and can't wait to see you both again next year.   with grand regards, Sebastien

title: nice location
review: I would say the location, right in the heart of town, but if you want to shop, good place to stay would be in central. There is only one big mall in Patong and its quite big and they sell variety of stuff, the food though are very nice, most probably everywhere in Thailand. Cheap food and good servings. Would come back here!!

title: very smart
review: Dear Litia V,   Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us on Trip Advisor!   It is such pleasure having you here with us and learning you enjoyed yourself so much! We are already looking for your return!   Please feel free to contact us directly, our team will be pleased to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Can't get any better!
review: very smart hotel, we liked everything - great professional service from helpful staff, nice facilities including big swimming pool, well design and well decorated room, and super location in the middle of patong

title: A new hotel but the service could be better....
review: Dear qiangping,  Allow me to use this opportunity to thank you for your recent stay at the resort and for providing us positive feedback!   We are delighted to hear we managed to exceed your expectations and that you appreciated every aspect of your visit!   Also, we are pleased to hear that you were well taken care of by our professional and helpful team. Kindly rest assured that your kind words have been passed to everyone here!  Should you wish to recreate another wonderful experience with us, we remain at your disposal!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: August 2016
review: Very impressed with this hotel. It is located right in the heart of Patong and close to the beach. Hotel is located on the main street and you have a great choice of pubs, clubs, restaurants and market. Basically, you will have everything within reach! For those into nightlife, you won't be disappointed!  Hotel is about 45mins from Phuket airport so please allow time for this especially those on the early flight out! The rooms are all very nice and contemporary design. The hotel has rooms on the ground floor which gives you access to the beautiful pool directly. Very handy indeed.  The kids corner was great for the kids!  Very thoughtful hotel and welcoming to see the towel elephant n the bed. Pleasant surprise!  A new and modern hotel in the heart of Patong. Perfect place for…

title: Heavenly Stay
review: It's really a blessing to stay in this gem. We stayed here for 3 nights. We were here for my birthday celebration. It was a lovely surprise arrangement from my sweetheart. Our room comes equipped with a king bed, chill-out sundeck, a bottle of white wine, free WiFi & exclusive pool access from room deck.   Staffs were very sweet and helpful. The staffs even assisted my girl to prepare a surprise birthday cake in the room that night without herself being there at all. It was so funny at first, as the moment I open the door after we came back from dinner and shopping along Patong beach, I notice there's a lovely cake served on the round glass table accompany with a bottle of Moscato. And i said to my sweetie, "Baby, it's so nice the hotel prepare us cake and Moscato". She just…

title: Definitely a hotel worth visiting with those friendly staff
review: Booked 8 rooms with them with a group of friends. Been taken care with friendly approach and nothing I can really complain about. Certainly not a 5 star hotel but sure it's close in terms of service. Maybe, I'm lucky to met some very friendly staff.  Breakfast need improvement thou. I've been very happy with them because my next check in into outrigger Laguna was close to disaster. Worth visiting again!

title: Nice hotel, but be prepared for complications at check in!
review: Dear Wonderwin,   Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts with us on Trip Advisor!   We are glad you enjoyed your stay and especially the friendliness of all our team members! We hope to have the chance to welcome you and your friends back to the resort in a very near future!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Amazing & superb Service
review: Do not book more then one room under the same reservation name. What a nightmare to check in! Took me an hour to finally get a room key (mind you this was at midnight), then me and my fiancé were given a room with two single beds. We had 7 rooms at the hotel and all family members had the same experience.   However, there were definitely some highlights;  1. Koi the Front Desk Manager kindly upgraded me and my fiancé to one of the suite rooms on the fourth night. The room was amazing with great views of the resort. Koi had also written us a note and created a male and female swan out of towels with rose petals! Was a very nice gesture!  2. Paul the Food & Beverage Manager was very accommodating and helpful. He was able to communicate effectively and assist with a smile.

title: Best Resort Hotel at Patong
review: I spent lovely days in the hotel last years during our marriage anniversary starting from 7th August , 2015   I really would like to apologize to mr. Sebastien GM of hotel who was able to change dramatically our experience as we had forgotten to write comment since that date , as I was so busy after vacation but it's big shame to me, sorry again   Really big thanks for you, I don't want to comment on first two days in hotel before I met you,   but later on after He met us in breakfast , listen to our complain, He upgrade us to amazing suite, provide special car for amazing view to celebrate our anniversary  Once we return , I will never also forgot special dinner celebration which done by Paul in very romantic manner.  Thank you Paul for your hospitality during all our days in…

title: Why the Deposit
review: Stayed at the property last week fm 28to 31 July. Generally had a nice stay except for the deposit policy. I have stayed in many hotels, boutique and chain alike. no hotel has ever ask for cash deposit that is 1/3 of the daily room rate even when the rooms are fully paid for. this is ridiculous. if this is the policy of Accor then i will never step into any of its property again. a worse thing is the front desk inform me if I choose to use the credit card as deposit, the hotel will charge the card on the spot and return the deposit on check out by reversing the charge, And I will only get back my deposit about 2 to 3 weeks later after the card company has taken a bit cut on both side of the charges. this is absolutely nonsense. Other hotels will just put the charge on the card…

title: Awsome
review: Dear Xin_zer,  Many thanks for those comments and very sorry about the frustration caused. I wish you would have simply mentioned it to me earlier, when we met at the Lounge as it is a Brand standard and and most if not all 4* and 5* throughout Thailand are applying the same procedure.   It is simply a deposit of THB 1,000 per night that is requested and we leave it up to our guests  to decide on whether or not they would prefer "blocking" the amount on their Credit card or simply deposing the amount at the Front desk cash. The later option is often picked as it means no bank transactions and guests can get their deposit back right away, upon check-out.   Anyway, i wish to ensure that we never charge our guest's credit card. We do block that particular amount simply as provision for miscellaneous charges you may have throughout your stay, like the cocktails and tapas you all enjoy at Craft for instance... The fact you left a deposit upon check-in means that you do need to carry money around and can simply sign for any bill and in any outlet (Bar, Restaurant, Ryn Spa, Tours, Tours and excursions).   I understand your surprise and i am once again very sorry for it... Please do not hesitate to email me directly next time you plan on visiting Patong...  In the meanwhile, and as discussed, please feel free to enjoy your LeClub benefits in our new properties in Singapore... I really can't wait to visit again :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: ok hotel
review: Really really Awesome.  I have been here for the 2nd time and trust me everything is just a walk away. The location of the hotel is great. Pool is Awesome although they could have a better pool for kids.   Also i am a indian muslim so halal food is available plenty outside the hotel but too bad as hotel doesn't have it so it could be a point the hotel should look into as phuket Patong beach is very famoUs with arab tourists and halal food can definitely ease our life at least for breakfast.

title: Superb 1 bedroom villa in an oasis away from the hustle and bustle of Patong!!
review: Dear Shabbir K,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! It is always a pleasure to see happy guests returning to our property and we already look forward to your 3rd visit next year.   As for Hallal and food variety, i am a little surprised by your comments as we have been working on improving this particular aspect of our cuisine for the last 18 months. I am really sorry about that as we all understand how important it is, whether talking about Hallal food for our Muslim guests, vegetarian dishes for a few of our Indian customers or any other diet that might be requested.   I would think it comes down to a communication issue as we do provide Hallal food and meats on all levels. Our Chicken is supplied by the largest Thai corporation called CP. This company is Hallal certified and known around Thailand for being the first and still, only major supplier with such affiliation.  Our Beef is coming from Australia and our Lamb, from New Zealand, and both are also Hallal certified.   As you know well, Hallal is not only about the product itself, but the process and once again, we have followed special training courses here at the Hotel, with Phuket Islamic Institute. We have Muslim cooks and a dedicated set of kitchenware as well.   Please rest assured that we will brief the team once again and "advertised" Hallal dishes on both menus and breakfast buffet counters... so to re-insure all our Muslim guests in future.   Many thanks and wishing you and your loved ones a wonderful week! Sebastien

title: Great fun hotel
review: The hotel is nice, well located, nice rooms. But, I was expecting for more. The stuff are freindly but not always professional, Reception stuff not always good with English. The hotel is crowded and the feeling in the public areas (Lobby, Bar, Pool, ...) is not relaxing at all. The room are good and comfortable. brealfast is very good too.

title: Well relaxing...
review: We had a really relaxing time at the Grand Mercure hotel in Phuket. Rooms were nice and tidy and the location was right in the centre but still very peaceful. Breakfast was good, swimming pool looked good just did not have time to experience it. I definitely recommend this hotel for Nightlife and resting.

title: Great hotel, friendly staff
review: Dear Suresh T,   Many thanks for taking the time to review the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We are pleased to read you enjoyed the cleanliness of the room, the central location and the breakfast selection. Your feedback will serve as a great encouragement to all our staff who work hard to satisfy guests need!   Please feel free to contact us directly should you wish to recreate another relaxing experience, our team will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Second stay was amazing!
review: Stayed here 5 days, clean room, nice pool, excellent breakfast, and very friendly staff. Only smiles. The only improvement I can think about is that it takes too long to get a capucino at breakfast. The location is very good to get to the beach, or to bangla road, both are easily within walking distance.

title: Nice Pool. great service, good location.
review: Dear Ferd S,   Thank you for taking the time to write about our property!  I am glad to learn that your stay was a comfortable one. Moreover, I would like to thank you for all the positive comments you had given to our hotel on the areas such as the  room cleanliness, the great breakfast you had and most of all the friendliness of our staff!   We will be more than happy to serve you again in the future, should you need any assistance prior to your return, please feel free to contact us directly.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Awesome holiday!
review: My second stay at the Grand Mercure phuket; first time with my family a few years back and now with my boyfriend was very relaxing.. A perfect mix of hotel and resort, that was also affordable is what ticked the box for me for my boyfriends first stay in Thailand! All the rooms face the pool and offer a balcony, despite it being the cheapest room, which was very pleasant. This allowed us to have a cheeky smoke on the balcony too. Will definitely be back :)

title: Two bedroom pool villa in Patong - exceeded my expectations!
review: We were two young families holidaying get together, and after five nights in Khao Lak we spent two nights in Patong. We shared the two bedroom pool villa at Grand Mercure.   Upon arriving at the hotel, I was impressed with the reception area, and how friendly the reception staff were. Cold drinks, wet towels, and a delicious profiterole-like pastry were immediately provided to us as we were checking in. And then the assistant manager, Sumontha, came and greeted us. She noticed that we had three young children and we had requested to check out at 6.30pm on departure date due to late flight home, she offered to waive the original 50% room charge for the late check out. How nice was that! It was a really nice gesture on her part, and left us with a really good impression of the…

title: Nice Hotel, Great Location, Friendly Staff
review: Dear LoveToTravel1010,   Thousand thanks for this wonderful and very detailed review on our resort!  It is an absolute pleasure to hear of your beyond expectations experience. I am glad our team was able to deliver an above and beyond service to you!   We cannot express our appreciation enough for the excellent service that you have pointed out above. Please rest assured that your kind words have been conveyed to our wonderful staff and Sumontha accordingly.  Should there be anything we can assist regarding your next stay with us, please do not hesitate to contact us directly!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Love pool access
review: Stayed at the Grand Mercure between 18th and 22nd July 2016 with family. Thoroughly enjoyed the hotel facilities and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Personally really liked the location although it is about a 5 minute drive from Patong Beach. I thought that was a positive as you are not in the thick of the Patong Beach madness 24/7 and have an opportunity to get some quiet time when u feel like it.  In front of thebhotel there is a market which offers quick bites, bars and the usually small shops with knick-knacks.  The rooms on the pool side have direct pool access and that is a positive if younare looking for a lot of time in the pool. As we had a lot of tours planned, we had not taken these rooms as we were not in the hotel much.  Otherwise the facilities are…

title: Patong's Precious Pearl!
review: Dear RehmatHasnie,   Thank you very much for your kind words and feedback about your recent stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   I am truly flattered to learn that your experience was a comfortable one. Moreover, I would like to thank you for some rather positive comments you had given to our hotel on the areas such as the hotel facilities, the professionalism of our staff and the proximity to shopping areas and the beach!  We hope to have the opportunity to serving you again in the near future!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great Hotel
review: It was a great stay, great location. Pool access was amazing.  Gym was really good too. The rooms are a little small as reviewed and I think they need better happy hours at the pool bar!  Overall a pretty good stay :-)

title: Nice room
review: We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights and we enjoyed it. They checked us in prior the checking in time and all the staffs are very welcoming! 😉 we enjoyed their breakfast, wide range of food and very attentive filling up my coffee every time my cup is empty! :) We can recommend :)

title: Experience Luxury in Phuket
review: Dear jayson d,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us!   We are pleased to read that you enjoyed our bespoke service and the variety of food served during the breakfast at the Bubbles Restaurant!    The team is looking forward welcoming you back at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Wonderful hotel but should add more to breakfast
review: Amaze in the hotel structure and design! I have experience Luxury in Phuket. Room is big enough for 2. view was fantastic, pool was nice. almost perfect vacation the only thing it not pleasant to me is the aircon during the night. Seems to be need to increase the temperature of the aircon but its a centralize. I was hoping to attend to my complaint or just trasfer us to another room but it did not happen

title: Simple and clean
review: My husband and i are staying in this hotel in room 635 for our first anniversary,its a beautiful hotel,staff friendly,very clean,we are simply having the time of our lives in it, my only problem is the breakfast,as a muslim its very difficult to find something to eat,ive been having the same breakfast for 4 days now,my choices as an arab muslim is very limited,i just hope that the hotel takes this into consideration and add up some more items to their buffet. Even with this small problem id definetly come back to this amazing hotel whenever i come to phuket

title: Fantastic four days
review: Dear HM H,   First of all, allow me to thank you for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   The team is honored to read that you and your husband had the time of your lives with us! It is delighting to see that you enjoyed the hotel and our friendly team so much.   We would like to thank you as well for your feedback regarding the breakfast selection. Please rest assured that our Chef is working at the moment on improving the selection and in adding few dishes. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused to you.   Please feel free to contact us directly prior to your next visit, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Mini Break In Beautiful Private Villa with plunge pool
review: Check in was very smooth and easy and while we waited for our room to be ready we we had a couples Thai "Sleep " massage. My husband and i felt so relaxed and calm afterwards we were so happy with the type of massage and the pressure used by the therapists at the Day spa. We were then shown to our private villa with plunge pool via buggy as the villas are behind the hotel rooms , we have a fruit platter on arrival and then in the evening were delivered some fruit juice with cupcakes and traditional thai sweets which was a very nice touch. We had a huge bathroom and loved the villa layout and style of room. Perfectly decorated and great location in Phuket. Only downside i have to comment on is the mosquitoes situation around our pool villa ( this couldn't be avoided even with bug…

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear Raemike,  Allow me to thank you for your kind words and for taking the time to write a review on your experience at our resort!   I am really glad to hear that you have been enjoying your Pool Villa and the hotel facilities. What a delight to read also that our Ryn Spa met your expectations!   Please rest assured we are conducting weekly spray through the resort for the mosquitoes but with the high humidity level and the raining season it is sometimes a challenge to keep them away. Though, we are happy to see that the little inconvenience caused did not alter your overall stay much.  Once again, thank you for your valuable comments and we look forward to having the chance to welcoming you back!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great location, great food. Overall very pleasant stay
review: Best place ever really great hotel, clean,friendly staff i camed for honeymoon with my wife and it was amazing  Breakfast was very good and tasty and the location of the hotel the middle of the souks so you can walk for 5 min and do shopping  I will come back for sure again.

title: Ok-ish
review: Dear rodrigue l,  I would like to express my sincere gratitude for having chosen to stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for your Honeymoon!   We are so delighted to read that you had a fantastic experience with us and especially enjoyed our location. Having such positive feedback keeps motivating the team to reach the guest satisfaction and expectations.  We are excited about your return and remain at your service should you require any special arrangements on your next visit.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Fantastic Hotel.. 5 Stars
review: This hotel is located at the heart of Phuket. With just a 5 minute walking distance from the famous Patong beach, you do not need to get taxi (Tuk-Tuk) rides to get to places. Clean and good rooms. Pool is nothing special but then again we weren't there to just chill at the pool. Food is amazing. Breakfast is to die for and so are their buffets for different events. If it were up to I would eat at the hotel all day long. YUM! Also very friendly staff.

title: Beautiful People, Amazing Place
review: Had the most amazing friendly service from Pimtip, nothing was to hard for her. The room was clean, modern, looking out over the pool. Buffet breakfast, from western food & asian was awesome. Central located from walking distance to Patong Beach & market stalls. Beautiful experience, highly recommend .

title: Stunning hotel
review: Dear Dean B,   Allow me to thank you for sharing such kind feedback regarding your recent experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are thrilled to hear that you had a beautiful experience at the resort and you enjoyed the hospitality provided by our staff, rest assured that we will pass on your warmest regards to Pimtip.  Please do not hesitate to contact us directly for your next trip, we will be happy to assist you with the arrangements!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Beautiful resort close to all the action.
review: We stayed here 2 nights everything was fantastic the pool area is very nice and clean the breakfast buffet had an endless choice the staff were professional and the hotel grounds were beautify presented the the rooms are nice but are more of a 4 star than a 5 if the hotel can add a few finishing touches they would be perfect however do not let this put you off as the hotel is fantastic and centrally located.

title: Simply Amazing!
review: Dear Brad380,  Thank you very much for letting us know your thoughts on your most recent stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are glad to learn you found our resort in almost every aspect to be fantastic. It is a great pleasure to see that you enjoyed your stay and our facilities.  I would also like to express my gratitude for your feedback on our rooms. Your comment has been noted and will be used to improve this area accordingly.  Lastly, we are all looking forward to welcoming you back to the resort in near future.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Luxurious Oasis in Patong
review: Wonderful resort, extremely friendly staff, beautiful decor, excellent pool, beautiful rooms, amazing food. Wonderful greet with cold towel, beautiful fresh juice and two tiny eclair's. Miss Khemmaporn Rattanaphak checked us in and out, she was so sweet and helpful and did all she could to make us happy, very warm and friendly offering her assistance at any time we neede it. The bar pool was fabulous with good music and a great selection of cocktails at a very reasonable price along with food. The toiletries products were of great quality and we were greeted by animals made from the bath towels along with fresh lychees everyday.

title: Wonderful stay & great staff
review: 2 nights stay at Grand Mercure with my best friend and not the first time. I always get whatever i request before arrival. Reception staff can also recognize us and  treat us so special. The welcome fruit basket with a bouquet of white rose in the room made us feel so Wow ! Definitely return again soon :)

title: excellent hotel
review: Dear Carmel B,  Thank you so much for this wonderful review and for your loyalty towards our resort!   It's our pleasure to welcome you at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we thank you for letting us know that our staff made your stay with us, a delightful experience.  We are all looking forward to welcome you again in the near future :)   With Grand Rergards, Valentine

title: Akash
review: It has been an amazing experience over here. The room service and everything was excellent. you must have a night stay over here to have a amazing experience of this hotel. I would like to specially mention Mr. Sarayud  to help us out. The facilites are mind blowing.

title: Consistently exceeded expectations
review: Dear Mansi A,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! We are all really happy to see that you are having a wonderful experience in our Pool Villa and I will surely thank Mr. Sarayud for his friendliness and attentiveness!  Enjoy the rest of your vacation. With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Average hotel
review: Great hotel and great person . Mr Sarayud is excellent service level . Must come here for a stay when you are traveling to Phuket . They have given complimentary breakfast as a goodwill gesture . It has been an amazing experience over here. We enjoyed a lot. Thank you.

title: Comfy hotel and full of thai sense
