review: It was my first time visiting thailand,phuket. It was amazing and full of adventure. I really enjoyed spending time here. The facilities that has been offered are really good. The hotel is very nice and chic and full of sense of thai life. Swimming into the pool everyday makes your body fresh. if you get lucky, sometimes it is also raining which makes it more relaxing intor the water. The staff are really polite and friendly and more importantly caring for passengers. I am already thinking of planning another trip to phuket next year.

title: Hotel with a great pool and view
review: Dear minagholami,   Many thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us!  We are delighted to hear that you have decided to stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for your first time in Thailand and it is wonderful to know that your time with us was a comfortable one and that you enjoyed our warm and caring service. Your kind words are greatly appreciated by all our staff.   Please contact us directly to arrange your next stay with us; we are looking forward to your return next year!   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Disappointing
review: Stayed there for 4 nights and must say that it is a hotel with great staff with friendly customer service. The rooms mostly overlook the pool and the beautiful mountains. The hotel is a few minutes walking from the hotspots of Phuket like the walking street, patong beach, jungcelon mall and the shopping district. The pool villas are amazing with private access to the pool whic has a great bar also the lobby area has a pool table with bar that has great offers on beers. Overall a highly recommended place to stay in phuket.

title: Impressed
review: Dear Sreyasi S,  Thank you so much for this fantastic review!   I am thrilled to read how much you enjoyed your recent stay at our property.  Please be ensured that your lovely feedback has been shared with our teams and we are all looking forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very nice hotel with friendly staff
review: If you book make sure it's online. we added a couple of nights to our original stay and made the mistake of paying at reception. It was meant to have breakfast but they tried to add this cost. Very deceitful staff won't deal direct with them for booking again.

title: Lovely Modern hotel
review: I stayed in this hotel for 9 nights for my birthday. On arrival we were greeted with a drink and small sweet treat, check in was pretty quick and thestaff are very polite and friendly.  The hotel is clean and modern with a room cleaning service everyday. The lobby and pool area is very nice to chill and eat food. I was given a lovely chocolate cake for free on my birthday which was very nice. The staff are very helpful and the hotel food is nice but a little pricey. The cocktails around the poolside were lovely and breakfast was ok there is a reasonable variety of stuff to eat. The hotel is situated in a good location 5 minutes away from the madness of Phuket.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Decent location with friendly staff
review: Dear Hotgem81,   Thank you for sharing such a nice review about your recent stay at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   I am pleased to learn that you had a wonderful experience with us. It is an honour to read your review and the team is thrilled to hear that their efforts in delivering delightful guest experiences have been duly recognised.   We look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future!  With Grand Regards,  Valentine

title: Simply amazing...
review: We stayed here last week. Has a good swimming pool and giant screens for watching soccer. The rooms are pretty well maintained and the staff were very helpful. Has a good Indian restaurant just outside the hotel.

title: Even if it rains, it's still where you want to be
review: Dear Danny A,  Thank you for taking time to share your experience with us!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your compliments about the hotel facilities and staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Extremely Rude Staff ......Hospitality Zero  !!
review: This hotel is exactly the one you can call home away from home. It is always great to see when the team put so much effort to their jobs. Big thank you to all the staff and management that made our stay more than just memorable. Will definitely come back!

title: Lovely hotel central location
review: We stayed here for 4 nights in a pool access room. The room itself was nice but quite small so it wasn't easy to store luggage. The small deck with deckchairs and pool access was great. The room we had was in a quiet area of the pool which didn't seem to get much direct sun so it tended to be a bit damp. It was also a bit  difficult to get a comfortable temperature on the air conditioning.  Overall service from the staff was very good, they were very helpful and accommodating. We found the food to be nice, we had breakfast and a set 5 course dinner included with our accommodation package and enjoyed these. The room service meals were nice, well presented and we thought very affordable.  The day spa was also very pleasant with lovely staff. We had free wifi in the hotel but this…

title: Not what TripAdvisor recommended!
review: Dear mmjtravel,  Thank you so much for your detailed review and 4* rating!  Glad to hear you enjoyed your overall stay and in particular the service provided at the resort.   We truly appreciate your feedback and please rest assured that we will investigate each matter with the respective department to further enhance our services. Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience that we caused.   When your plans bring you back to Phuket, please let us know, we would be pleased to assist you with the necessary arrangements.   With Grand Regards Valentine

title: Great hotel in the heart of Patong
review: Hello I stayed here for 3 nights with my family just last week and had booked this place purely because of the fabulous reviews on TripAdvisor about its breakfast buffet and the new 5 star property in Patong. Well, this review is purely subjective. Our check in was great, the front desk is so polite and welcoming. I don't remember all of their names but you guys are doing an amazing job!!  The rooms were smallish but that was already mentioned on their website and I am not complaining about that. The decor is modern and comfortable. Housekeeping is not efficient.  The pool is small but it's great for amateur swimmers like me hehe  The location is fine, it's in the middle of the market and very accessible.   The breakfast buffet seems huge and it is as there are ample varieties…

title: Great hotel, service and rooms
review: Dear Devyani S,  Thank you for your comment regarding the excellent service provided to you by our Front Office team.   We also appreciate your feedback and constructive comment on our breakfast. Please note that I have shared your comment about the quality of vegetarian dishes to our chef and we will work on the improvement especially in adding few dishes, adjusting the ingredients and do a new rotation in our breakfast.  Please rest assured we are trying to accommodate Halal, Asian, Oriental and European requirements  in order to satisfy our guest as much as possible. Once again thank you for your 4* star rating and it was certainly a pleasure for us to be at your service and we all look forward to welcoming you again!  With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Mostly enjoyable stay
review: A really great hotel in the heart of Patong, within walking distance of Bangla road and many great restaurants and local markets.   The lobby really set the right first impression, its really aesthetically appealing and nice to relax in. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful particularly the girls on reception. The rooms are really clean and well maintained and the bed extremely comfortable. The housecleaning system is brilliant and organised, you can use an an in room system that lets housekeeping know you want your room cleaned.  We had the bed and breakfast package and the we thoroughly enjoyed the breakfast which offers a traditional Thai breakfast as well as continental and even a few Indian dishes, it really caters for a wide variety of travelers. There's also a…

title: More like a 4 star hotel
review: We stayed for 5 nights at the Grand Mercure in Patong. It was an OK experience, nothing special. The location was good and the service was generally good. The room was small! They have an amazing coffee shop near the lobby, a must try. We score the hotel a 4 out of 5! It feels more like a 4 star hotel.

title: Exellent Hotel in Patong
review: Dear nadhemjf,  Thank you for your recent stay at our property and for taking your valuable time to share your experience. We are happy that you were satisfied with your overall stay and that you enjoyed our Chou Chou Deli Shop so much!  If your travels bring you back to Phuket, please feel free to contact us directly to give us the opportunity to better serve you. With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Great hotel!
review: This was my second stay at the Grand Mercure Hotel at Patong Beach. Having been a member of Accor Advantage Plus for 17 years  I would have to rate the Grand Mercure Hotel Patong as the best hotel that I have stayed at. The service at the hotel was five star, as was the food served in the restaurant. I would highly recommend the Grand Mercure Patong Beach to anyone visiting Patong.

title: An Enjoyable Stay!
review: Dear Christopher B,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review and your 5* rating!  First of all, I would like to thank you for your loyalty and trust in our hospitality, it is very valuable to us.  What a pleasure to know that you were highly satisfied with our service and facilities! Your comments will definitely serve as a great encouragement to our team members.  We are looking forward to have the pleasure of welcoming you for your third visit at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong! With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Very good hotel resort in Patong
review: This hotel was great! My friend & I stayed here for 4 nights and upgraded to have the pool room. Definitely worth it!  The morning tea is great! The rooms are a little small to store baggage, but the pools, restaurant & spa made up for it. Service was exceptional.

title: not bad but also not good
review: good hotel in Thailand , we stayed 2 nights in bedroom with non accec to pool ,When I first arrived at this hotel, I was totally lost in the view from the lobby,The hotel has great design, very helpful staff and friendly , but non upgred as always i had from others hotel but any way was nice time

title: A TRUE FIVE STAR EXPERIENCE!
review: Dear ZAMIL A, Thank you very much for sharing your experience at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!   We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the friendliness of our staff and the contemporary design of the resort.  Please accept our profound apologies for the disappointment you had experienced concerning the room upgrade as a Platinum Member. We hope you will give us another chance to welcome you back and please feel free to contact us directly to secure an upgrade prior to your arrival.   With Grand Regards, Valentine

title: Wonderful Resort yet horrible check-out
review: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights June 2016. The hotel itself is beautiful, the pool is unique and expansive, the pool villa suite was superb.   The manager "Koi" did everything under the sun to make sure our stay was pleasant. We originally had a complaint about our room, from that point we were switched, upgraded, and treated with the highest form of customer service throughout our stay. They checked in several times to make sure we were happy.   We have stayed at many 5 stars in the past and this experience was way up there with the best. Thank you for making our stay a memorable one!

title: Great resort in good location
review: Dear vegamin,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share this wonderful review with us!  Your comments are very rewarding and it gets us motivated to further enhance the guest experiences.  We are pleased to see that both the facilities and the service provided made an impact on your stay and will surely take this opportunity to thank Koi for her friendliness and professionalism.  Looking forward to your next stay and please do let us know how we can be of any assistance for future bookings or arrangements. With Grand regards, Valentine

title: Well run hotel with excellent staff and great location.
review: Really enjoyed the resort the rooms were very nice. My partner and I had room with pool access and it was so serene. We also used the spa twice it was the best we experienced as we tried several in area. The entire time at resort was great we had the seafood buffet on Friday which I highly recommend and breakast buffet daily. The downside of our trip is when we checked out being charged twice for transfer pickup. I paid the room deposit in cash and was also asked to pay for our transfer from airport. The receptionist took my deposit and transfer fee for ride but only put in the deposit. I should of received a receipt from her but only received receipt for deposit. I advise guest to make sure you get receipt for every cash transaction as hotel manager told me I can go to court to…

title: House keeping must work extra
review: Me and my family finally stayed at this hotel for 2 nights, the building is new and the design is fresh. The room itself is very spacious and clean. Some minor thing about the room is the toilet sprayer, it supposed to be design for majority people (right-handed), in fact our toilet sprayer was designed for left-handed.  One other minor thing that become an issue is the lobby restroom, I happened to use the restroom, and what I found is big donuts sitting inside the toilet bowl without being flushed by the user/housekeeping. It ruins all my appetite for the whole day. About this hotel location, I think it is perfect, there are plenty of seafood restaurant just in front of the hotel, and this hotel offers good deal for the seafood buffet!

title: Relaxing stay
review: Dear Alvin A,  Thank you very much for your comments and few minutes taken in sharing your experience at our property. I am very pleased to hear about our location and service overall and wanted to reassure you that comments given about Hotel's lobby and restrooms are being looked at now. It must have very much spoiled your mood and i am really sorry about it.   Many thanks again and looking forward to welcoming you back next year! Sebastien

title: Great hotel, rude manager
review: Didn't know what to expect but loved it from the minute we arrive. Quiet, relaxing  and located in a great location. We booked a private pool villa and it was excellent. Staff were excellent and wou,d stay again in a heartbeat !

title: Great hotel, nice service....
review: Dear Grid5861,  Many thanks for this wonderful!  We are all very much looking forward to your return next year :) Sebastien

title: Pure Bliss
review: The Hotel is super nice, clean, big.. Rooms are medium size, pool nice but closes at 7. It would be nice if they delay the closure time till 9 or 10.. The spa is excellent.. The welcoming staff is very friendly and the housekeeping crew very gentle and respectful.. However, one of the manager named Nopporn was rude and disrespectful in his attitude with us.. We requested a late check out and he refused to give us at first and then he replied to us in a very aggressive way.. Overall, our stay was pleasant except for this unfortunate accident..

title: Nice
review: Really nice hotel, we were extremely pleased with all aspects, the staff on arrival were very welcoming and efficient with check-in, throughout our stay they were helpful whenever we needed anything. Our room was nice and new with a good view. Swimming pool was amazing!

title: A perfect stay...
review: I took a short break with a friend and decided to fly last minute to Phuket.   Grand Mercure facilities are very well looked after and service is spotless. Perfectly located and walking distance from major attractions from Patong.   Chou-Chou cafe is a great spot for a coffee in the morning and F&B in general was very good. Will definitely come back.

title: High rising Hotel with Equally high rising service
review: Dear Idracab31,  Many thanks for choosing our property for that very short break. We are welcoming a lot more last minute requests from guests living in KL, Bangkok or Singapore and it is a great feeling to see guests leaving us rested and relaxed, after only a night or two with us.   Very happy to hear you enjoyed our bakeries and coffees at Chouchou too, that's great!  Many thanks and looking forward to your next visit to Patong. Sebastien

title: Holiday
review: The multi storey building surrounds a bright blue pool welcoming guests as they enter the premises. The receptionists are neatly dressed in tasteful uniforms.  Their friendly approach to guest makes one feel immediately welcome.  We were escorted to our room by the receptionist who checked us in. She explained everything to us and left us again with a friendly farewell greeting. The concierge at the front reception is most efficient and helpful.  They will call you a taxi, do a booking for a show or just assist with general enquiries.  And as service fees are included in the room rates, there is no expectation for gratuities so often found at other hotels. Overall the hotel is centrally located with easy access to the main street, main market as well as the main beach.  It is…

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: Dear Douw W,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. Very pleased to see you both had a very pleasant stay with us and we all hope to see you again back at Grand Mercure very soon.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great hotel
review: Everything's great, they upgraded us to the Pool Access and the pool is lush just on step from our room.  Staff are very friendly and always smile.  Seafood buffet was very good, Seb the General Manager came to us and explained to me about where the food was coming from etc, our oysters arrived from France on the day and they served us fresh!  Just one thing, I think the rooms should have beach bag provided for the guests day out to the beach etc and perhaps you can consider about it :-)  Definitely coming back again!

title: The Place to go in Phuket!
review: It is my first time in a Grand Mercure Hotel and we will remember it!  I stayed in the Deluxe room with Pool access which was absolutely fantastic with its semi-private pool. I really love the room with direct door terrace to the pool.  Food selection was great with wide buffet breakfast and seafood BBQ at night you can enjoy nearby the pool.  Excellent customer service provided by the teams especially at the Front Desk/Bellboys, at Pool Bar as well as the Bar located near the lobby area with its amazing mango mojito! With continuous smiles, staff always offers assistance. The hotel is also well appointed and very clean. I definitely recommend Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and would definitely stay there again!

title: True 5 star
review: We stayed from 1st may until 8 may 2016.hmm what can i say about this amazing hotel?! After we reserved the hotel i sent an email and informed them that its our anniversary trip. Mr chino the front desk manager great us and he even offered 50% discount for a pool access room. Checkin was very quick and after we enter the room we saw a lovley cake and and special bed makeup.. in the  morning i went to front desk to say my thanks personaly to mr chino but it seems like he was very busy to see us! Pool was very clean and relaxing we enjoyed that alot. Breakfast was great too. The most important thing was the waitresses and people in front desk: they are very very helpful and always smiling.i want to thank mr paul. And special thank to mis KOI. she was very lovely and helpful

title: Great Choice
review: My husband and I are so please we chose to stay at this property during our stay in Patong. It was close to the action yet quiet and luxurious. You could walk almost everywhere.   We had a room on the first floor and it was spacious. Loved the amenities (although the shower gel portions are barely enough for one person to use lol). The staff was very helpful and always smiling.   We visited Patong Beach (5-7) minute walk, but it was filthy. Plastic floating in the water and the water was very brown so we headed back to the hotel pool and enjoyed a nice swim.   I have a very sensitive stomach and experienced upset most of our trip do we ate at the onsite restaurant the entire time and it was delicious.   After this stay I will be seeking out other Grand Mercure properties. I was…

title: Great location and service
review: Dear Tonya R,  Many thanks for this wonderful 5* review and great comments about both our location, service quality and also our cuisine at Bubbles restaurant.   Always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves so much and i thank you once again for the time taken in sharing your experience with us all.  See you again soon... Sebastien

title: Great Hotel...good service and fantastic location
review: We stayed here for 5 nights at the start of our recent trip to Phuket.   The hotel is overal very nice, the rooms were nice, spacious, modern and had good bathroom amenties.   The pool area was very pleasant and relaxing with plenty of sunloungers and a good selection of cocktails and specialised draft beers.  The staff were helpful and friendly.   The breakfast was varied and good with a selection of thai, western and Live cooking stations. Even when busy the staff were attentive and served you with a smile.   The gym was adequate, small but with modern equipment.   We went to the onsite bakery a few times which again was quiet and the food was lovely.   The location is fine with a few local cafes, markets stalls and pubs literally across the road but within 10 minutes walk you…

title: Feel Bad // So sad
review: I stayed here for 3 nights for business. Room and staff at front desk very good. I just feel bad on last night at the bar. I had meeting with friend at the bar. We order some drink but staff said bar close.(that time 10:45 PM.) We sit there about 10 mins after that had 4 guys walk and sit at the bar beside our desk. They ordered some beer and cocktail and no problem at all. They can drank. We try to ask lady waitress but no one came our desk.  It's terrible. We said with someone at front desk. They said very sorry. 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

title: I was on Holiday for my son's wedding!
review: Dear B8778PHpauls,  Many thanks for this 4* review and comments made about our Bar service team and closing time. It was an unfortunate misunderstanding and i am really sorry for the disappointment caused...  Please kindly contact us directly next year, ahead of your second visit. I will be more than happy to have a few Beers & cocktails prepared upon your arrival at our Resort.   Once again, thank you for the feedback and see you back at Grand MErcure very soon... Sebastien

title: Poor breakfast service
review: I only spent 3 x nights at the Grand Mercure, not enough time there, excellent, excellent, excellent. The Buffet Breakfast was beautiful, staff were very gracious, never had to ask for a cup of coffee. The boys working at the Bounce Bar were fantastic, so happy & cheerful, you could tell that they enjoyed working there. Rooms were a good size, just need a few more power points in other areas, some were hard to get to. Overall just beautiful.

title: A grand stay
review: My little girl and I went for the morning breakfast and was shown a table by the crew. After getting our food items, we came back to the table to find that it was occupied by a Chinese couple.  I approached the staff about this situation and requested for another table. Instead of being apologetic for causing my inconvenience,  I was given a frustrated look, like I'm the one causing the trouble. I was then shown to a table which was not set up, or cleaned properly. There were no cups, knifes, napkins... What kind of shabby service is this? I'm dissatisfied and disappointed with the type of service that lacks professionalism. Totally out of expectations. A simple, I'm sorry this happened, and please let me show you to another table would have been most welcomed by any guests that…

title: Excellent hotel for all budgets
review: Right from the location, the hotel has a lot of positives. A great variety of rooms available at decent prices. Rooms have all the basic ameneties. Hotel staff is courtious.Breakfast buffet is good. Hygine standards are upto mark.

title: Best for phuket!
review: If you're coming to phuket to enjoy the nightlife, the clubs and the walking street, this is the best place to stay. Its 10 mins walking distance from the place where all the action is. Sure there are other options which are closer but we chose this one as reviews were better for this one, which was totally right.

title: Vacation
review: Dear Kshitij T,  Thank you very much for this wonderful 5* review...  We are very pleased you could find us and hopefully your recommendation will also help others choosing Grand Mercure for their coming holidays on the island.   Many thanks and see you again very soon... Sebastien

title: What an amazing time!
review: Stayed at Grand Mecure. .clean rooms, staff could do enough for us.  Stayed on 7th floor room 710 with a balcony..get the breeze in afternoons over looking pool up towards hills..Most other rooms apart from Suites have juillet balconies..Food was amazing buffet breakfast and seafood night..

title: Best hotel in Phuket!
review: Dear Cyclonetraceypng,  Many thanks for this amazing review and 5* rating.  Always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves and experiencing our Seafood selection and buffet too.   Looking forward to your return in 2017! Sebastien

title: Great Hotel
review: My first time in a Grand Mercure Hotel and i will always remember it. We stayed for 4 nights and everything was great. Location in the heart of Patong and everyone knows the Hotel close to everything. I also received a welcome letter signed by the manager himself. Staff was very helpful. Everything you can expect from a 5 star Hotel great rooms ( we took rooms in the 5th floor) spacious very good A/C which is extremely important in such conditions (around 38 degrees during days) spacious restaurant fitness center, massage available in the room. Breakfast is sublime very large variety and taste very good. Nice swimming pool as well. The hotel also contains a very good restaurant that we didn't try and a bakery store. For families or couples i would definitely suggest a room with…

title: a resort in town
review: Dear Georges M,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay so much.  I will certainly pass on your warmest regards to Front desk and breakfast teams too.  As for the late check-out and you correctly mentioned, we do our very best and show great flexibility, especially to prefered members like yourself, but the high occupancy we are enjoying since CHinese NEw Year now has made things a little more complicated i have to say. Please do not hesitate to contact any of us directly next year, ahead of your second trip, as i would be glad to help and assist in making such arrangement possible, well ahead of departure date.   Once again, thank you very much for this 5* rating!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Dinner..
review: i chose this place because of the limited time we had and still wanted a resort feel yet still be in town and i am happy this is the perfect resort. the breakfast choices are quite a selection and the restaurants are just as good too! i loved the fact that the resort was still in town yet away from the noise. plenty of food choices across the hotel as well. and less than 10 mins walk to the beach and 10 mins walk to the mall. pool is spacious , rooms are huge and clean. the staff are friendly they always great you with a smile! i would defintely recommend this hotel!

title: Best holiday
review: Dear emmy91,  Thank you very much for this great review and 5* rating.  It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves so much and we all look forward to welcoming you back next year again!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: The Must stay hotel in phuket
review: Grand seafood Barbecue ever Friday.  The best seafood buffet I never has for long time, BBQ seafood, cold seafood, sushi, salad, smoke salmon, ham, cheese, bread,Thai food, BBQ beef and all the sweet deserve am...... So delicious  And all stuff nice and kindly good services. we will be back for sure, we love it.   And also thank you agency "Phuket Dream" for recommending me in to the Grand Mercure Phuket, Thank you 😘😘

title: What a great place to stay
review: Excellent ..... Customer service outstanding - the room was fantastic was very clean -  fast wifi and always working - pool and swim up bar amazing - walking distance to the beach ... Would definitely stay there again .... ......Loved it!!!!

title: Impressive hotel with good service
review: Dear TraceySloss,  A thousand thanks for this short yet superb review of our Resort! We are all looking forward to welcoming you back again...  Sebastien

title: RELAX and switch off.
review: We spent 5 nights here in connection with a conference.  Arrived at Phuket Airport from which we had a car arranged with the hotel.  But, after waiting an hour, the car had still not arrived.  Calls to the hotel, and a car was sent. But then as soon as we set foot in the foyer, they could not have been nicer.  They apologised profusely and then gave us an upgrade to a two bedroomed villa.  I didn't complain or ask for it...so it was a great result. Throughout the stay, the staff were personable and attentive.  Our conference food and drink was excellent.  The canapés at the cocktail party were so imaginative.  The snacks at break out time, as well as the gala dinner - all beautiful, tasty and served well. Another 'apology' bowl of fruit arrived mid week. The hotel is on a tight…

title: Hotel Lobby badly needs air conditioning!
review: Dear charteredlossadjuste,  Thank you very much for this amazing review and 5* rating of our property.  I am very pleased we could make it happen, despite the airport transfer mishap and rest assured we have since then reviewed our procedure when it comes to communicating with drivers and third party bookers.  It was great welcoming you and your colleagues for this 2-day seminar too and hopefully, we will have a chance to accomodate you all once again in 2017, whether for a meeting or family holidays this time.   Once again, thank you very much! Sebastien

title: Home away from home
review: I stayed here for 1 week solo and it was fantastic, from check in to check out nothing was a drama nor a hassle for the super friendly staff who always waved or said hello in passing. I had a a nice room on level 3 overlooking the pool which was to die for. The buffet breakfast was average but still had heaps of choice, happy hr was available in the afternoon and a coffee shop was on deck too. A nice big sun baking area around the pool felt semi tropical. The rooms were great with a nice little balcony, the ensuite had a great big walk in shower. Bedding and linen was nice and complimentary water each day was given. Within walking distance to beaches, shops and restaurants.

title: A resort hotel with clean and well furnished room, plus a great breakfast
review: We got a very conveniently located room, near lobby, pool, restaurant and conference room (we were there for a conference). The room is spacious with comfy bed, fridge and all the things you may need.  The location is not very strategic. Hard Rock cafe is about 5 minutes walk, Jungceylon Mall is about 12-15 minutes walk, the nearest point of Patong beach would take you about 20 minutes walk.  The pool is of medium size. There are two additional strips of pool located in front of guest rooms, if connected to the main pool would be great enabling long swimming track.  This hotel serves good breakfast.  A little bit disappointed as we could not get late check-out after 3 night stay even as Accor member.

title: Beautiful stay!
review: Dear sunantawu,  Thank you very much for sharing such a nice review. Really appreciated your comments in regards to our location and products and service offered.  I am however sorry to hear we could not help you with a late check-out request and hope you will not hesitate to contact us directly next year, while planning your second trip at our Property.   Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Wow absolutely fantastic! 5*
review: My partner and I stayed at the Grand Mecure for a total of 6 nights and had a wonderful stay. We arrived about 11pm straight from the airport and greeted with a cold drink, cold towel and a small dessert, so good! We ordered room service, large menu and easy to ring to order and usually came up between 15-20 mins.   MAKE SURE YOU INCLUDED BREAKFAST! Seriously the buffet breakfast is amazing. A huge selection and just delicious. Not going to lie I had 2 serves... Everyday.  Pool is great, pool bar handy. Lots of lounges to sit on. Jealous of the people in the pool view rooms. We had a standard room, no balcony but there is a rail to hang your clothes out which is handy.  Location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach and jungceylon (huge shopping centre) and a shuttle takes you to those…

title: Honeymoon
review: Dear 293bek,  Thank you very much for this beautiful review. Very pleased to see great comments about both the team, the environment and the quality of products offered, especially during breakfast.  Really sorry about the inconvenience with the room. We have closed your room last week, for a few days and deep cleaned it all again. very sorry about that.   Kindly let us know if you wish to give our Pool access room a try next year, I will be very happy to help and look into the reservation personally.   Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Good hotel but room small
review: What can I say other than it was an absolute pleasure to stay here.   The hotel itself looks far superior to any other that we passed on the way into Phuket and the reception staff couldn't be any friendlier. We were welcomed off the taxi by porters who lift your suitcase and escort to you the reception desk, here you are greeted with cold towels, a drink and a cake. We arrived a couple of hours before you were allowed to check in but we explained our total travelling time was over 24 hours and were exhausted so they got the maids to make up our room straight away!  We upgraded our room to the deluxe pool access room and I've got to say that it made our holiday. Being able to get off your sun bed and walk straight into the pool or back into your air conditioned room was a…

title: The hotel is situated in the heart of Patong area.
review: The hotel is situated in the heart of Patong area. There are nice eating places (a few practically right at the doorstep of the hotel), and shopping places nearby the hotel. There is also a big mall within walking distance, and not too far off is the infamous Bangla Street.   Patong is also one of the areas where adventure tour operators pick up people who signed up for day adventures without additional pickup charges. We went to sea walking and ATV rides. Both were fantastic experiences.  My room was nice and clean. Staff friendly, but many of them do not speak English.

title: Elegant Resort
review: This was our last stop on our trip, and we were impressed with the service at the hotel. Our room wasn't ready so they checked our bags, and showed us downstairs where they gave us locker keys to put my purse and passports so we could enjoy the pool and grab down lunch.   The pool is ok nothing spectacular, and be carful of the ground as they did a sealed concrete finish and it's a bit slippery, saw a few people fall. The swim up rooms are nice, you have a separate pool from the main pool, if you want it to be quieter ask for a room on the opposite side of the kids area.   The interior of the rooms are a nice modern feel, could be kept up as we had some mild in the tub and the drywall and baseboards were beat up, but the ac system works like perfection! Also room service has an…

title: Fabulous hotel, great stay and the reasons for 4 stars are ..
review: Dear Baeux,  Many thanks for this great review!  Very please to hear we could assist you with lockers while the room was being prepared and also about your comments about In-room dining.    Many thanks again and looking forward to welcoming you back in 2017!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Really liked this one
review: This hotel is nicely situated if you are not a beach lover as it is not a beach front resort which I am not really. Otherwise, the location is great as it is opposite a large open air food place, lots of shopping close by yet quiet once you enter the hotel! Check in was a breeze and when they noted the platinum membership, they had Sam, guest relation manager personally greet us. Very nice touch. The check in area as in most hotels in Phuket is not aircon. But a lovely cold towel and drink and a little yum snack was provided. After that, they had 2 people from the concierge escort us to our room! One for the luggage and one to show us the way, As platinum member, they kindly upgraded us to a pool access room. This was a lovely room albeit small as we had travel from afar and had…

title: Amazing Hotel, Staff and Location
review: Dear HotspiceAustralia,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and very kind comments about both team and services provided.  It is always a pleasure to welcome one of our Platinum le Club member and i am happy to read about your time relaxing at the pool or the nice selection you were able to enjoy at Bubbles restaurant.   I wish to apologize for the issue concerning the transfer. I believe our concierge was only sharing our Hotel transfer rates, from our property to the one you wanted to be sent to (which can be seen expensive considering a local Taxi or tuk-tuk truck would only charge THB 200 i agree).... I have spoken to him as we do not encourage short transfers but instead concentrate on pick-up and drop off from and at the airport only.  Many thanks again and looking forward to welcoming you both back...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Amazing Team
review: I was lucky enough to spend 2 weeks at the Grand Mercure. Next time im in Phuket ill be staying there without a doubt. The staff were all amazing but in particular -Marn, Chai, Aon, Ake, Boom and Kim made every moment something special. I will be recommending the hotel to all my family and friends purely for the experience the staff provided!

title: Wedding of my Dreams
review: Dear Joey D,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and please rest assured i will pass on your warmest regards to both Marn, Chai, Aon, Ake, Boom and Kim too.  Thank you once again and see you back at Grand Mercure very soon.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Thoroughly enjoyed our week at the Grand Mercure
review: We cannot thank The Grand Mercure enough for organizing our wedding. It was more than I ever dreamed it would be. From the moment we arrived in the hotel, you all treated us so well.  The ceremony set up was so beautiful, the perfect flowers and the arch looked amazing. The bride and bridesmaid bouquet were stunning. Everything was so perfect.  The reception room was decorated amazingly and the staff could not have been more helpful and friendly. The food was delicious, all our guests complemented it.   Thank you for making my dream wedding come true. There was no stress at all from our side throughout the whole experience, even though we were opposite sides of the world organizing it. Emails were so precise and we understood exactly what was happening. It was a  pleasure to…

title: Some hits, some misses
review: Dear Ashling F,  Thank you very much for this very kind review.  It was a privilege accommodating the wedding of your dream and i am pleased your family and friends also enjoyed their stay so much.   Once again and on behalf of our entire team, Congratulations and looking forward to welcoming you both back!!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: I will come back again
review: From check in to check out the resort is well run with hardworking smiling attentive staff making the experience memorable. Joining on line Accor membership and a timely advertisement in newspaper our breakfasts were included in our booking including a 30% discount. To our delight, included was daily afternoon tea in the club 11.00 am until 5.00 pm enjoying a variety of different treats and drinks menu changed daily. Our room was a good size all appear to have balcony facing pool. It fairly new well made and maintained. Only down side is Patong has changed, it is exploding with hotels and people I found it draining. This resort made all the difference. Tip: a quick walk to JungCeylon turn left instead of right it is only a block away 8 minutes walk.

title: Great Property, Excellent Staff
review: As a Accor Platinum member, I am spoiled for choice as there are a few Accor properties in Phuket. Having read excellent reviews from other travellers, I decided to spend my eat pray love Phuket vacay in Grand Mercure Patong - it proved to be the right decision.  Upon check-in, I was attended to by Dawn. She recognised me as a platinum member when I provided her my passport and card. Welcome drink was refreshing and check-in speedy without compromising on Thai hospitality.  Khun Sumontha took time to introduce herself and welcome me. By then, I knew my stay would be one that is memorable. It indeed is.  Breakfast spread was good, although a change in menu alternate days would be good.  Room was well-appointed and I love the pool access - the convenience of the pool by right at…

title: Fabulous Hotel
review: Dear joshdes,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property.  It is always a pleasure to welcome and serve a Le cLub Platinum member and i am very pleased you brought back some great memories of your stay.   Once again, thank you and looking forward to welcoming you back in Phuket. Sebastien

title: Great stayed
review: We had a lovely stay at this hotel, Staff were brilliant, so helpful. Our room was excellent The lovely touch of a turn down service was really nice, with extra water delivered at this time and a little treat each day, fruit, sweets, chocolate brownies. Would fully recommend it and if we go back to Phuket we will definitely stay here

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Swilco0912,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review. We are very pleased to hear about your experience and look forward to your return to Grand Mercure...  Tomorrow will be the first day of the Thai New Year festival and so the mood is pretty joyful around the Hotel Today. Please let me take this opportunity to wish you and your loved ones a very Happy Thai New Year!!!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Perfect Location, Pool & the Staff : Luxury Stay
review: The hotel is an oasis away from all the endless street stalls, shops (selling same things), massage parlours & restaurants/bars of outside. We booked two pool access rooms, which our kids loved. I did find the room small & we had a bath in ours (as opposed to big walk in shower), which seemed poorly designed. We moved into one of hotel's 2 bed bungalows for last few days. This was lovely, luxurious and huge with our own plunge pool. Highly recommend. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast and staff were all lovely. We also had access to daily complementary 'high tea' & invited to cocktail evening to meet senior hotel staff. Room service & drinks were reasonably price and there's an array of bars/restaurants on hotel's doorstep. Hotel also provide a complementary bus service. Overall we…

title: Beautiful stay
review: It was a nice stay at this hotel. The rooms were very comfortable and the breakfast was very good. The location is fantastic because its walking distance to the beach and shopping mall and the walking street. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended

title: Even Better than Last Time
review: Dear delawaiz r,  Many thanks for this very short yet superb review of our property! Always a pleasure seeing guests enjoying themselves so much...   See you again next year :) Sebastien

title: Good location a few minutes' walk from Patong Beach
review: My partner and I booked a Superior Room with Breakfast and also a transfer from the Airport to the Hotel.  I usually do not book breakfast but the deal was of excellent value and whilst the hotel transfer is not cheap it is certainly convenient and comfortable.  The meet at the airport was hassle free and the icy cold towel and icy cold bottle of water was most appreciated. The transfer took about 45 minutes, as it was not peak hour. Allow at least an hour and a quarter when times are busy.   Checkin was straightforward, we were expected and welcomed, and were given a refreshing drink, cold towel and a small pastry on arrival. We had booked a Superior Room but due to my status as an Accor Plus member we were given  a complimentary upgrade to a Pool Room and access to a an…

title: 5* Service
review: Dear 56ajax,  Many thanks for the time taken in reviewing our property (once again) and sharing your experience with the rest of the community.  We are glad you both enjoyed your stay so much and sincerely wish to thank you again for this wonderful review!  Always a pleasure to welcome back guests and friends of ours and i am happy to read the team response and initiative when it come to upgrade and late check-out request. Being a LeClub member is indeed always a Plus and I would encourage all our future guests to join the free program once at the Hotel, or even prior to their arrival at the property, via our company website.   Once again, i am very pleased you both enjoyed yourselves around the pool, at the restaurant and in the rooms so much!   A great way to start the day !! Many thanks and see you again very soon... Sebastien

title: Close to hard core area in Patong
review: Overall we had a pleasant stay.  - Good location, but room is a bit small as expected - Welcome drink on arrival - Large and comfortable bed - Hotel is new & well maintained  - Noise from nearby construction

title: Highly recommend
review: I just spent 7 days at the Grand Mercure with my husband and two year old son. Modern, clean resort that is perfectly located to shops and restaurants. Breakfast, kids club, facilities and rooms are all first class.   Most outstanding feature was the friendly staff who were always polite and efficient. Special thank you to Walaiphan Noikasame, Assistant Front Office Manager for going above and beyond in customer service and making our holiday memorable.   Thank you for a truly wonderful stay.

title: Nice place and location
review: Dear DJMontana,  Thank you very much for this wonderful and 5* review of our property.  I am very pleased to hear that Khun Koy (Walaiphan) took extremly good care of you and your family and hope you will not hesitate to contact her back next year, when it is time again to plan your future holidays :)  with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Best hotel in Phuket
review: About an hour from the airport, check in was relatively quick but not as welcoming as I remember my last visit to Thailand. Beds are King singles and very comfortable . Breakfast was fantastic, so much variety, loved it.! - didn't know there was cappuccino or hot chocolate til the last day which is the only complaint.  Pool service/room service all good.  Markets across the road, restaurants with cheap delicious food and taxi guys waiting to take you away.  10 minutes walk to the beach.

title: Bday with mama
review: Dear sarahjoshua,  Many thanks for this great review! Very pleased to see you both enjoyed your stay and our services so much...   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good place in Patong
review: I'm now staying at Grand mercure, very happy with the wonderful service and would invite everyone who plan to go to Phuket to stay at this hotel. I saw many other hotels in Phuket but i found Grand Mercure is the best , it also met my expectation upon arrival.  Staff appearance were neat and elegant, their uniform is beautiful. House keeping, room service, reception staff were well groomed, always smiling and friendly, they all represent Grand mercure positively in excellent way. I rate it 10 of 10. When i booked i request for honeymoon arrangement as I came with my wife to celebrate our honeymoon, upon arrival to our room they provided us with honeymoon cake, special flower, and special design of towels on bed.  Loby has great design furniture. Rooms are equipped with premium…

title: Most Convenient in Patong
review: This hotel has the friendliest service, polite, efficient and pleasant - buffet staff were all amazing, as well as the bartenders, simply fantastic.  We had buffet breakfast every morning and some dinner buffets, and the variety and quality were very high, really amazing, delicious, beautifully presented, just absolutely perfect. Well done, ACCOR!  The bartender who served my husband and I from the time of our arrival was Pornpimon, also known as Belle. She makes a wonderful Pinacolada and also prepared Mojitos & the famous Brazilian cocktail, the Caipirinha. All fantastic. She was lovely to our little boys, and she was the one who recommended the fantastic buffet dinners. Thank you, Belle!  Bar has a huge TV screen and cozy couches and we were watching soccer and enjoying…

title: Third Time is the Charm at The Grand Mercure!
review: Dear Flying_Explorer,  What a Grand review!!! Many thanks for the few minutes taken in sharing your experience with us. It is very much appreciated and always a pleasure to see our guests bringing back home such wonderful memories...   I will surely thank Khun Belle, our Bartendee at Craft Beer lounge, for her friendliness and recommendations when it comes to cocktails or themed dinner nights at Bubbles restaurant a floor below.   Please do not hesitate to contact us directly, if you ever plan on returning to Patong, as we will be more than happy to reserve a room that is closer to our Lobby and therefore, more suitable to you and your family.   Once again, thank you se very much!! Sebastien

title: Centralised location, nice rooms and swimming pool, good breakfast
review: I followed the construction of the Grand Mercure and read the early reviews two years ago in 2014. They began to turn more positive and it seemed this resort would be very special for a holiday. I made a reservation for my first stay that would in December 2014 and enjoyed it very much. I felt at that point the hotel definitely deserved 3.5 stars. Even though things were not perfect, I made sure to meet as many people who worked there as they were always so kind and helpful in every possible way.  I planned another holiday for April 2015 and chose to come back to The Grand Mercure. Not only was I greeted by the Management Team Sumontha and Sebastien, but I was treated like a member of the family, and provided with a complimentary upgrade to a suite, since space was available.…

title: Swim up bar
review: Dear Ted L,  Thank you very much for yet again, another wonderful review of our Resort.   I just realized you are probably the only returning guest at Grand Mercure with stays in both 2014, 2015 and 2016... and this alone, is an amazing achievement, understanding we will celebrate our second anniversary only next week and the fact you have to cross the Pacific to get to us....   I will have this entire review published and posted on our "staff board" today and it will serve as a benchmarks to newcomers wondering what working at Grand Mercure is about... following the steps of Sita, Pat, Preetirat and a few others you kindly mentioned about.  To be honest, I am particularly pleased with your comments about the boutique service approach... "I observed that this is the way they treat every single guest without exception". Welcoming and serving well over 600 guests a day is a very challenging task and the given goal shared with the team upon opening this beautiful property was to offer boutique-like services and experiences, while operating a much larger than boutique-like property, with 314 rooms and villas. We might not be able to reach every single guest of ours daily, but reviews like yours, and the few other "excellent" ones we are receiving on regular basis, mean the World to us.   You made our day Ted L, thank you very much from the bottom of our hearts! It will be a real privilege to have you back with us in December this year again.  with Grand and Most Sincere regards,  The Team & I.

title: Excellent hotel!
review: There are few pros for this hotel. Firstly, we picked this hotel for its close proximity to Jungceylon shopping mall, massage joints and street shopping. This means that you can save on the highly inflated prices of the phuket tuk tuks, which cost at least 100baht for a short ride. The hotel do provide shuttle service to the beach, Jungceylon and Central Festival mall. It is also not too far from the beach.   Secondly, as the hotel is relatively new, the rooms are clean and nicely decorated. Which makes it a comfortable stay just to chill around in the hotel. Thirdly, the pool, although not huge, is a nice place to chill with a poolside bar which is quite a standard thing in Phuket. Lastly, the breakfast buffet spread is also nice, with decent spread of food to cater to…

title: The conference room was great.
review: I did not stay at this place, just conference here, the conference room was great and wide, good for seminar and any meeting. I would suggest this place if u want to set up your company trip. The place was not far from the beach neither the others in Patong. U can walk a little to the beach and enjoy the street.

title: A Preferred Home In Patong
review: Dear Siriporn V,  Thank you very much for your great review and recommendations in regards to our Meeting facilities...  We hope that next time, you will also stay in one of our room and enjoy our services throughout the property.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great oasis in the centre of the hive
review: I had been to Patong Beach on numerous occasion but I must admit that Grand Mercure Patong is truly a Wonderful resort. One of the best resorts, if not the best, that I had stayed in, in Patong Phuket. Great location, clean and neat place to stay in.  As an Accor Plus Gold member, was upgraded to a complementary deluxe suite room by Mr Sebastian and his Team.  Room was Huge, Clean, Neat, and Tastefully decorated with full amenities.  Kids club, with the 3 wonderful staff, was a haven for my 2 kids, 2 and 8 yrs old, Even though it is a wee bit too small.The staff more than makes up for the size of the club.  Resort is near to Jungceylon shopping mall with complementary shuttle from the hotel to the mall(or 10 mins walk)  Also about 10 mins walk to the beach, but there is also 3…

title: Lovely pool access room and hotel
review: Dear Aloysius N,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review...  It is always a pleasure welcoming one of our Le Club Gold member and we are very pleased to hear you had a short yet most memorable time with us...  I will surely take this opportunity to thank our Kid's Club attendants and pass on your regards to the rest of the team as well...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Wonderful stay with Grand Mecure Phuket Patong
review: We stayed for a week in March 2016 in a one bedroom villa. The hotel is very good, the pool area is great and we loved 'Bounce', the swim up bar. It may be pricey compared to others in the area but once inside you would never know you are I. The heart of the busiest place in Phuket. The wi-fi was very fast but the breakfast coffee was not. I tried the gym and steam room and found it completely met my needs. The staff were very friendly and the service was five star. I've read reviews where some people were not satisfied and I can only assume that the choice of room makes a big difference. I would highly recommend the one bed villa in this hotel. It is easy walking to the beach, bars, Bangala Rd & Jung Celyon (the  excellent shopping centre).

title: On a tour of the Far East to celebrate a special birthday
review: The Hotel was spotlessly clean, and the staff were friendly, excellent and attentive. A special thanks to Sebastien, Paul, Paulo and Siam for looking after us so well on the day cooking course run by the Hotel which was agreat memory to treasure now that we are home. The bungalows were out of this world and are highly recommended. Location of hotel was excellent and very accessabile without being affected by noise. An easy 5-10 mins walk to the beach which was very clean, and within 2-3 mins there is a range of eateries and shops. Great location, run by very friendly and attentive staff in a great location.

title: We received a cead mile failte. (Irish)
review: Dear gerry178,  A thousand thanks for this wonderful review of our Villas and property.  Always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves and i will surely thanks Paul, Paulo and Siam on your behalf.   Thanks again and looking forward to your second visit already... Sebastien

title: Almost perfection!
review: We booked a twelve night stay in the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong. From the moment we arrived we were so impressed with the level of hospitality we received. It became our home from home for our stay. The staff were so warm friendly and helpful. Nothing was too much trouble. We met so many wonderful staff members from the trainees - Dawn from Taiwan,Paulo from Brussels, Pat (a good Irish name) from Bangkok and Lucas from France. They made sure that all our needs were catered for and most importantly they shared their time with us.  Tode checked us into the hotel when we arrived. He was so helpful and friendly. My husband mentioned that I was celebrating an important birthday during our stay in the hotel. He also mentioned that he was gluten intolerant. Gluten free bread was…

title: Super
review: Stayed at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for 8 nights. On first impression! Wow! Staff were friendly and efficient at check in. Stayed in a pool access room, for me it was a 10/10, however if you were one to indulge in beverages from the bar they cannot be delivered from the poolside bar.  However you can drink to your heart's content from the bar in the main pool. Cleanliness-10/10. Facilities - I can't fault 10/10. For a big resort it was extremely peaceful at night. No noise from other rooms. Great location and close to everything. I loved this place and 8 nights felt like a month it was so relaxing. I will be back.

title: Peaceful and restorative
review: Dear bdpurcell,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and 10/10 ratings on both overall cleanliness, facilities and Resort's location. It was a real pleasure to serve you during your 8-day holiday and the entire team is already looking forward to your return next year...  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Poor check in procedure
review: On arrival at the hotel I was advised that as a result of the previous occupant checking out late, my room would not be ready for half an hour I went to the lobby bar and ordered some food & drink returning to the check in desk forty five minutes later This time I was told that the shower was broken & I would have to wait until the maintenance engineer repaired it I had made arrangements to meet some friends & by this time it was getting late so I asked if by chance, another room was available The desk clerk immediately gave me another room but I really can’t understand why I wasn’t offered this alternative room right from the start Wasting my time, very inconvenient

title: The perfect hotel for a relaxing vacation
review: Dear Andy S,  Thank you very much for your review and the few minutes taken in sharing your disappointing check-in experience.  I have this morning discuss this matter with our Front Office Manager and asked her to review the overall procedure with team, whenever the occupancy doesn't allow us to switch rooms automatically.   Thank you once again and see you back at Grand Mercure very soon.. Sebastien

title: Lovely hotel
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure for 8 nights. It was the perfect choice for a relaxing vacation. From check-in to check-out all staff was polite, helpful and went the extra mile. The room was very nice, lots of amenities, comfortable beds with premium quality linen; excellent choice of food and drinks for breakfast, also here the service exceeded our expectations; they even knew our room number and our preferred juices at day 2 of our vacation. The pool and the pool bar are the place to relax and to meet other guest, if you like. Deck chairs were always available, very comfortable. Lobby Lounge large, open, so is the lobby bar. Concierge very helpful, they helped us with transportation fast and efficiently and for reasonable prices. The Spa is outstanding; we had 6 massages - and…

title: It is as good as it looks!
review: Dear schaeferrolf,  Thousand thanks for this amazing review and 5* rating.  It is always a pleasure to please and ensure high levels of satisfaction for guests and starting the week in such fashion, is simply amazing....  Many thanks again and looking forward to welcoming you both back home!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Most Helpful Customer Sevice
review: This hotel is well located. Away from the busy Bangla Road and near enough to reach there by foot. I love the pool... staffs are friendly. Walking distance to Junkceylon, if you don't mind the walk. They offer free shuttle there too! but we always missed it. Not much local food nearby. Eateries are way too commercialised. Prolly my country has better Thai food. Good massages everywhere on the way from Junkceylon to the hotel. There's a family mart nearby as well.

title: Amazing outside spaces!!!
review: When you live there it feels like you are in a small village... the outside spaces are great..the pool amazing and really hot...!!! An other amazing thing for me, is their drinks that offer you to their bar..excellent topical rum!! Try it..the locatio  of the hotel is in the center of the town and you csn go anywhere from there..  i must also tell about how ckean were their rooms!! Great hospitallity and various of things thay you can try to the breakfast!!

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear Efi Z,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and 5* rating. Very pleased to see you both enjoyed our rooms and services as well, especially the Chalong Bay Rum specialties :)  Thank you once again and looking forward to you next visit... with Grand Regards, Sebastien

title: Great hotel
review: I loved this hotel. The service by everyone was superb. My room had everything you could possibly want and had direct access to the pool. I would thoroughly recommend this room. The location is good and is surrounded by excellent restaurants. Most of all the WiFi was perfect. So often this is a frustrating failure. The hotel was packed as it was Chinese New Year which did often result in a line up at breakfast but I think this would only be a problem at this time of the year. All in all I would stay here again on my next visit to Phuket.

title: Best Hotel In Phuket
review: Dear Arnold1004,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and excellent rating. We are all very pleased to hear you very much enjoyed your stay and most particularly, our high-speed internet and our most relaxing Pool access units.   As for the queue, it was unfortunate and we are now back usual and more personalized breakfast operations indeed.   Thank you once again and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: Quiet oasis in Patong
review: Staff is friendly and attentive to guest need. Location in central & convenience surrounding with many restaurant and massage shop. Breakfast taste is good.  You can book local tour anywhere around the hotel. i will stay back this hotel

title: Highly recommended ... Great pool ...
review: The positives are:  1) Central Location... It's about an hour from the airport and in the central area of Patong which is close to the craziness by a tut tut (about 10 mins).   2) Service... We originally booked two rooms via Expedia and there was a slight mix up and the front desk provided excellent customer service by upgrading us to a two bedroom villa with our own private pool.  3) Pool ... Their regular pool was very good with a swim up bar and restaurant next to it.   4) Wifi.. Wifi is now expected at every hotel that you visit and this hotel recognises that by printing a complimentary wifi when you check in which avoids hassle of looking around for the password.    The areas of opportunities are:  1) We only wish we could have stayed another night but the hotel was booked…

title: Decent hotel with decent facilities, decent service and decent rate.
review: Dear Clement K,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  I am very sorry you could not extend your stay with us as we were "full house "and hope to welcome you back again some other times...  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Enjoyable stay
review: What I love best:  1. Service was quick, housekeeping came to deliver our requests in less than 5 mins. 2. Staff were attentive and polite. (except when they recommended an overpriced yet mediocre restaurant). 3. Since we left for island trips almost everyday, really love to see the room all clean and neat again. 4. Just across the road there is a siam/seafood resto called sansabai. It is really great and not as overpriced as other restaurants. Chinese will love this store since almost all the staff speak fluent mandarin. 5. Plenty of bars and souvenir shops just across the road. (although for food, I would suggest the Banzaan market better)  What I find helpful:  1. Location wise is not bad. It is not on the beach side and not across the Bangla Rd/Jungceylon but still close by…

title: Oasis in the heart of Patong
review: Dear Lycurguz,  Thank you very much for this very "decent" review and rating! It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying both our location and services and i will surely thank our team for their friendliness and professionalism. Those past ten have been extremely busy and it is at times difficult to grant an early check-in at all, when when previously requested. It is simply due to the fact that all our rooms are occupied and that we need other guests to check-out, before cleaning the room and opening up again for our next guests. I am very pleased to hear our team handled this situation quite well... That is not always that easy and i wish to thank you once again for your patience and understanding.   Please feel free to contact any of us directly, ahead of your next visit...   Thank you, Sebastien

title: Great facilities, staff and location
review: We booked 3 nights with a family of six for 3 nights stay at this hotel. Well, overall it is modern, clean but not spotless. Here are the following comments.  Positives: Huge lobby Staff are friendly Large swimming pool  Good breakfast with adequate varieties Large bed with request for topper Comfy and fresh pillows Convenient stores and eating place just across the streets and shops around the corner  Negatives: Rooms are quite small Rooms & toilets are generally clean but not spotless Shuttle service to town provided but only one way. Around 200-300 baht for taxi ride back to hotel Check in was quite slow  Tips: If you intend to walk to town ie Jungceylon mall, you may opt to walk towards the right side from lobby, is more happening with many stores along the way. The left…

title: Very Helpful Staff
review: My family - and 3 other Families were originally booked into the Novotel at Kamala Beach. Upon arrival at the Novotel - they were overbooked, and were 2 rooms short for our family group - we needed 7 rooms in total. So they moved all 4 families to the Grand Mercure at Patong. (It was a 4 Family Holiday - and we didn't want to be split up) So we stayed here instead of the Novotel Kamala. Now the only reason I give Grand Mercure an average rating is because it was NOT where we wanted to stay. In saying that - the staff here went over and above to make us happy. The breakfast was included for us - and was great. But go early - there in a lineup to get in during peak times during peak season. We had dinner here on one night - Fantastic - great food and service. Lunch by the pool a…

title: Perfect place to stay
review: Dear dingo_joe,  Many thanks for this great review of our property. It is always a challenge to welcome and pleased guests in such circumstances and i am delighted we could somehow compensate the disappointment caused.  Many thanks again for your kind words about our food and quality of service at the Bar... I will surely thank our CHef and his team on your behalf.  I believe you might give Kamala a second chance next year but please rest assure that we would always be happy to have you back at Grand Mercure, even if it is just for a coffee or a quick snack by the pool.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Stunning hotel
review: Perfect location, fabulous rooms, staff are so helpful and try to please every time.  10 minute walk to the beach.  Great markets literally across the road & cheap cafes right on your doorstep.  Pool was beautiful & warm, plenty of sun beds, including some actually in the water which were lovely.  Pool is very large & spaced out & lots of different areas to sit around the pool which meant everybody wasn't on top of each other in the same area.  My parents room was decorated for their 50th wedding anniversary & they were also given a cake.  Very happy with our choice of hotel & would certainly recommend.  PS - We are well seasoned travellers so are well aware of comparisons.

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear KymmyH,  Many thanks for this excellent review and rating! Very pleased we could make a difference and look after your parents on their 50th Anniversary.  We are now getting into one of the busiest period of the year and receiving such comments is always very encouraging...  Many thanks again and looking forward to your return, Sebastien

title: A great choice in Phatong
review: Stayed here for 4 nights in January. Chose a pool side room - amazing! Ate breakfasts and also had a couple of lunches and a dinner in the hotel - plentiful selection and very tasty. Staff were attentive & very friendly. Had a massage in the spa which was so relaxing. Would highly recommend this hotel. Great location - as short walk to the craziness but very serene.

title: Great Hospitality and Comfortable Stay
review: We were here during our Honeymoon and it was quite good. Firstly we were welcomed with a chilled drink and cupcake which felt really good. Later we were also welcomed with a Honeymoon Cake which was special. The staff is very helpful and always smiling. Our room was clean and comfortable. We choose to stay in Deluxe Pool Access Room which was amazing but it was slightly in a corner which was obstructing the main pool view. Pool was clean and rooms were tidy. The pool bar was also good but slightly slow in service. The breakfast also had many options. Food is good with variety of drinks. Overall a perfect and relaxing stay.

title: Great location
review: Dear Namrata08,  Many thanks for this great review of our Resort.  Very pleased to see you both had a lovely time with us and could celebrate your Honeymoon in style.  Thank you also for the comments about the Pool Bar service team, which i have already forwarded to our Food & Beverage Manager.   Many thanks, Sebastien.

title: Great service, Clean and Modern.
review: Excellent location.Resturants, bars and markets  across the road great hotel very clean rooms ,lovely staff ,great pool really enjoyed our stay and will return. Beach was less than a 10 minute walk . Night life  on bangla road walking distance 20 mins .

title: A lovely stay, comfortable, clean & relaxing
review: Dear Headtoniphil,  Many thanks for this short yet wonderful review of our property! Will surely seize this opportunity to thanks our associates for their friendliness and dedication.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Hotel, Location and Hospitality!!
review: My husband and I stayed at The Grand Mercure for six nights in January and were very pleased with the hotel. The staff were always friendly and helpful, the room was spacious enough and very tidy. We stayed in a superior double room (the most basic room) and were lucky enough to have views of the pool and a beautiful mountain peak.  The Breakfast selection was wonderful, better than the other 3 hotels I have stayed at in Patong. There was a good selection of Western and Eastern foods including pancakes, waffles, a selection of cereals, beautiful fresh fruit, breads and pastries (the almond croissants were delicious!), eggs, cold meats, salads, cheeses, dried fruit, nuts and seeds, jams and nutella!, bacon and other meats (I'm vegetarian so I skipped this section), rice, noodles,…

title: Simple and perfect for my honeymoon
review: This is my first ever holiday and it's my honeymoon. As soon as I walked into the hotel I was blown away and amazed by the front open lobby. The staff were great and very welcoming. Hotel was really nice and the room was great and comfy, the poolside was really good and the food was spot on although quite pricey but it's is a hotel so yeh expected. It was the perfect location and very convenient as it was close to everything. I highly recommend it and definitely would come again one day.

title: Fantastic hotel-Amazing staff!
review: Dear Shabba12345,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and once again, congratulations from the entire team team at Grand Mercure.... It was a pleasure having you both staying with us and we are already looking forward to your second visit in Patong!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: “Classy Establishment”
review: This hotel is everything I'd expect from a 5 star establishment. Modern, clean rooms with very efficient air con! The buffet breakfast would have to be one of the best I've been to. The food was beautifully presented, delicious and the variety was extensive. The hotel location is brilliant, easy walking distance to most attractions. If you don't want to walk taxi's or tuk tuk's are just outside the hotel driveway. The staff are second to none, friendly and accommodating. One of our group was too sick to come to breakfast one morning so the manager on duty arranged for a tray to be taken to her room! I would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Superb hotel !!
review: Dear Chris0368,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and recommendations.  I will surely pass on your regards to the rest of the team and thank them on your behalf.   Looking forward to your second visit... Thank you, Sebastien

title: Great location and the buffet?? OMG!
review: “Classy Establishment”  5 of 5 starsReviewed 2 days ago NEW  via mobile    This place in classy and clean. Polite staff and in central area for highways and restaurants. Next door a stellar bagel sandwich shop. The hallways are draped with European decor, while the rooms remain modern while reflecting a hint of the olde country. I say come here to avoid the avg chain hotels while still getting the same features such as pool free breakfast and Wi-fi etc.

title: Great place to stay!
review: Great place to stay. Breakfast was good. Overall, service is great. Only improvement needed is to have a smoother check-out process. Because we had an early flight, I tried to check-out before my roommate came down to speed up the process, but was not allowed. We had to wait until she came down, while delayed our departure.

title: Awesome stay
review: Dear D F,  Thank you for your review and kind words. I am a little concerned about the delay upon check-out and will discuss the matter separately with my assistant at Front Office. Very sorry about that, we do have procedures to follow but a little flexibility could at times be given to the process i agree.  Once again, thank you for your great review and see you again very soon... Sebastien

title: Unbelievable!
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure for 6 nights, and we were happy from check-in to check-out. Each reception staff were welcoming, from the moment we checked in and throughout. Not only were the reception staff friendly, but other staff (gardeners, engineers, cafe staff, Ryn staff etc) were extremely friendly - greeting us with a warm smile and hello each and every time.   The hotel itself had everything we needed, and being quite "picky" with cleanliness we were never disappointed. Housekeeping staff never disappointed us with during our stay, with general areas (pool, gym, etc) kept up to standard at all times.   It is conveniently located, where tour vans were able to pick us up or drop us off from the hotel's front steps. Security staff was available at the gate at all times…

title: Bad turn Good
review: Dear Shaz K,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  Very pleased the felt welcomed and "at home" during those few days and i will surely take this opportunity to thanks our Front office team and our Bell boys, as well as Chef and his team who are indeed preparing wonderful treats every morning.   Thank you once again,  Sebastien

title: Holiday
review: Well i'll tell you i'm in the travel industry and i'm also VERY picky when it comes to hotels. I could not say 1 bad thing about the Grand Mercure. The location is IDEAL unless you want to rent a motorbike or hire a TUK TUK driver everywhere. Literally almost everything you need is walking distance from this hotel. We stayed a week here and enjoyed every minute of it. Walked to all of the local restaurants and shops PLUS patong beach is a 5 minute walk. It's not the nicest beach AT all  so we only went for a little while- take a TUK TUK to paradise beach so wonderful!!!   The staff is on point! They are very gracious and welcoming plus help you with local hot spots if you need it. I prebooked our tours but I overheard them helping others.  Lastly, be prepared for an amazing…

title: Loved this place service with a smile, the best place to enjoy a quiet drink in Patong..the girls at the bar great
review: Awesome place!!! The girls at the bar are amazing please make sure you visit this place they can't do enough for you and you will not go thirsty. Craft bar offers Great prices as well for a five star hotel. I couldn't believe the prices. Loved it

title: Magnificent diner at the Bubbles restaurant
review: Dear Patrick M,  Many thanks for this superb review of our property and our Beer Lounge, Craft! We have recently reviewed the entire selection and i am pleased you liked it so much.   Many thanks again and see you back at Craft very soon... Sebastien

title: First class hotel and first class staff
review: Located in the heart of Patong, I was very interested to discover this 5 stars hotel. I decided to try it and everything was excellent ! The staff was so friendly, welcoming and the food was fabulous. Moreoever the location of the restaurant is downstair and the atmosfere is peaceful.
