I recommand this hotel to have a great diner and I will certainly take a room during my next visit in Patong.

title: What a wonderful stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong
review: Dear 892clarad,  Really pleased with your comments about Bubbles, our Poolside and all-day-dining Restaurant . Since we launched our Wednesday and Friday's themed nights, feedbacks have been extremely good and i will surely take this opportunity to thank our Chef and his team, for their efforts and creativity. They are now working on the new a-la-carte menu, adding a few more "Phuket recipes" and that should be very exciting too.  Thank you once again and looking forward to welcoming you back at Bubbles and Grand Mercure.  Sebastien

title: Not a 5 star hotel
review: I spent 10 days at this hotel earlier this month. The facilities are first rate and the hotel's location is excellent. However, what distinguishes the operation most significantly is the warmth of the welcome and the friendliness of the staff- particularly in the restaurant: always smiling, always welcoming, happy to stop and have a longer discussion about the hotel or a local attraction. Simply a delight to be around.  My only criticism (and it is incredibly minor) is that the music at the poolside bar seemed inappropriate for the demographic staying at the hotel and far too loud, particularly at 7.30 in the morning, when you are trying to enjoy a relaxing breakfast. But easily fixed and not a deal breaker.  In conclusion, I think that this is a great hotel with a wonderful…

title: Great resort, small rooms, centrally located
review: I stayed here for 4 nights in February 2015. I booked the standard room as that was all that was available at the time and it was very small. We had a great view on the pool and enjoyed opening the sliding doors. The bathroom was starting to age and it was leaking water into the room next door. This was causing the floor boards next to the bed to become moist and shrivelled.   We paid for a 5 course dinner for 2 people as we checked in on Valentine's Day. The food was delicious and we had an enjoyable experience! We were not able to use the spa experience which was part of the Valentine's Day special, so they offered us a refund for that part.   The pool was fantastic, I loved the openness of the reception area and it is very close to the main road!

title: Great hotel and cental location
review: Dear Katieeez,  Thank you very much for this great review of our property.  We are all very pleased to hear you both had a most pleasant stay and it is sad you had to cancel the Spa treatments at the end... We will keep 2 therapy beds available for your next visit :)  Many thanks again and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: A PERFECT HOLIDAY HOTEL
review: We stayed at this hotel in August 2014 when it was still under construction but the main section of the hotel was complete. The welcome was warm and friendly, The rooms were spacious and clean, Breakfast is yummy and lots of variety. The hotel is very close to shops and Jung Ceylon shopping centre. I honestly could not find a flaw with this hotel and will be back again.

title: It's ok
review: Dear Agro1963,  Thank you for this amazing review and 5* rating! We are all very much looking forward to welcoming you back and serving you once again...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great hotel for a good price
review: My wife and I stayed at the Grand Mercure Phuket for approximately 1 week. Upon arrival we were offered an upgrade from a poolside room to a private villa which was accepted gratefully as it was very spacious and private. The facilities at the hotel are excellent for individuals, couples and families and the staff are excellent. The hotel location is perfect, 10 minutes walk from the beach and 10 minutes walk from the shopping mall where a large number of excellent restaurants can be found. Having said that, the hotel restaurant was excellent and the food quality and range great. On one day my wife was ill and the hotel offered all the necessary support and more including a get well note and fruit basket. The hotel facilities are in general excellent and the wifi one of the…

title: 5 star hotel center of Patong
review: I have been this Grand Mercure Patong for inspection and i very like it, The room very clean, smell good, very good service, beautiful swimming pool, and Grand Mercure it stay perfect location it next to the otop shopping mall, not to far from Jungceylon.

title: 5 star resort
review: Dear TourPhuketdream,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of yours... Always a pleasure to welcome a colleague from the industry at the property!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Pick the villas. Good value for price range.
review: 5 star resort right in the center of Patong, we were expecting a smaller city style hotel given the location but it was a huge resort style place with amazing swimming pool. Everything was amazing, especially the lovely staff!

title: New Year's Stay
review: Dear Chloe W,  Many thanks for this 5* review of our property.  It is indeed quite impressive and i surely take this opportunity to pass on your warest regards to the rest of the team... Looking forward to welcoming and serving you again in 2016!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: What a great hotel !
review: Location Perfect for friends and wanting to be in the heart of Patong. Tuk tuk easily available but chose GrabTaxi instead cos of price transparency.   Room Pick the villa when you can. Perfect with 2 -bedroom cos the party could "live together" and yet have enough personal space with the living room, dining area and private pool. Got to use Club lounge to boot (but no alcoholic drinks tho...😞)  Breakfast buffet spread is fine for what it is.   Reception/ Front desk made great restaurant recommendations. Were spot on when we explained what we wanted.

title: Super location
review: Was a bit confused before about where in Phuket should stay as its a big island and lots of choices, decided to go for Patong just as seemed to be most hotels there and proved to be the right choice as everything for tourists is there. Grand Mercure where we stayed was surrounded by interesting little shops and restaurants, and a short walk to the shopping mall or beach. Staff made us feel welcome and the hotel was really smart.

title: Grand Hotel with dirty details
review: Dear Fruity1980,  A Grand Thank you for this beautiful review and rating.  We are delighted you chose Grand Mercure for your holidays! Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next year if you decide once again to visit Southern Thailand!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Beautiful Hotel, friendly staff
review: At first glance, This hotel seems very high end with a grand open lobby and nice pool area/decor, but when you get down to it, the finishing is very poor and many things were broken in our room. We also had ants and the room didn't feel like it was clean.  Unfortunately, I think this may be one of the better resorts in Patong, it's a busy beach city, and the whole area is kinda dirty.   Customer service was nothing to rave about, and it was like a 10 min ride to Patong Beach via taxi...all in all it was an average hotel.

title: a stunning hotel in a fabolous location
review: Dear christine h,  Thank you for your feedback and encouraging review. Patong, as a destination can at times have this effect on first time visitors and i am very sorry we could not provide you with the tranquility and comfort we are well known for. Our location, just walking distance from the bustling areas of Patong is usually well praised and rest assured that cleanliness is on the very top of our "to-do" list.  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Perfect
review: Myself and my husband stayed here for a week over Christmas and had an amazing stay. Firstly, the hotel is just lovely,very new and modern. Our room was a superior double and was clean and fresh and modern. Not huge but perfect size. Would be nice if you could sit on the balcony but in fairness we were not in the room often so didn't bother us too much. The pool and bar are great, breakfast was one of the best we had in hotels and was always packed. It was a highlight for my husband! Food at the pool bar wasn't the best so would recommend you go to one of the restaurants right outside, having said that it was fine. Cocktails were good though! This hotel is about a 10 min walk to Patong beach, and is right in centre of Patong so if you don't like a busy bustling area this might…

title: Stunning hotel
review: Went here with my partner we stayed for a week.  Stunning hotel, service from the staff was excellent.  Good location not to far away from the hustle bustle but not too close either.  Enjoyed a few drinks at the swim up bar, had a very relaxing stay.

title: hard rock cafe around the corner
review: Dear galface123,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and 5* rating! Looking forward to your second visit already...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Very good spot
review: Ideally placed just a short walk to the beach, or use the hotel bus. A longer walk to walking street. We liked being just out if it. Across the road from the hotel was a large market, as all the rooms we saw faced the pool there was no noise from anything near by.  We didnt like the look of the swim up rooms with direct access from the pool as everyone else would be looking at your terrace, so not private.  Our room had a Juliette balcony. Only very few of the top floor rooms have a real balcony. We always ask for a higher floor so we are out of reach of mosquitos. Our room had a glass window in the bathroom, there is a pull down blind, which might not suit all.  We enjoyed our week here and would stay again

title: Nice stay for the price
review: Dear 007jezabe,  Many thanks for this very kind review and great rating.  We are very pleased to hear you both had a lovely time with us and would consider Grand Mercure as your prefered place of stay in future... It is always very encouraging to receive positive comments and i wish to thank you once again, on behalf of our entire team.   Happy New Year and see you again in 2016! Sebastien

title: Perfect choice in Patong
review: I travel a lot ,this hotel is highly recommended the GENRAL manager was very helpful I spend 4 days was lovely ,I try before few hotels in Phuket but I like this one special with family ,I recommend only the pool access rooms ,I try before the higher floors room is good in seven floor have balcony but to much to keep going down for pool or if you want to be out ,just across the road small shopping area ,restaurants but restaurants play with prices special sea food I use same quality and clean food but in Patong (MR goods) very good sea food Resturant about 10 mints walking ,their is small GM by the hotel Hard Rock Cafe about 3 mints walking and Irish bar , The hotel staff are very friendly and they can speak English ,the hotel provide airport round trip transportation for…

title: Good location, great pool, average service
review: We spent our X'mas holidays in this hotel, we booked 2 pool-access rooms so that our kid can swim around between them. He loved the pool very much.  Pros: 1. Convenient location, 15 min walking distance to Junceylon 2. Great pool and buffer breakfastl 3. Reasonable price  Cons: 1. Some rats over pool area, quite big ones 2. No English Premier League boardcasting for TV inside room, only available in lobby bar 3. Clubhouse is too small, and provide insufficient variety of refreshments for afternoon tea

title: Truly grand
review: Dear Chunchun2014,  Thank you very much for your review and compliments about our Hotel Location and Pool. I am sorry about the Football however as we do indeed, only broadcast games in our Craft Lobby Lounge. As for the Club house, please note i have already asked our Chef to review the menu and selection this week.  Many thanks again and looking forward to welcoming you back in 2016!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Nice Hotel, Excellent Staff but not worth the price
review: * Excellent staff and prompt room service * Very well maintained. All rooms have a pool view. * Spacious rooms * Excellent location. Very close to the beach and nightlife yet away from the crowded locations. * Superb pool and kids pool. * Very close to tour operators and taxi stand which makes commuting very easy

title: Holiday
review: Dear puneetxgulati,  Thank you very much for your review! We are delighted to note you enjoyed your holidays with us so much and look forward to serving you again in 2016.  with grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good hotel, nice staff, clean and new.
review: Arrived around 1 pm, was given room immediately, Kids went to pool but didn't really like the pool, a very simple one for a resort had  lunch at the restaurant which wasn't  very impressive, The room had a musty smell but was clean and beds were very comfortable, We were not impressed with the size of the room, bathroom was also small but acceptable  Our room had a long walk and was the last one in resort and we were not very happy about it, so requested for a change and got a very close one next day, so that was nice part from the hotel  I must say the staff was Excellent  they were properly trained and knew how to handle customers, so full marks to the management at grand mercure, We requested for late checkout got it without any issues, House keeping was very helpful and…

title: Greate direct pool access rooms
review: We had a direct pool access room that had sun all day. It was greate. 2 sunbeds with thick mattresses on ower own terrace. Included in this type of room is also access to a day lounge from 11am to 5 pm with complementary non alkoholick drinks and snack. Greate coffee latte. An other thing that is verry good about the hotell it that they have plenty of sunbeds by the pool for those who dont have direct pool access rooms. It was never full and the sunbeds have thick mattresses. It is only one thing that is missing and that is more light in the bathroom. It should have been more light by the mirror.

title: High recommended - Pool access room!
review: Dear M0nicaN0rway,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! Very pleased to hear you liked your pool access room so much. Looking forward to welcoming you back in 2016.  Happy New Year to you both! Sebastien

title: Best hotel in Patong
review: This is a relatively new Hotel in Phuket, as such every facilities still have the new good and feel.  Staff is very helpful and friendly. But the best thing about this hotel is the room. They have a special Pool access room which you can just jump into the pool right from your balcony! The pool is also in very good condition since it is new, and the view is very beautiful. They even have a pool bar.  Only downside will be the mosquito, there are quite a handful of them almost everywhere, but I am sure this is Phuket in nature. So make sure not to leave any room doors open!

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: Dear Xive,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and comments.  Very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay so much and will surely shared your kind words to the rest of the team. Looking forward to welcoming you back at the Grand Mercure...  Happy New Year!! Sebastien

title: Great Hotel At Phuket
review: Absolute Wonderfull hotel great staff really friendly. Pornpimon wattanart the lady that works in the bar was so friendly and kind and her manger maew really made me enjoy my stay . I will definitely be coming back . It's situated in the best place easy to access night life shopping or to get taxi or tuk tuk . Wonderfull

title: Good stay but unwelcoming reception staff
review: Great hotel, modern, good location and clean however the reception staff were not very welcoming. It felt like we were a burden to them when asking for beach towels, taxi's and checking in etc.  Eg, while checking in we made payment for our accommodation and the receptionist told us our card had declined and just stared at us without offering any solutions or trying again. I asked him to try it again and the payment went through with no problems. Strange and very unwelcoming.

title: Very nice hotel, near the beach
review: Dear Joseph R,  Many thanks for this great review and rating despite the few issues you had during your stay. As already mentioned, i have already spoke to employees concerned and expecting now great improvement in both areas.   Thank you for sharing those and allowing us to improve our standards even further.   with grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good staff good service
review: The hotel looked very nice and pretty cheap for a 5*, which was why I booked it - and it was! The location is great, very close to the beach, shops and restaurants. The hotel itself looked new with a big pool. Especially I liked that sunbeds stood in the water. I found my room good in size and very clean, except for some weird spots on a wall in the bathroom, but that did not bother me much. There could have been a bigger balcony... The staff was very friendly and smiled to me every time, although I think some can improve their English. Some of the reseptionists did not understand me and I also had difficulties understanding them. At the check-in the guy used Google translate for communicating, which I found was very hard. Otherwise the staff is very helpful and I had no…

title: Service staff need improvement
review: Dear yanazzh,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating!  Always a pleasure to see guests of ours enjoying themselves so much... I have already discuss the billing and deposit mater with our Front office team and expecting improvements in days and weeks to come.   Many thanks again and Happy New Year 2016! Sebastien

title: Stunning
review: Our room was facing the swimming pool. Good one. I was expecting the hotel to be on the beach but it is a 10 mins walk to the beach. Not too bad. there are plenty of restaurants in and around the hotel. Food is no problem at all. Breakfast is good. Overall a good stay.

title: Great stay, very friendly and helpful staff
review: Stayed in grand mercure for the weekend before christmas, and it was a wonderful stay.  From the second you enter the hotel, until you leave the staff will be smiling and willing to help. The breakfast was very good, especially the pastries. The hotel is beautifully designed and the rooms are spacious. If you need any help just ask any of the staff and they would be more than willing to help.  The hotel is a 5 mins walk from patong beach, and about 10-15 mins away from bangla road. Dined most of the days at the thai shop infront of the hotel, the prices are reasonable and the food tastes great.  The only thing that wasnt too great is probably the smell of the rooms, as it is a bit stuffy sometimes. But otherwise everything else is 5 stars.   Would definetely be coming back.

title: Great Stay.. 100 % Recommended...
review: Dear Mohamedelsabaa,  Thank you very much for this 5* review of our property. It is always very encouraging to receive such comments and please be assured i will share those with the rest of our team shortly.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: 4 days 3 nights stay at patong
review: Me and my friend visited Phuket this November and after a lot of research we finalized Grand Mercure Patong Phuket.. And I am really happy and proud that we made this decision as this hotel is value for money. The hospitality by the staff was great. The room and the pool were excellent and the breakfast buffet too was just what you would love when you are on a holiday... The area nearby is so lively and so it made our stay great.  Thank you for such a warm welcome and we surely would love to stay again on our next trip to Phuket.

title: Disappointed ...
review: Dear RiyaBajaj,  Many thanks for this superb review and very kind comments. Very pleased to see you picked Grand Mercure among hundreds and even happier to be considered as your prefered place of stay for future holidays.   Many thanks and see you again in 2016! Sebastien

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: was at grand mercure superior room for 4 days 3 nights . bed and bathroom are spacious and complete with amnenities and standard room facilities .   wifi , swimming pool , gym , child playground and lobby are great .  staff were delightful , pleasant and attentive without being overbearing .   halal food stalls , massage , tuk tuk services are just opposite from our hotel .  only 10 mins walk to patong beach and bangla street , you can get a tuktuk to get there faster for 200baht .   area are not congested and quite apart with busy street .  in a nutshell , i recommended grand mercure phuket patong as one of the best hotel in patong !

title: luxury!
review: Such a great hotel. Rooms were very clean, new and modern! Loved the cafe chou chou, well priced used it for lunch or breakfast some days. Breakfast was quite expensive to be added on! Location great, short walk to the beach and shopping centre. The pool was set up nicely with lots of little sections. Staff were friendly, helped us with anything.

title: Nice, Clean & Convenient
review: Dear meg72015,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  Always a pleasure to receive positive comments and i surely thank our team of bakers and servers at Chouchou on your behalf.  Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next year, ahead of your second visit!  Merry Christmas ahead, to you and your loved ones... Sebastien

title: Recommended
review: I have stayed in Mercure hotels in different parts of the globe, but so far, Grand Mercure Patong is one of the best I have ever stayed! I would recommend this place for a Beach or Relaxing Getaway.  This hotel have very nice amenities and pools, especially the deluxe rooms that is on the same level as the pool which allow guests staying in these rooms to have private access to the pool! The location is very convenient and accessible to Patong Beach and also to a shopping mall (Jungceylon) which is about 10 mins walk away.

title: Luxury in middle of messiness
review: Dear Dolphinjc75,  Thank you very much for the kind review and words. COnsidering the amount of Mercure throughout the Globe, your reference speaks for itself and i am very pleased to see we could provide you with those very little touches that make a big difference on the overall experience and stay.   Once again, thank you and see you back in Patong very soon... Sebastien

title: Relaxing stay
review: Great hotel with great location. So near to the beach and accessible to all shops, massage area, seafood restaurant and all.  Hotel is very clean and service is good. They even have free shuttle to junceylon & patong beach on few time interval. Love the pool access room. Will definitely come back

title: Location & Staff of the hotel was amazing!
review: The hotel is walking distance from Patong beach so its very convenient. There is a family mart, restaurants (San Sabai, hoooters, etc) and massage parlours close to the hotel.  Hotel is relatively new (about 2 years old) so the facilities are all new and updated.  Since we were platinum members of the accor group of hotels, we got upgraded to the suite on the 7th floor with early check-in late check-out and free breakfast as well. The suite was awesome, no view as such, but great facilities.   The staff is amazing, very polite and friendly, makes you feel really special. They gave us suggestions for good restaurants, Apichaya (receptionist) was very helpful throughout our stay.  The breakfast was good, with a good variety of fruits, cereals, eggs, juices, coffee tea, etc.

title: Central Patong
review: Dear RadhikaAC,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves around the property and even more so when it comes to providing personalized and exclusive services to well-travelled Gold Le CLub members...  Many thanks again, i will surely take this opportunity to thank Apichaya and team for their efforts and friendliness.   with grand regards, Sebastien

title: Perfect location
review: Stayed here for 4 nights in October 2015. I normally visit Phuket every year, and this time I wanted to try out Grand Mercure Patong. The location was pretty central in Patong (walking distance to Jungceylon, Bangla rd etc). About 2-3mins by foot to the beach. It is located in the quieter section of Patong, hence you are guaranteed for a good sleep every night! The hotel has a big pool and the rooms are spacious. There are many amenities for children. The staff are friendly and pretty helpful too! I would recommend this hotel if you are coming as a couple of even family.

title: Almost up to excellent hotel
review: Dear Hanif_IM7,  Thank you very much for this great review and wonderful comments about our location and service standards.  It is very much appreciated and always encouraging for the team. We are all very much looking forward to welcoming you back at Grand Mercure.  Sebastien

title: Ok hotel
review: We learnt from our first previous trip to Phuket that its quite a big island so important to choose the right location. This time we stayed Grand Mercure in Patong, and it was perfectly located, near Jungceylon, Bangla Road and the beach, and surrounded by lots of restaurants and little shops. The hotel is big and modern with a great pool too.

title: It was all good until...
review: We stayed from 5 Dec to 8 Dec. It was wonderful being able to check in by mid morning by Nok. Nok is definitely one valuable staff who provided excellent service. She recommended us where to eat, shop and find our way around. Drinks and little snack were served promptly while we waited for the rooms. She even showed us to our rooms for the first time.   The hotel is big, airy and quiet. We had a good time having drinks at Chou Chou as well. The pool is nice but not exactly fantastic for children play.  The room is well equipped except there is no toothbrush unless you request for it. And they do not replace the toothpaste even if you have finished that little tube.  While we thought that we have had made and awesome choice to stay with Mecure, we received a shock on 7 Dec…

title: Modern, Convenient and Next to Patong Beach
review: Dear Hui Ming N,  Thank you for your review and please allow me to apologize on behalf of our Duty Manager and team.  I can understand your surprise and frustration really as i would have myself reacted in similar fashion I think. I do not think there was any evil thought behind his letter. We should indeed have managed the situation differently and probably wait for you to be back instead of simply sending a letter to your room. I do put a lot of pressure on the entire team when it comes to granting highest satisfaction to all while preserving the Hotel assets and sometime it is difficult for us to manage one without affecting the other.  Guest satisfaction is our ultimate goal and i will personally review these entire procedure so to avoid such misunderstanding and concern in future.  It seems like everything was going extremely well up to that particular episode and shall you decide on giving us a second chance to serve, please note that we will be more than happy to have you all back for another relaxing break in Phuket.   I will also take this opportunity to pass on your warmest regards to Nok at the reception and our team at Chou Chou bakery too.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Awesome Birthday celebration with wife
review: The lobby atrium was quintessentially Thai with the spectacular arching white roof and the whole place oozed a certain compact, modern mini-motel family resort aura with the rooms all nestled around the internal pool.. a lovely breeze would serenade you each time you walk along the open corridors to your room which is just right for a couple but manages to house a king size bed.. there's a nice glass enclosed bathroom with a big bathtub to soak in and the amenities have that refreshing tropical lemongrass scent.. the only thing is the balcony was kinda small and was only really useful for hanging wet clothes..  the Thai food at the sole restaurant is an interesting elevated fusion on local fare and definitely worth a try.. otherwise there are plenty of eateries and pubs…

title: Pefect location
review: Dear JohnChiongLuke,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review. Really appreciate the few minutes taken in sharing your Grand experience with the rest of the tripadvisor community.  Thank you for your kind comments about our rooms, our service standards and the quality of the food, our Thai specialties too. Coming from a well-travelled "neighbors", it means a lot to us.   Again, we are all really thankful for those superb comments and recommendations and are all looking forward to your return in 2016.   wth Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent Hotel
review: It s a wonderful place. Do not regret staying there for my wifes birthday celebration. They took care of everything, nice room , a special swan and petals decor and a complementary birthday cake. Chino the manager made sure things were taken care of. Location is excellent, near to patong beach near to jangceylon, near everything. The only problem I have is the gym is way too small for such a big hotel, but then again not everyone is concerned with the gym since there s so much to do in phuke. Anyhow the place is worth more than what we paid for. Would definitely stay there again.

title: Average stay
review: I only spent the night at the hotel on a quick stopover before flying back home. I didn't realise just how far the hotels in phuket are from the airport, I was in the taxi for 1hr and 20 mins! So I don't recommend this hotel for a one night stay. I found it very easy to get a metered taxi from the airport, after you collect your bags and have gone through customs you will walk through doors where people try and sell you car transfers, turn right and ignore them, walk maybe 30-40ms and you will see an exit, this is the domestic arrivals exit, walk through there, then turn right as you go outside and right in front of you will be the metered taxi stand. I can't remember the exact amount I paid but it was between 700-800 thb. Cheaper then the hotel taxi and not hard to find.  I was…

title: Back with great pleasure
review: Dear sl1910,  Thank you for this detailed review and sorry to hear it took you well over an hour to get here.  Usually, guests in transit would consider Hotels closer to the airport, especially at this time of the year where occupancy is raising and traffic can at time be a real concern.   It is a great initiative by the local authorities to allow Taxi meters at the airport and indeed, their rates are usually better than the taxis from Patong or even our Hotel limousines... I would highly recommend future guest of ours to consider those services rather than opting for a "non-licensed' operator once landing at Phuket airport. It is "usually", of better value and also safer.  I have also shared your comments in regards to the room upkeep. Our Housekeeper is investigating and will take suitable measures shortly.   Thank you also for your great comments about our room service and food selection at night.  As for the late check-out charge, it is usually based on the "rate of the day" so to keep it consistent and fair to all.  Once again, thank you and shall you decide on spending a few more nights in Patong next year, please do not hesitate to contact us directly.  Sebastien

title: Absolutely flawless!
review: One year after my first visit I decided to come back, and boys what a wise decision. I already gave 5 to this resort  and I was happy to see that GM Sebastien and the staff kept up the good work. Actually it got even better, with added services to the spa that my wife and daughter loved very much. I strongly advise to try this hotel for your next trip,  a real 5 stars not far from everything but hidden enough to allow a splendid rest.

title: Nice stay & lovely stay
review: Grazie mille AdrianoBerrino,  Always a pleasure to welcome back dear guests and friends of ours... I hope we will find the time to seat and have a drink together...  Have a wonderful stay and see you soon... Sebastien

title: Very great hotel
review: This place is amazing from the second you enter the lobby right up until after you leave. The beautiful attentive staff and management really do go out of their way to ensure you have he most enjoyable and pleasant stay. Many thanks to the Manager Mr Sebastien and his team for their hospitality. We wish you all the luck with your new property.  We shall come back to see you all again!

title: Good pool
review: The pool was great but the service was below average. They would bring you two water bottles at a time but only two so we kept calling every hour. They played music in the hall from 6am until 10pm which might not bother some people but I had to call and ask them to turn it off. The breakfast was good and we booked great day trips through the hotel. They kept calling us to ask for more money for a deposit and have us pay our bill since we spent more for the deposit which makes no sense, hence a deposit. The spa was very nice. I wouldn't stay here again but I also won't be going to Phuket again.

title: New and clean
review: Dear andersensf,  Thank you very much for your review and concerns. I am glad you could take refuge around the pool, away from the hustle and bustle of Patong's street life.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Clean comfortable and quiet
review: Enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Went with my partner and was not disappointed. Probably the only down side of the hotel is the room service/cleaning was really late on some days. Staffs are friendly and the pool was nice and clean. Did not try the food so no comment on that. Convenient with some bars, shopping and family mart across the street. On a quieter side of the road, abit further away from the hectic part of patong street but not too far to walk.

title: Good hotel, terrible area
review: Dea 417damienl,  Many thanks for this very kind comments and wonderful review.  I am happy to note your satisfaction when it comes to hotel location and overall cleanliness of the property and rooms. I will surely share your comment related to maid services too so to speed up that process and make it even more efficient.   Once again, thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: beautiful hotel
review: Got this deal on expedia, this Hotel is not on the water but if you wlk everywere like us close to everything and you save money. Money exchange andd trip sales just down near th e taxi rank and if pushed you can get the trips nearly half price. For the hotel very clean, staff are excellent. Top place to be.

title: Fabulous family holiday
review: From the moment of our arrival we were greeted with big smiles and welcomes (and yummy tea and cakes) We stayed in a deluxe suite on the top floor with a view overlooking the pool - the room was immaculate clean spacious and nicely air conditioned. We traveled with our 15 month old son and the wonderful Samantha sent up a sterilizer and bath complete with rubber ducks to our room! We also had a infant bed set up in our room and housekeeping would turn down his blanket and leave a little flower on his pillow too.  The hotel is located in a great position close to the beach and close to the shops. All of the staff at the Grand Mercure Phuket  are wonderful - a big thank you to Sebastian and his fabulous staff for making our first trip to Thailand so enjoyable - we will be back!!!

title: Fantasic place to stay
review: Dear Claire E,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It was great to have you staying with us for a week and very pleased to see our Housekeepers making an impression as well.   We are already looking forward to your return in 2016...   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Last minute choice
review: What a great place to stay. A new property which is modern and well fitted out. It is also well located with plenty of shopping and restaurants across the road. What made this resort so special was the staff who were all very professional and friendly. From check in with Sumontha and Sita to service at the restaurant and by housekeeping, it could not have been better. Booked a pool access room however was upgraded to a pool villa. Very very nice.  All the rooms however looked very good. Would definatly stay again

title: Fantastic! Great Service! Clean
review: Dear Kevin-A-Jopaz,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating. We are really happy to see we could make your stay most memorable and very much look forward to welcoming you back in 2016.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Had an amazing wedding anniversary
review: We have only just returned from our stay here. Our trip to this hotel was last minute  as we were supposed to be going to Bali but had to change our destination due to the ash cloud. I am a member of Accor and selected the hotel through the Accor app. This hotel is beautiful. I really liked the design of the pool around the rooms and in the centre. The entrance to the hotel is open and is nicely furnished. Our room was a deluxe pool access room, but it was a lot smaller than we imagined. There wasn't much space. The pool access we had was amazing. And we just happened to be in a nice spot that was well covered and gave us some privacy. We could sit outside by the pool and relax. We had a few issues with the room though which surprised me for a 5 star hotel and impacted my rating…

title: Very helpful staff
review: An oasis of calm in full on Patong! Very helpful staff who moved us to a quiet room shortly after we checked in & who also fixed our air conditioning. Pool area lovely as was the food. Room spacious, clean & comfortable. A most enjoyable relaxing week!

title: Amazing!
review: Dear Victoria J,  Many thanks for this great review of our property.  Very pleased we could assist you right away with the air-conditioning unit and ensure you with a most relaxing stay. Please feel free to share your thoughts on restaurant and Deli shop pages as well. Bubbles and Chouchou are receiving lots of praise these days and i will surely take this opportunity to thank our Food & Beverage Department heads shortly.  Once again, thank you and see you both back at Grand Mercure very soon.  Sebastien

title: This is more like a 3.5 star, not a 5 star hotel - it's dirty and moldy
review: I am currently 2 days into a 9 day stay here. The experience has been amazing so far. We paid to have the hotel van pick us up which made the experience a lot easier getting to the hotel. As we pulled into the hotel a man on a scooter slammed into the van as we were getting ready to pull into the hotel driveway. It was not our drivers fault nor were we totally traumatized (maybe because of the 18 hour travel time). The next day the hotel called our room to apologize for the experience and comped our breakfast for the entire stay. It was not necessary but shows how much our experience means to them.   Hotel is very clean and modern with all the amenities you can ask for. Room is equipped with Everything from robes, slippers, hair dryer, safe, fridge and universal power outlets…

title: Beautiful place!
review: Dear Michael M,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review.  Very pleased to see you are both feeling home at Grand Mercure, despite the unfortunate accident on the night of your arrival.   I will try to meet up with you over the coming days and hope you will not hesitate reaching out for any assistance you may need.   Wishing you both a very pleasant stay!. Sebastien

title: An Experience to Remember
review: Room:  Our room was on the 6th floor with a great view of the pool.  Upon check-in we found that the upholstery on the couch and the desk chair were extremely stained and worn.  The room was not very clean.  My bf went back down to see if we could exchange rooms.  We looked at 2 other rooms and the 2 other rooms which both had the same if not worse stains and reeked of mildew.  I think ours perhaps did not smell so bad as the AC had been running prior to our arrival.  They leave the AC off in unoccupied rooms.  For lack of a better room available, we stuck with our original designated room.  I think that the design of the hotel had some high class elements but there was some poor design choices and the hotel has not been kept up well.  The lobby is the swankyest part of the…

title: Very nice resort like hotel
review: Great location. Great staff! Everyone is very friendly. Book the room rate that includes 2 daily breakfast buffets. Children are free so it's totally worth it. Buffet election is huge and food is pretty good. Staff in the buffet are not overly friendly but aren't grumpy or anything. Where they shine the most is at reception from the first greeting to accommodating almost anything you request. Our friends requested to change their room in the middle of their stay to have theirs right beside ours. They took the time to figure out when the room would be available and transferred them when the last guests checked out. Awesome service! The only real negative thing was the mold in the bathroom. It's a given seeing how humid it is. The silicone areas have some mold issues in the shower…

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Ginger88,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review.  Great to see you both had a lovely time with us and would consider Grand Mercure again in future.  The rainy season is slowly coming to an end and we are all very much looking forward to a lower humidity level and sunny days.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Nice one bedroom villa
review: We stayed 3 nights at the Grand Mecure in November, the location was excellent, close to beach and shopping district. The hotel supplies a free shuttle bus to beach and 2 shopping precincts though the day.  The buffet breakfast is extensive and caters to all tastes. The hotel is warm and welcoming and the staff are friendly and courteous, nothing is too much trouble. We stayed in a ground floor pool access room, which was tucked away and very private. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Week in patong
review: Dear Lesley S,  Many thanks for the few minutes taken in sharing your experience with the rest of the community.  Very pleased you liked it so much.   Thank you once again and looking forward to welcoming you both back next year.  Sebastien

title: Excellent service !!
review: After the not really good experience of our first night stayed in Grand Merure, the Manager solved all the issues for us. We really enjoyed the rest of three nights in this lovely hotel. Nice pool, tasty food, friendly staff and beautiful flowers. Thanks. I really like the one bedroom villa. The price is only one third of the same standard room in Australia. I will book the villa for my parents' next anniversary in 2016. If you are here for honeymoon, this is the right one for you. And location! Location! Location! I think this is the most convenience hotel in Patong. 3  minutes to beach. 6 minutes to Bangla Road. 8 minutes to shopping Mall and Banzaan Market. Best location.

title: Excellent
review: We loved every minute of our stay here. It is a resort style place with nice swimming pool area that is great to relax and unwind by. But also such a great location so close to everything in Patong, especially amazing choice of local restaurants.

title: A great place to stay for 6 nights
review: Dear Minsi C,  Thousands for this short yet superb review of our property. We are all very much looking forward to welcoming you both back again soon.  Thank you Sebastien

title: Great hotel in great location
review: Stayed here in Oct 15 with a friend. On arrival we were warmly greeted and our luggage taken. The rooms were not ready as we were early so we went for lunch.  The rooms were large and well appointed with a/c , safe, free wifi, comfortable beds. The bathrooms are wet rooms which is great although there is an odd blind you have to pull down for privacy in the bathrooms, not sure I want to see my mate on the toilet haha.  The hotel has a fantastic pool and pool bar where you can get a decent drink at not too expensive a price. The food by the bar is equally good especially the pizza.   We ate in the hotel one evening at the Asian buffet which was great value and had a huge choice of foods from across Asia. Well worth a go in my opinion. Irritating that they had run out of my 1st…

title: Beautiful hotel, great pool, friendly staff & excellent location
review: Dear david g,  Thank you very much for your wonderful review and rating.  Very pleased to see you enjoyed your stay so much and had a chance on experiencing both our Pizzas and our Asia/Oriental Buffet on Wednesday.   Please feel free to contact any of us directly next time you plan on visiting Patong. We will be delighted to assist you with reservation and any other arrangement you may need.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: An oasis of calm an relaxation in the middle of a wild and hectic city
review: We arrived to some Sean towels and a honeymoon cake which was a nice touch.  Really clean and nice place.  Located 5 min from the beach and right next to amazing little restaurants.  Pool isn't massive but is very nice with swim up bar.  Breakfast was lovely.

title: Comfortable stay
review: I normally don't stay in luxury hotels like this but only because i work for the company in Australia that i get my staff discount card to have the amazing opportunity to experience these lovely places in style. We booked online on my app very easily and amount already taken out of my account when we arrived, just the room deposit. As always greeted with big smiles, helped with out bags and taken to our room. The lovely gentleman notice the room had a damp smell to it and changed our room straight away to another lovely room with a great view of the pool. Only down side to us was that we used the waters from the fridge and obviously didn't check the price list that they weren't for free as we thought they would of been as in the Sofitel and most other hotels they usually are too…

title: Very clean and modern in the heart of Patong
review: Dear Lorelei M,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and looking forward to your return in 2016.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Lovely & relaxing resort close to Patong Beach & Bangla Road.
review: We had only two days here after ten days at a beach property  at Kata Noi beach . My friend had not been to Thailand before so we wanted a few days to shop and  see the craziness of Patong s Bangla road and night life . I was so excited to finally receive my gold Accor card  and was hoping for an upgrade on arrival  which is given if available at the time . We were very pleased then to be given a suite on the seventh floor . It was lovely with beautiful  views  of the pool  and glimpses of the ocean  whilst walking to the lifts . It had. Coffee machine which was great to have an espresso on the balcony . The bathroom was lovely with seperate shower room and seperate toilet  and a big bath  as well . Also there were flowers in the bathroom and we received a lovely fruit basket .…

title: great spot and clean
review: Dear catherine w,  Thank you very much for your detailed review and great rating. I am very pleased to see you appreciated your stay and the little extras offered within our Suites very much.   I wish to also thank you for sharing the few communications issues in regards to the transition between AdvantagePlus and AccorPlus card. Our Front office Manager has conducted yet another briefing about it and i will today review the benefits and personalized treatments usually offered to Gold and Platinum members with them too.   Once again, great to see you had a lovely stay with us.. Sebastien

title: Very Happy Thx
review: Beautiful & relaxing resort that allows you to escape from the craziness of Patong Beach & Bangla Road. The staff were professional & polite. Bubbles Restaurant, Room Service & Chou Chou Cafe offered a great variety of food & drinks. Would highly recommend the Pool Access Rooms. Thankyou to the Grand Mercure Phuket for a lovely & relaxing week. Would love to come back & visit you again.

title: 35th Wedding anniversary
review: My wife and I wanted to celebrate our 35th wedding anniversary somewhere classy and stylish. We stayed 12 days, from 14th October. Could not fault this hotel at all. Everything from the moment we signed in to the day we left was excellent and the staff at the front desk, concierge, pool attendants, room service, housekeeping, restaurant staff even driveway attendants, did everything gladly, quickly and with a friendly smile. The food and drinks was also impeccable. The General Manager Sebastien runs a great hotel. Definitely returning again, the experience was worth every cent, (or Baht)  Des & Rosetta

title: WOW!
review: Dear dest285,  Many thanks for this superb rating and review of our property! Glad to see you both enjoyed your holidays so much.   Once again, thank you and see you again in 2016... Sebastien

title: Best Location, impressive services
review: We stayed at G.Mercue Patong a couple of nights and really enjoyed it: perfectly located, only 10 mins walk from Patong beach so, great to avoid all the noise of the area. The team was very friendly, polite and speak fluently english. The room was big and very well appointed. The bathroom amenities very good and the bed very comfy. MUST DO: Book a "pool room" with direct access to the swimming pool - made in a way to respect your privacy but so cool to simply jump from your terrace! The breakfast was full of options to please all of us! Thank you for your hospitality and we look forward to visiting you again soon!

title: Fantastic service & people, modern room
review: Dear Globetrotter1605,  What a pleasure to start the week reading such a review! Thank you very much and please rest assured we are all committed in continuously providing such Grand experiences at the property.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Would return for sure
review: Location is about 1 hours from airport, but at a heart of recreation. We arrived at 9th, suppose to wait until 11th for check in, but Sebastien - GM was very kind to let us check in earlier. We book 3 rooms. He is very cool GM, so nice and warm, he greeting every guest who just arrived. He has very good personality, this is shown also to all his staff. All are very warm welcome us and work professional, check in proses were super fast, welcome drink is very nice and unique. The lobby is very cozy, very relaxing bar located near the lobby, walking a bit far to our rooms, but is not a problem, the room facing to breathtaking pool view. Size is fine, very clean, comfort bed, soft pillow make my sleep so relax, very quiet. Lighting was good, strong signal of Wifi. The bathroom is…

title: Great hotel at affordable price in a good location
review: This is an Accor hotel (owner of the Sofitel).  Like the Sofitel, everything works well and the rooms and facilities are nicely appointed and very comfortable.  The room was spacious, well stocked, and clean. It had a great bathtub, and plentiful outlets, a safe, and other needed amenities.  The gym was adequate, but small.  There is an okay pool, and a spa that was always busy.  The service was helpful and attentive.  There aren't many nice hotels right near Patong Beach, so if you're interested in Bangla Street (Walking Street) and Patong Beach, this is a great choice.  Phuket is pretty big, so many locations are 40 minutes drive away, so it's nice to be able to walk to Bangla and the beach along with massage locations and restaurants within 5-10 minutes.

title: New hotel, Excellent stay, close to Patong beach
review: Dear AmanJunkieBoston,  Many thanks for this superb review. It is always a pleasure to see guests of ours enjoying themselves so much!  Looking forward to your return in 2016... Sebastien

title: Best hotel experience I ever had!
review: The hotel is newly built in 2014, so it is very trendy, clean, equipped with stylish furniture. Its location is very good and convenient; closely located to Patong beach, shops and restaurants.  There are some rooms with pool access, which I want to stay next time. It looks awesome that you can just jump into the pool from the room. Nice view from my room that we can face the swimming pool. There is a bar in the swimming pool, so you can have a drink or desert if you want to take a rest when swimming. Free yoga session is provided and is by appointment 1 day in advance. Quite good experience to have yoga in vacation. But what a pity that it is a in-room yoga near swimming pool, but not outdoor facing the swimming pool. A cute purple elephant is placed on the bed. You can take it…

title: Wanna stay here for the rest of my life!
review: Dear Borb_laib,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. Very pleased to see you enjoyed your stay with us so much...  I have discussed with our Activity Manager this morning and soon, we should be able to move all yoga, Taichi and Thai boxing activities to our gardens.   Thank you and see you again next year!  Sebastien

title: Couldn't wish for more.
review: If you want to stay at a luxury and brand new hotel this is definately your best choice for the Patong area at Phuket. The hotel has a great location near the city centre and nightlife. Also a big shopping mall is at a 10 minute walk where you can shop till you drop. There are many restaurants and bars around the hotel to relax and have a good bite of Thai food.  I was amazed by the friendly staff and excellent service by everyone who worked at the hotel. I really appriciated the effort both the manager mr. Tronchet and his executive assist took to take care of me during my stay, making sure I did not had anything to miss or complain about at all. It's was all worth it!  If I would come back to Phuket I will book this hotel without a doubt for my full stay and can recommand this…

title: Good location, central to everywhere
review: My wife and me arrived earlier (@ 11am). However, the front desk staff allowed us to check-in even not the check-in time yet. The front desk staff even guide us all the way to our room. Our room was facing the a nice swimming pool view (I believe all room are). The bathroom had a see-through glass panel but we able to slide down with the blind. Overall the hotel is nice and we can take the hotel free shutter to the beach and mall on scheduled time. The only things we feel a bit disturb was the damp floor and mildew smell of the room due to the humidity of the island.

title: Great Location and Service
review: Dear geoffloh85,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review. I am particularly pleased to hear about the early check-in option that was offered to you upon your "early" arrival at the property. We often receive requests for it, as guests would like to maximize their holidays by arriving as early as possible on the island and when possible, we are always willing to assist.  We are currently tackling the humidity issue most of the properties are facing at the moment and are investing in a software that will allow us to control air flow and condensation in room better, whether when guests are staying in the room or not. The raining season is "slowly" coming to an end and we really can't wait to see sunny days coming back.   Once again, thank you very much and see you again next year! Sebastien

title: Lovely Peaceful Hotel - great staff, food and facilities
review: I stayed 5 nights at this hotel while on holiday with my brother and 4 other friends, I am a Accor platinum member and received room upgrade for myself and my brother, from check in to check out everything went smoothly, the gym is well equipped and supervised, bottled water and clean towels were offered on arrival and when I left. I also used the spa for a massage and again this was a great experience. I had the pleasure of meeting the GM Sebastien who obviously knows how to train and motivate his team

title: FANTASIC PLACE
review: Dear Paul F,  It was a great honor and pleasure to welcome one of you and your family, as one of our Platinum member and most valuable guests. Thank you so much for those very kind words... I am sure our Management and associates will  be very pleased to see you all had a wonderful break in Patong.   Thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: from check in, this place was a joke
review: We have just returned from our second visit to the Grand Mercure Patong.  First off we are not great fans of Patong as a rule but this hotel is so quiet and peaceful you would never know that you were in the midst of such a busy area.  The staff at the hotel are simply excellent - led by a proactive and efficient management team.  They are all so friendly - we felt very welcome from the minute we arrived!  We stayed in a one bedroom pool villa - a really comfortable and private living space.  Access during the day to a club lounge serving soft drinks and snacks was very much appreciated.  The weather was a bit inclement on our last night so we chose to eat at the main hotel restaurant 'Bubbles'.  We had a fabulous meal that was very good value (we used our Accor Plus card) and…

title: Never make me disappoint
review: Every time, when I visit here, this hotel never make me disappoint.last time when I stay there I feel relax, they still keep service standard, I remember that every time came here I also use their massage service . I really love it.   and I also do like,  having breakfast beside swimming pool,   I promise I will be back soon.

title: Extremely slow and poor checkout service
review: Dear kornsirikarnkingprai,  Kob Khun Krub for this wonderful review! I am very pleased to hear you and your friend enjoyed your time with us so much and that the Pool access room was a great pick too.   Please do spread the words in Bangkok as we would love to see a lot more Thai Nationals traveling to Patong and staying at our property.   Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Great hotel in Patong
review: Very nice hotel in a great location.  Room was very nice but vacation ended very badly as we waited 20 minutes to check out of our room, overcharged for the taxi service to the airport and then threatened to have police stop us over 2400 baht despite the hotel having our credit card on file.  If you stay here be sure to plan on spending 30-45 minutes checking out as the lobby is unorganized an chaotic.  Again hotel is nice and staff was pleasant but the long wait, over charging for a taxi service and unable to properly charge room service did put a negative charge in the end of a holiday

title: great hotel to stay at
review: Dear Paul D,  Many thanks for sharing your experience and also the few issues you had to go through upon check-out. Following our discussion yesterday, i am pleased we can now put those behind us and hopefully have a chance of welcoming you back at Grand Mercure.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: wonderful resort
review: Great hotel in Patong.Patong area in general was very smelly and dirty but the hotel was an exception. Nice staff and good service. Food was good too.  Will return to this hotel in every again in Patong.

title: Brilliant and highly recommended!
review: We stayed here for 5 nights and were upgraded to a villa room without request. We also received complimentary fruit bowl in the room, drinks and treats upon arrival, access to the club room with free snacks and refreshments all day, free wifi, daily buffet breakfast and discount on laundry! The hotel was very generous and make you feel very welcomed. It is located within Patong and close walking distance to markets, eateries and the famous Bangla road. I would recommend eating at the San Sabai restaurant across the road, the food is cheap and very tasty. The taxi stand is next door to the hotel and they are pleasant people, especially Mr Prichet, he drove us around each day.

title: Really nice hotel and staff
review: Dear Jot88,  Many thanks for this superb review.  I am glad you were pleased with the upgrade and the small benefits that come with it. Offering  memorable holidays is what keep us up at night and it is great to see you enjoyed your stay with us so much :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: all the facilities you could hope for
review: I stayed at this hotel two weeks ago and thought it was really impressive with exceptional staff working there.    All the staff were very kind and polite to us and tried there hardest to help us with any queries; the guards manning the driveway/car park, reception/concierge staff and restaurant staff were all exceptional.   I stayed in room 641 which had a very nice view out onto the pool (similar to the view in the professional photos of the hotel).   The room had lots of nice touches:  - two pairs of very comfortable slippers in the wardrobe - a glass fronted drawer inside the wardrobe for smaller items of clothing - a wardrobe light that came on each time you open the door - lots of ambient lights (one above the headboard, one underneath either bedside table, a table lamp)…

title: Every thing you could need or want is here great location
review: Dear fijishams,  On behalf of the three hundreds or so members of the Grand Mercure family, i would like to thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with the rest of the community.   I am really pleased to see your kind words on both the soft and hardware and really can't thank you enough for this wonderful and very detailed review.   We are all very much looking forward to welcoming you back next year...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Standard, met expectations, very busy with families
review: Though we only stayed here one night, we really enjoyed our time at the Mercure. The pool was lovely, we had an excellent massage at the spa, and the buffet breakfast had everything you could possibly want to eat. It was also extremely convenient for trips to the Jungceylon shopping centre, as well Bangla Road to experience the nightlife the town has to offer.   The staff were very friendly and helpful. When I injured my foot they took me to the first aid room and got me cleaned up, and then even called our room to check on me later.   There was a bit of a language barrier between us and certain staff members whose English wasn’t great, but nothing that couldn’t be overcome. The only real problem we had was with the air conditioning, which we couldn’t manage to change in our…

title: Fantastic Wheelchair friendly hotel in Patong
review: Arrived at this hotel very tired after our flight. The staff couldn't have been more welcoming - greeting us with a refreshing towel, drink and pastry. Our room was fantastic. Easy to get around the bed in a wheelchair and the bathroom was beautiful and very accessible. First time i have ever had a chair in the shower as when we stay at hotels normally i get off the chair and sit on the floor. We put the blind down in our bathroom all the time as it offered more privacy. The bed was incredibly comfortable. Our room was on the same floor as the lobby and the lift was next door. Very easy to get to the restaurant and the pool. There are 2 ramps to get into the lobby and they were very easy to navigate. The path down from the hotel was good but the ramp down the bottom was a bit…

title: Good hotel
review: Dear wheeliemandy,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful and very detailed review of our property. It was a great pleasure to have you, your husband and your friend(s) all staying with us and we are all very pleased to hear you had an amazing stay.   Glad you liked the room so much :)  See you again next April... since then, please take care of your good self! Sebastien

title: Great Hotel!!!
review: We stayed 2 nights there and the breakfast was good and hv many choices.  Pool is nice but unlucky that  2 days are raining so we didn't swim. The location is good at patong and if u want to walk to jungcylon, it takes about 5 minutes walk to there

title: Dream Hotel!
review: Dear Kanas0811,  Thank you so much for this superb review and rating.  The sun is now back and we are all happy you could still appreciate the beauty of the island and the quality of our services despite the heavy rain falls that we experienced over the last few days...  See you again soon... Sebastien

title: Excellent
review: Stayed here for 4 nights and it was a wonderful experience.  Upon arrival was great and we were surprise that the hotel was very beautiful and very well designed, even better than the pictures showed in the website. All the staffs are very well trained, helpful and very friendly. The staff that we appreciate the most was Sita, she is such a wonderful and helpful person (my mum adores her!!) I must say the room is beyond our expectation, very clean, very comfortable and great place to rest! The meals were great and the mojito was uhm!!!! We would like to Thank all the staff especially Sita for our great vacation!! Will be back soon!!

title: Good Hotel Management
review: We were experienced issue when we first arrived, however once the hotel received our feedback the management person have immediately call to understand the incident and efficiently solved the issue. A good Hotel that really care about their customers stayed. My family have happy memories at the beautiful pool. This hotel served delicious breakfast and superb nice lunch and dinner. Short Walking distance to the beach and the hotel is surrounded by restaurant, pub, massage center and night market. A new hotel which recommended for family with kids and old folk.

title: Poor Customer Service
review: Dear 164huiyingk,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review! Really pleased to see you all enjoyed your family holidays very much.   See you again very soon, Sebastien

title: Wonderful Hotel and excellent staffs
review: We had pre-arranged with Ryn Spa for massage before we check into the hotel.  The spa is clean and therapists were good, we enjoyed our time there.   After the massage, we wanted to check into the hotel and was told the room is still not available until 2pm.  Then we proceed to have lunch opposite the hotel.  By 2.30pm, we approached the front office and again ask to wait at the lobby and she will check for us.  However, this lady, did not check for us  and just let us sat their to wait.  We decided to approach another staff, and this particular staff get the key for us which was already there placed at the front desk.  Location is good easy to access to Jung Ceylon and shopping area. The sofa and bathroom in the room were stained, bed is comfortable.  The housekeeping need to…

title: An Oasis amongst Organed Chaos
review: Dear MYWoon,  Many thanks for sharing your thoughts about your previous stay at the property. July was a very busy month for most properties in Patong and i am sorry we had to ask you to wait a little longer than usual before granting you access to your room. I wish you could have mentioned this particular point to us directly and while at the property though.   I am really pleased you enjoyed your treatment at RYN Spa and hope you will give us a second chance to serve and impress...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Service par excellence
review: What a wonderful Hotel a lot of Restaurant sound closer to shopping mall, Upon arrived was great full with warm welcome from Bell boy to reception, Here all staff helpful and alway smiles to you I feel it that not only to have smiles but they're smile from heart especially Ann Issariya,Apichya every time me and my friends passes to them always smiles to us this is so impressed and I will recommend to all friends and Family of mine to visit here , I don't need to leave but have to go back home, room very clean be and comfortable to sleep, Hope to come back again soon, Thanks for all staffs to made my excellent stay here

title: Loved it!
review: Fairly new hotel in the heart of patong. Loved our stay! Our room was small but modern and the staff was great. We got massages almost everyday sometimes twice a day at a place next door to the grand Mercure. Lots of restaurants around the hotel. Overall a great visit and would recommend.

title: Good location, fabulous staff, unforgetable trip
review: Dear Lakrchic834,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review.  I wish i would have had the chance of meeting you in person and try to convince you on trying one of our very own treatment at Ryn Spa though... Next year perhaps :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Hotel
review: Stayed here for 2 nights for leisure trip. Checked in was smooth by a lady (i forgot the name) who was friendly and she provided us room with nice view as we requested. Yongyut, the concierge staff was also very helpful. He escorted us to room and recommended us some places to go. It was raining season, so we were just chilling at the pool. The pool is nice, especially the staff at pool bar (Aon and Bounce). They recommended us to have spicy carbonara pizza and it was so yummy. They also have nice breakfast n nice ambience. I could not mention all the names but all the staff are super friendly, especially Sarayut from concierge and Waranthon from restaurant. Even thou it was raining but they made our trip unforgetable by their smiles. Kudos for this hotel!

title: Nice hotel with everything nearby
review: Dear Hanna S,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review.  It is always encouraging to see names of so many of our employees being mentioned and i will surely have your review shared and published on our staff board too...   Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Amazing few days in patong
review: I recently stayed 10 nights at the Grand Mercure Hotel Patong Beach. It is a great place to stay, the staff were always friendly and very very helpful. The meals in the restaurant were excellent. I will definitely be staying there next time I visit Patong

title: Good stay and strategic.
review: Hotel was clean,friendly staff and location of the hotel is good.distance to bangla street approximately 10min walk.lots of shops and good food area at its area.sight seeing area are of some diatance.using the toot toot..cost you about 200bhat per one way...

title: Nice hotel great location service hit or miss
review: Dear pavinks,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! We are very pleased to note your satisfaction when it comes to the location of the property and our services...  Thank you again and see you next year hopefully! Sebastien

title: Fantastic hotel in a great location
review: Hotel great location walk to shops, mall, starbucks, restaurants and the beach. Food is good. Pool and fitness center were nice. Room small but comfortable. Bed and shoes are nice. Service in restaurant is good. One day at the pool they had no clean towels.  Advised me it be a half hour wait and on morning did not do wake up call. So service is hit or miss. The hotel did apologize with free use of hotel car to airport which was nice.  I would stay here again

title: A great place to stay
review: Dear James C,  Thank you for your comments and review.  I was informed yesterday about the issue related to the wake-up call and can't appologize enough for it. Our Front office Manager is still investigating with her afternoon and night shift teams as we could not find any record so far... This episode will i am sure serves us well in future and allow us to review our internal procedures with team accordingly.   I am glad you would still be considering our Hotel as prefered place of stay next time you visit Phuket and can't wait to welcome you back here at Grand Mercure!  Sebastien

title: Welcome to stay
review: We stayed at this hotel from 3-5 September. We had a bit of a bad start at the hotel as the bell boys just stood there chatting when we arrived so we had to ask them to help with our bags as we had heavy bags and there were steps to walk up - usually at every hotel we have stayed the bell boys are ready to help with bags as soon as you step out of the taxi but this did not happen here even though the guys were just standing there talking. We noticed the same thing happening to other guests a few times during our stay so this is something the hotel management should address. Furthermore when checking in, the form prepared by the check in staff had incorrectly assumed our nationality due to our names which was very disappointing. Having previously stayed at the Novotel down the…

title: Pool access rooms
review: we booked this hotel after staying at the holidayi inn burkerum wing last year,we were there for 15 days after the second day we wished we had booked the holiday in again, Pool was very noisey and not very private ,considering the hotel is only 18 months old the rooms are considerably tired smeld of dampness and had a smell of urine at the one side of the bed floor,we asked our maid to clean it and she did a good job but the smell kept coming backend we had to ask her to bleach floor again,maid was fantastic until she had days off others not so good,my wife booked room service one night at 7:30 it arrived at 9:30 to late to eat but we were still charged.reception was great any issues we're dealt with quickly and efficiently apart from the once we asked to see inside a pool villa…

title: Nice hotel
review: Dear moon1960,  First of all and on behalf of our management team, please kindly accept our most sincere apologies...  More than the few issues you had to go through, i am devastated by the fact you stayed 2 weeks with us and none of us, at the executive level, managed to meet with you even once, so to see how things were going or if there was anything we could have assisted you with. This is a procedural issue i will address in person shortly.   I am also very sorry to hear that housekeeping standards went from great to "not so good" overnight. I would really like to hear from you more about this and help us address this concern in a more effective manner. I called for a meeting yesterday with our Executive housekeepers and the 3 ladies that were assigned to your floor during your 14-day holidays and they all have an excellent record with us to be honest... with 2 of them being mentioned by guests on many different occasions.   I would also seek your assistance in reviewing timing and performance of our Room Service team too. In our cashier system (which is computerized), your waiter "closed" your bill at 8.47 pm, meaning the food was served prior to that time and therefore, i am a little concerned about the "actual time of order". I reviewed the time of delivery thanks to the cameras on the corridors and it was just before 8.45pm. It can happen that orders are queuing on the kitchen pass... but not to that extend and regardless of the delivery time, the fact you were charged is beyond me... I could not even believe it going through your review.   If you do not mind, i will send you an email separately and discuss those unfortunate issues with you personally.  I am really sorry it took us 10 days to offer you a cappuccino and even more sorry about the fact you left with mixedfeelings after what should have been a very unique and memorable holidays.  with Grand regards, Sebastien.

title: Good solid luxury hotel
review: I love the swimming pool esp when u upgrade ur superior room. So the pool is just under the balcony. The breakfast got a lot choices and delicious. The market nearby also great to drop by. A lot restaurant nearby and taste nice.

title: Top class hotel
review: Thank you very much Jessie Z! Glad you could relax for a few days with us...  See you again soon hopefully, Sebastien

title: Fantastic Hotel, great food & Service
review: We booked this place for 2 nights on our Thai adventure. The plan was to have a little bit of nightlife between our trips to Koh Samui and Phi Phi, and this hotel was the right location for us to do that.   Check in was great, smooth and efficient as you'd expect from a branded 5-star, the staff very polite. The first thing I noticed was the massive walk to our room, and I wondered at one point if We'd got lost.... Certainly the lad dragging the bags would have qualified as a Tibetan Sherpa had we gone much farther.   Eventually after getting to the room (and pausing for breath) we had a quick look around. Everything is here that you'd expect from a 5-star, nice well stocked mini bar too! The room was impeccably clean, and the beds were amazingly comfortable.   The pool was…

title: Choose this Hotel !!!, in Patong Beach
review: I was here with one of my friends just two ladies who love good food good drink good night out. The hotel located near all things that we are looking for. The staffs are really helpful. We are staying at Pool Access Room type. It is right next to the pool. So cool. Great experience. Would definitely come back.

title: Relax, Pool Villa
review: Dear JoBzillaa K,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review and pictures.  It is great to see the two of you having fun in the pool and around the premises...   Looking forward to welcoming you back next year! Sebastien

title: I will not come back
review: Stayed with partner and 6 year old in Deluxe one bed villa about 100sq mtr. they made up a bed for our son in the separate room where tv/lounge was viewed, leaving plenty of space. We were in room 904 at the back corner of the resort and wifi was fine. Rooms in this new resort were clean and shiny. The bathroom large and well laid out.  Room service was prompt.  On check in we were introduced to the General Manager, Sebastien and throughout our stay I often noticed him saying hi to new guests, nice touch. He was attentive and keen to better things, although we had no complaints. We got what we expected. We found the breakfasts were plenty ample with sufficient choices. The hotel has great location 10 mins walk to beach. Shuttle to Phuket town is free. I agree the property is…

title: Would stay again!
review: Dear MuknDeb,  Many many Thanks for this wonderful review.  It was great meeting you indeed and we are all very pleased by your kind comments about the team and products offered.   Our Pool villas are ideal when traveling with a child or a 3rd person as they do allow us to utilize the space, yet offering privacy to all. Great to see you loved it.   Please feel free to contact any of us directly next time you plan on visiting Patong... We wil be delighted to extend you with even more personalized services and amenities... so to make your second stay an even more enjoyable one.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: A quieter place away from the centre
review: I stayed here for six days. Prior staying here, I thought the hotel was good since it was rated as the top choice in Airasiago website. It was my honeymoon and I had been looking forward for a great vacation in Phuket. That was my second time visiting Phuket. In the previous trip, I sayed at DusitD2 Hotel,5 minutes distance from this hotel.   This is the worst 5 star rated hotel I have ever been to. I have stayed in so many 5 star hotels and this one really disappoints me. We made the booking 4 months in advance and it was clearly written that we booked for a room with a king bed. When we arrived my boyfriend and I was given a very tiny room with two single beds. You can never imagine our disappointment. We called the room service and told them about it. What they did was…

title: A Perfect Location
