review: Grand Mercure is situated about 15 minutes walk from a shopping mall. Restaurants, open air markets, massage salons and souvenior shops are also in the walking distance. It is virtually a perfect location.   When we just arrived at the hotel, however, no one came to greet us even though we had stood in front of the reception desk for a few minutes. While there were a few hiccups, the service was still satisfactory during our stay. The staff were polite and helpful.  The villa, in particular the pool, was relatively small compared to other villas I have previously stayed but it has pretty much what you could find in a villa in any hotel. If you just want to dip into the water with some privacy, the villa's pool still does the trick. If you want to stretch your legs, you could…

title: Great Hotel, close proximity to restaurants and entertainment strip.
review: Dear Karmaexplorer,  Thank you very much for this great yet sincere review.  I am very pleased to note your satisfaction when it comes to Villa set-up and overall service and will surely have a chat with our Food & Beverage Manager and Chef today.   Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and definitely an area where improvements and adjustments are needed on daily basis.   Our new Executive Chef has only joined us for a few weeks and his first "mission" is to review and improve the offer and overall quality of the breakfast.  Therefore, we should soon see great improvements to the spread with a local fresh juices station and greater egg selection being added and reviewed. Our Oriental & vegetarian offer also need some touch-up and they will all be soon put into place.  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Sofabed for kid, Good front desk staff.
review: A difficult property to fault. Staff were efficient and friendly, especially at breakfast. Rooms were clean and the pillow mix superb. For elderly or mobility impaired persons ensure you book a room with a walk in shower. The bath sides are very high in the other rooms, a little difficult to negotiate. Overall a good value for money stay.

title: perfect location , 5 star service & staff, 3-4 star infrastructure
review: Dear trev0rm48,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. I am really pleased to see you appreciated the efforts of our Housekeeping team in keeping your home-away-from-home tidy and cleaned during the entire period.   As for the bathtub access, we have added a stainless handle next to the bath so to ease the access in & out... Still, i understand that people of a certain age, or younger ones with knees or back problems might found it difficult to access.  As you correctly mentioned, half of our room inventory is made of "walk-in showers" and therefore i would recommend anyone not comfortable with our bathtubs to simply make a request for the shower instead, at the time of the booking preferably (so to get organized accordingly).  Thank you and see you again next year! Sebastien

title: New and fresh with very nice sunbeds at the pool
review: Hotel has GOOD LOCATION and SERVICE. The room has good size, we booked the lowest room typed and it fit us (fam of 4 with 2 kids -5&7yro) Since the bed was king size and there was a sofabed.if you are a family, and has dilema (budget vs. Comfort) this hotel will fit you perfectly. In front of the hotel there are plenty of good seafood restaurants. Everything you need are walking distance. I encountered small problem regarding my accor dine in discount, but was easily taken care of by Tod at the front desk. Food at Bubble restaurant were good too, should try it while relaxing by the pool. I would come back again if I visited phuket. I trust Accor standard and this hotel maintain it very well. Thank you Tod, Sebastien and accor team. We had pleasant stay.

title: Fantastic hotel, great location and service
review: We had a pool access room which is a must if you can get it, the rooms aren't big but having the outdoor area makes a massive difference, with the water right at your feet. All staff we came across were friendly and welcoming. Breakfast on some mornings was a bit hectic but very well organised with the F&B staff seating everyone as quickly as possible, Paul the Assistant F&B Manager was always unflappable and extremely friendly. The hotel is fairly new and very well maintained and staff constantly cleaning around the public areas. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a high class hotel with great team from the General Manager Sebastien, to everyone else we came across during our stay. The hotel is in a great location, a short walk to  jungceylon shopping centre,…

title: Excellent Hotel !
review: Dear LyndaM456,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review. It is great to start the week reading such review and i will surely pass on your warmest regards to the Team and Paul most particularly.   Our Pool access rooms are too one of my favorite units and i am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us so much.  See you again soon... Sebastien

title: Best holiday
review: Stayed in this hotel on 7-9 August 2015. A very nice and clean hotel, the staffs are friendly. Loves the location ttmax as it is close to restaurants, bars and shopping malls. The , will definitely be back to this hotel again.

title: Great stay calm and relaxing
review: Dear RinaLim,  Many thanks for this short, yet wonderful review of our property! We are all very much looking forward to welcoming back at Grand Mercure once again.  Sebastien

title: Excellent Hotel
review: My wife and I stayed here on April 2nd 2014 when we have booked only 2 weeks from the second day of opening of the Grand Mercure. We arrived late in the evening and the greeting from the staff was great. Paper works was process quickly and were guided to our room at the top level. We enjoyed the first week very well including daily Breakfast. On the second week we were offered an upgrade to the pool access area (Room 107). This was a great experience and we made good use of it. At the end of our second week we decided to stay for another 2 weeks as we liked it very much here. As my Birthday fell in to the last week of our stay, Sebastian invited us to have a Dinner here to celebrate this occasion. In the morning I was surprised by the staff with Happy Birthday greetings in our…

title: Great pool view rooms - close to the action - yet far enough away!
review: Fantastic Hotel and the staff were very accommodating. Close to all the action yet far enough away to be relaxed and enjoy your holiday. Amazing pool rooms allow you to relax on the balacony before slipping in to the pool and around to the bar.

title: Room 125 - Pool Access
review: Dear ryan_wilmott,  Thank you very much for sharing your own experience with the rest of the Trip Advisor community. Very pleased to see you had a wonderful stay in one of our Pool access room.   Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Great Stay
review: This hotel is just over a year old. The presentation and facilities were grand. The pick of a room is the swim up pool room straight to your room with your own private pool access. Breakfast is included in our package at Bubbles restaurant. The food Manager Jamnong was very helpful, after a few days he could remember my coffee order. Unfortunately Irene who was manning the reception for breakfast was not suited to her role. She could not adequately take charge and organise a wait list to get in for breakfast during the busy hours of 9 - 10am. The General Manager Sebastien, a French man personally greeted us on our arrival, which was a lovely touch. The only criticism on my room type was the lack of storage for you clothes. It was taken up by a safe and pool towels, this is only…

title: Very Amazing
review: Dear Jason C,  Thank you very much for this very honest review and kind compliments about the team members.  Very pleased to see you both had a great stay despite the very high occupancy the Hotel was enjoying during that period and the busy breakfast times...   Patong and Phuket as a whole is seeing a switch in its own clientele mix and with Phuket's Airport now deserving most Asian capitals directly, it becomes very convenient if not easy for young couples and families to come over to Phuket for a few days only. We are seeing the average length of stays reducing to about 4 nights only against the 10-12 nights average Hotel were accommodating only a few years ago.  Thanks to our positioning, we can still maintain a good balance, between holiday makers coming from Europe, Australia or the States and other Asian clients probably coming on for a weekend or few days holidays only (like short break away from capital cities).  Our Middle East clients are usually visiting Thailand in July & August, when the temperatures are at their highest in their home country so altogether, we are still very happy with the way things are evolving in the entire region and are adapting our team to new requirements as well (multi languages, new cuisine orientations, room amenities...etc).  Many thanks again for this wonderful review and please feel free to contact me directly for your 7th visit!! I would be more than happy to assist you personally with reservation and other arrangements as well.  with Kind regards, Sebastien

title: Second Visit
review: We had 2 days at hotel Grand mercure phuket patong. Everything certainly made our stay very enjoyable. Good location, Great service and friendly staffs. We had great holiday and super great experience. Thank you.

title: Great experience
review: Beautiful hotel mixing modern and tradition , well done. Every outlet are very attractive and well decorated , the cake shop Chou-Chou is very cute,shame that it's "hiding" behind the lobby. the Gm make you feel home and he is very friendly , the managers at the breakfast can remember your preferences after 2 days only, kids corner team are amazing with kids . The room very comfortable and clean , only 2 comments: missing clock in a room and transparent door in the washroom are not glamorous as you believe, especially when you have kids and you want privacy.

title: GREAT LOCATION AND PROPERTY
review: Dear jmgaucher,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review and photographs. We are very pleased to see you all enjoyed your time with us very much and please rest assured that your comments about shower room privacy and clock will not be left unattended. Our Chief Engineer is already working on a few different designs for the glass door....  Once again, thank you and see you again very soon. Sebastien

title: Will never return
review: Spent a great week at the Grand Mercure in Phuket. The hotel is very new and is situated within walking distance of great shopping and eating, they also provide regular transport to Patong Beach and the local shopping centre. The rooms are very comfortable and well equipped. A word of advice for the more elderly - ask for a room with a separate shower and not one located in the bath as its a bit difficult to get in and out of. The pool area is welcoming as is the lounge and 6 to 8 happy hour, and the same goes for the breakfast. The staff throughout are particularly helpful and friendly and we would like to make special mention of Khun Manus, Khun Aphichaya and Khun Ann all on the from desk who made our stay even more enjoyable.

title: Unfortunately the hotel rooms were not up to the standard, we were very disappointed.
review: Dear Hugh B,  Many thanks for this great review and kind words about our team and facilities.  I will certainly take this opportunity to thank Khun Apichaya and Khun Ann for their outstanding contribution.  Once again, it was a pleasure welcoming and serving you during these few days holidays...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Wow
review: We just stayed for our second time at this hotel,stayed in October and had a fabulous time so we were really looking forward to returning but sadly we were severely disappointed. The room was so dirty,had mould on walls and only changed our sheets once and that was at my request. We stayed for 6 nights. The portacot was also covered in mould. I will attach pictures. The staff are friendly but thats the only thing this hotel has going for it. Food was below average and whenever we requested extra towels they never came. One day we called twice in an hr and they never showed up. We are regulars to patong and at othet hotels we stayed at we would always see staff out cleaning or trimming hedges etc by pool but never did we see that here. Not worth the money sadly.

title: 5 star look, 3 star hotel
review: Food - 3 stars, reason: 4 times the price of other restaurants around Patong and besides the presentation, no better.  Bed - 5 stars, reason: very comfortable nice pillows  Room - 2 stars, reason: stains on chairs, wallpaper bubbling off the wall, wall was cracked, bathroom design is very poor, mold growing on all corners of shower, no balcony...  Location - 3 stars, reason: close to beach and shopping, but it is across from the water treatment plant so occassional strange smells waft over.  Reception - 5 stars, reason: polite fast check-in, beautiful look.  Pool - 3 stars, reason: deepest part only 1 metre, beautiful lights at night but they close the pool at 7pm. Why have those nice lights if we can't swim? Really silly policy.  Gym - 5 stars, reason: very well equipped, clean…

title: Pool-Access Room just Fabulous!
review: Dear Jackson C,  Thank you for the time taken in reviewing our property.  Really nice to see you had great nights of sleep and could also exercise comfortably.  I am a little surprise by your comments about the food selection and price to be honest, as we made it a point to offer quality dishes, local or European, at very reasonable price. In regards to hygiene standards , plate design and quality of product served, we can't obviously compete with local operators or what we call here "street food" but are certainly not charging 4 times the price... I am sorry you felt that way and wish i could have recommended you some local specialties we are becoming famous for like the "yellow curry" or Chef's homemade noodles.  We usually receive great comments about our location and never had any issue with the water treatment plant either but i am taking note and will monitor this closely over the next few weeks.   Thank you also for the 5* star rating about our front office feel and look... I will surely share those positive feedback with them.   I am sincerely sorry we somehow failed you and will be more than happy to look into your next reservation myself, shall you decide on giving us a second chance to serve and impress.   Once again, thank you very much for your time and constructive comments.  Sebastien

title: New & clean 4* hotel
review: We stayed here for 6 nights at the end of June/beginning of July, travelling with another couple.  The hotel is in a great location, across the street from O-Top market, short walk to Bangla Rd, Jungceylon Shopping Centre and the beach. Perfect location for busy Patong.   We had a Pool-access room, which was fabulous. After a busy day of shopping/tours it was wonderful to just slip into the pool straight from our room. Also perfect for an early morning/late night dip (the main pool is closed then). Most of the time we had our pool to ourselves. Our room (118) was in a very private, secluded spot, which we loved. Some of the pool rooms are opposite the bar and main pool, which could be noisy, especially opposite the bar as it plays music all day. The main pool, while beautiful,…

title: 12 Days of Bliss
review: Dear Shelley L,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.   I am very happy to see positive comments about the the friendliness & professionalism of our team members and will certainly share this review with them during our coming staff reunion.  One aspect i am particularly pleased with is the performance of our Housekeeping team these days, with the very high occupancy we are enjoying and the 300 rooms or so they do need to look after.   The humidity level is close to 80* at the moment and it does create little issues when trying to dry clothes on the terrace i have to admit... But i would encourage our guests in Pool access, Suites and Villas to use our Laundry services instead, services for which guests in those room categories would receive a daily complimentary pressing for 2 pieces of their choice as well as a 10% discount on other Laundry services.   Thank you also for your kind words about our breakfast offer, really appreciated.   We very much look forward to welcoming you both back in 2016...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great facilities, a bit pricy
review: It's abt 50mins away from airport, taxi cost 700-800bahts New hotel located just 10mins walk to patong beach & Jungceylon mall. 15mins walk to Bangla street. Along the hotel u can find food, spa, shops & convenient store Free shuttle tuk tuk to mall & beach **no sun chair or umbrella provided at the beach by Mercure, wich very poor. ( my last Phuket we stayed at a 4* hotel, towel & sunchair were provided at the beach)** Hotel itself : Fast check in wit welcome drinks & bites. Average Free speed of wifi provided in entire hotel, upgrade the speed with additional cost. ( keep log out itself so u need to sign in every now n then....painful) Room decent size. Loved the toiletries (lemongrass scent- soothing & calming feel especially after a long flt) Excellent room service (…

title: Peaceful retreat in the middle of chaos!!!  :)
review: We just returned after 2 weeks in rooms 310/311. After reading reviews here we decided against a pool access room. Regret...pool rooms looked awesome and were full so couldn't upgrade.  Rooms...not overly spacious and no balcony but at the same time exactly what we needed. Toiletries were stocked each day, water also. Never had this before, usually it's a one off thing. Housekeeping were awesome. Took shoes off to clean. That made my day(as a clean freak!). No noise issues. AC great, wifi great. Really, just perfect :) Used the daycare once for 2 hours. Super friendly and my 6yr old loved it.  It was our first visit to Thailand. It is a crazy, buzzing little town. We loved it but were so happy to walk into our lovely hotel after a day out. Right in the middle of all the action…

title: Hits and Misses
review: Dear travellers5forever,  Many thanks for this heartfelt review.  There is no better way of starting a week at work and i have already "copy/paste" and sent it to all our heads of Department to congratulate them and their team.  The part that pleases me most is the fact our colleagues went that extra mile, taking initiatives in pleasing you and your family even more... little attentions that are making a huge difference for yourself but also hundreds of others enjoying their time with us.   I am touched and really pleased to note that your young child loved it too... It means a lot to all of us.   Looking forward to family holidays in 2016...  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Great hotel in Phuket
review: Overall The hotel felt more like a resort, with rooms with balconies and 3 swimming pools available. However, there were hits and misses.  Location The hotel had an excellent location- 10 minutes walk to Jungceylon and Patong Beach, 15 minutes walk to Bangla Road. Small stalls were located opposite the hotel and around the vicinity.  Service Service was good, reception was friendly and apologised for not having a room upon check in (I had an early arrival). However, reception did not verify my choice of newspapers upon check in. I was not introduced to the facilities of the hotel upon check in except for the breakfast area- I had to ask to find out the location of the pool, gym and opening hours. I was not informed of the shuttle service and only found out while walking past the…

title: Great hotel, clean, superb breakfast <3
review: Dear camilleypy,  Thank you for your constructive and much detailed review.  It is always very interesting to receive comments from a professional Hotelier who understands more than anyone else the needs and expectations of our clientele.   I will go through the list with all concerned Managers today and take appropriate measures to improve the overall quality of service in those specific areas.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: It was pretty good...
review: This is a great hotel, very close to central Phuket and is walking distance to the beach. I had the unfortunate experience of being sick during my stay-- luckily the mattress and pillows are like a dream. The breakfast buffet was excellent and the pool features a swim up bar, which is amazing. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone!

title: Excellent Hotel & Would recommend staying at this hotel
review: Check in went smooth considering we were very tired from travelling.  They served us drinks on arrival and also included a complimentary upgrade which included “High Tea Refreshments daily, 10% discount on laundry services, Complimentary local calls and Complimentary pressing service for 2 pieces per stay” due to the special occasion.  The package we paid for was Suite, King Bed with a balcony.  This consisted of breakfast and wi-fi.  The room was lovely and I could not fault it and there is free complimentary water as well. We hung out at the hotel quite a bit and had cocktails by the pool where you could purchase cocktails for 380 Baht which is roughly $15.00 Aud so it does add up quickly.  They have a good deal for2 x pizza’s and beer if that is what you are into it. Staff at…

title: Holiday
review: Dear Postwoman,  Thank you very much for sharing such a wonderful review! It is always very encouraging to see guests enjoying our facilities, not only our rooms, or Suites, but also our restaurants, Bars and other services like complimentary high speed WiFi for instance.  Thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: It was simply Paradise. No words can describe how perfect it was. MAGNIFIQUE! ❤️
review: This is the 1st time we stayed at this hotel. When walked to the lobby ambiance was so nice and the Front Office was deliberately so helpful and friendly. We went to the room and we were quite shock that the bed was too small for 3 of us to sleep. So I decided to use the sofa bed but the sofa bed was too hard and uncomfortable to sleep on it. Then, I decided to sleep on the sofa instead of making the sofa bed. The next day after we've finished from playing on the beach we were ran out of shower soap and tissue. Did the housekeeping has a check list to refill the daily amenities to refill it again? Overall we've had a good stay but I would've the management to review my feedback so it could be helpful for families to stay.

title: Nice but with ants in our beds!!
review: Dear lawbud,  Thank you very much for your kind comments. I am a little confused about your comments in regards to the sofa bed... as those are normally used for young children only. Upon request, we always have extra beds available for adults to sleep and rest comfortably...  Thank you anyway for your recommendations as we do indeed care for families and are about to launch a dedicated activity program for kids staying with us too!  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Small touches makes a big difference!
review: I stayed at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong for 3 nights from 11/07/2015 - 14/7/2015.  Here is my detailed review of my entire stay.  1. ARRIVAL Upon arrival at the front entrance of the hotel, I was completely whisked away by the hotels sheer beauty. It felt like I was in paradise. From the moment I got out of the car and stepped foot onto the hotel grounds, I was treated like a VIP. There were the friendly staffs and concierge staffs greeting me and escorting me to the check in counters. I knew it was going to be an amazing stay and boy, was I right.   2. CHECK IN The beautiful Thai staff that was handling my check in was fast, efficient, friendly & always having a genuine smile which clearly resembles the wonderful Thai hospitality. I was also served Grand Mercure's signature…

title: Family trip
review: We enjoyed an excellent stay in the villa, very spacious for 4 adults and one kid. The private swimming pool is huge, deep. All rooms and garden are very modern, clean and new. Water pressure was great under the shower. We had 3 independent AC in the villa working perfectly. Staff was extremely friendly and upcoming. Breakfast and lunch is also first class. We definitely do recommend this pleasant hotel which is well located.

title: Great time in a Lovely hotel
review: Dear Tripadv001,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. Our Two Bedroom Pool Villas are offering this extra space required when traveling with family and children and i am very pleased you loved it.   Thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: Ants in my bed
review: The service of the hotel staff was excellent.  When we arrived, the porter was there to assist us immediately.  The front desk was very efficient and well trained, so our check in was very fast and easy.  Furthermore, we were greeted by the General Manager Sebastien, who was very friendly and helpful.  We had a superior room and it was spacious and clean.  The king size bed was very firm and comfortable, so we were able to sleep well every night.    I have to commend the excellent work provided by the house keeping team.  We would switch the 'room cleaning' light on before we leave our room for breakfast every morning.  When we got back to our room an hour later, we were very pleased to find that our room was clean and all made up already.   The swimming pool was very big and…

title: Long waiting time to check-in
review: Dear Phi S,  Many thanks for this great review and kind comments.  Very pleased to see that you all spent quality time with us and i will surely ask our Activity Manager to look into purchasing a few more games for the " not-so-little" ones...   Thanks again and hope to serve you and your family again in near future... Sebastien

title: Good Relaxing Stay
review: Upon arrival this hotel seemed heavenly. It is beautiful and the staff is very welcoming and they all speak English perfectly. The pool is enormous and the breakfast is worth getting, it is very diverse and delicious. The room we got was adecuate for two people. The only major fault was that i found ants in my bed. I woke up from a nap yo fin them all over my arms. I had not left any food out. When we alerted the staff they did nothing more than apologize. For this reason I can't recommed you stay here.

title: Loved this hotel but one or two niggles....
review: From the moment we entered the Lobby area I loved this hotel.  The welcome we received was fantastic.  The décor great and the ambiance is awesome.   When we got shown to our room we were unfortuanetly hit with a smell of dampness that was really overpowering.   We stayed in the room because we were only there for one night, but if we had been staying longer, I would have been down at reception expecting a room move.  The rooms as previously stated by other reviews face into the pool area and our room (because of the way it was in the corner) looked into the room next door.  (I think we were in 217).   The shower is in the bath with a glass wall between the bathroom and the bedroom - however, there is a blind you can pull down for privacy.  The food at the hotel is great, the…

title: Good location but not much view
review: Dear MissBehavingAgain,  Thank you very much for your kind comments and review.  Very pleased to see you could enjoy your short stay with us, despite the high humidity level Phuket is suffering from at the moment.   This morning, the temperature was 33* and humidity level at 82%, hence the feeling most of us may have while landing in Phuket or entering a room on lower floor for instance. We are taking all necessary measure to balance if off and as you correctly mentioned, do need, at times, to move guests from one room or one floor another. I would indeed recommend new guest of ours not to hesitate sharing those issues with us, in case they would prefer a room located on higher floors for instance, with better air flow or sun for instance.   Thank you very much as well for your great comments about food and service at Bubbles... it is very much appreciated!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Very good hotel - great location
review: If your are looking for an new international hotel in Patong Beach, this should be the only choice right now as most of the famous hotel chain is old in Patong Beach. This hotel is quite huge and has most type of rooms ranging from standard hotel room, pool access, suit, villa.....etc. sure there is 1 type that can suit you. We had chosen deluxe suit, i think is the biggest hotel room available(unless you choose villa), the hotel room is surrounding the big pool where else villas is behind the hotel room building(5floor or 7floor height), so basically you can see the villa roof from the hotel room corridor, as all the balconys is facing the pool. The pool is not big enough mainly because it had sacrifice alot to the pool access room, the pool access room has seperate pool from…

title: Very good Hotel but ?
review: Dear flyingdance,  Many thanks for this great review.  Glad to see you very much enjoyed our Executive Suite and the extra space that comes with it.  We also appreciate the few constructive comments made and you can be sure i will take this opportunity to once again brief our team, Chef included so to see immediate improvement at breakfast (sushi variety). All our rooms and suites are facing the pool and as correctly mentioned, the common area where all our sunbeds are set. It was important for us not to have guests squeezing by the pool, like it is the case in some other resorts around Asia and that is why you may feel it is quite a waste. I can however ensure you that guests enjoying a sunbath "down there" are very much appreciating the tranquility and space offered.   Thank you as well for your wonderful comments regarding overall quality of service and friendliness of staff. I will certainly take this opportunity to thank them all on your behalf, during our monthly gathering this afternoon.    Many thanks again and see you next year hopefully.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Superb hotel excellent location
review: Overall a very good hotel in an excellent location - less than ten minutes easy walk to the beach and surrounded by numerous restaurants and shops.  Whilst the hotel itself offers nothing traditional Thai in terms of building and architecture,  what it does do is offer a very convenient location,  immaculate and modern rooms, very nice pool area and great service.  I chose a Superior Suite on the top floor which was great - another good choice would be pool access rooms on the ground floor.    Breakfast was good with a wide choice to suit all tastes ranging from traditional American to fresh fruits,  cereals, and any style of hot breakfast made to order. There were also local Asian foods such as stir fries, soups, noodles and sushi.  The room came with access to the Club Lounge…

title: Great hotel
review: The staff were lovely and give u a nice treat in arrival!   Very clean rooms with great views of the pool. Which might I add the pool is amazing with swim up bar and lounge chairs to lay on.   Great location so close to all the shops- just across the road!!   Amazing breakfast!   Defiantly recommended it!!

title: Close enough to the bars on Bangla Rd and yet far enough away to be peaceful.
review: Dear Jemma_Peterswald,  Many thanks for those wonderful comments.  Our breakfast is receiving plenty of great reviews and that is very encouraging. I will surely share those with our Chef and his team.  Many thanks again and see you back soon in Patong! Sebastien

title: Nice Stay, Nothing Special
review: I stayed in a standard room at around £50 p/night. Room size was fine, storage for 2 people's clothes would be challenging, certainly if you're staying more than a few days. If additional clothes hangers are available upon request, this would be easily overcome though.  Bathroom was a good size, with full size bath for those that prefer not to shower. Towels clean and soft, changed daily or at your request. Bed was comfortable and pillows a mix of firm and soft. I had no trouble sleeping, helped that the rooms have blackout curtains. Aircon worked well, variable speeds and could keep it on during the night on a low speed, without noise intrusion. Buffet breakfast is plentiful, good choice of pastries, cereals, juices, cold meats, cheeses & salad. There is a selection of cooked…

title: Thailand ..... Phuket .... Grand mercure ..... Just amazing
review: Dear DMark71,  Thank you so much, your review is amazing and I am very pleased to see you both had a great stay with us.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Another wonderful stay in Phuket
review: The location is like a 5 minute walk from Bangla Street and is very suitable if you want to explore that area. The hotel itself has extremely nice staff and is always kept looking amazingly clean. The pool is also pretty nice. Many of the hotels in the area have comparable setups with the inside pool and restaurant though, such as the Holiday Inn right down the street. I thought that the in-pool bar was pretty cool although the pool closes at 7 and that was a little annoying because it was so earlier (not sure when other hotel pools close though).  Although I didn't stay at one, this hotel has there own private bungalows with their own private pools which seemed really nice especially if you want a more intimate setting.  Great stay and would recommend!!!

title: Nice hotel with very friendly staff
review: We arrived late and had to wait a little to check-in.   The receptionist was very friendly and even helped us take our luggage to our room when there was no other staff available to help us.  Our room was situated a little ways away from the reception area and required a bit of a walk.   It was comfortable and clean, with a modern appearance but seemed a bit on the small side.   The bed was very comfortable.     Just be aware that the rooms facing the Pool will hear some noise, either in the evening from low volume music played from the pool bar, or in the morning as people enjoy the pool.  The beach is about a 10 minute walking distance and about 20 minutes to the entertainment area, i.e. Bangla street.     The breakfast buffet selection was well worth the money, but be aware…

title: Grand, Wonderful
review: Dear Tom34438,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us.  It is always a pleasure to see well travelled guests enjoying themselves the way you did.   I will pass on your warmest regards to the rest of the team and thank them for their sincere hospitality and friendliness too.   Many thanks again and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: Friendly staff, nice property
review: I had the best experience and stay in this hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful upon check in and we were greeted with cold towels and welcome drinks. I loved the room and it was very comfortable although there was a slight hiccup as the key cards were not working. Otherwise, the bell boy who helped us with our luggage was friendly and ever ready to assist us. I loved their breakfast spread, especially the pastries. I bought a choux pastry and coffee from Chou Chou Deli, and those were also delectable. I did not manage to have a drink at Craft but the selection of beers on sale were impressive and for beer lovers, it would not disappoint for us and the acoustic singer has a very soulful and beautiful voice. The hotel is also very close to Hooters and Hard Rock Cafe, and…

title: Not as good as last time
review: Dear kai-els,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful and complete review of our property.  Very happy to see your comments regarding our breakfast and pastries from Chou Chou Deli.  It was great to have you staying with us and hopefully next year, you will spare a few minutes of your time to experience our Beers at Craft Lounge too :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Very pleasant and comfortable stay!
review: Located near the Patong Beach and you can walk there within 10 minutes. We got a pool access room which is very nice, what can be better than jumping into the pool directly from your room's balcony? The hotel property is nice with very good massage facilities. Plenty to choose from breakfast buffet. Staff members are very friendly and helpful, unfortunately language ability for some of them is a bit limited. Room is fully equipped with amenities, however housekeeping services can be further improved as sometimes they forgot to replace all amenities in the room during room cleaning.

title: Grand stay!!!
review: Myself, partner and mum stayed here for 4 nights and had a wonderful stay!! We had a pool access room and although it rained everyday, we were still able to enjoy the pool access! Also my mum loved the chou chou cafe!! Thanks wes and staff for a great stay, see you again soon

title: Best in Patong!!!
review: Dear Craig J, Many thanks for this wonderful review.  Very pleased to see you all had a great time with us.  If you could take a few more minutes of your time and review ChouChou deli shop too, that would be awesome :)  Thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: Wonderful place
review: My wife and I stayed here a couple of weeks ago in a deluxe pool room. How nice it was to step straight onto our private balcony and either dip into the pool or relax on our own pool lounges, this is 100% worth the upgrade. Sebastian and his team were all friendly and courteous making our stay most enjoyable and memorable. The breakfast buffet provided many options (the pastries were to die for), and the dinner menu was at a high standard. Happy hour at the Craft Bar was great, which gave us the opportunity to have the hotels signature Mojito (made from top local ingredients). The location of the hotel was perfect, with many bars, clothing and souvenir shops across the road. Patong Beach and Jungceylon shops are a close walk, with the hotel providing a scheduled complimentary…

title: great stay!
review: Dear neco74,  Many thanks for this great review!   We also appreciate the time taken in sharing a few additional comments, for improvements. I believe the BBQ lunch by the pool is the next to come on the 'to-do list'. We have often discussed about offering weekly buffet options and will launch in July & August a seafood promotion i am confident guests would enjoy.  It is not about the offer itself but as you mentionned, about the continuous improvements made to entertain guests of ours and for that reason, we wish to thank you once again for those.  Thank you and see you both again soon. Sebastien

title: Amazing Staff.
review: We stayed here for 4 days with our nine month old daughter. It was perfect from the moment we checked in. I must say that the staff is amazingly friendly and eager to help. Ambience is remarkable. Every room has poolside view and gives a refreshing and open feeling. Meal orders were always spot on. Room service was super and even provided fresh fruits for our little one.. I would definitely stay here next time...highly recommended

title: New, clean international hotel complete with good location!
review: I booked this for a short weekend trip after knowing it is relatively new - which means clean hardware as most beach destination hotels can get really grimy after a while. The travel agent arranged for a pick up from the airport and the ride to the hotel took about 1 hour.   CHECK IN - We were checked in while being seated and served a welcome drink. It took a total of 20 mins or so before we were handed our keys but service was smiley throughout and no complaints.  ROOM - We had a basic category superior room and it was really nice and extremely clean. The twin beds were immaculately prepped, amenities complete with a cushy elephant and complimentary water for the very hot water. Room was a good size too with plenty of room for 2 pax with small-medium luggages. But some rooms…

title: Stinking rooms
review: Dear Hburn10,  Many thanks sharing such a nice review with the rest of the community.  I am very pleased to see you had a wonderful time with us. I have also taken the liberty of reminding our Front of the House teams about Le Club privileges, especially when it comes to well-travelled gold members like yourself. We will surely improve this particular aspect shortly.  Once again, thank you! Sebastien

title: Just one amazing place!!!!!
review: I checked in 30 mins back and writing this review.  The rooms seems to be not used or cleaned for a long time and it is stinking. Have called the rooms service to come with a room spray the moment I checked in and still waiting for them to turn up. It is not a hotel, but inn. It is not for people who want to enjoy their time in a hotel.

title: An average facility with some nice staff
review: Dear Palani_Bala,  Thank you for sharing your experience  with us. As mentioned, we always encourage guests to discuss personal preference or issue they might be facing with us directly, by simply contacting any of us at the reception.  I am obviously very sorry about this unfortunqte episode and glad to see my assistant Sumontha discussing with you yesterday. i hope you are now enjoying your stay and having a great time at Grand Mercure.  with grand regards, Sebastien

title: Top hotel!
review: Stayed for 10 nights. This hotel has everything that the traveller wants: good location, spacious rooms, attentive stuff, and wide variety of meals. Stayed in a pool access room, can’t recommend this place higher. The rooms are modern with nice furnishing. Big bathroom, spacious veranda with a pool access. The hotel grounds are very clean and very well maintained. Should also mention the hotel staff. Could not compliment them more: attentive, friendly, helpful. Well definitely come back again!!!!!

title: Only stayed one night. Wanted to stay longer
review: Fantastic hotel with numerous facilities. We used the pool, bar, steam room and had breakfast here. The hotel also helped us book onward travel to phi phi. Located about a ten minute walk from the Bangla road. Very long winded check in process but you are offered a welcome drink and snack.

title: So happy with this hotel!
review: Dear Laura P,  Glad to see you both had a wonderful stay with us. We are always very happy to see guests enjoying our services and tours :)  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Fabulous resort
review: Definitely going back. Accommodating staff! Told them 2 of our friends were celebrating a birthday and the manager gave us complimentary breakfast for our 2 rooms with 2 pax each! Love their food too!! Can't wait to go back this October!! My hotel of choice in Patong

title: Great customer service!
review: Dear Chesa L,  Thank you very much for sharing such a review! We are very much looking forward to xelcoming you back in October!  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: First time in Phuket
review: We stayed three nights in a pool access room and found it very relaxing. My partner had fallen ill and these staff were very helpful. Breakfast experience was a bit impatient and strict but everyone has rules I guess. The spa was a nice experience and affordable.Not sure if I would be as happy in a standard room as they have no real balcony just a sliding window?? Late check out was a bonus..thanks

title: Modern smart hotel
review: Very pleased with the location right on a busy street with lots of shops, restaurants, massage shops. Inside the hotel was quite quiet and in our room peaceful enough for good sleep. The hotel is modern and looks smart.

title: Back again just 6 months later & better than ever!
review: Dear LippyL,  Many thanks for this short yet super review! Great to start the week with such recommendations!  With kind regards, Sebastien

title: Grand hotel indeed....
review: The Grand Mercure Patong is just amazing! We visited last  December and prior to that , in September not long after it opened. This time we bought 12 guests with us who just raved about the friendliness of the staff, their rooms , the facilities and the central location to almost everything. I would personally like to thank Sebastian Tronchett and Sumantha for the faultless, care and attention provided to both ourselves and our guests, who all plan to return again. It needs to be said that our rooms were meticulously clean and if we needed anything extra at all it was provided with a smile.. In addition to this we would like to thank the Grand Mercure's wonderful staff who went out of their way to ensure our wedding experience was seamless, and an event for both ourselves and…

title: Wonderful stay thanks to some of the great staff...
review: Dear JayneyG711,  Thank you so much for choosing Grand Mercure once again! It was great welcoming back the whole family and also meeting new friends on that very special occasion. Very pleased to note you all enjoyed it very much. I will surely share your review and pass on your regards to Sumontha and team.  Once agiain, thank you very much and see you again next year, for your first anniversary ;)  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Family stay for wedding party and friends
review: Awesome hotel!!.  I'd just like to say Thanks to all staff for their help and assistance.   Hotel is in a good location close to restaurants, bars, shops and ofcourse the beach and the hotel itself being a 5 star, has everything you'd expect.     I want to give a shout out to the GM, Mr. Sebastien Tronchet,  who came and shook my hand upon checking out and wishing me a safe journey home which was a really good gesture.  Cheers.

title: Pleasant stay and service
review: Stayed for 3 nights, and this hotel has an awesome lobby. The compound is huge with 3 to 4 private pools lining the first floor rooms and a middle main pool. Room is pretty huge, but the balcony is non-existent. WIFI is good. This hotel is in a quiet location, but also close to Jungceylon (about 800m) and the beach.

title: Not so "Grand" Mercure
review: Dear CMLim,  Thank you very much for this very nice review of our property. Glad to see you enjoyed both facilities and location and very much looking forward to your return next year...  Sebastien

title: The friendly staff is impressive
review: Only in some alternate universe is this a five star hotel. My husband and I were having difficulty deciding where to stay while on our vacation in Phuket but decided to try the Grand Mercure for one night. Thank God it was only for one night! The room was dirty (countertops not wiped down, table in front of couch dirty) and small. Also, the room never got cold! We even left our room key in the door but the temperature remained the same. We attempted to have the concierge book a diving tour for us. The woman who "helped" us  handed us the phone and told us we should just talk to them ourselves (isn't that the point of having a concierge??). We ended up booking the dive trip which was the only positive thing to come from our experience there (see my review on Sea Bees Diving). We…

title: A lovely, quiet, and relaxing nest in the mid of buzzing street
review: Dear Customer1999,  Thank you for bringing up those issues to our attention.   I am sincerely sorry we could not please you fully nor ensure you and your partner with an authentic 5* experience during the only night you spent with us.  It is indeed difficult for us to address issues guests might be facing within such a short period of time and while operations should be running very smoothly by now, we still need to monitor those very closely so to avoid such disappointment in future. Really sorry for that and I wish you could have simply contacted our Front office at time as we could have easily moved you to another room and compensate you eventually with a late check-out or else.   I have also discussed with our Bartenders at the pool a few minutes ago and they mentioned they had added an extra shot into your cocktails following your remarks. We also did the same with the fruit platter which was apparently not to your liking.  As mentioned, we are here to serve and are pleased to help when requested to.   Regarding your comment about our concierge services, i am glad you both enjoyed the diving so much. That is great to hear.  It might however be a little different from diving spots but in Phuket at least, it is a very common practice to let guests and divers discussed details of their coming trip or journey together.  Such details as padi levels, suit & fin sizes, what tank size works best and any other details that might make this dive even more enjoyable are helping diving instructors keeping the dive safe and most pleasant.   Once again, i am very sorry you felt it was a lack of service from our team. it was not the intention at all.  Best regards, Sebastien

title: Ok hotel, nohing to be excited over.
review: The hotel is away from the beach, but there is a free shuttle. Available within walking distance from the hotel to the mall, and you also have a free shuttle.  The staff were very friendly. Hotel facilities also good compared to the price.  Unfortunately, I had a different schedule, so I did not use the restaurant.

title: Staffs are friendly and helpful
review: Stayed in the hotel for 3 nights with my family, the staffs are very helpful to answer our questions and to provide very good suggestions. But the hardware of the hotel should be approved, such as the door is difficult to close and open, the hot water supply is not stable (become very hot suddenly), the location is very good, breakfast is average.

title: Great stay
review: Dear RoyChanHK,  Many thanks for this great review and recommendations.  I will definitely look into the door issue and check whether or not it can be fixed internally.   Once again, thank you for taking a few minutes of your time to share those positive comments with us.   See you again soon, Sebastien

title: Best Hotel in patong area
review: Mercure has free WIFI everywhere - central location - near shops - 12 minutes walk to beach - tidy and modern rooms - great drinks - value for money.  The pool is great and breakfast was amazing - we paid extra for breakfast as not included but worth it totally - staff friendly - massages were amazing.  Drinks on arrival and wet flannels - nice welcome.

title: Great hotel, helpful but somewhat inexperienced staff
review: Dear Zoanne H,  Thank you very much for your 5* review.  Glad to see you could also enjoy a massage at our Ryn Spa and also decided on booking our special offer for the breakfast. Very good move indeed :)  Please kindly email us directly next time you decide on visiting us again... will be happy to look into your reservation personally.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Go for it
review: The hotel was best with nice clean and calm environment and very friendly staff. Worth to stay there. Food,Gym, and all other facilities are excellent, and also very near to Bangla road known for its night life.

title: Great Location
review: I really couldn't fault this hotel. It is in a very accessible location, you can pretty much walk to everything from here, the beach, Bangla Rd etc. The standout point for me was the quietness of the resort; it is in a very busy area, but you honestly wouldn't know it as it is so peaceful. Both the room and the resort itself were very clean. The staff were always pleasant and overall, it was a very enjoyable place to stay. Keep an eye as they do very good deals on rates too.

title: Clean, convenient and cost effective
review: Dear Emer2014,  Thank you very much for your very nice review and recommendations.  Very pleased to see you had a wonderful stay with us and appreciated the serene and relaxing atmosphere of the property.   Many thanks again. Sebastien

title: Great location, nice hotel
review: My wife and I stayed here for 3 nights in May 2015. A well located place, 5 mins walk from the Patong Beach and 10 mins from Bangla Road, yet a bit away from the noise.  The hotel lobby is quite tastefully done and opens above the pool. The buffet breakfast has a decent spread. The staff in the restaurant was quite considerate in general as they even made our omelettes in a separate pan (as we didn't want any meat). Barring one server, who tried to joke around at our expense, we found the people to be very good.  The rooms are small but decently done. The size was quite disappointing as I am used to bigger rooms at resorts in Asia.  Language is a bit of an issue and not everyone is fluent with English. So explaining something uncommon to them is a challenge till you find the…

title: Neat hotel in a great location
review: Dear NikhilMohta,  Many thanks for sharing your experience with the rest of the Tripadvisor community.  Glad we could accommodate your vegetarian diet and also provide you with good valued services throughout.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good location, great service but a few things travellers need to know
review: This is a nice, relatively new hotel, in a great location in Patong.  Walking distance to the night life & Jungceylon, Bangla Rd. The pool access rooms are really nice but a bit on the small side.  The service was good and the pool was sparkling clean.  I wasn't completely fussed on the breakfast, it was adequate, but could have offered a lot more choices.  For location, cleanliness & service you can't go wrong here and It was good value for money, so worth a stay.

title: Good Value for location and service
review: I spent time searching for a good value 5 star hotel near the middle of Patong - I was very happy with this choice we stayed for three nights (enough, I think, to enjoy the night got life before you get tired of the touts).  Great location, good service. The pool was nice, but small for the size of the hotel. Does have a swim-up bar though. We chose a Superior room, quite small but nicely appointed. The pool access rooms look awesome but they are a lot more expensive. I was happy with my choice for the money. Recommended.

title: Great hotel in a great location
review: Dear Fergford,  Many thanks for this very nice review.  Really happy to see you find our Superior room to be of great value and looking forward to your next visit in Grand Mercure.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Lovely NEW hotel close to everything patong has to offer
review: We had a pool access room, it was fantastic, the service was great, friendly staff, amazing breakfast, can't rate it highly enough. The hotel is extremely close to restaurants & shopping, & a 5 minute walk to the beach. The hotel runs a shuttle service to the beach & also to the Jungceylon shopping centre. The rooms are compact, but room enough to get around, but, I probably wouldn't stay here if I couldn't get a pool room, the majority of rooms don't even have a real balcony, the door just opens to a railed edge, the pool access is well worth it

title: Great Stay
review: Dear Gelew,  Thank you very much for sharing such a great review.  The pool access rooms are in really high demand and i am very pleased to see you enjoyed it very much. Please kindly contact us directly next time you plan on visiting Patong so to make we keep one for you both :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Great hotel, new, excellent staff, gorgeous foyer area, lovely grounds. Hotel pool not as big as the pictures seem, still decent size but not football fields upon football fields of pool. We enjoyed a pool access room which was great due to ease of location to breakfast, ease of access to pool, no need to access stairs or elevator, downside was size of room, it was a matchbox, normally their is plenty of space to have 2 suitcases out but here only room for one out with the other tucked under the table, clothes cupboard small with only 2 drawers and a few coat hangers, small rail to hang your towel outside, no where to put your wet swimers or under garments you may have washed, we ended up draping them over the inside of the sun umbrella this sufficed. Apart from the size of the…

title: Simply the best
review: This hotel is simply the best , as the rock singer Tina Turner song goes.  I stayed 6 nights at this hotel ( 3 -9  May 2015 ) and I can honestly say it's got many lovely aspects to it. Deluxe Rooms are linked to the pool area.You just walk out of your room to a semi-private sunning deck and pool area. Breakfast provides a many varied mixture for all people's from all around the world. The staff are very engaging and take a special interest in the guest by ensuring their stay is a memorable and a pleasurable experience. The hotel's decor is earthy , warm , inviting and fresh.  The General Manager Mr.Sebastien Tronchet is always out and about meeting hotel guests to ensure them if there's anything he can do personally to further enhance their stay to please let him know. I had a…

title: Best Resort in Patong
review: Dear Garry B,  Thousand thanks for this wonderful review and rating. It is always a pleasure to note that guests are feeling at home at Grand Mercure.  Thank you so much for your kind words about khun Manus as well. He is indeed doing a terrific job and always willing on assisting and helping people getting around. I have already share your review with him and rest of the team at the front desk, Wen included.  Will hopefully have the chance of welcoming you both back very soon...  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Grand in all senses!
review: I would like to say thank you for making my Mothers Day weekend very special. The resort, the staff, the room, the bars and restaurants are definitely up there with a lot of the five star resorts around the world. We have stayed in a lot of resorts and  this one couldn't be faulted. The check in was smooth and efficient with a lovely welcome drink and delicious pastry. The room which was a superior room with king size bed and their standard room, was very comfortable and the bathroom was spacious with a lovely rain shower. The fresh fruit placed in our room was also a nice touch. We enjoyed a free cocktail in the bar (Craft Bar) which was also thoroughly enjoyed. Breakfast was of a very good selection and the restaurant (Bubbles) in which its served in beautifully set out and…

title: Great Location, Great Staff & Great Hotel
review: Dear tag000,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property.  Very pleased to see you both enjoyed your stay very much.  I will surely thank the entire team at Bounce pool bar for their friendliness and service provided.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great place to stay during low season
review: Despite the very nice beach Patong/Phuket is nothing but a huge fish net to catch tourists, the constant feeling of being prey is annoying. Therefor, it is heavenly to have such a grand refuge at Grand Mercure! The airport is located in the very north of the island, no less than an hour must be taken into account. The bus (only 180 baht) isn't a good idea, for one must change in Phuket city; taxis want 800 baht and the hotel offers a shuttle for 1200 baht. The refreshing jasmine towel, water and drinks as welcome won't make it less pricey, though. One does feel grand at check-in, I was already awaited and the process went most smoothly. Have your passport and immigration card ready, though, they will be taken a photocopy of. The executive suite on the 7th floor is simply grand,…

title: Pleasant Enjoyable Stay
review: We stayed 3 nights in April 15 and were impressed with the professionalism friendly and helpful staff. The reception counter staff were accommodating and very pleasant and they escorted us to our rooms. The rooms we stayed were clean and housekeeping service was excellent. When we called for housekeeping service our needs were attended promptly.  The breakfast buffet spread satisfied our appetite and taste. Dinner was well served at the restaurant. One of the waiter even came to ask us for feedback and comments on the food and we like the staff attitude. I must say that in this hotel communication was effective as the hotel staff understood our queries and addressed our requirements.  However we felt that the balcony is not big enough. But if you are staying on the ground floor…

title: "Our 2nd visit & it was better than the 1st"
review: Dear Lulu L,  Many thanks for this great review and very kind comments.  Very pleased to see our team members taking care of your family and will definitely share this great review with them all.  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon... Sebastien

title: Lovely hotel
review: What beautiful reception you get from the staff as you arrive. Through the resort we organised to be picked up from our resort in Khao Lak. Our driver was punctual,very friendly & professional. Last year the Grand Mercure had just opened so there were no cafes or shops opened, how happy we were to experience Chou Chou cafe! The pastries & baguettes are delightful. The coffee was good too however you may need to be a little patient as our standard of a latte here in Melbourne is a little different to theirs. Just ask for a double shot macchiato with a little milk. The mango smoothie was my favourite.  Bubbles restaurant was a hit once again. Breakfast & dinner have a range of choices. Bounce bar at the pool don't have a huge selection of cocktails however my friend asked for a…

title: Exceeded our expectations!
review: Dear gcsv,  Many thanks for this wonderful reviews.  It was great welcoming you "back home" and very glad to see you enjoyed it very much, once again.  Please do not hesitate to share your Chouchou experience on the page  we recently created:   http://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g297930-d7229093-Reviews-Chou_Chou_Deli_Shop-Patong_Kathu_Phuket.html  Hopefully we will soon make it a "must-visit" bakery in Patong :) Thank you and see you again soon... Sebastien

title: Awesome Stay
review: New hotel in patong. Beautiful lobby and the check in was done with ease. We booked a pool access room and it was the best thing we could have done. Just step out of the room and in the pool. The room was very clean and presented well.  Anything we requested was done very quickly.  We also had access to the club room where you could get free coffee/nibbles through the day. That was a nice touch. The staff were always very friendly and always greeted us. The breakfast had everything we wanted and enjoyed it. The only thing is people using the main pool could easily come in and use the area of our pool access.

title: Great choice for family stay in Patong Phuket
review: Travelling with family including 4 years old kid and wife on a vacation in Phuket, I was looking for 5 star property but which is close to where the action is. I got perfect fit in Grand Mercure on Patong beach. It's managed by Accor group which also manages brands like Novotel in hotel industry. 5 mins from Patong beach, shops,restaurants are minutes away once you step out. Taxi stand is 2 mins and so are massage parlours. Inside the property, the facilities and service is great!! They have well maintained kids area where you can your kids occupied. They also have nannies available if you want to step away. Pool area is awesome so is restaurants. Live music on all days which is great to unwind with some cocktails after a day out in the sun!!Room size and hygiene is very good.…

title: Fantastic place to stay!
review: Dear Sachu_gavde,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It is always great to see that families are enjoying their holidays at Grand Mercure and very glad note you made good use of our babysitting services so to be able to enjoy yourselves even more. Very pleased with your comments about the Indian "corner" at breakfast (vegetarian mostly), which completes a wide spread of European and Asian specialties on daily basis.    Please let me know personally if you plan on staying in one of our private villas next year as i will be delighted to sort things out for you and the family.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Lovely Hotel !!
review: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights along with another couple traveling with us. From the moment we were picked up from our previous accommodation by the hotel minibus by our driver, Niwat, we were treated like honored guests. Upon arrival at the hotel, the staff at reception were friendly, polite, helpful and efficient. We were escorted to our rooms immediately with our luggage. The rooms were very clean and presentable, with a bowl of fruit upon arrival. The beds were very comfortable which made the stay even more pleasurable. Any request or query we had was eagerly dealt with by the friendly and efficient staff. We had dinner at Bubbles restaurant on 3 occasions and again we were not let down by the friendly and courteous staff notably Tony and Cartoon. The menu selection…

title: Great hotel though buffet could use a change every couple of days
review: I stayed 6 nights at this hotel. The location is good, just walkable distance to Patong beach and market place.  The staff and hospitality is very good. The buffet breakfast had a good spread. The room was excellent.  A lovely Hotel indeed !!

title: Good Hotel, Great Staff
review: Dear SHAILESH KUMAR A,  Thank you very much for this wonderful comments. It is great to note you enjoyed your stay very much and we are all looking forward to your return.... hopefully next year!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic stay...
review: I stated in a pool access room with my daughter for 10 days in April, which happened to coincide with Songkran.  It was a great stay - the room was a little small but having pool access made up for that 100-fold, and when you consider that you don't spend all that much time in the room it really made no difference.  The housekeeping were fabulous and did a great job every day. I was very grateful for the free wifi access. The breakfast was amazing. I found it so hard to limit myself to just a few options every morning; you are so spoilt for choice. Check in and check out went very smoothly and efficiently and the reception staff were more than happy to help me with an enquiry about what adventure to partake in. Ryn Spa was amazing with lovely decadent options to choose from;…

title: clean and nice, but small room.
review: Dear Tanya M,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property. It was a pleasure to welcome you both and hopefully we will have a chance of seeing you again soon.  I will take this opportunity to thank our Spa staff as well as the entire breakfast team for their professionalism and dedication....  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Second Stay at This Amazing Hotel
review: hotel is quite clean and well maintained. room is quite smaller than any similar hotels, but room is in good condition. Pool access is easy to relax. Standard room is too small. Breakfast was normal, but needs some more training to staffs. One female staff told they open from 6AM (Our tour bus is supposed to come at 6:30AM), but when we went for breakfast next morning, they didn't allow to come in saying they open at 6:30 AM.   Internet option is confused. It shows 3 options ( free, 500BT, 1000BT) in an access login page. My friend clicked 1000TB accidentally, and we had to pay it when we checked out. What a shame! Giving some notice or information when check-in is required.  In a room, they put only 2 bath towels. Considering it is a resort and humid, they should leave extra…

title: Thai Hospitality
review: Dear ddalgi,  Thank you for your review and for sharing a few areas you think could be improved.   I am very sorry about breakfast opening time. Even though we only open at 06:30 am, i believe we could have organize a few bakeries and a cup of coffee or Tea for you though... It is disappointing and i will today discuss this particular point with our Food & Beverage Manager.  Please note we also fdo prepare "take-away" breakfast boxes, for guests of ours, like yourself, with early pick-up or departure from the property....   As for the internet connection, we offer the choice between the 3 options you referred to, indicating both speed and price that comes with it.  Our complimentary connection speed is 1Mbps and usually more than enough for daily use..   Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next time you plan on visiting Patong... We will be more than happy to make it an even more enjoyable stay i can ensure you...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Bliss!
review: I was first here in December 2014, a short 8 months after the hotel first opened. I had been tracking their progress though for months prior to that stay. It was very good the first time. This time it was amazing!! Clearly this hotel has gotten all the kinks worked out and is now 5 stars. It has helped along the way to get to know the staff so I would like to send special thank yous to the bar staff, the check-in staff, Sebastien and Sumontha for your incredible graciousness and welcoming me back as a member of the family. I also want to thank Wen, Jamnong, the incredible girl in the fitness center for her attention and support every day while I worked out. Also the friendly staff at Chou Chou, and the pool guys for keeping everything perfect. I hate the thought of leaving…

title: Another GREAT Stay -  Best Hotel in Patong Beach - Thank You Grand Mercure Patong!
review: Second time back here in 4 months and loved it all over again - great service, warm staff, fabulous facilities and location.  Rooms are wonderful and spacious and best part is that nothing is too difficult for the very dedicated and friendly team.    An absolutely thumbs up - will be back and highly recommend if you want something upmarket, really well priced, above standard with outstanding service.

title: Nice hotel but room not private enough
review: DearTanyaOzi,  Thousand thanks for yet again, a unique and superb review of our property.  It was a pleasure to welcome you back and while i was not around to assist, i am pleased Sumontha and rest of the team made it happen.   See you again soon... Sebastien

title: Overall Very Good However..........
review: We booked a two bedroom suite with a private pool for our stay. The rooms were just next to the other guest rooms so when we were swimming and having fun in the pool, the other guests were able to see us from their corridors, which was annoying as we had someone who kept staring at us for the few days.  Hotel is new, so bed was comfy and all facilities I the room wa really great. Love the shower facilities as it was spacious and luxurious. We had club benefits so we went to the lounge for our tea, selection at club lounge is limited.  Breakfast choices were limited judging on the scale of the hotel. But it was a decent spread. Love how the restaurant is situated near the pool and the view was relaxing.   Overall great stay and staff were helpful. Location of hotel was also…

title: Great hotel only 10 mins from Bangla Road
review: Dear Missypenguin,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It was a pleasure to welcome you all for that short break. I am very pleased to note you enjoyed our villa very much despite what you referred to as "privacy" issues.  Our 2-bedroom pool Villas are actually called "Family" Pool villas due to their proximity to our main buildings... We thought that 2 couples travelling together, or simply a family with children would enjoy the space offered and wider pool rather than privacy.  We do however offer much more private option with our 1 Bedroom Pool villa... but then again, mostly suitable for 2 adults or 2 parents and 1 child at most.   Thank you very much again for this superb review. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next time you plan on visiting Patong as we will be more than happy to look after your entire family once again.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent hotel
review: Overall Room 8/10, Daily Room Cleaning 5/10, Pool 8/10, Beach 2/10 (Sea Lice Plague Daily), Breakfast 9/10 (Very good). Check-in Reception 4/10 (Too Slow and Inefficient) Overall Location 8/10,Pool Bar Service 3/10 (Could sell 3 times more drinks if they were more organised), Complimentary Room Wifi 9/10.

title: Great location & wonderful staff...can't wait to go back!
review: I've just returned home from an amazing 3 week stay in this hotel. The hotel it's self is very comfortable and well decorated, it's only a year old and still feels very fresh and new. The location is also good as its close enough to the beach (5 min walk) and close to the markets and night life. The room we had was a double over looking the pool (room 506)...the bed was very comfortable and the room very clean. The room was large enough to accommodate me and my partner and all of our stuff for 3 weeks comfortably... Though we did ask for some extra hangers and draws which the management dealt with straight away. The breakfast was fabulous and there was loads of choice  and the food was of a good quality....fresh baked bread and pastries and proper bacon! The breakfast staff were…

title: Awesome new hotel close to everything but the noise!!
review: Dear Kerry D,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating.  It was a pleasure to have you both staying with us for such a long period and all very much look forward to welcoming you back next year.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Affordable Resort in the Perfect Location
review: Great new property close to everything Patong Beach has to offer. It's off the main drag and is its own little quiet haven right in the heart of vibrant Patong. Great new rooms all overlooking the pool containing everything you need for a great stay. 10 mins walk to everything ...the beach, Bangla Rd, Jungceylon Shopping Centre. Make sure you eat at least once at Poo Nurntong Restaurant it is well worth the 5 min tuk tuk ride and keep away from those bloody lady boys LOL

title: A Very Comfortable Stay
review: Dear THEcriticiser,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property.  It was a pleasure to have you staying with us!!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Amazing hotel and great location
review: We had a fantastic stay at the Grand Mercure in Patong. The rooms were modern, new, clean and spacious. Ours was on the fourth floor overlooking the pool with a small balcony which was perfect for us.  The pool was amazing with heaps and heaps of sun loungers and umbrellas- no chance of not being able to grab one!  The breakfast was delicious with heaps and heaps of options!  Location perfect for those wanting to be right in the thick of it! 10ish minute walk to Bangla & Jungceylon, 10 minute walk to the beach and opposite all the little bars and markets.  Although the resort is right in the thick of everything you would never know it as the sound is completely blocked.

title: Friendly staff, nice amenities but not clean and expensive.
review: Staff was nice, greeted us with drinks and a tart. Our room looked nice upon arrival but later discovered that it was not well maintained. Part of our room smells like pee... So they don't wash the floors often. They don't clean the toilets and showers well either. They also don't wipe down table tops. The hotel food and drinks are crazy expensive considering what you'll find outside of it. The pool area is nice though, the finishes of the hotel are pretty nice, just not well maintained. Perhaps that's just the standard in Phuket, not sure.

title: Absolutely gorgeous
review: Dear Esther M,  Many thanks for sharing your experience with the rest of the community.  I am a little surprised, to say the least, by your comments about the housekeeping i have to say. I am not sure about Phuket but it is definitely not the way we are usually servicing our rooms and i am devastated to hear about all those.  I will conduct tomorrow morning a general meeting with entire housekeeping team and look into various areas where improvements and additional efforts needs to be done.   Once again i am very sorry. Please do not hesitate to contact me directly at H8109-gm1@accor.com next time you plan on visiting Phuket. I will be more than happy to look into your reservation details personally.   Sincerally, Sebastien

title: Fine hotel
review: Situated right across the beach (you'll have to cross the street though) but with amazing sea view from the hotel. The rooms and facilities are highly tasteful, clean and updated. When we went, they had such lovely paintings on the walls - I absolutely fell in love with them! Forgot the name of the artist, but would love to follow him/her if I knew. The staff/reception was friendly and accommodating enough - they helped us with tourist recommendations, etc. It's only a 10-minute walk to crazy places like Bangla Road, but far enough for the quiet and privacy. I would definitely recommend this place.,

title: Great Experience
review: Dear schezara,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property. Really glad you enjoyed your stay with us!  See you again soon, Sebastien

title: Class from start to finish
review: Fine hotel, new facilities and good location as can walk from hotel to the shopping centre is around 10 minutes. But only the design of washing room is not enough good used for client as there is no door.

title: It's the best
review: The rooms with pool access are the best they are a must  The club longe is ok just food and cool drink from 11 am to 5pm good for a lunch or snack ---------------------------------------------------------

title: Perfect for most travellers wether you are 1 - 2 - 4 or 10 people.
review: Dear 124john486,  Many thanks for this great review and rating!  See you again soon, Sebastien

title: Fantastic hotel even better staff
review: First I would like to thank all the employees at this great Hotel.  Everybody was just so smiling and helpful with any question or requirement I had.  In particular Manus the duty manager and Numphung in the Draft Bar was very helpful.  - but really all the Employees was great.  This Hotel is really for everybody.  whether you (like me) is a Solo traveler, or a couple, a family or a larger group.  I saw many couples but also groups and families of 4-6-10 people who all seemed to have a great time.  as a Solo traveler I never felt "alone".  For instance: the way the pools (3) are built up, there are space for people who just want to be in a quiet area of the pool and for people who like to hang out around the "swim up" Pool bar with music.   I stayed in a "Pool access" room. …

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Ole L,  Thank you so much for sharing such a Grand review of our property.  I am extremely pleased to see you enjoyed your stay very much, even though you were traveling on you own :)  I will surely take this opportunity to thank the entire team for their effort and friendliness and pass on you warmest regards to our Chef and his team who are working very hard on the breakfast set-up and treats.   it's nice to start the day in such a fashion!! Many thanks again and see you soon...  Sebastien

title: Beautiful and clean hotel with great swiming pool
review: We stayed here for our sons 21st and had a booking for 15 people.  The hotel accommodated is all together in a row for the pool acces room (5 rooms and on a higher floor a suite). Fantastic rooms and very comfy. The resteraunt was fantastic and the breakfast smorgasbord was one of the biggest I have seen with a high selections for all nationalities.
