The staff where fantastic and very friendly.  I would highly recommend this hotel to any one and was it was in a great location.  Special thanks to Sebastion and his staff for organising our sons 21st dinner. The food was to a high standard and the staff where faultless.

title: A very relaxing holiday
review: I spent 15 nights at the Grand Mercure Patong, Phuket, Thailand. First of all I do really want to thank all the staff of the hotel for being so polite, kind and helpful. Very comfortable double room, spacious, clean. Towels, sheets were changerd everyday. Bathroom products were abbundand and supplied every day. Tea, coffee facilities.and bar service in the fridge. Complimentary cakes were offered every day in the early evening. I had some problems with my case and the Qatar airways, but also with the local telephone lines. Well the staff  has done their best to assist me.  And the restaurant? A very tasty and rich breakfast until 10,30. Dishes served were both Thai and international. And above all prices were very reasonable. As I booked through Expedia both flight and hotel I…

title: Awesome Place to stay, Superb Place run by wonderful people!!!
review: Dear madiba1996,  Many thanks for this great review and rating! Very pleased to not your satisfaction and overall comments about team and services offered.  It is often more difficult for the team to keep high standards and consistency over such a long period and i am delighted to see we could manage that and grant you both 15 days in paradise...   Many thanks again and arrivederci :)  Sebastien

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: The Hotel holds up to its name, it was really "GRAND."  We were a family of 5 adults and 2 kids, stayed for 2 nights-3 days. The staff is really superb.  The room and hotel amenities are very well maintained.  There is a kids play area too, which is well looked after by the hotel team.  The buffet breakfast spread has plenty of options and the food is simply awesome.  The hotel staff including the manager went out of their way in assisting us with all our needs and whimsicals, (believe me, with the kids).  They definitely made the stay a memorable one with their caring and helpful attitude.

title: Very Nice but Housekeeping Fail
review: Dear ForgivingDevil,  Many thanks for this Grand review of our property.  It was great having you and the kids playing around the pool and we all sincerely hope to see you again very soon.  I will pass on your regards to the Chef and his team too...  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Well looked after by some very caring staff
review: We paid a reasonable amount of money to stay at this hotel, but felt we were actually at a more expensive hotel for the money.   Having gone around Australia for five weeks and lived out of a suitcase, in many hotels, for us this was the best saved to the last.  It was really good.  Fantastic Swimming Pool that glittered every morning as I looked out of my room, food that was, a little expensive, but still wonderful to eat, a bar that was open whenever you wanted a drink, a cleaning service that left your room spotless and, of course, Mr Sebastian!  I had read about him in previous reviews when trying to choose a hotel and he was exactly as portrayed 'on the tin'  Real 'diamond geezer' as a cockney from London would say.    The wi fi was fast and easy to access from the minute…

title: Good location, nice pool, friendly staff, small rooms
review: This hotel is in a great location about 2 streets away from the beach 5 - 10 min walk to bangla road 5 min walk to the shopping centre and next to the markets.  The hotel staff are very friendly the supervisor at the time was great not sure what his name was.  The rooms here are the smallest i've been in around Thailand but are enough.  The pool is pretty good with a fun swim up bar prices are pretty high.  We got a secret deal with this hotel and  wouldn't want to spend any more then we did on the room they offered us a late check out of 7 pm for 2500 baht which is just under what we where paying for the whole night we had a late flight so went with it.  Few year ago I stayed at Holiday inn the resort which is across the road id say that was nicer and the same location but…

title: Top Class Hotel
review: Dear TheStah,  Many thanks for this great review of our property.  Very pleased to see your comments about our team attitude too.   As for the surcharge for late check-out, and as much as we try to accommodate all requests and often offer a late(r) check-out until 1 or 2 pm on complimentary basis (depending on availability of course), we need to manage our inventory as efficiently as we can and need sometimes to ask for a little extra when it comes to requests for 4pm, 6pm or later. Very sorry about that again...  Kindly let us know if you plan on visiting Phuket again soon, as we have a few other properties in Karon, Kamala and Naithon too...   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: not so grand
review: From the moment we were met at the airport until we checked out we had a grand time at this hotel.  Checkin was straightforward, we were expected and were charged the negotiated rate.  We had asked for a quiet non smoking room and this is what we were given, we never heard any other guests.  The room was a (standard) Superior with comfortable King Size bed, tea coffee making facilities, stocked mini bar with the contents having the hotel seal, no balcony but a rail to dry clothes on.  The bathroom was well stocked with toiletries, towels included face washer, the shower was fantastic, plenty of hot water, although it was all glass with a blind, which lets in natural light, but does not aid privacy.  The room was kept clean and reasonably well stocked.  There was a very extensive…

title: GRAND HOSPITALITY
review: Dear 56ajax,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating.  It is great to see you both enjoyed yourself very much and i'm particularly pleased by your comments about staff friendliness and quality of food & beverage selection.  We have recently created pages for both our pastry shop "Chouchou" and pool side restaurant "Bubbles" and would encourage others to check those and get an idea of what awaits them at Grand Mercure...   Once again, many thanks for this very detailed and kind review!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Impressed yet again -Top Class Hotel
review: we had pool access room but everyone can still use the pool right in front of your door and balcony, mosquitos every where come into room as door is opened ,shower in bath which I hate with water running from bath ledge onto floor had to put large towel down to soak up water. Had to go looking for the coffee ppl at breakfast most times if u don't u wont get any . Concrete around main pool area very very slippery saw one guest fall flat on his back. O  top markets across rd from hotel is a rip off 400 bht for a t shirt if u r dumb enough to pay it, I much prefer the northern end of Pa tong from Bangala Rd North

title: Disappointing staying March 2015
review: Deluxe pool access room is misleading anyone can use it..founds other guests sitting on private beds exclusive to room!!! Pool far too small to house all guests.  Can't sit out at night due to moscetto and cockroach.. Paid for this facility to be disappointed..restaurant choices for Europeans not enough choice.  Good location if you want a lively holiday -close to Bangla road.  Complained to staff regards insects and offered to upgrade room and gave us a courtesy meal...but had to pay for drinks to accompany it!!!!- rooms small restaurant disorganised.

title: A great hotel in the heart of Phuket Patong
review: Dear Sandra D,  Thank you for sharing those various with Sumontha and myself the other day.  We have asked the pest control team to emphasize on this green space you refereed to, so to minimize risks to future guests. It is always challenging to prevent mosquitoes an other insects to enter our premises, especially considering this humid tropical climate, but efforts are made on daily and weekly basis so to prevent major invasion if i may say.   Very sorry once again for all the trouble. You seemed both happy during the last few days of your holidays and i hope you will give us a another chance next time you decide on visiting Patong, Phuket.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: "New Hotel with Great Pool"
review: We had a great stay here at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong. The hotel is brand new, modern, with a great pool and within walking distance to the beach and Patong night life.  And a big Thanks to Manus, the Manager, for helping us with restaurant choices, tours and getting us taxi's and transportation to airport.

title: highly recommend
review: Dear BILLinDC2015,  Many thanks for this wonderful review...  Very pleased to see you had a wonderful stay and could experience local tastes and cuisine thanks to K.Manus too.  Will pass on your regards...  Thank you very much once again, Sebastien

title: Bad experience, not a profesional staff !!
review: My husband and I along with two other friends stayed here 5 nts. Nice new hotel with beautiful pool, lots of lounge chairs available around the pool. Great locations, shopping, and beach is within 10 mins walk.Friendly service at the restaurant, but we were disappointed with service upon check-in.  They couldn't find our reservation even though we booked it directly though the hotel's website. We were told that they needed to see the  confirmation to check us in. Fortunately, I had it with me but my friends had to go dig through their suitcases to find it. They seemed impersonal and unaccommodating in dealing with this. We're planning another trip to Phuket again for early next year, might stay here again because of hotel and location and hopefully, we'll have a better…

title: Brand New Hotel Excellent Pool
review: I booked this hotel as it had newly opened and wanted to check it out and was not disappointed, on arrival the hotel looks stunning with a lovely reception leading to a trendy pool area with loads of available loungers. The rooms are beautiful not the biggest though and have no balcony just a sliding Juliet style balcony which did not bother us in the slightest. The breakfast is excellent and plenty of choice and although the hotel guests were mostly Asian there was plenty of European choice on offer. The hotel is situated near hooters and hard rock which are both great and also 1 street behind patong beach road so really central to everything .All in all a stunning hotel with excellent room rates for  5* new hotel get it booked!!!

title: Ups and downs in Phuket
review: Dear dunalt,  Thank you very much for sharing such nice review! It was a pleasure welcoming you at Grand Mercure and the entire team is looking forward to you return.. maybe next year :)  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent
review: Rooms are cool, if you chose the ones on the first floor you have a direct access to the pool...Which seems like a wonderful idea, until the following morning when you have kids screaming at your door. . Service is very polite but excruciatingly slow. Bar and restaurant menu is limited, and the staff's ability to speak English is also limited.   and there are mosquitoes everywhere. bring lots of OFF

title: Amazing staff 'Olga'
review: Dear sergioinflorida,  Thank you very much for your comments.  I am sorry to hear about the mosquito issue. We have done weekly fumigation since opening and are also providing a coil for guests to use on each terrace. It is usually very helpful and sufficient but with climate changing now that we are approaching raining season again, we might need to pay extra attention about those... and we will.   Please kindly let us know if you ever plan a trip back to Patong, we would be very happy to make it happen this time around.   Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Dirty and impersonal
review: I stayed at Grand Mercure Phuket, Thailand for a week, with my partner and it was probably the best week of my whole summer. The hotel is beautiful. As beautiful as the setting was, it was the staff that really made it a worthwhile place to stay--especially the customer service manager Olga who was always very attentive, and gave impeccable dining and sightseeing recommendations. Such a small gesture made a huge impression. Next time I'm in the area, I would definitely stay here again.

title: Awesome staff
review: My husband and I stayed at the Grand Mercure for seven nights and thoroughly enjoyed it!  I would especially like to acknowledge the helpfulness of all the staff and management after I badly sprained my ankle at the beach.  They couldn't have been more helpful, providing a wheelchair, and helping me in and out of my room whenever they saw me.  The room itself was clean and the towel-dog on our bed was a lovely touch!  Each time we called for additional house-keeping items, they were provided promptly.  On arrival we received a complimentary drink and cupcake thing, both of which were absolutely delightful!  The pool was fabulous, as were the cocktails.  The buffet breakfast was also great with a reasonable variety.  Again, thank you again to all staff and management, in…

title: Good choice if you have to be in Patong
review: Dear Belinda T,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful and rating. It was great having you both around and i hope you are now feeling lot better.  Please let us know if you do plan a new trip to Patong soon... It would be a real pleasure to welcome you both back.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Finnish to a holiday
review: This is a large resort with modern amenities set in an urban city that has grown far too fast for its own good. The hotel itself is well run and good value for money. Welcome drink, snack and cool towel provided. Fairly quick check in process and then to your room.  Rooms are modern with comfortable beds. Very small balcony, just enough to stand on, so smokers be warned. Good room service, nice pool area. Breakfast was adequate but with some very odd food choices on offer. Good restaurants just outside the front drive as well.  Bell boys negotiated a good deal for me for transfer to Khao Lak.   While I doubt I'll ever stay in Patong again, I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good resort there.

title: Beautiful but could use improvement
review: Dear Itravelutour,  Thank you very much for sharing such a nice review of our property. Patong is a little like "Marmite" :) With this in mind, we tried to create a little oasis, an exception to the rule that would allow guests to rest and relax peacefully, while being only steps away from shopping and entertainment districts.   Thank you for your great comments about service & food quality as well as friendliness of the team!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great "intro" rate to new hotel!
review: We were treated with a welcome drink and fresh made cup cakes to our check in the very quick then to our room  to find to single beds no problem fixed with in no more than 5 min whilst the porter was still showing us how every thing works.  The rooms are very nice but a little small as to the balcony but still nice our friends room had that mouldy smell in there's we didn't. The pool was to die for, so clean and fresh the pool staff were nice and polite.mr Mann was a quick operator with drinks. Breakfast was the best we had all holiday as we stayed in 5 hotels in two weeks. The only bad thing watch out for the concrete around the pool it's very slippery I found out 1st hand and I was sober thongs or bear feet. Great resort  great Finnish to a holiday

title: Disappointing!!
review: This is our 4th visit to Phuket. In Patong location is everything for us when choosing a hotel. We were very excited for staying at the "new" Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  We arrived after 2pm for check-in. Our room was not ready. They offered for us to use the club facilities (which is anyway included for us as we booked a grand pool access room) as the room, in her exact words "will only take 15-20 mins, max 30 mins". We waited more than a hour & could only go to our room way past 4pm. That to me is unacceptable & poor service.  The room is VERY small. The room, especially bathroom, already looks rundown. Access to the pool is great. Food & especially drinks is very expensive.  We already shortened our stay by 2 nights, & will definitely think hard about returning to this…

title: Great stay, helpful staff, beautiful pool and nice breakfast, bad internet and cleaning of the room done late
review: Dear jua83,  Thank you for sharing this unfortunate experience with us.  Our Executive Assistant Manager K. Sumontha mentioned she had the chance of meeting you both and it was great to hear that things were getting better by the day.   Very sorry once again, Sebastien

title: Fantastic service
review: We stayed 8 nights at this hotel, from Feb 08 to Feb 16, I must say it was a pleasure to find a good quiet hotel in a crazy really animated area as Patong is known to be. The fact that all rooms are facing the pool is offering you a peaceful feeling, no noise during the night, doors and walls are pretty isolated, I did not hear others voices form the room next to us or something like that.  The superior room is not so big, but I'd say 30m2 is enough for everyone (2 persons) and the bed is a king-size bed, the bathroom is big and clean, there is a window between the bath and the sleeping area, but if you don't want to be seen you can use the curtain that they have and it's just as intimate as your home.  The cleaning is ok, they change the sheets if needed, every day they are…

title: Poorly trained staff
review: Dear Anouk_0501,  Thank you very much for your very kind review.  I am very pleased to see you spent quality times with us and would recommend others to give Grand Mercure a chance.   I have also noticed your very valid points about staff attitude in regards to using our printer or delays experienced when it comes to cleaning the room. As correctly mentioned, those little issues can be quite annoying and i am very sorry you had to go through this.  I have discussed those specific matters with both Front office and housekeeping Managers so to avoid recurrence in future.   Thank you once again for sharing your thoughts about overall kindness of the team and also the quality met at breakfast!  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon... Sebastien

title: Great hotel with nice pool in a good location
review: From the moment we arrived at the Grand Mercure we felt very welcomed by the lovely staff at the front desk. We were upgraded to a pool side room with complementary afternoon tea which we didn't complain at all. The room as very neat and tidy. Breakfast buffet was varied and catered for a variety of taste buds. We ordered pizza for in room dining and they were delicious. Overall a lovely stay.

title: High Quality Hotel, Highly recommended
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure for 8 days in February 2015 and we really enjoyed their hospitality and service. The location is very convenient as you are in the heart of Patong and a short walk to the beach. Very convenient for eating out and visiting different venues at night without the need of transport as you can walk almost anywhere in Patong. The breakfast buffet is excellent and the hotel restaurant is one of the best in Phuket, very good ambience and high quality food .The prices are not bad at all for 5 star service. The rooms are modern roomy and the beds very comfortable. The French coffee  shop is also excellent.

title: Dissatisfied Guest
review: Dear ioannou417,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and rating! It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying their stay with us and I will take this opportunity to also thank our Restaurant team on your behalf.  See you again soon, Sebastien

title: Very clean hotel in the heart of Patong
review: Im currently staying in two bedroom villa with pool in room 913. Firstly, i got to say both toilets are infested with mosquitoes and bugs which i have to get the housekeepers to come in the first thing we got into the villa to exterminate them. Even so, they just keep coming in. We went to the mall to get those electric bats in the shopping mall to help us.  During the night when we got back from dinner, the whole villa was pitched dark. Although the housekeepers did the turn down service but why did they didn't turn on the lights. Furthermore, my dad is difficulties walking which he requires a walking stick to assist him. i just felt its really dangerous.   For both afternoons we were here, the housekeepers never came until we rang for them. Even so when we came back from…

title: New hotel, very nice stay
review: Dear alexwaiwai,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts and own experience at our property.  I am very sorry about all those issues encountered, issues that have been discussed and addressed already by the team.  In addition to lighting set in bedrooms, we have revised our Standard operating procedures and will from now on switch on both living room and outdoor lights when servicing the room in the evening.   Very sorry once again, Sebastien

title: An oasis in a wild town
review: We were a group of friends that stayed there for a week from February 5th. We booked superior suits on 7th floor.Me and my wife stayed at suit 711.They were really amazing and lovely.  Big rooms with soft big queen beds besides living areas with sofas and big samsung LED(possible to use USB for listening music).  One thing that really surprised me was its big, nice and luxurious Bath.One of the best beautiful baths I I have seen.  Big walking closet with 2 washing sink, rain shower, normal shower and jacuzzi.   Hotel located at 10 minutes walk to bangla road (Patong walking street) and 5 minutes to Patong Beach.  Our rooms were really clean since they made them up and replaced our towels twice daily. receptionists were really polite and nice.  Pools were really clean but small…

title: Home away from home in Phuket
review: The place to stay in Patong beach Phuket-- a bit pricey but worthwhile. It is in the centre of town, very good, spacious and clean rooms. It is a very modern hotel,(opened less than a year ago). The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. The only area of improvement that I noticed, was that the staff did not clean the breakfast tables quick enough, so in one of the days I was there, it was a bit of a fight to try and get a clean table to have breakfast -- and when we got it, one of us was always garding it from people looking for free tables -- do not know, if it was a management issue, or just not enough staff at the busy hours.

title: Brilliant hotel but not quite a 5* yet
review: Dear Jorge R,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of yours.  It is always a pleasure to note guests are enjoying themselves and we noted your very valid comment about breakfast too.  With very high occupancy these past few days, it has been very challenging for the team to keep up   with requests and definitely an area to improve in days and weeks to come...  Many thanks and please do let us know if you plan a new trip to town soon :)  Sebastien

title: Lovely Stay
review: This hotel is perfectly located, close enough to restaurants and nightlife but yet a peaceful haven to return to once you needed a break. I didn't try the restaurants as the food outside the hotel was so tasty and much cheaper. The pool area is nice but does not get enough sun. If you are a beach person then I would suggest a different hotel, or do what we did, which was to hire a scooter and travel to different quieter beaches every day-i would recommend kata noi beach. The hotel isn't a 5* as the finishes are poor, the rooms are small and poorly lit. However, having looked at other hotels in the area, of i were to return to patong, which I doubt, I would defo come back here.

title: Hotel is beautiful but Patong is not
review: Dear Av1984_Traveller,  Many thanks for your review and for the useful tips given to others...  A lot of our guests are actually choosing our Hotel for that very particular reason... the fact that we are located just minutes away from center, JungCeylon Mall and Patong beach while offering privacy and tranquil surroundings. A few are either opting for taxis, tuk tuk or just like you did, bike rentals to get around the island and enjoy nicer beaches in Karon/Kata or up North around Surin.  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Very slow to check in and rooms need fixing
review: Fantastic hotel with first class facilities and an excellent and very friendly staff. The hotel is very central close to Hard Rock Cafe and therefore only 5 minutes from the beach. Very quiet at night as it is just away from the noisy areas of Patong. Lovely pool and a bar which has over 100 beers from around the world and a very knowledgeable Olga at the bar. Thanks for a great stay and will be back.

title: Really nice style and layout, good location, lovely pool area
review: The style of the hotel was very calming and pleasant and so was the pool area, which as you would expect not was enormous (off course because of the urban locality of the hotel). Very quiet though and I slept well. Staff very friendly and helpful. In spite of a fully booked hotel they let me check out 3pm with no extra charge.  The room was not enormous but plenty for me, was a little disappointed to have to stand in the bath to shower in a hotel of that standard. Bed was large and comfortable, lovely view poolside, but no real balcony (French balcony). Was a bit surprised that they allowed smoking on the "balcony" in non-smoking rooms, which literally meant that guests could smoke with windows open. Was not impressed with the quality of the food for room service, but just…

title: Faultless hotel, definitely a top pick
review: Dear RieJul,  Thank you for you great rating and very objective comments.  Good to hear you enjoyed our rooms and slept well too. Please note we have about 40% of the room inventory featuring bathtub as they are praised by parents with young age children or other clients wanting to immerse themselves and relax :)  I am sorry you felt disappointed by the quality of our room service... we are usually receiving great feedback for it and wish you would have give our Ryn Spa a chance knowing our prices are probably 20% higher than outside while the room cleanliness, the atmosphere and creams and oil used are of a much higher standard and quality.   Let me know next time you plan on visiting us and i will be happy to offer you a little discount for any of those treatments :).  Thank you once again and see you again soon. Sebastien

title: Well located and good Service
review: We were extremely happy with this hotel, so much so that this review may almost sound like an advert!  The lobby/entrance to the hotel has been built beautifully and, although open, is air conditioned and as such is so refreshing after getting off the hot Thai streets. All staff in the hotel were very friendly and helpful - even surpassing expectations by arranging a birthday cake in our room for my partner once they found out it was her birthday (and I didn't even ask them to do that!!).  Breakfast quality & choices (western and Asian options) was as good or better as I've had in any hotel. In the room and bathroom, it feels modern and comfortable. The bed was very comfortable, as were the pillows - the room coming with a range of different pillow types.  The location is…

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
review: Dear MarkTBrizzy,  Thank you very much for this very detailed and excellent review. It is always a pleasure to note that guests are enjoying themselves by the pool and around the premises and we are all very much looking forward to welcoming you back.  Thank you once again Sebastien

title: Bubbles Restaurant is awesome
review: This Hotel is very well located .. Not on the beach but walking to all nightlife and Bazaars .. The rooms are well done . specially the Pool acess rooms are very good and the Villas also are worth it.  The swimming pool is very nice and relaxing .  The breakfast is usually quote good as per intl standards

title: Good hotel but very annoying the taxi mafia
review: Everything in this hotel was perfect, the staff friendly, the cleaners allowed us to sleep till whatever time we wanted without disturbing us or moaning that we didnt get up and leave the room till 3pm some days and still cleaned.  only very very annoying aspect is that although you can get a taxi transfer for as low as 1000 b the hotel and the taxi guys that sit outside do not allow other taxi drivers to pick up. I'm sure it's illegal. Every morning almost 20 guys,they will sit front of the hotel and try to catch the client. Even you tried to told them don't want use their service. they will follow you walked down from lobby. I'm felt surprised that why they can use hotel lobby be a nest.  Very scary!!! I didn't report this problem to hotel because seems they saw but can't…

title: Disappointment
review: Dear Andy,  Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and hotel itself. I wish we could have meet and discussed this particular point together as we have already taken some actions.  I was a bit disturbed by their daring attitude over the last few weeks and stepped in on Friday to clarify the situation with their team and ours.  I heard from another client Taxis from outside were also referring us, the Hotel, as partner of theirs and this is absolutely untrue.  As much as they can be friendly and helpful at times, when in large numbers,  they can appear "scary" as you said.   Please note i have had a meeting with their Boss and things are now back in order. We only propose Airport transfers, tours and attractions to guests and leave it up to guests to pick our services or organize their own with outside companies and taxis.... but at least, we will make sure our Lobby and Hotel premises are not being intruded and guests not being approached if they do not wish to.   Thank you very much for your comments, Sebastien

title: In a Nutshell - Great
review: Chose this hotel as thought it had good reviews. Warm reception on arrival, and service pretty good until last day. Bathroom had mould in shower area, had prepaid for breakfast, and they forgot to give us the breakfast box we booked for day of check out. Advise never prepay, and booking tours outside hotel is way cheaper! Breakfast food not covered, and so some bugs around the fruit and muffins, and got bitten by Mosquitos in breakfast room! Also, price in £ on grand Mercure website is not what they charged me on my card, ruined my holiday!

title: nice and cleaan hotel, not flexible and overpriced
review: Dear LotusKat82,  Very sorry to hear about your disappointing experience at the property.  Please feel free to contact us directly to look into the discrepancy you are referring to at h8109-re@accor.com. If there was any, we would compensate you accordingly.   Very sorry once again!  Sebastien

title: Nice
review: We stayed here for 2 nights in late Jan 2015. The hotel was built 10 mths earlier and therefore was like new. It is close to the night life of Bangla Road and 800m from the Jungceylon Shopping Centre and also close to the beach (although we never bothered visiting it) as the pool with its pool bar, was such a nice feature. Although we have plans to return to Phuket, Pantong is not a place we are likely to stay in again. However, if we were, this would be our hotel of choice. Great service, great location and far enough not to hear the noisy night life but close enough not to need a taxi if you want to visit the night life. Only gripe was to get speedy wi-fi you had to pay, which for this class of hotel is pretty mean. Lower class hotels in the area offer it for free. Come on…

title: Great service and and location in Patong
review: We went as a family and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Grand Mercure in one of their 2 bedroom villas. It was like having a home away from home. The hotel is an easy walk to Junceylon and the madness of Bangla Road. Hard Rock & Hooters are just around the corner if that's your thing, yet the location away from the beach means it is quiet enough (apart from a few illegal Patong firecrackers) and only a 5 minute walk to the sand of Patong beach. Breakfast was a great mix of Western, Eastern & European with something for all ages in our family. The staff were lovely and very attentive, doing all they could to get our coffee & tea just the way we liked it! Thank you to Sebastien, Bootsong & all the staff for looking after us.  Make sure you try the seafood restaurant right…

title: A tranquil and relaxing stay
review: Dear Nicknotes,  Thank you very much for this superb review. Very pleased to see you both enjoyed our Pool villa so much and also took the time of visiting our Club lounge.  I will pass on your regards to Jamnong and rest of the Food & Beverage team for their friendliness and dedication.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great location, OK accommodation
review: We recently stayed 5 nights at the Grand Mercure and loved it as our quiet relaxing base after big days of exploring the busy streets and sights!  Location - an 800baht taxi ride from the airport (approx 1 hour, $34AUD) - it was a hot and busy 10 minute walk to Patong beach, I would prefer something closer but the pool is better to swim in than the beach anyway.  - very close to good markets and bars and restaurants.   Service - everyone at the desk was lovely and more than happy to go out of their way to make things more comfortable for you. - ask concierge for help with organising taxis, hire drivers, directions, etc - make use of the travel desk in the "business centre" room. There is always someone there to help you book the best tour. TIP: prices through the hotel are…

title: Good service and location
review: Dear Kate117,  Thank you very much for this great review and rating! Very pleased to see you enjoyed your stay very much and liked the breakfast spread even more.   It was great to have you around for a few days and hopefully we will have the chance of welcoming back sometime in 2015!  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Great location!
review: This hotel is less than a year old and we stayed in the entry level Superior room.  First impressions were a little disappointing with the room quite small and the room not very clean, with dirty shower screens, towels and around the basin.  However, the service was excellent, from reception, concierge and housekeeping, they were always smiling and friendly and could not be faulted.  Also, given we were celebrating our 7th anniversary, the hotel kindly made up our room with flowers and swans made of towels as well as a nice cake.  Thank you!  The hotel grounds are quite nice with a lovely pool and modern reception/bar area although we did not eat there and cannot comment on the food quality.    The best part of this hotel is the location.  It is just far enough from the hustle…

title: Peaceful, relaxing respite
review: ...from the bedlam that is Patong Beach.   I found the Superior room acceptable but tight. Don't unpack, there's no place to put anything. The bathrooms are clean, generous and modern. The room was clean and well lit. Tap water is labeled unsafe and bottled water is provided happily as needed.   The breakfast buffet was very good.. Delicious strong coffee and  Croissants to die for. The buffet was  very clean and well-served. A good  deal of requisite asian fare that I did not sample much; my appetite for pigs blood in the morning is keenly subdued. The fruits, eggs, bacon, fried rice/noodles, and pastries were all I had room for because the Chocolate Croissants needed careful repeated inspections for quality.  Wifi is free but only two devices may log on? I can only use one at…

title: Good hotel, great location
review: Dear Bullshark2000,  Thank you very much for taking a few minutes of your time and sharing your own experience with us.  It is very much appreciated and your comments have been well noted. I have asked our IT Manager to check the maximum number of log-in per room as i thought we were allowing 4 devices for the last few months already.   Thousand thanks for your superb comments about the local cuisine. Very pleased to see you enjoyed our Padthai so much.   Please do let us know if you ever plan a new trip to Patong!!  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Mediocre at best
review: When we arrived we were pleased to see this hotel is still very new. Everything is smart and shiny. Our room was a good size and well fitted out. The shared facilities of the hotel were also good including pool. Best point was the location, which was in the middle of Patong so there werte shops and restaurants all around the hotel, and the beach was just a few minutes walk.

title: Nice new hotel
review: Dear Jojo W,  Many thanks for this very kind review of our property.  We are all looking forward to welcoming back once again.  Sebastien

title: Pretty good hotel, awesome staff
review: We stayed here for 2 nights & 3 days. The property itself is located at walking distance from the beach and market. However, location is the only thing going for this property. During our stay, the rooms were really tiny. The bathroom was filled with insects such as cockroaches and had spider webs at two places. The room itself was clean. Only staff members at the front desk are familiar with English. This gets extremely challenging when even trying to deal with room service. We placed an order for a club sandwich and were curious to know if they had any option of brown or multigrain bread. We spent over an hour trying to explain the same. After this decided to have our meals at one of the several fast food restaurants in and around the market. The staff has a completely non…

title: Dont overlook Patong- this hotel is sensational!
review: I went with my 18 year old daughter, first time to Thailand and most people told us to stay away from Patong as go to Karon Beach, or the like. At the last minute we changed our booking to the Grand Mecure Pool Access room and it was brilliant. Sebastian, the General Manager, runs this resort like it is his own. It only opened last year and it is stunning. It is like a boutique hotel although it is part of a chain. The pool access room is brilliant and you can access the main pool if you so desire but you have your own lagoon pool with other pool access rooms so we didn't use the main pool. Staff are so polite, breakfast buffet is great, location is perfect as you can walk to the beach, the great shopping mall or the madness of Bangla Road but you don't hear any noise.…

title: Nice nothing special
review: Dear Sharon Andrea,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It was a pleasure to welcome you both and see you enjoying yourselves by the pool everyday.   I hope to see you again very soon!  with Grand regards, Sebastien  PS: Thank you for the gift... Ozi Ozi Ozi :)

title: Quality Hotel; Exceptional Service & Amazing  Location!
review: Not a good part of town. Smelled terrible walking out of the hotel. Didn't notice while in hotel though, so that's a plus. Paid $125 night. Listed now over $250. Would not have been happy if I paid more than $125. Pool was nice. Breakfast buffet and restaurant was good. Need better trained staff, but they were all very sweet and tried to accommodate. Close to many attractions. Beach, Bangla road, muay thai fights, juceylong.

title: Lovely Resort
review: Dear krista s,  Many thanks for your review and kind comments about staff attitude and willingness to please. As mentioned, we are trying to offer a little oasis within Patong which can at time be a little hectic.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: location :(
review: It was my 1st visit to Phuket  Patong  Thailand  and my very 1st stay  at  Grand  Mercure and i have had an AMAZING  Experience. I traveled  on my own yet felt surrounded  by  friends  during  my time  at Grand  Mercure  Phuket. The  Hotel is of high Quality standards and the Staff are Exceptional in their  Service and extremely  accommodating. I celebrated my Birthday at Grand  Mercure Phuket and cannot express the level  of  gratitude  and appreciation i hold for the generosity received, i was overwhelmed  by  the Birthday  surprises organized by the  Hotel Management and  Staff. THANK  YOU  OLGA (Service Manager), Sebastian  (Hotel Manager) and the whole Food & Beverage  Team. I will definitely  return  to  Grand  Mercure when i plan to  visit  Phuket  Patong  again. Highly …

title: Amazing hotel!!
review: I have stayed in hotels all over the world and I must say this rates in the top three. The staff is simply awesome! They will do whatever they can to make your stay anything but amazing. I have no complaints about my stay here except that I didn't want to leave. I plan to make several trips to Phuket in the future and I will be staying at the Grand Mercure!!

title: great location
review: Dear Daniel S,  Many thanks for this superb review and rating! We will be very happy to welcome you again soon and take this opportunity to wish you a fantastic Year 2015!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent hotel, Convenient location and Friendly staff.
review: near to the beach, near to jungcylon shopping centre. great location with quiet atmosphere. very attentive staffs with warm smile.

title: Select an alternative
review: Dear jennyyoon1,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property. Very much appreciated and always a pleasure to see guests leaving with a smile...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Decent Value for money
review: When you arrive at the hotel, you will be usher into the spacious lobby and had your luggage taken care of. While checking in (2pm), you will be served with drink, cold towel and cream puff. Location are good, 5mins walk to Patong Beach and 15mins walk to Jungceylon Shopping Mall. Was being given complementary access to their grand club (free drink & snack) which is a good add on. Requested for late check-out, and the front desk did managed to arrange it for me. Food was being wrapped up or cover to prevent bug from flying into it when ordering in-room dining. The following need improvement: Should inform guest on the free shuttle services to patong beach (11.30am and 3pm only). Should increase the free wifi speed and not charging guest for that. Overall, the stay was enjoyable…

title: Good value for the money due location & being new
review: The hotel is relatively new, which was why we stayed there.  It was pretty clean, but not really a 5 star IMO.  More like a 4 star.  The location is actually very good, as it's a short walk to Patong Beach, and the mall (they also offer free shuttles).  Lots of restaurants nearby, and the staff was very helpful and friendly.  The pool was very nice, but the restaurant and breakfast were just okay.  The lobby area is very nice though, and the live music entertainment they have on some weeknights in the lounge was outstanding (the vocalist has an amazing voice).  Only reason I'm giving it 5/5 is due to the value (bang for the buck) and location.  Facilities could be cleaner, and the room and décor could've been made with better quality.  BTW, don't stay in Patong for the beach, as…

title: Excellent food and service
review: Dear D L,  Thank you very much for your 5* rating. Very pleased to see you enjoyed our property and found it to be a great "value for money" option.  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Best place to stay in Patong
review: Stayed here for 5 days and had a great time! All the staffs were really friendly and helpful. The room was modern with everything you need. The food at the restaurant and bakery were really good! And because Patong area is generally a tourist rip off place anyway, the restaurant food at the hotel (Bubbles) is the same price and sometimes even cheaper than outside but has better food and better service! The bar has craft beers and evening live chill music and there's a swim up bar. The lobby area is super pretty and very chill with a nice breeze. The pool is a bit on the smaller side but really pretty and you can still swim laps which I did. There are also tons of private villas with own mini pool. It's also a 5 mins easy walk to Patong beach. Highly recommend this place!

title: Disappointment for a nice facility!!
review: Dear Arthemie,  Thank you very much for sharing such a review of our property! I will pass on your regards to our Chef and team...  Many thanks and see you again very soon! Sebastien

title: House keeping not keeping the house
review: We have travelled to Patong 5 times and have never bothered to review a resort ,but this time, I feel the need to .  This resort was fantastic, close to Junceylon and 5 mins to the beach, GM Sebastien, made himself known to us and provided a  complementary beer and coffee and the use of a DVD player that we enjoyed. All staff, in the bar, restaurant and housekeeping are lovely and go out of their way to make sure everything is ok . Breakfast was ok but felt it catered more for the Asian community. We stayed in a pool access room which we highly recommend . Cocktails, lunch and dinner in the restaurant were delicious and reasonably priced. Overall, we had a very relaxing and comfortable stay and look forward to returning again soon

title: Could not possibly ask for more....
review: but even if we did, I am quite certain that the GM, Sebastien, would have provided it for us.  Their excellent customer service began even before we arrived as I had messaged The Grand Mercure Phuket on their facebook page about various topics (diving, weather, spa menu, etc).  I had no idea that the gentleman responding to my messages was actually the GM! I assumed he was a marketing/PR guy.  The prompt and thorough responses, laced with a little humor at times, made a great first impression and it just got better and better.    The lobby is beautiful.  It's open air and just screams "tropical paradise!"  It really wows you when you drive up.  You would never know that this little gem was just across from the lively, noisy, bustling shopping/restaurant area you see as you…

title: Beautiful but room to improve
review: Dear azhootie,  Thank you very much for sharing such a review of our property. It was a great pleasure to welcome you all and i am very pleased to see you enjoyed your stay very much.   I will take this opportunity to thank our Food and Beverage team for their great efforts over Christmas and New Year period and conduct shortly the lucky draw for the prize you left as promised.   Many thanks once again and wishing you good luck and health for the coming year!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Very enjoyable stay.
review: Excellent location if you like Patong.  Not at the heart core but still walkable to the beach and the busy part of Patong.   The hotel is very new in time and it looks modern and nice but the hotel must be aware of keeping it nice and clean since I saw chips and scratches on walls and corners around the property.  If nothing is going to be done, the hotel won't look nice in a year or two. We got a 1 bedroom villa which is very nice decorated and spacious although I would like the pool to be bigger.  Housekeeping definitely need some improvement.  Requested for more towels on the first day, none after we came back from dinner.  Have to request again.  There are constantly tiny little flying bugs around the room and I don't know what bugs are they but they are very annoying.  My…

title: Beautiful hotel
review: Dear Mochaaaa,  Thank you very much for your review and for pointing at issues we are now working on fixing.  It is always easier for us to act or react once informed of an issue than look into it once it is over and i am pleased you gave us a chance to improve and fix what needed to be.  Great to hear you loved your stay in our Villa and will take this opportunity to thank the entire team on your behalf.  Many thanks once again and see you again very soon. Sebastien

title: 5 star hotel but feels like 3 star !
review: We stayed at this hotel for the last leg of our honeymoon in a King Suite. We were taken care of exceptionally well and all the staff were extremely helpful and polite. The pool and pool bar were extremely relaxing and the food at the restaurant was very good. They also played live music every night which was a nice touch. The location of the resort was excellent and in very easy walking distance to the beach and shopping. The wifi was a bit annoying as it continuously dropped out and you had to keep signing in all the time. Overall we enjoyed our stay and would stay here again in Phuket.

title: Unbelievable Gem - A Must Stay!!!!
review: There are some places you stumble upon that you want the world to know about and this is one of them!  What a fabulous place in the absolute heart of Patong without even feeling it.  Walking distance to everything. The property is only 9 months old having opened on 1 April 2014 and it is beautifully decorated, fantastically designed rooms - all pool facing, and are specious and have everything you could possibly need.  There are many room types to choose from and a fabulous choice of pool access rooms as well.  Great grounds, open spaces and lovely areas to enjoy a meal or drinks at the bar.  Breakfast is delicious with a huge choice at the buffet and the food in general is excellent.  As you would expect from an Accor property, the service is outstanding and all staff under the…

title: Amazing hotel and great service
review: Dear TanyaOzi,  Thank you so very much for sharing such a review... You are too kind and we are all very grateful for it.  Please let us know when your next trip will be so to get organized accordingly and get the red carpet in place :)  Once again, thank you very much and see you again soon, Sebastien

title: Thank you for taking care of us
review: We had the opportunity to stay at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong and we have had such a great experience during our stay there.  The staff were friendly and helpful, and the hotel itself was beautiful and new, and when you are inside the hotel you forget that you are in the hustle and bustle of Patong.  The food was excellent, whether it is the spicy carbonara pizza or the larb burger and Thai fried rice, and they are all very strongly recommended.  We loved the pool area which was a great place to hang out especially when the weather was slightly gloomy during our stay.  All in all, we would strongly recommend Grand Mercure Phuket to everyone who wishes to visit Phuket and we can't wait to go back again.

title: Beautiful oasis amidst Patong nightlife
review: Dear aprilc411,  Thank you so much for this review and rating. It is great to see you enjoy your stay so much and also had a chance to try on our carbonara spicy pizza...   Hopefully, we will meet again in 2015! Sebastien

title: outstanding hotel and staff
review: You hotel is really amazing especially people is so kindly helpful and taking care of customer every time. We have been staying just 4days, you guys touched our heart. And thank you for preparing father's birthday cake. Actually, it has been changed to our first plan though, nothing problem or I think more impressible. In addition, our Table guy in Babbles Dinner at 1st Jan, his service was really great. Unfortunately we don't know his name but please say hello to him.   Some part, I think you guys can clean up more and getting more amazing Hotel. Hope we will visit there again near in the future. Thank you.

title: Nothing special
review: Stayed here with family in mid December. Standard room was quite small, mini bar zone was full of small ants, although we were on the 3rd floor. Common areas were very good with nice music in the evening. Location is very convenient for those who like active holidays, many Restaraunts, markets and massage salons around, but the surrounding residential buildings are very close and very dirty. Hotel is two blocks away from the beach or 10 minutes.

title: Good Hotel..small rooms!
review: Dear Bakhtiar B,  Thank you for your comments. Sorry you could not find anything special about our property! We are actually trying very hard in offering services and options like no where else and we probably failed this time around.  Sebastien

title: Brilliant and Peaceful
review: We stayed at the Grand Mercure Patong from 25/12 to 28/12 in a pool access room. We had mailed and requested for a early check- in at 12 pm as we had our 3 yrs old son with us. Email response was prompt and helpful, but while reaching we had to wait till 2 pm with our son sleeping in the stroller in the heat. The lady on the counter was borderline rude and non adjusting (was not expecting the same been an Accor advantage plus member), as cleaning the room takes max half an hour (that was the time taken for our room to be cleaned for the next three days). On checking in, the room size was really small for our bags, stroller and our kid to move in the room.  Access to the pool was good but the pool is narrow and always cold due to the shadow of the building. We had to jump to the…

title: Excellent place to stay in Phuket
review: Dear Hetviv_traveller,  Many thanks for you review and for sharing your those few concerns with us.  I have discussed those with our front office team and have to apologize to you for not being able to help with a faster check-in. Those last two weeks were very busy as you can imagine and unless guests are checking out earlier in the morning, it is very difficult for us to offer early check-in services (especially when it comes to our Pool access rooms).  I am very sorry your child had to wait in the lobby and wish we could have find a better alternative venue for you to rest and relax while your room was being released and cleaned, probably at the restaurant or maybe in another standard room.  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Affordable luxury in Patong
review: We had the good fortune to stay at the Grand Mercure from the 20th to the 28th December 2014. Purpose of the trip was a family holiday to relax and the hotel more than adequately assisted in this. The deluxe pool access rooms (125 & 126) were brilliant. The hotel is well positioned in Patong if you want to experience the markets and night life but we spent most of our time at the hotel. Facilities were more than adequate and very much met the brief. Staff were lovely, accommodating, smiling, friendly and extremely helpful and took all the stress away. The 4 of us had breakfast everyday which caterd not only for Western guests but alos Asian, Japanese and Indian tastes. Joined the Christmas Eve dinner which was fabulous and the food on offer unbelievably good and varied. Would…

title: Good hotel can still improve
review: This is obviously a brand new hotel and so certain inconsistencies can be forgiven. Check in and out was a breeze. However be aware they will block 1000 bath per day of your stay on your credit card. Here's a few things worth improving: 1. Room : shampoo and toilet paper were never replenished, had to ask for it from the maid, bathroom shows already moldy places. On three days construction noise (hammering) starting at 8am, no warning /apologies from the management. Otherwise nice blackout curtains, good Windows, quiet  2. Pool : nice, a bit narrow. Enough chairs and umbrellas. Nobody to take your orders, have to walk to the bar yourself. Dirty plates not removed for hours. Food very good though, especially the pizza! Silly registering of towels you take j/ bring back. Not…

title: Minnesota, USA
review: Dear Mertinontheroad,  Thank you very much for your review and constructive comments.  I am glad to see you had a good stay overall and would still recommend our property despite those few little issues that bothered you.  i have shared your review with our Executive housekeeper and Food & Beverage Manager for their quick and corrective actions!  Many thanks once again and see you again very soon.  Wishing you a wonderful New Year 2015... on the road!  Sebastien

title: Good work Grand Mercure Patong
review: Great new hotel, staff and location. Recommend. Would stay again. Hot water fluctuates between hot and cold both nights that we were there. Walking distance to patong beach and Bangla road(it seems to be about 20 mins walk not the 7 mins they told us).

title: New hotel
review: Dear Marc Y,  Thank you for your review and kind comments...  I have asked our Engineer Manager to check the water system in your room and it has now been fixed. Thank you and see you again next year hopefully.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Overall ok but staff need to go training in problem handling
review: It's a great stay at Grand Mercure Patong.  We booked the 2 bedroom Villa, my boys enjoyed the private pool. Breakfast is great too. The only thing that the hotel need to improve is the wifi in the Villa,  really poor reception.  The staffs are indeed helpful, friendly..... Very convenient to all places. We definitely book Grand Mercure Patong again for our next visit to Phuket.  Keep up the good work.

title: Excellent hotel
review: We recommend this hotel customer service the best Weve had since stayed in four seasons Personalised interactions with staff to make your stay more enjoyable Clean comfortable good surroundings . Food and service impeccable. Thai and western cuisine Breakfasts to suit all tastes from western to curries noodles muffins yogurts omelettes etc We were lucky to have an upgrade to pool villa which was very private and a large size villa This met very criteria we would want for a hotel . It was a home from home we would definitely return.

title: Great hotel!
review: Dear Coleen E,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property.  Our Pool Villa are really unique in that sense and it is great to note you enjoyed your stay so much.  Thank you also for your comments about our cuisine and quality of the service team... very much appreciated.  Wishing you a Merry Christmas ahead! Sebastien

title: Grand and welcoming!
review: Very impressive from the start. Grand,open-style lobby. Check-in seamless.  Checked into 2 pool access rooms (definitely the way to go if possible). Rooms are small but have everything that's required. We too found the glass windowed bathroom very strange. The king bed room had a small bath, the double bedded room had a huge walk-in rain shower. Hard mattresses.  The pool is great, especially when you are able to access direct from your balcony and have an entire area to yourself. It is enormous.   We enjoyed the breakfast and being able to sit outside to enjoy the view. Large variety of western and asian foods.  Staff very attentive. The manager Sebastain is working hard on making his a great hotel.  We particularly liked the location of is hotel. Easy walk to shopping, beach…

title: Beautiful property in Patong
review: Dear Lions300,  Many thanks for this great review and rating.  I am very pleased to see that you all enjoyed our Pool access rooms and services.  Please let me take this opportunity to wish you, your family and loved ones a merry Christmas and wonderful New Year celebrations...   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good and comfortable stay
review: Came here with friends for a short break. Located just a walking distance away from Patong nightlife and Patong beach. The staff are the certainly  worth mentioning as they welcomes the guests with warm and friendly service to ensure that this is truly "Patong's best choice" of holiday experience. Room are clean and cosy. I would certainly come again.

title: The Best
review: I stayed there for 5 days and 3 nights. From the very beggining their service is fabulous. I really love this place and look forward for my next visit. Best service, facilities and location :) I strongly recommend this hotel for families or couples.

title: Fabulous Hotel in Patong!
review: dear JonJon2345,  Thank you very much for this short yet wonderful review of our property. It was a pleasure to have you staying with us and would like to take this opportunity to wish you and your family a merry Christmas ahead!  Sebastien

title: Nice Stay in a New Hotel
review: I really liked the hotel, staff was amazing, rooms beautiful. I just really didn't like patong maybe I'm not use to 3rd world countries but I just felt it's very dirty. One thing bad about the hotel is the view to the side is of filth and junk. Should be cleaned up.

title: No Frills and personalized service...
review: Dear Heatherlynreid,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  Hope to see you again very soon...  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Spot
review: We stayed at the Grand Mecure in November 2014.  I read the reviews from Tripadvisor saying it's a new hotel.  I'm a bit surprised that the hotel is already a little bit run down.  The walls are very scratched and the showers have mold.  However, the stay was really nice with nice staff.  Overall, we had a nice time here.  The rooms are very clean except for the mold in the shower which I didn't mind very much.

title: Excellent stay!
review: Excellent stay from the welcome to the goodbye. We were greeted on arrival and checked in very quickly. On check-in we were upgraded to a pool access room which was a nice surprise. The room was a good size with efficient air conditioning and a terrace with direct access to a pool. The hotel is very close to the beach and lots of bars and restaurants. It is also only a 10 minute walk to the nearby shopping mall. If we are back in Patong Beach we will stay again!

title: Best Hotel for Patong Beach
review: Dear LondonBiker999,  Thank you for sharing such a review! Very much appreciated...  Wishing you a merry Christmas and wonderful year-end celebrations! Sebastien

title: Best family stay... Ever!
review: This property was 8 months old at the time of December 2014. Its a very new property that is well furnished and has good security.  On arrival, we were warmly welcomed with cold towels and a nice cool drink. This was very refreshing as the weather was really warm. The towels were nicely scented and a good touch. After checking in, we were brought to our rooms which were prepared early.   The room was very cleaned and well maintained. Me being the tech geek was impressed that the room had touch card access which affords good security. The toilet was large and came with a bath tub. The toilet also had a full set of amenities and very nice fresh hotel towels. The bed was comfy and the room had a view of the pool.   Surrounding the hotel property, were lots of seafood restaurants…

title: Very Disappointing
review: Dear Sniperxpert,  Many thanks for this wonderful review and beautiful pictures... Very pleased to see you enjoyed your stay very much.  Taking this opportunity to wish you and your family a merry Christmas and Happy new Year ahead.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Hotel!
review: We stayed in the suite with pool view and the space was great for our little toddler (17 months old). The little living area gave her the space she needed to play and explore without getting bored. Our baby enjoyed herself so much and that made our vacation perfect.   The best part about the hotel has got to be the amazing service. Almost all the staff went the extra mile to ensure baby was well cared for and happy. Special mention to Peach who would stop by Kids Club to play with my baby and bring such smiles to her face.   We also hired a baby sitter on one day so my husband and I could enjoy a massage together. We had our reservations at first because we were not too sure if baby would take to a stranger in a strange land readily. We imagined that she might kick up a big…

title: Nice Hotel
review: We stayed here for 5 nights with high expectations, with it being a new 5 star hotel. The reception and pool area of the hotel are very nice, although I saw rats on a few occasions by the pool. I wouldn't say we were disappointed but the hotel wasn't up to 5 star in my opinion. The workmanship in the rooms wasnt up to standard. Fixtures not straight, sealant all over the place. The rooms were also too small so for 5 star and so were the Balcony. But get me wrong though this is a lovely hotel. For the money I guess it's ok.

title: Amazing Service
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your comments. We are pleased to see you had a relaxing stay despite this unfortunate encounter...   Wishing you a merry Christmas and wonderful New Year celebration ahead.  Sebastien

title: Pleasant stay
review: Unfortunately my 16 day vacation will end tonight and tomorrow I will start my 24 hour plus journey back to the states. I have followed the construction and evolution of this great hotel since early 2014 and decided several months ago to give it a go. I was not disappointed. While it was not a perfect experience, it was great for a hotel ONLY 7.5 months old. The rooms are very clean with pool access although they are small. But....I did not come to Patong to stay in the room. Pool access is a HUGE plus. What made this stay here special was the service!  Checkin - A+ Bar and Chou Chou coffee bar and cafe - A+ Pools - A+ Restaurant - A Service - A++  Special thanks and gratitude to Olga at Chou Chou and Bar who gave us a list of awesome restaurants to go to at night but you cannot…

title: Disappointing Stay though it's new hotel
review: Dear Ted L,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property. I am very pleased to see your comments about Chouchou and will surely pass on your regards to Olga as well. Sumontha has been doing a fantastic job since opening day and i'm sure she'll appreciate your remark too :) Merry Christmas and very Happy New Year to you and your loved ones...   Many thanks again and hope to you very soon. Sebastien

title: A 5 stars that's not quite there
review: Stayed for 2 nights at Grand Mercure. Its a pretty new hotel, can still see some minor touch-ups going on. Arrived early at around 10am, but the hotel staff who did the check-in for us was kind enough to arrange a room for us. As we had to leave the hotel early the next morning before the breakfast at the restaurant is ready, the hotel prepared a takeout breakfast for us to pick up at 6.30am. The 2nd morning, we managed to enjoy breakfast at the restaurant and there was quite a decent variety of food provided. Luv the pastries and bread selection. We had a peaceful sleep as the hotel is quite quiet, no loud music etc. Minor cons: The swimming pool was pretty small and narrow, the hotel does not have any backgate to Jungceylon therefore we had to walk a big round to get there.

title: Best in Patong
review: Had a excellent stay at Grand Mercure Patong. Two nights in the pool villa, a short swim from the pool bar :) Clean rooms, proper service and great food. Will no doubt stay there again on my next visit to Phuket!

title: AMAZING
review: Dear KingMarkus,  Thank you very much for such a rating and review. The entire team is looking forward to welcoming you again next year.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Honesty
review: I was very welcomed here, Amazing CLEAN hotel rooms, Very kind staff, Especially one called Srisuda she was so welcoming checking in and out, And made sure my stay there was perfect, Thank you very much Srisuda you made my time at Thailand great.

title: Comfortable stay
review: Dear Wayne P,  Thank you very much for sharing such a review! Very pleased to see you had a great stay and love the place very much.  I have passed on your warmest regards to Miss Srisuda already.  Thank you once again and see you again soon hopefully!  Sebastien

title: Nice room and big swimming pool
review: Stayed overnight and departed early for the airport the next morning and left my notebook bag in the lobby containing passport and a number of un-replaceables. We simply called the Hotel who had put it aside who despatched the Hotel Bus to the Airport. A small fee and tip to the Driver and we made our plane departure. Can't explain the relief of getting it all back! Thank you so much for such good service. Lovely Rooms too.

title: Pleasant 4 days 3 nights stay
review: Travelled as a family with 2 young kids in late Nov 2014 and we had a pleasant 4 days 3 nights stay at the hotel. The room itself is not big as compared to some other hotels that we have stayed before at Patong but the king size bed we had was huge. I think it was a super king bed. There was also a sofa bed that can be converted into a bed, which is just nice for kids to sleep.     The location of the hotel is good as there are many local food stalls just opposite the hotel.  My only vibe about the entire stay was the renovation works that was going on below our room on the 3rd day. There were constant knocking and my girls couldnt take their nap in the afternoon. I had to call the front desk to ask them to stop work so that we can have some rest.

title: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay
review: Dear Rachel L,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review. I am very happy to see you and your family enjoyed their stay very much and that proper actions were taken about the noise disturbances coming from other floors.   Many thanks and hope to see you all again very soon.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good hotel but watch out for breakfast!
review: Really nice hotel, good location a little walk to Bangla road. There was building work going on whilst we were there however apart from the smell of paint it was no problem at all. Would defiantly recommend this hotel.

title: Hotel Service
review: Dear monkeyhanger3519,  Many thanks for this short and great review of our property! With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Amazing experience
review: Everything about the hotel is great except breakfast...and this isn't a comment about the food itself, which is good, but the service and management. You can either get the buffet for 450 baht which is very pricey or go a la carte which is reasonable at 150 baht. Thing is, if you go a la carte you will wait MINIMUM 30 min for your food. After 25 min, we gave up because we had to leave and it took talking to 3 different managers for them to finally take the meal off our bill. OH but wait...they still made us pay for the coffee?!?  Seriously??

title: Holiday
review: Great time at grand Mecure the staff couldn't help us enough concierge was fantastic. Drove us around where ever we wanted to go .we went on day trips daily and they could help us enough we had a invitation to have pre dinner drinks before going to a show for free myself / husband 21 year old daughter and 25 year old son in law  they gave her a complimentary birthday cake which she was frilled  we did arrive on an early flight in to phuket at 5 am although they aloud us to go to our room poolside by 1230 pm instead of two pm breakfast menu covered all nationalities they couldn't have done it better The staff are second to none at your beckon call when ever you needed them I give them a big thank you and would recommend them any time 5 minute walk to the beach but quiet at night…

title: Lovely hotel with excellent staff!
review: Dear Helen R,  Many thanks for your kind review and rating. I am very pleased to see you enjoyed the tour around Phuket and also appreciated the few cocktails served at the Bar.   We are all very much looking forward to your return here in Phuket.  Many thanks Sebastien

title: Kids club not safe for my kids.
review: Grand Mercure is in a good location surrounded by markets, restaurants, shops etc and a few minutes’ walk to the beach. We only stayed here for 2 nights but were very impressed by the fantastic welcoming staff that makes sure you are happy with lots of personal attention. The hotel itself is quite spacious with a beautiful lobby area.  Our room was a Superior King which was nicely decorated, clean and fresh. The bed was one of the best we have slept in during our 6 months in Thailand.  This room also has a sitting area with a nice lounge and chair.  We also had no problems at all with the free wifi, good connections and fast enough to upload many photos etc.  We were both quite surprised with the quality of the food here; we did not eat in the restaurant but ordered room…

title: Fabulous Phuket
review: Dear Cathy & Gary,  Thank you so much for sharing such a review.  It seems you both have been around quite a lot and sharing experiences with the rest of the community on regular basis and to be honest, receiving such a rating from you is a blessing.  286 reviews is the highest I've seen here at the property and I am very proud to see we made it to the top :)  Thank you so much for the remarks about quality and value for money our Food & Beverages selection offer. We are working daily on providing great options, both in restaurant, at the pool bar or in the room and i'm delighted to see you enjoyed our Lamb shank, homemade breads and Caesar salad so much.  Please do not hesitate to contact me directly as soon as your dates are blocked for your next visit. I will be happy to look into your reservation personally.  Thank you once again. With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great hotel for a great price
review: Stayed here for 3 nights. On the first day, we left our 6yo son at the kids club and went shopping nearby the hotel. Staff assured us that it's safe and they won't be left unattended.   Imagine our surprise when we came back 2 hours later, and our son was playing with one other small kid, without any staff there. I asked my son who had been taking care of him there and he said one lady staff left the room without saying anything and it's been quite some time they were alone.   I was REALLY shocked and lodged a complaint to the front desk, who offered an apology. Since then I've never left my kids at their kids club again.   Having said all that, the hotel is good. Location is central of Patong and nearby the mall, and right outside our hotel is halal restaurant etc. Majority of…

title: A Grand Stay at the Grand Mercure
review: Stayed in the Grand Mercure for two weeks with a friend and would have loved to have stayed longer! Perfect location in the heart of Patong but just far enough anyway to be quiet and comfortable if you want a lazy day by the pool.  All the staff were very friendly and helpful and the restaurant, Bubbles, is great for any meal during the day and pretty well priced.

title: Great hotel in a good location
review: Dear Ben W,  Many thanks for this splendid review and rating! It is always great to start the day in such fashion...  many thanks again and see you again soon, Sebastien

title: The almost perfect purple Mercure
review: The hotel is situated right in the centre of phuket. Great if you just want to walk around. Go down to the beach. The rooms are very spacious with everything you need. We only had the breakfasts in the hotel but this was excellent, a buffet style with everything to suit every nationality. For the price excellent value would recommend anyone to stay here.

title: teething problems
review: Dear Bryan D,  Many thanks for such a review. It is great to see you enjoyed your stay so much...  With Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Great Hotel
review: Stayed at this hotel from 20-24 November 2014. Arrived at the hotel at 3pm. The reception was quiet and I was greeted with the expected Thai hospitality and warm genuine smile. Check-in was brief and precise. Welcome drink (a sweet floral purple drink), a nice purple colored cream puff and a refreshing cold towel were served. I love the minor details already! A very good first impression for first time guests!   Hotel is located about 10-15mins walk to Junceylon mall and Bangla street in Patong. 2-3 mins to Hard Rock Cafe and Hooters. 5 mins walk to the beach passing by holiday inn resort. An outdoor night market opp the hotel but selling almost the same thing.   The receptionist (Mr Tawich) told me that the room which I was allocated have to undergo some minor repair and touch…

title: Superb Stay and Relaxation
review: We decided to stay here having looked at the reviews on trip advisor and were so pleased we did! We had a warm welcome on arrival. The staff are great and the atmosphere is very relaxing and friendly. We were staying in one of their villas which was very well appointed with excellent wi-fi, a media centre, luxurious bathroom with both a bathtub and separate shower. The villa is of a contemporary style with great furnishings and an amazingly comfortable bed but one of the best parts is that we had our own private pool!   Breakfast was amazing with so much choice and excellent service.  We met with the Sebastien the manager at a welcome drinks reception whilst we were staying and he explained how the hotel had opened only 7 months ago but it felt rather more established and became…

title: Nice stay
review: Dear Jpouk,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with rest of the TA community. It was a pleasure to welcome you both and have a few drinks with you at our Management cocktail.  I am also delighted to see your comments about the Pool villas... We are working on creating a unique atmosphere, offering both space and privacy to long stay guests like yourself and it seems we are on the right track.  Thanks a lot once again and hope to see you again next year.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good & Clean Hotel
review: My first hotel stayed in Phuket this time visit, I have high expectations for this hotel but however did not met. Got in to the hotel was no body care what I came for, I was not use to with a lobby no greeting, no body show me where is the Check in desk(why I said that because the day I went the people at the desk were wear different uniforms ). The facilities are good, but one time I was on the running machine and the power was suddenly switched off, I almost injuried my kneels . Some of staffs are great, don't know they are names, thank you for the good service and friendly.

title: Wonderful stay in Thailand
review: Dear Weihua T,  Thank you very much for your great review.  I am sorry to hear about the lobby atmosphere in which you felt left alone.  It is not usually our way of welcoming guests and i will share this specific point with the front desk team and belle boys.  Thank you however for your great comments about service and friendliness.. really appreciated.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Nice hotel, great location
review: We stayed for four nights. It was good. Room was clean. Staff was friendly. The entire premise was very relaxing. Location was not bad too.  The pool has a bar. They make some very good cocktails.  Overall, we enjoyed ourselves tremendously. May come back for the 2-bedroom villa with my family.

title: Perfect Place To Stay
review: The resort is the perfect place to chill out  & laid back.From the first time we stepped in the service& the hospitality of the staff were so noticeable with attention to details & guests comfort is the main focus of every & each staff member. The resort is open & it can give you the feel of a busy place to be but the set up & the lay out do offset that.I highly recommend this resort & it will be my next get away residence.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Dear Bkeche,  Many thanks for this wonderful rating and review. We are all looking forward to welcoming you back and will keep a corner suite for your next trip :).  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Satisfied in overall
