review: We had a great stay at this hotel.  We had a pool access room, which was fantastic.  The room itself was very modern, clean and had a good layout.  Some of the finishes aren't that great, but that is just being a bit picky.  The buffet breakfast was good, as well as the complimentary afternoon tea that we were not aware we had until arrival. The pool bar and main pool were really good as well.  One thing that puzzled me was the pointlessness of the "balcony's" size on the upper levels....They are about 30cm wide and were only used by people hanging stuff out to dry.  I feel this is a real design flaw.  My recommendation is to get a pool access room for this very reason.  The lobby and restaurants are great and the staff are very friendly and accommodating.  We were surprised…

title: Love this place
review: Dear Anderss22,  Many thanks for this wonderful review. It is great to start the day in such fashion and we are all really appreciative.  I will pass on your regards to our Food & Beverage team as well.  Many thanks once again, Sebastien

title: Beautiful and modern
review: Happenned to stay for 3 nights at deluxe room. Definitely good value for money since we got 1 free night. Close to the Jungceylon shopping mall and Bangla road. Amazed with the wide range of beers selection. Great lobby designs but was hoping for a better room designs.

title: Internet and Balcony
review: I stayed here twice this month. Generally the hotel is excellent however during my first stay I had a room on the 3rd Floor with Balcony. The balcony is actaully about 6 inches deep and it has has two functions namely: hanging out washing (not very five star) and smoking.  Second stay I had a Superior Room on the Ground Floor with Pool Access. A beautiful room and no complaints.  My only real gripe is with the 'free WiFi'. For some strange reason (or maybe a financial one) connecting to WiFi was laborious and time consuming. On each occasion and for each device I had to call Reception before I could connect. Disconnection was frequent and time consuming.  The poor guy on Reception made it clear to me that this was standard and he received complaints all day long.  You can…

title: Excellent!
review: Dear Roy,  Thank you very much for sharing your thoughts with us and giving us a 4* rating despite difficulties encountered in term of wifi connection.  I was a bit surprised to see such comments as guests are usually enjoying great signal strength and connectivity throughout the resort. I was even more surprised to see your note about our associate's response as I am personally not aware of such difficulties. Considering this, your comments are even more appreciated as it is definitely an area to look into.  I am living at the Hotel myself and surf on the web most evening without difficulties, using the "free" link too.   Even though it would be a great way of creating additional revenues for the hotel, i am asking our team to concentrate their "up-selling" efforts on other services in the restaurant and Spa for instance as we well aware of the fact that wifi is not even considered as an added value but yet another "included" service nowadays.  People often don't even realize or ask about it anymore as most if not all of our guests would expect high speed for free anyhow.   As for the balcony, it was our decision to give an extra 6sqm. space to each room yet giving the opportunity to guest to open their window and enjoy fresh air and views... I am sorry you felts that way and maybe a Suite would be more suitable to your needs for your next visit, as they are the only "rooms" featuring a balcony, an a pretty large one.   Thank you once again for your comments, really appreciated indeed.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Stereo type towards Asians!
review: My husband, our 15 month old daughter and I stayed here for 4 days 3 nights. I corresponded with Chino and Yollada prior to arriving and have advised them this was a surprise trip to my husband so I had a few requests such as a baby cot, message on the bed and bringing a birthday cake in on our 3rd day. I booked the superior suite but when we arrived, Todd, the very nice and friendly staff member who checked us in told us we're being upgraded to a deluxe suite for free! We were so happy! The deluxe suite is brand new and absolutely worth it! It had a separate living area, dining room with an 8 seater dining table, kitchenette, the bedroom has a spa, toilet, closet, his and her sinks plus of course, a shower, and another toilet outside the bedroom. Our room was on the topmost…

title: Right in the heart of town
review: Dear CL,  Thank you so much for such a review! It was great meeting you upon check-out and even more pleasing to see you had a great stay. We are always looking at ways to improve existing offer and sometimes it works better than others  I will check with team about the birthday cake though :)  Many thanks once again and see you next year! Sebastien

title: It was perfect
review: Staffs especially the bell hop are stereo type to Asian guest. We are staying in room 547 from 10/11-13/11. They did not greet us since day 1. We feel as if we are invinsible maybe because we are Singaporean (Asian). We will not be staying here again in future. Please look into this matter, please provide balance treatment, be it caucassians or Asians. We are a paying guest and we expect good service provider from the Hotel.

title: The best in Patong!
review: 4 of us stayed at the new Grand Mecure Patong recently for 5 nights in pool access rooms #127 & #129. We had a very memorable experience at the hotel. From the minute we walked in the lobby, greeted graciously by the front desk and then Sebastien the GM personally welcomed us. I have never had such an excellent welcome to a hotel anywhere in the world! Very impressed and honestly can say set the standard for the hotel and it was kept throyght the 5 days we were there.  The rooms were perfect! Great way to relax in your own surroundings. Nothing was better than waking up and jumping in the pool every morning before breakfast without having to really 'wake up' if you were to go to the general pool. Which too was fantastic! Pool bar was comfy, drinks and food well served and…

title: Very central. Customer service needs work
review: Dear Tnam11,  Thank you so much for such a review! It is great to receive such feedback and see that we are slowly getting there :)  The Management team and I are spending as much time as possible "walking the resort" and it does help sometime when it comes to creating connections and fixing little things that might make the difference.   I will surely pass on your regards to the entire team and thank them for their friendliness and dedication.   Many thanks again to the 4 of you! Sebastien

title: A jewel in Patong
review: Currently staying here in a deluxe pool entry room allowing me to go for a swim daily which is great.   The room is spacious enough to let you walk around the fairly soft bed.   The bathroom in my view is quite large and the roof mounted rain shower head is a nice touch, for those who don't like the roof mounted heads they have been thoughtful to add a sliding removable shower head.  The hotel buffet breakfast is ok. The omelettes however are great as are the waffles on a stick.  There is a new cafe that recently opened just opposite reception which had nice enough coffee, they need signage to bring more people in and take away cups and lids.  The service was ok with one exception which I need to deduct a couple of points for. Staying 9 nights with a late flight on our last day…

title: Fairly new hotel already has mold fungus
review: Dear Jason J,  Many thanks for your review and please accept my most sincere apologies for the confusion and frustration caused. It seems you were having a great time up to that very last request and it is very annoying to see efforts of the entire team ruined in such a way. I wish we could have meet or discuss this point directly as I firmly believe in the fact that each problem, has a solution.   I am sure you noticed in previous comments that we are usually very accommodating when it comes to late check-out, when the occupancy allows us to do so however. During high season and for pool access rooms and villas mostly, it is not always easy to manage such request. We are trying to please short and long stayers but also need to get ready for new arrivals too.   I am sure you noticed a few comments about people having to wait for rooms past 2pm and this issue is sometime due to "late check-out/cleaning of the room/new arrival schedule" mismanagement.  The pool access rooms are in extremely high demand and allowing anyone a late check-out, at whatever price, when occupancy is very high, puts actually immense pressure on the team not knowing arrival time of the "next" guest for that particular room (we only have 38 of those ones).  With high season rates and the fact we did not have any spare room available means that rates are going up and following up the same principal of half day rate being 50% of daily and full rate, it came to 3,600 Baht (as we were selling THB 6,100+++ on that day, and still today).  I wish we would have simply explain that a late check-out on that day was unfortunately not possible in those rooms and offered you alternative options instead (like a superior room at around 70+++ dollars).  Please rest assure our intention was to find a way to please you, somehow, and the complimentary late check-out given until 2pm at the end, was to some extend, a way of doing so.  I would be very happy to look into your booking requirement personally, shall you decide on giving us another chance to welcome you...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent stay
review: Worth every dime. An absolutely amazing stay in this new hotel, where we spent a long stint. Despite being brand new, all flows smoothly and everything, from rooms to breakfast, is outstanding. The experience of the pool acces room is great: in the middle of the night you can plunge from your private terrace in total privacy, real luxury at a very reasonable price. Miss Mareeya is always one step ahead, and she and all the staff really make the difference every single day. I recommend room 138 if available, slightly hidden and thus even more precious. But every room will do in this resort, that we were really lucky to find: we had a lroblem with some construction in progress, and we reported it. They took care of it with efficiency, discretion and true concern for our comfort.…

title: Lovely new hotel, good surprise inside
review: I normally only stay in Patong to do a little shopping & stay in a poolside suite at the Holiday Inn, but thought I would try something different. The Mercure had a great pool, extremely long to do laps & has lots of quiet nooks & crannies. When I checked into Room 119, direct poolside room, I was initially disappointed as quite dark & not as much sun on balcony as I would have liked. But alas was the best room, perfectly quiet, private & still full access to everything. Thoroughly enjoyed, all staff 100% couldn't have tried harder. There was nothing wrong with their English and the breakfast room had a wonderful selection of food. Hotel has covered not direct access to beach by having a lovely new shuttle bus. Will definitely return. Club still being completed but will be nice…

title: Average stay in Grand Mercure
review: Dear Joanna H,  Thank you so very much for such a review! It is great to see you enjoyed your stay very much and look forward to you return at Grand Mercure.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: New and still long way to go
review: Had the opportunity to stay at Grand Mercure Phuket from 01 - 04 Nov 14. First impression I get is that the road leading up to the lobby is not big enough for a coach, only big enough for mini van.So, for those on group tour, the coach will drop you off by the road and you will have to walk up the ramp to the hotel lobby, not bad on a warm day but not good on rainy days.  Stayed in Superior Room, room is of average size with king sized bed and sofa. The balcony/terrace is tiny, only good enough to stand and watch people at the swimming pool below. Please note that most, if not all rooms' balcony faces the swimming pool, which is good, as the view from the front door corridor is of construction site and unfinished buildings. Hotel is new but I noticed the grouting in the bathroom…

title: no balcony in superior room, close to Jungceylon and Patong beach
review: Dear Dexstar99,  Thank you very much for your detailed review.   I believe arriving at the hotel and experiencing such heavy rain from start did not help with overall experience and i apologize for that.  Our Hotel was actually built 6 meters off the street level to help with monsoon's flood that are occurring heavy years and it was our decision not to have bus dropping off guests right in front of the lobby, to avoid exhaust emissions and other noise pollution affecting every other guest experiences. It is not the first time we are welcoming leisure groups or corporate teams and as always, our entire team would provide buggy transfers for luggage and welcome drink upon arrival at the lobby. It is a 50 meter walk and unless there is a heavy storm, the journey is usually being handled smoothly.  Thank you also for your good comments about the team and overall property lay-out... we thought guests would enjoy an extra 6 sqm. indoor rather than on the balcony, knowing our pool side Bar features not less than 100 sun loungers for the few guests who would appreciate a hot sun bath and a refreshing drink by the pool.  As for the ashtrays, please rest assure i am constantly chasing the team to keep the common areas as clean as it can get. It is unfortunate but by Thai regulations, smoking in the hotel premises is strictly forbidden, even outdoor. Therefore, we are providing ashtrays a few meters away from the main Hotel entrance, just far enough not to put the Hotel Management at fault, yet ensuring smokers with a suitable solution.  I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for all those constructive comments and hope to see you here again very soon...    with Grand regards, Sebastian

title: Absolutely stay here when visiting Patong Beach
review: New facilities which are modern but hotel not running efficient yet. A lot of the details missing that make a good hotel. Breakfast buffet a bit poor and not well organised. Missing details in room (eg. no classes in bathroom). Staff needs training but is friendly. Check-in a bit inefficient. Good location is a plus even so nearby construction could create noise in the months to come.

title: New hotel
review: We are currently staying at the Grand mecure hotel and it's been amazing.  It's so close to do everything. A short walk to the end of the street is the beach and one street over from Bangla street.  There are many restaurants and pubs near by.  The hotel service has been so good.  The service staff have good English skills and make you feel very welcome. The rooms are tidy and clean and beds are comfy also :)  We will be back.

title: The Best Location
review: Dear Jess J,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with the rest of the TripAdvisor community. I am glad to see you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your return.  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Great Hotel
review: Loved the location of this hotel, it runs along OTOP (shopping markets), This is a new hotel and still had not had its Grand opening when we were there, so there was still works going on (which we were fully aware of) The works however did not affect us at all. I had booked three Deluxe Pool Access rooms Which were fantastic, although on the smaller side. As i was travelling with my parents and kids (17 & 13 yrs) they upgraded my husband, myself and the kids to a 2 bedroom villa with its own private plunge pool. My parents stayed in the pool room. Although I would have been happy with the pool room the villa was amazing. Great bedrooms, bathrooms, lounge, dinning and kitchen with a full size fridge (which is great to stock up with the drinks and nibbles). The only complaint…

title: Perfect.
review: Dear bradandjackie,  Many thanks for this wonderful review! I am very pleased to see you and your family had a great stay with us. I will surely take this opportunity to thank our Front desk team for their spirit and initiative...  Please rest assured we are currently working on fixing those slippery tiles by the pool and hopefully next year, you will see some improvement there.  Once again, thank you very much!  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Disappointed!!
review: Great hotel! I stayed 3night in the pool access room with my bf for our birthday celebration on 30Oct~2Nov. We loved the hotel ver much! The location is great n the staff were very nice!!  There are many choices in the breakfast. The design of the swimming pool is good. There are one thing need tp improve is the bath set should be double if there are 2guests in one room.

title: A piece of Paradise in ...
review: This hotel is really trying hard. The staff are phenominal , some have limited English , but hey it is Thailand . I am an Accor club member so stay with this brand regularly. My husband and I stayed for 7 nights in a pool access room (very small) with buffet breakfast. Our daughter stayed on the 6th floor and her room was much larger, but had almost no outdoor balcony. The finish of the rooms is fairly poor, uneven tiling,fittings fitted badly, some crooked plumbing,front door not square so it did not shut properlyand only hanging space, no drawers except bedside.The aircon was hot/cold and if the sliding door wasnt perfectly shut it switched off ! Some times we got our coffee/tea, shampoo/conditioner/body wash replaced but when I removed the room slippers it was duly noted !…

title: Best place to stay in Phuket
review: Dear gidget_8,  Thank you very much for this much detailed and encouraging review.  It is always a pleasure to receive such comments from a top contributor and please rest assured we are still working on many areas we have too, identify as "could be improved"!  Your comments about the team are fantastic and i will surely take this opportunity to thank them all, especially Panadda at the restaurant, who had been with us since day 1. Sincere and professional service is one of our core value and i am pleased to see you felt very well taken care of during your entire stay.  See you again next year... in Patong or Aloha :)  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: An Ok Experience
review: Checked in on 16th Oct 14 to 19th Oct 14. Stayed in room 440.  Upon arrival early check-in was done and every staff was really polite and hardworking. The front desk officer even walked with us to the room for check-in. Never ever I had experienced this at any hotel.  Days before check-in, I had emailed to the hotel to request for special decorations as it was my wife's birthday. Really a big thanks to Mr Chino Khaesawang for that special arrangement.  Location wise it is not smack right in the entertainment zone (which is an advantage from all the noise) but it is walkable to Jungceylon, Bangla walking street etc.   Cleanliness really top notch.  Shuttle service to Jungceylon could be better if hotel can increase the frequency.   Overall, this hotel stay was really memorable…

title: Near perfect
review: Dear Ananda K,  Thank you so much for such a review! It is always a pleasure to start the day on a positive note and i sincerely thank you for that.  We always try to surprise clients and anniversaries or birthdays usually give us a good chance to do so :)  Hope to you soon, if not next year...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great New Hotel
review: Stayed from 30 Oct - 1 Nov in room 409. The view from the room was great,the check in was a breeze and the staff friendly.  However, the breakfast was disappointing indeed with only bread, salad, yogurt and fruits available for vegetarians. For a hotel claiming to 5*, I would've certainly expected much more.  Even the noodles/fried rice are cooked in oyster sauce and has eggs. The hotel ought to be more considerate to vegetarians.  IMHO, Novotel Phuket and Holiday Inn Phuket offers a much better variety in terms of vegetarian breakfast and offers the same ambience.  Would I stay there again? No.

title: New build - soft opening was JUN14, still finishing villas...
review: Overall the 6 days I spend here with my daughter were good. We were there in what is the "rainy season" but its also the special promotion season too.  Our pool entry (upgrade room) that we first allocated when we arrived at 11pm local time was one king bed. We had booked a twin room.  The staff had no more allocation that night for a pool entry twin so they arranged for us to relax and a nights rest up on a high floor and made the change the next day. We didn't really care as the next day we were mostly out and we found that when we had returned all was changed for us.  The staff were terrific, we got the VIP treatment every time and everywhere within the resort. A big hello to Sebastian the Manager and all of his staff.  Our pool entry room was well worth the switch over as we…

title: Nice hotel & great location
review: Dear Theo B,  Many thanks for this wonderful review.  It is great to see such comments early in the morning and hopefully we will fix the slippery tiles soon (working on it with Owners and Management now).  We shall see you again very soon i hope, Many thanks again!  PS: Our Grand opening is scheduled for 8th of December so we will have everything up and running smoothly by then.  Sebastien

title: Outstanding in every sense!
review: - Friendly concierge & housekeeping staffs. - Superb hotel facilities (available shuttle to the beach & Jungceylon mall. - RYN Spa : professional staff, comfortable & reasonably priced. - Great location.

title: 3 nights with a Toddler... a little disappointed
review: Dear Ink 000,  Many thanks for this short yet great review! Very much appreciated,  Sebastien

title: Almost perfect
review: WOW!!  This hotel has been incredible from the moment we checked in.  Impressive grand entrance, beautiful and well appointed rooms, amazing breakfast that caters for all nationalities and impeccable service from all staff. I just can't believe we get all this for a little more than $100 per night.  Can't wait to come back!

title: Excellent hotel
review: stayed here from 11/10/2014 to 20/10/2014. A stunning new hotel with a excellent location. Arranged round trip hotel airport transfers with the hotel which was excellent, the driver had drinks and cool towels upon arrival at the airport. Check in was quick, efficient and was offered delicious welcome treats and drinks. We had arranged for a baby cot in the room and was delighted to see it had been already in our room along with other baby necessities that we didn't even request (baby bath, sterilizer, baby bottles with brushes etc). Service was excellent from housekeeping, reception, resturant and pool area. Complimentary bottle water is a nice touch everyday as well as the amenities provided in the room and bathroom. The hotel is a 5min walk to the beach, jungceylon mall and…

title: Wonderful stay!
review: Dear Muhammadhajat,  Thank you very much for your great comments and rating! Please allow me to take this opportunity to thank the entire team for their initiative and dedication!!  See you next year i hope...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great resort
review: We stayed at the hotel over the period 10/10/2014 - 20/10/2014 and it was a truly exceptional and wonderful experience. From the moment we checked in(our flight arrived late in Phuket and we only checked in after 11pm) till the time we checked out the service was exceptional. All of the staff at the hotel were extremely courteous and friendly and went out of their way to make our stay one to remember. Their training is of a very high standard and  language was not a problem, everyone is well versed in English. It is a beautiful hotel and well worth the money, the buffet breakfast is very filling and well prepared and presented. We opted for a pool access room and it is well worth the cost to pay that little bit extra, having your own sundeck and relaxing with a cocktail while…

title: Not a 5 stars for sure
review: Dear Gerard 804,  Thank you so much for such a lovely review.  Our PR team could not have put in any better and i sincerely thank you for the time spent and efforts made in writing such a wonderful review... really appreciated.   I am pleased you enjoyed our Spa very much as guests would sometimes be afraid of prices you would expect in such a property. Our aim is to propose great values all around and 3 treatments might actually be a record :) With current promotions offered, prices are actually similar to the ones offered in the near-by places.  Thank you so much and hope to see you again next year.  Many thanks, Sebastien

title: Our recent holiday
review: Just finished our holiday. Great location, friendly staff nothing is too much trouble. Rooms very clean stayed in a pool access room which I highly recommend. we had a room away from the main pool and restaurant area, you feel as if you have the place to yourself.  Definitely will be back for another stay

title: Beautiful and Great Value!
review: Stayed here with a group of friends a few weeks after the hotel opened and were impressed. The decor is very nice and the rooms were very clean. The location is great, walking distance from the main attractions in Patong and walking distance from the beach. We ate at the hotels restaurant a couple times and the food was very good! Our one complaint was the pool. It was very big and the swim up bar was a great addition, but whatever they used to build it was extremely slippery. We fell multiple times and saw it happen to other groups that were there.

title: WOW!!!!! The perfect Hotel
review: Dear NB0624,  Many thanks for sharing your experience with the rest of the TA fans :) It was great to have around and please rest assured we are working on improving the poolside finishings, so to avoid incident when walking by or simply getting in or out of the Pool. You will surely see improvements shortly.  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: OK Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel for 4 nights, and I can honestly say that this is the best Hotel I have ever stayed in.  So what is perfect?  Location: Quick walk to beach, Bangla Road and Mall YET you feel that you are away from the crowds and the hussle and bussle of Patong Food; High quality breakfast. We ate at the Hotel one evening and was best meal of our trip Staff: Always friendly, always ready to help and really went the extra mile Value: Very well priced for what you get  I can not think of a single thing to complain about, or anything that could be improved.  Do yourself a favour and stay here!

title: Outstanding service!
review: Dear Phillip O,  Thank you so much for posting such a review. very pleased to see you had a great stay and enjoyed our Cuisine very much too.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Outstanding!
review: My expectation was quite high from Grand Mercure, however didn't meet and the 5 star kind of class. When we checked in they should have give us the information regarding free Hotel Tuk Tuk to Patong beach, we came to know later from Room TV Hotel channel. Here are the Pros and Cons of the Hotel :   Pros :   Check-in is fast, waiting time is less. Just infront of  Kohinoor Indian Restaurant, which is a big plus for us.  Room is very beautiful, bedding, bathrooms, Aircon, pool view is excellent. 10 minutes walking distance from Patong Beach, Bangla road Children play room is very nice. Baby Pool is ok. Billiard Pool Table is there to play.     Cons :   Swimming Pool is very small as compared to the total number of rooms in the hotel.  No Jacuzzi in the Hotel No Aircon in Hotel…

title: Excellent
review: Stayed here in September management was great, especially the lobby manager she was brilliant and a big help. Very polite, excellent service provided by all. I will defo stay again and recommend anyone who goes patong stays here. Thank you 👍😎

title: An Oasis of Indulgence
review: Dear Rehaan786,  Many thanks for sharing your experience with the rest of the TA community :) I will pass on your regards to Wen, our Lobby Manager, for her frinedliness and professionalism too.  Many thanks once again, Sebastien

title: Great value quality hotel
review: We loved this place from the moment we arrived! The big foyer with beautifully dressed staff who were so welcoming! We were on the 5th floor in a Superior King room and found it to be easy access and nice views of pool area. The staff were more than helpful with any of our needs! Wen helped us with all our day trips to Phi,Phi, James Bond and also organized a private taxi to take us on a tour of the southern beaches and attractions, extremely practical in every way couldn't help us enough!  We mainly ate our meals at Grand Mecure because it was top quality ,quite cheap and the staff were very friendly and courteous and they had a high standard of hygiene which was important for us! We also ate breakfast there every day and have never seen better in all our travels!!! Only regret…

title: Fantastic
review: Dear Melinda R,  Thank you so much for such a review! We will be very pleased to welcome you back anytime.   I will take this opportunity to thank our tour desk and front office teams and also send your regards to our Chefs for their dedication and attention to quality and details when it comes to the breakfast spread.   Many thanks once again and see you soon! Sebastien

title: family oriented hotel
review: We stayed here for 2 nights in October 2014 Rm 301 Superior Twin. We were originally staying up in Khao Lak but due to rain left or hotel early and secured a last minute booking in Patong. We got an excellent rate including breakfast. The hotel is new, modern and clean but has some personality to it. Reception was very good. Our room, considering it was the most basic level, was excellent. The shower and bathroom had some oddities but nothing that detracted from our stay. English level and professionalism was very good across all staff. Gym was good. Not as a big as their photos but the equipment was good quality, modern and in working order. Breakfast was very nice with a good selection. Location was good. Walking distance to beach and shops but not close enough to be affected…

title: Do yourself a favour and stay here!
review: It's only our second day here but I do feel comfortable to review this hotel already....By far is this one of the best vacations to Thailand...  All the staff (front desk, management, maintenance, housekeeping, etc.) ALWAYS offering warm greetings, excellent advice when questioned... The rooms are spotless and worth every dime. Beds are comfortable,  bathrooms were nice and open. The location of the hotel makes perfect for our adventures and relaxation; excellent food on-site and close by, stores, etc. are all within easy walking distance.   If you are sceptical,  don't be and book this place.  You won't be disappointed.

title: Recommended - perfect location, great food, lovely staff
review: Dear JasminkaHus,  Thank you so much for such rating and review! We are glad to see you had a great time with us and very much look forward to welcoming you back again... to celebrate your next anniversary!!  Many thanks again!  with grand regards, Sebastien

title: Mr
review: We cannot recommend this hotel enough! This is our low down:  What's fantastic about the hotel: - perfect location. Just outside your front door is Otop which is over 80 little shops where you can grab cheap bargains on clothes and souvenirs, plus tailors, including several bars. We had more fun shopping in Otop than we did at the mall or the Main Street which was only 2 min walk away. Massage place literally outside the front door and plenty more within 3 min walk. The beach is only 5min away. This hotel is a lovely oasis to come back to from the hassle bustle of Patong.  - the hotel provide a free one way shuttle bus drop off to the Jungceylon Mall and Beach  - awesome place for babies and kids. We are well travelled and haven't been to a hotel like this where without asking,…

title: Brown's in Phuket
review: Dear The Parrys,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of yours. It is always a pleasure to see guests enjoying themselves with us and i thank you also for your detailed review and comments made about children.  We are a family friendly property and i happy to note you enjoyed our new water slide in the kid's pool too :)  the entire team is looking forward to welcoming you all back soon...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Grand Mercure Patong Beach
review: Excellent hotel located in a good location very quiet friendly staff excellent deal beyond the border whatever makes you feel comfortable in the hotel every time I travel out to the Phuket will be my first unique experience you are looking for comfort

title: Happy Holidays
review: We had a wonderful time at the Grand Mercure. I would recommend anybody to stay there.  The food was great and the swimming outdoor area awesome.  The service was also great.  The Grand Mercure was very central to the shops, beach and eating places.

title: Highly recommend!
review: Dear Marie K,  Thank you very much for this great review.  Glad to hear you had a fantastic stay with us!  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Brand new hotel !!!
review: We loved staying at the Grand Mecure Phuket Patong last week. Highly recommend a pool access room which has its own sun beds and steps into beautiful infinity pool which looks over the main pool and swim up bar. Fantastic staff and great food! Loved it and only a 5-10 min walk from Bangla Road.

title: Service with many smiles
review: Dear Virginia P,  Many thanks for this superb review! Hope to have the chance of welcoming again very soon...  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Stay
review: If you want to stay nearby Patong night life and Patong Beach,this can be a good choice.This is a new hotel just opened 5 months back,so rooms are quite clean.Stayed is pool access room,location was good however room and toilets were quite small.Lobby and public areas are well designed,bar is in best location with interesting sitting area.Stayed in Holiday inn two years back ( which is a huge property ) and Grand M can be a good alternative( Holiday Inn is having renovation of one of its wing and look bit messy).Grand M is a bit small property looking at number of rooms they are holding.

title: new and clean hotel
review: I chose this hotel cause of its location and also it's new hotel. So many hotels in Phuket which are quite cheap but they are already old ( dark,dump,frightening place )...and I want the better one. Grand Mercure is in Patong, so it's very easy for you to walk around, looking for transportation, for food..and it has shuttle to Jungceylon mall. The hotel is 'new' , so it's very clean....and the breakfast is nice....

title: Best hotel in Asia as far as I'm concerned
review: Dear Chrysantha,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of our property! It is always a great pleasure to note that guests have enjoyed their stay and evenmore when positive comments are coming from a well-traveled person and top contributor to TripAdvisor like yourself.  Hope to see you again soon...  Sebastien

title: Great hotel in a horrible place
review: I loved the Grand Mercure. My young family stayed at one of the villas for 7 nights from 4th September to 11th September. The villa was so nice and very clean. We were told the hotel itself is only a few months old and we felt very priveledged to be the first guests of that particular villa. The whole resort was very relaxing, and hubby and I were every impressed with the level of customer service the staff provided. We had our 17 month old son with us and used the babysitting service and were very happy with the staff there. They were very warm and genuinely loved children. When my son got sick and I approached the front desk for assistance, they were very prompt in their response. They called the doctor for me and within half an hour the doctor had arrived. The hotel itself is…

title: Excellent service in a new somewhat "boxed in" hotel.
review: Dear XtineBenji,  Thank you so much for such a review! It was great to have you around for a week or so. I will take this opportunity to thank our team and the few persons who personally took care of your young child as well. We very much looking forward to welcoming you back in near future.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: good satuing experiance
review: This hotel was fantastic, it's quite new, the rooms are not particularly big, but clean and nicely decorated. The bathroom set up is a little weird, the shower wall facing the room is a glass panel with a blind you can pull down, but if it's up you can see through the shower to the toilet !?!  The pool is brilliant, with some great lounges in the water at the pool edge. The restaurant was fantastic - beautiful buffet breakfast with great variety, and good food available at lunch and dinner. All of the hotel's grounds are lovely, it was a lovely haven away from the craziness that is Patong. I hated Patong itself, but the hotel was great!!!

title: Best restaurant in Phuket
review: We just finished our 8 days stay at this hotel. Overall is very good. The food in this restaurant is simply fantastic. We ate 2 dinners at Bubbles restaurant and I would strongly recommend this restaurant for nice food and perfect ambience at a very cheap price too.

title: Excellent resort and location - recommended
review: Dear Alanlee75,  Thank you so much for this wonderful review of our property. I will thank our Chef and the rest of his team for providing you with such great culinary memories...  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: In general the experience was good here
review: The Mercure is a brand new resort in Patong, Phuket. I found the location to be ideal as it's not far from the beach and Jungceylon, the local shopping mall. Both places are reachable on foot. The resort is beautiful and the pool is enormous. The staff were excellent, really attentive. Most importantly for me was the cleanliness of the hotel - absolutely spotless. And the breakfast buffet is one of the best I've ever experienced. I fully recommend this stunning resort to anyone that plans to visit Phuket!!!!

title: Hotel needs improvement
review: Dear Marvinberry,  Many thanks for your kind review and recommendations. It is always a pleasure to read such review!!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Best hotel in Patong!
review: We stayed here for 2 nights only, the check-in experience was bad, however, except that, in general most of the staff were helpful and friendly. The hotel is new with many good facilities, e.g. gym room, kids club, pool...etc and with a great location. The rooms are clean and tidy and the decoration is nice too.

title: Wonderful stay, amazing staff and kids club
review: My husband,  3 year old daughter and I stayed 10 nights at hotel and had a wonderful time. Staff were amazing especially front desk and kids club. Best aspect of the hotel was the kids club, workers were wonderful, glass windows so you could sit by the pool or have breakfast and still see your child. Great location and pool. Only 2 minor faults, shower went hot and cold all the time and lack of cereal choice at breakfast.

title: Great!
review: Dear Arthur 1972,  Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience with the World! Great to note your satisfaction with our Kid's club attendants and services...  See you again very soon :)  Sebastien

title: Excellent Value For Money!!
review: My family and I stayed at the Grand Mercure Phuket Patong about two weeks ago. This was our first trip into Phuket and we chose Grand Mercure based on the many positive feedback we found on tripadvisor. Our plan was to spend 6 days in Patong but being the cautious traveller, I only booked for the first two nights. After the first day I ask to reserve the other days too worried to not find a good service, a good atmosphere and great place like this.  Recommended

title: Palacial Pool
review: Dear Jo8450S,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review! Looking forward to welcoming back again very soon...  Sebastien

title: Beautiful, modern, gorgeous staff!
review: I stayed at the Grand Mercure with a friend for 10 nights in early August and we had a great time.  We received complementary cool towels, welcome drinks and pastries upon check in; given that we were checking in around midnight I was very impressed with the service as I had been expecting perhaps one sleepy eyed employee on the check in desk. This was not the case. In fact, we were very impressed with the service we received throughout our stay. The staff were at all times helpful & courteous and most of them spoke rather good English. Due to a flight cancellation we had to extend our stay by two nights at the last minute and the staff were most helpful. We did have a couple of miscommunications due to the language barrier, but these were quickly resolved. I can think of one…

title: GREAT LOCATION
review: We stayed for 10 days and loved the location and the experience of the place... Great Location - excellent facilities - great staff - good food.  I would make mention that the black tiles in the pool area are a definite safety issue as they are very slippery under foot and that also includes the ones that are through the centre of the main concreted area.... very slippery when wet.... my wife slipped three times and I did twice stepping in to the pool around the seated area near the bar.   Remove all the baths as we had a bath in our room and our friends had just a shower area, theirs was much nicer and our water kept going hot to cold.  Close to everything........ good breakfast and nice pool to just relax..........  The rooms are nice not spacious but as a motel style type…

title: Worth it!
review: Dear Paul V,  Many thanks for this superb review of our property. Very pleased to see you both had a relaxing and most romantic stay with us.  Adding a few more channels to the selection is definitely on the 'to-do' list and i think by the end of the year, we will have a better idea of what is needed and what is not. Thank you for bringing it up!  with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Super Awesome
review: Loved loved loved our stay at the grand mercure Phuket!  The staff were friendly and helpful. The hotel was nice and modern, rooms, clean and presented well! The only down side was the balconies were really narrow and could barely fit us out on it! Considering we are two small 5"3 girls, there's not much space!   Location was great! Nice and close to the main st but not too close that it's noisy etc.   Would def RECCOMEND and am so happy with the value for money! Can't wait to visit again!

title: Wonderful girls trip
review: Dear Lala 2010-10,  Many thanks for this fantastic review of our property!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Exceptional Service, Perfect Accommodation in Patong
review: Its exactly like its in the internet pictures...Its beautiful...The pool access rooms are amazing...totallly worth the price ...The room service food is yummmmmm and the location is the best..Its proportionately away from chaos and 2 min walk and you are in the party zone...massages..nail do..mall..nightlife..all 2-5 min walk....do try the island tours..they have hotel picks from this hotel.

title: Absolutely Stunning!!
review: I would first like to point out that I worked as an International Travel Agent for three years and have travelled the world extensively. I am very familiar with the Patong Beach area of Phuket and have sent countless couples, friends and families on holidays to resorts all over Thailand. As I am very familiar with the properties around Patong Beach, I decided this year I would take my mother on a short break away. As this was a new property I wanted to see what it offered. Never through all of my travels have I been so impressed with the resort than the Grand Mercure Patong Phuket.  This property is the essence of what a five star resort should be. As it is still practically brand new, everything is to the highest standards.   We arrived in the early hours of the morning due to…

title: BEST HOTEL IN PATONG
review: Dear Shomness,  A thousand thanks would not even express how pleased and grateful we are!! Going through your comments, point by point, i realized we were slowly but surely getting closer to the level of service and dedication we want to be at... the level and quality that would please every single guest, even the well-traveled or tourism experts like yourself we may welcome from time to time...  Thank you very much for sharing your experience in details... very much appreciated.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Great Location.
review: I just returned from 14 days at this hotel and all I can say is its amazing. I have been to Patong the past 7 years and this would have to be the best hotel I have stayed in ever. I stayed for 5 nights then went to Samui and returned for another 9. Both times check in was a breeze with staff being very professional, their English was amazing and everytime when walking through reception they were always pleasant and smiling. I had a pool access room both times when checking in the second time I wasn't completely happy as the new room never got any sun but that wasn't a problem when I asked if I could be moved they were very accommodating and even sent a staff member to help us repack. Sumontha who is second in charge was truly amazing with her help and caring nature, nothing was…

title: Excellent place to stay
review: Dear Vicki27Newcastle,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience at Grand Mercure with the World. It is always a pleasure to start the day with such a review and i am very pleased  to see you enjoyed every bit of your stay. I will pass on your regards to the Sumontha and rest of the team, from restaurant to reception and Spa.  We are very much looking forward to welcoming you back at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!  With Grand regards,  sebastien

title: CLEAN BUT LACKING SERVICE = DISAPPOINTMENT
review: This hotel is beautiful. gorgeous pool area and the breakfast and breakfast staff are fantastic. However, rooms are much smaller than anticipated, and cleaning of the rooms was sub standard. Reception staff need a big shake up , The check in was lengthy, disorganized, confusing and we were given no tour of the amenities, just a finger pointed in the general direction, I would have expected more from a 5 star hotel. Check out was also lengthy so allow yourself 30 minutes for this procedure. Construction is ongoing, unfortunately it was extremely close to our room and we were there for 14 days. I would have thought the length of the stay would have warranted a little more consideration of the the room location. The location of the hotel  is great and I would be willing to stay…

title: Not Beach Front
review: This is a good quality hotel well located cose to the nigth life of patong beach the pools are very good and the breakfast first class if you like to stay just on the beach this is not your hotel but if you want a first class hotel in Patong this is the wright choice.

title: Nice and good services
review: Dear Imanol G,  Many thanks for this great review. As you correctly mentioned, we are located only a few minutes from not only Patong beach, but Banglar Entertainment distrcit as well as Jung Ceylon shopping Mall.   Glad to note you enjoyed your stay with us. See you again soon...  Sebastien

title: Wonderful
review: 1st of all, the hotel is new and clean. Staff are nice and friendly. Good location. Secondly, we were upgraded to the villa, so happy we were. One of my boys hurt himself in the swimming pool. Hotel staff are promptly react to our situation, accompany us to the hospital. Helping us a lot. Thank you very much.

title: Sensational
review: Dear BK0325,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of our property. I hope your child is now fully recovered.   Looking forward to welcoming you back in Grand Mercure.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Really nice hotel and sweet services
review: We had a fantastic time at the Grand Mercure and loved the pool access room which I would recommend. Everyone from Sebastian to Olga and her team at the bar and the craft beer bar were nothing but hospitable and welcoming. I had a slight issue with one of the night front desk staff due to his attitude but that was resolved quickly and certainly didn't take away from what felt like a second home. We ate lunch and room service a few times and the food was great. As others have mentioned, there is a Family Mart just across the road to stock up on water, snacks etc and just outside of the mart you can have your laundry done for 50BHT per kilo and it comes back smelling great and nicely wrapped. Allow a couple of days or pay more for express.  The hotel is only a short walk to all…

title: Great new place to stay in Patong
review: Conveniently located in the middle of the the hussle and buzz of Patong: Jung Ceylon Shopping Centre, Patong Beach and Bangla Road. In fact, straight across the road is a large market and numerous places to eat. Yet it is has a very quiet, relaxed and calming atmosphere in the resort.   The entrance and the lounge areas are very grand, beautiful and stylish. The hotel was only 4 months old when we stayed in this resort and so it had that fresh, clean, and modern feeling and experience.   Breakfast here is excellent. It caters for a wide variety of tastes including Chinese, Japanese, Western and Thai. The food is very good quality. The main pool is clean. The rooms are perfect and the view from our room was stunning. The employees were all very polite, helpful and courteous. Made…

title: RECENT STAY GRAND MERCURE
review: Dear Marq C,  Thank you for your very good rating and review.  I am pleased to see you had a fantastic stay and please rest assured that we are working on those little steps here and there that can be safety hazards as well.  As I am writing to you, we are today adjusting those steps, removing tiles and creating a slope to avoid such issues in future... The work will be completed by mid next week for all buildings.   Thank you again and hope to welcome you back anytime soon...  Sebastien

title: Wonderful stay
review: stayed at grand mercure patong for 9  nights ,had booked 2 x pool villas & a pool access room ,found pool access room to be smaller than other rooms that i have used in patong but it was still okay clean etc , the 2 x pool villas were very new but very roomy & great having your own little pool ,buffet breakfast was good , restaurant for dinner was also good ,staff were helpful & polite , as with other reviews i do agree the concrete around pool area is very slippery ,will stay here again due to its location

title: “Fabulous stay and service”
review: Dear Stephen9733,  Thank you very much for your review and very kind comments.  I am delighted to see you had a great stay and particularly appreciated the cuisine selection and service provided. As mentioned, we are now working on options to make the tiles by the pool "less" slippery. We will resolve this matter before the high season starts in a couple of weeks time.   Many thanks again! Sebastien

title: Loved it!!!! Little details, but all in all a great stay!
review: I spent 10 days in mercure hotel .. The place was really clean . The service and staff were pretty good too .  The pool was so clean and big. The breakfast was asian style with tropical fruits and noodles which was an amazing experience by itself .  The room was big and clean and the hotel was wonderful It was a pleasent stay .

title: Convenient and new hotel
review: It is a newly open hotel located just walking distance to the beach and mall. Price is reasonable and the hotel staff are very friendly and attentive.  Although some facilities may not be available for now, staff always do their best to accommodate my request.

title: Overall is good
review: Dear HongKongS,  Thank you very much for your very kind review! The entire team is looking foward to welcoming you back...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent!
review: Stayed 4 nights with my family in Grand Mercure Phuket in past few days.  This is a very new hotel. My family were enjoy this trip and satisfied with the hotel.   The swimming pool are large which divided into different depth.  Some of them are suitable for kids and other for adults.  There is also kids club for children where a staff is inside so she can temporarily look after our kids. Staffs of front desk and housekeeping always gave smile to us.  The reservation team were also efficient as they replied my emails so fast.  Location is good as we just spent 15 mins walk to Junkceylon, the largest shopping mall in Patong. The hotel also provides free shuttle bus to there on schedule.  The rate is good since we booked at promotion price.    But it is not prefect. Every morning…

title: Best in Patong
review: Dear Setphen_Lee,  Thank you for your review! Looking at the title, i was surprised to see you only rated us 3 out of 5 but obviously, service, attitude and friendliness of our associates at breakfast could have been better. Please note i have shared your feedback with our Food & Beverage Manager already. It does get very busy at times but attitude is something we have no excuse for.   Thank you for your kind comments otherwise... with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Excellent
review: A very new property with very nice rooms, wonderful staff, great pool, excellent restaurant & reasonable food pricing. We have nothing but praise for the staff, they really made our stay at patong more enjoyable. Breakfast buffet quality & choice excellent, room service prompt, we ate in the restaurant each night & tried many Thai items from the menu & all were delicious. I have no hesitation in recommending this property, the location is smack bang in the middle of the main shopping area & close to Bangla road & a short walk to patong beach.

title: Spectacular Brand new Hotel
review: First of all, I would like to congratulate the owner and staff for the opening of this tremendous new hotel. I stepped in to the hotel after 14:00.. The check in process went well and the room was available straight away.Receptionist handed us welcome drinks and snacks which was really cool. The lobby area is great and huge and there were many seats available to chill and relax. The receptionists and staff were all friendly and smiled whenever we saw them. The room was great (cosy too) and all the facilities were available. The hotel offers free shuttle service which was awesome and useful (especially the ride to Phuket centre). The location of the hotel is perfect.. I mean Patong beach is only 5 mins away and Jungceylon mall is only 10 mins away! The breakfast was good ,well…

title: Stayed three nights
review: Dear AbdulAziz T,  Wow, what a review!! We can't thank you enough for sharing your positive experience with the World :)  I am personally delighted to know you have enjoyed your stay with us very much... The Pool access provide little privacy to guests who booked those but please rest assured the access to "their" pool is equally granted to other guests. We simply thought that lgoon-like pool, going alongside the building, would give our Hotel an evenmore resort-like feel.  We'll keep pumping-up the volume!! with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Top of the wazza for phuket
review: Very nice new hotel . We book four rooms . Staffs are very well friendly , nice ambience very well maintained. Breakfast is very good , had more choices, swimming pool is good. Rooms are spacious very we'll maintained. Nice hotel to spend with family & friends. Overall our experience is very good....

title: Another pleasant experience.
review: Dear Vimal6162,  Thanks you so much for your great rating and review.   I am very glad to see you enjoyed your stay very much and appreciated efforts made by our culinary team when it come to breakfast quality and diversity.  Hopefully we will have the pleasure of welcoming you back very soon...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic stay - will be back!
review: We had 3 great nights there and the staff were great, the food and drinks were excellent. The poolside rooms were a bit small, I wouldn't pay extra for these again, as the regular rooms are bigger. Even the beds were amazing. We would definitely recommend it for anyone who likes comfort.

title: Amazing!!!!
review: I stayed here for over a week and it was one of the best hotels I have stayed in!  The staff were extremely friendly and very helpful. We had to extend our stay at the last minute and they were really great about it. The food was amazing! They made some delicious cocktails.  We had a few issues regarding language barriers but they were sorted out.  We had a few people complain that they woke to some drilling noises. But the hotel is still getting finished, so what do you expect! We had no issue with noise.  The hotel is in prime position. Very close to shops, markets and the party street, but it sits back on a side road so you don't get all the noise.   I highly recommend staying there. A fantastic hotel to stay in!

title: Honesty and warm courtesy service!
review: Dear Toriclaire,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful review of our team and property. I am glad to note you enjoyed your stay and that the language barrier was not much of an issue to you Thank you for your support when it comes to little disturbances (noise mostly) that guests might or might not have to bare with. We are almost there :)  Thank you once again and see you back in Grand Mercure very soon.  Sebastien

title: Great
review: Nevertheless of  my several repeat staying in the Grand MERCURE Patong .I dont even need to mention how great the service of this hotel staff do, and never have to mention how wonderful the food are.    It was my most most memorable return on 8th August that I forgot my valuable belonging and realized after checking out of the hotel.  Recalling once upon on the board of return flight to bkk. I had informed the hotel and guess what?... The hotel organized the registered express mail to send my valuable back right at my home!!! I had never have any thing returned from the hotel I stayed. Sincerely thanks to all well trained staff and honesty to your guest. I shall return!

title: 2nd Time Round and Still Love It.
review: Dear Khun Jonruk,  Thank you very much for such a review!  I hope that your business will be booming in Phuket so to see you and welcome you at Grand Mercure on even more regular basis.  Thank you once again. Sebastien

title: Highly Recommended
review: Just stayed a couple nights in this resort and it was great. Staff are friendly and sincerely try their best. Rooms are not big, yes, but there is everything one might need. Service was always friendly, let it be at reception or in the restaurant. Keep it up!

title: GP "Good hotel, good service"
review: Had a great time during my stay at the Grand Mecure. Rooms and food were nice and great location, 2 minutes from the beach an close to plenty of bars and restaurants. All the staff were very friendly and look forward to holidaying there again soon.

title: room of improvement
review: Dear Gareth P,  Thank you very much for this great review! We are all very much looking forward to have you back "home".  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: disappointing NEVER again !!!!!
review: pros: - friendly and helpful staffs - comfortable bed - location is great  cons: - construction noise, but they stops after we complained - no toothbrush in the toiletries - limited numbers of lift (only 1) so we need to walk quite far to the room

title: Disappointing
review: Dear Toonzone,  Thank you very much for your comments and rating.  It is great to see how much you enjoyed your stay and appreciate both employee's attitude and the hotel location itself. Please note we do have toothbrush but only upon request. We were actually discussing about having set permanently in-room at the beginning of the coming high season.... might well have set in room sooner. Thanks a lot. Still little noise dissturbances but we received the confirmation last friday that it will all be completed by the first week of September (current work is made in the villa area, at the back of the resort).  Thank you once again and hope to see you again soon, Sebastien

title: Grand Stay!
review: we booked this hotel and requested airport transfers, after three emails and no response I called the hotel to confirm we had a airport transfer, WHICH THEY CONFIRMED however after waiting at the airport for over 1 hour no one came to collect us. finally we reached the hotel via a taxi, no apology and the staff were quiet rude and spoke extremely poor english.  *they charged my credit card without my knowledge for an additional $350 AUS dollars which when questioned days later they stated its a "holding fee" which they keep for 2-3 weeks after your departure (we haven't received this back still)  *we booked a king size bed pool side, the most expensive rooms in the hotel and was given 2 single beds, when we asked to be moved into a room with a king size bed (as we are a married…

title: Hotel and staff lacks foresight
review: I was quite impressed upon my arrival in this hotel, it had a grand lobby that was beautifully lighted and a nice swimming pool area surrounded by buildings housing the guest rooms. The beach was a 5 minute walk and the main street with the shops and restaurants was just around the corner. However, my stay here was rather unpleasant at best. Below were some of the issues that we encountered during our stay.  1) Blackouts - Although this incident is not the hotel's fault, I was disappointed by the limited capacity of their generators. During blackouts, the room did not have electricity and the air conditioning was not working. This incident prevented me from having a good night's sleep for 2 of the 5 nights we stayed here. I'm expecting big hotels such as Grand Mercure to have…

title: Bad
review: Dear Ryuready,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us all.  I am personally very sorry about the inconveniences caused during your stay, whether when the blackout occured or when your toilet broke down.  These things can unfortunately happen but as you correctly mentioned, the fact we couldn't anticipate and compensate you accordingly is a totally different matter, for which we are usually very accomodating... especially during these first few months of operations.  To come back to the blackout and generator use, it did happen twice last week and while the municipality was working on fixing the main supply line, we automatically switched into "generator mode". I am not sure if you are familiar with the terms (no worry, i wasn't either until joining), but we have one of Phuket's most powerful generator in comparison to our number of room. It's a 1,200KW unit that provides electrical supply to all the rooms (emergency lights in rooms x2 and fresh air instead of air-conditionned), the lobby, the lifts and corridors, the surrroundings like walk ways and the restaurants.   Those are unfortunately happening quite often in Phuket (and any other city than Bangkok) and i can ensure you none of the property on the island, whether a 4 or 5* could have provided enough power to supply all rooms (as if nothing had ever happened).   I understand the frustration as i was myself in the lobby, discussing with a few "surprised" clients and appreciate the fact you understand it has absolutely nothing to do with us.   However, and wehn it comes to safety hazards and Housekeeping standards, it is our entire responsability and for those i have to present my appologies to you. I believe communication is important and i wish i could have had the chance of meeting you and discussing these matters with you directly rather than on this platform, maybe next time.  I did send you a personal appology note too so please feel free to contact me back shall you decide on giving our team and property a second chance...   Thank you once again. Sebastien

title: Fancy Hotel
review: To bad for newly open hotel that run out off room access key card. Front desk supposed to inform customers first when their checked in. Ammanities served only for 2 person for room paid for 3 person. Poor for breakfast food that not immediately add.

title: Mixed Feelings
review: Dear Benny W,  Thank you for your review and feedback. I am sorry about the inconvenience caused at breakfast. Our team is usually very reactive when it comes to buffet line replenishment and service at breakfast.   As you might have noticed, we were extremly busy with high occupancy over the last few days and I appologize again if you feel we were not up for the task.  I have this morning met with our Chef and Food & Beverage Manager to improve this specific point and hopefully things will get much smoother.   I am bit puzzled by your comments in regards to our key cards as i am not aware of such shortage. It might well be a miscommunication issue but again, i will investigate this matter so to avoid similar concern in future.  Thank you very much for letting us know. We are still in "fine-tuning" mode but i can ensure you we will work even harder on making this place a true retreat!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic Brand New Hotel
review: Great location right opposite the markets. The staff wer excellent on arrival and departure, every need is met, including some bottles of water when we mentioned we were hot. Such fantastic service in Thailand but this one was the best of the 3 hotels. The foyer was beautiful to sit in and the pool area was nice. The buffet breakfast was good but it took me a while to get a coffee, the previous hotel you could get your own freshly ground from a few machines ready to go. I would stay here again definately. Nice modern rooms and bathroom. Was only here for one night but would recommend highly.

title: Top Hotel Top Staff
review: We have just returned home after staying at the Grand Mercure for twelve nights.  This hotel is excellent. The decor is beautiful, the staff are friendly and attentive.  We have visited Patong six times and this is the best hotel we have stayed in.  It is the first time we have been in a hotel that the general manager and his assistants have gone out their way to be friendly and helpful. Reception staff are first class and always enquire to see if there is anything they can do to help you.  The restaurant staff all appear to be happy at their work and they all speak English well.  Food in the restaurant is excellent.  We send a big thank you to all staff and hope to be back in the future.  Joyce and Ron Crawford

title: Great place
review: Dear Joyce C,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property.  We are very happy to hear such comments about the team and hotel itself and can't wait to have back with us at the end of the year!  Many thanks again, Sebastien

title: Awesome new hotel
review: I'm still at the hotel and unfortunately I'm leaving next Monday. Been here a total of 14 nights and I don't want to leave! Rooms are beautiful, new and clean. Staff is very polite and they planned a private tour for me as there were only a few things left for me to visit. Breakfast buffet is great. If I come back to phuket I'd like to come back to this hotel.

title: Great hotel at an amazing location!
review: Dear AlessandraP,  It has been a pleasure to have you around for so long. I hope you made it safely back home and will consider staying with us again next time you visit the island.  Thank you so much for this very kind review of yours!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: The Best Hotel in Patong
review: Awesome new clean hotel in a great location opposite the Otop Markets and walking distance to the beach.  All of the staff were amazingly friendly, competent and spoke good English.  Rooms were excellent as you would expect in a new hotel, we had an adjoining rooms for our children which was appreciated.  Pool bar and cocktail bar and restaurant were all good, the breakfasts were amazing.  Only complaint was from our children that there could be more TV Channels, as there is no DVD player in the rooms.  The concrete area around the pool is very slippery when wet, as other reviewers have mentioned, however I am sure this will be attended to.  Would highly recommend this hotel as it is excellent value for money. Will definatley go back again.

title: You won't regret
review: Pros : perfect location , good customer service , good breakfast , good size room , great internet speed , fast front desk check in , staff are well trained , shuttle service available , great food service   Cons . Pool floor is  "very slippery" I was carrying my child and I almost fell , private pool was too cold for kids , my child started crying when he touched the water   Hotel entrance is very hard to climb , I had my mum with me and she had a hard time climbing the road  House keeping needs to clean better (my pool balcony wasn't cleaned for 10 night )(room 142)  Tv channels are mostly thai needs to be upgraded

title: GREAT HOTEL
review: Salamalekoom AbdulRahman81,  Thank you very much for such a great yet objective review of our Hotel. I am really pleased to see your comments and the rating given (5/5), despite the few issues you also pointed out.   It is always difficult to deal with water temperature at the moment as rain can sometimes bring temperature down to about 23-24 degrees (usually around 26-27 i would say). I hope your mum managed the slope well still... we will next time prepare a wheelchair for her and other Mothers and grandmothers that might have difficulties climbing up the ramp. The reason why the hotel was elevated 6 meters above the street level is for safety reasons due to our proximity to the sea (past Tsunami in 2005).  Anyway i hope you all had a great time and please do not hesitate to contact us directly shall you plan on a new trip soon.  Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Excellent value, very relaxing
review: Me and my daughter loved our time at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong, hotel is fantastic and great location for everything, swimming pool & steam rooms were great and food in hotel was excellent but what stood out most is the staff everyone was so helpful and pleasant to us all the time front getting us taxis , helping with our tours, at breakfast, room service.  Special thanks to JAMNONG BOOTSONG who really went out his way to make sure we were enjoying our stay and thank you WARAWUDHI PUMTHONG for your help and advice. when i go back to Phuket this is the only hotel i will stay Thanks everyone at Grand Mercure .

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Dear Sydneyfrankie,  Many thanks for the great review!! It is always good to start the day on a positive note... especially now that we are getting closer to completion time and when the transition between soft and Grand opening can sometimes represent a real challenge.  Very happy to note you enjoy our Food and Beverages offer and i will also take this opportunity to thank K.Jamnong and K.Warawudhi in person, for their great work and advices.  We very much look forward to welcoming you back at the property.   with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: great hotel, amazing location!
review: We stayed 4 nights in July in a Superior twin room. The rooms seemed a little small but you're not in Phuket to sit in your room. As platinum I requested an upgrade but was told that none were available (the hotel seemed empty but it was probably because they didn't want to put people in rooms next to renovations). They provided two complimentary welcome drinks upon request. The premier lounge was still under construction during our stay.  The food at the restaurant was delicious and very cheap. With advantage plus most meals were actually cheaper than outside the hotel. The service was excellent and cheerful and definitely made the stay one of our favourites.  The pool was fantastic, and the cocktails in the swim up bar were very cheap and very large (fish bowel sized Pina…

title: Great Stay
review: Location of this hotel is very convenient . Close to shopping centre , night life and local restaurant.We checked out from Grand Mercure on 23th July. We really enjoy during our 7 night stay.We got higher floor room, so that we didn't hear the noise from the pool.Our room was very new with comfortable king bed.Breakfast was fantastic.And the staff extremely very helpfull. The last night of our stay , we got birthday cake surprise. Thank you to Mr.Sebastien and all the staff. We really appriciate.We wish we could stay here again next time.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Amy M,  Thank you so much for this wonderful review. I am very pleased to see you both enjoyed your stay with us very much. Please come back for your birthday next year again, we'll have a bigger surprise for you i promise :)  Many thanks and see you again soon, Sebastien

title: Not a 4 star hotel as they claim
review: Great hotel in Patong, 5 mins walk to the beach and close proximity to restaurants, market and shopping centre.  The hotel looks very new and nice clean rooms.  Rooms were a little on the smaller side. We requested a double room but got a twin room, when asked they simply pushed the beds together without offering to change room or explanation on why they couldn't accommodate.  The hotel offered awesome breakfast with lots of variety.

title: Lovely new hotel
review: Dear Ngockie,  Many thanks for this 5* rating and very kind review. Glad to see you have enjoyed your stay very much. Please rest assured we could not move you to another room and that's the reason why we simply join the bed. Many guests do actually realize it as we are using 2 twin beds of 3.5ft each, giving an extra 1ft to guests compared to the usual 6ft king size bed that features into our regular double room. We have a 3" topper that fits on top of it perfectly and i do hope you enjoyed great nights of sleep too.  Thank you for the kind comments about the atmosphere too.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Construction Noise
review: Stayed here in July 2014 for 1 night before heading to phi phi. Booked to stay here as they are a member of the Accor chain and we're platinum members which should give us an upgrade when available and access to the VIP lounge. When we arrived little early than check in time, we were happy to wait as it had to be decorated as we were on honeymoon. However room wasn't ready until close to 2.30pm.   We were told we could not get an upgrade as the pool access rooms were all booked (they only have 10 available as majority of hotel is still under construction) According to their website, they have the 'Suites' but when we enquire these were not even finished!  The Superior room is TINY. we were told about 35sqm.  This may be acceptable if this was in Singapore or HK, but it's the…

title: New Hotel
review: We just spent 7 nights here in a Pool access room. The rooms were very small as was the bathroom . Getting into the shower could be a problem for an older person as you had to step over quite a high ledge into the bath. We loved the pool access but other than that everything else was just OK. We had dramas checking in , our room wasn't ready for checkin time which really isn't acceptable. They compensate us with breakfast the following morning which was a nice gesture . It's in a good location easy walk everywhere . It's a good choice if you get it r a discounted price

title: Good location reasonable price
review: Dear Anthony J,  Many thanks for sharing your experience with us. I am very sorry about the check-in episode... We are currently looking at ways to spee-up the cleaning process and once tthe entire inventory of 300 rooms will be available, i believe things will get a lot smoother.   The transition between the pre-opening and the "almost there" stages can at times be difficult to handle and i am once again very sorry you had to wait for a while past 2pm.   A for the access to the bathtubs, we have actually set in every bathroom, a stainless handle to ease access in and out of it. I will check the room you stay in in case it i missing.   Thank you for overall positive comments... I am happy to see you appreciated the effort and gesture of the complimentary breakfast!  Many thanks once again, Sebastien

title: Great location and chic design, but service could be further fine tuned
review: Nice new  hotel neat n clean .great location in patong walking distance to the bangla street n patong beach. Good indian restaurant s nearby . Food is good n reasonably priced . Only weird thing was a price list in the room mentioning price for everything from remote ,slippers , towel , even laundry bag and they were actually charging 100 bht for it . Pool is slightly small but bar by its side is great . Rooms are not very spacious but otherwise good . House keeping is one area where they need to improve . Overall nice place good location n good price .

title: Great hotel, close to everything
review: Dear Shaleen,  Thank you very much for your review and comments. As mentionned upon check-out, there is still plenty to be done and we are working daily on improving services and standards all around.   Please kindly send our kindest regards to your family and friends... It will be great to welcome you all back once the Hotel is finally completed... which should be the case in about 2 or 3 weeks top.  Many thanks once again, Sebastien

title: Awesome Hotel
review: The Grand Mercure is a welcomed addition to the otherwise mediocre hotel options around Patong. Its understated chic, well laid out pools and deck represent the best of contemporary resort design.  The hotel is located in a pleasant neighborhood , 450m to Jungceylon/ Soi Bangla via interesting path dotted with shops/restaurant/, 250m to the beach and 200m to Hard Rock Cafe/ Hooters.  The only let down is the inconsistency of service by a few staffs....While 90% were friendly as were expected of the famed Thai hospitality, a few obnoxious and condescending waiting staff should not belong to frontline service or need to be trained to be equally welcoming the all PAYING guests, regardless of whether they are Caucasian, Oriental, South Asian or from planet Mars.  My experience with…

title: reception forget copy Passport when check in, then phone to room disturb sleeping.Also, room had ants  wanderling.
review: Check in service not good, skip photocopy Passport, then phone to room ask for repeat the procedure, disturbing guest sleeping. Poolside, some guest smoking that polluted air.Room had ants.

title: New and Clean
review: Dear Sandymansh,  Thank you for your review and very sorry to hear we couldn't ensure you with a most relaxing stay.  I have discussed already with our Front office team about the disturbances related to the missing copy of your passport. We could have waited for the following day and do not usually disturb guests past 6pm. As for the polution created by the pool, i will get into this issue separately.   Many thanks once again, Sebastien

title: Brand new and beautiful
