review: Taxi tends to mix up Grand Mecure and Mecure (further down the street) so please inform them clearly when you're travelling to the hotel. It's few minutes walk to the "happening" street,shopping mall and plentiful of street food and massage parlour.  Rooms are new and clean with comfortable mattress and bathroom water pressure is good after a day of outdoor activities.  Breakfast is nice and not over crowded with sufficient to choose from. There's always few Pajero 7 seater outside the hotel(road side), and it's a better choice if you want to travel far (I manage to get them to send me to airport at 4am with only 800bht). Overall a very clean and new hotel with friendly services and up to mark facilities.

title: Great hotel with fantastic staff.
review: Dear NGCK,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful review of our property. I am very pleased to note you enjoyed a very relaxing stay with us and appreciated both comfort of our rooms and quality of our breakfast spread at Bubbles Restaurant.   It will be a pleasure to welcome you back anytime soon...  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic First Trip to Patong!
review: This hotel is so new, it's not even quite finished yet, (But this was just one block of guest rooms and meeting rooms which didn't affect our stay at all) The whole hotel is beautifully appointed with modern and attractive furnishings and fittings.  The breakfast restaurant is beautiful from the decor, to the way the fruit is presented, right down to the shape of the crockery and cutlery!  Beautiful. The rooms are equally modern and beautiful.   The hotel does back onto an old shed area but is well-located just a block or so from the beach and there are shopping stalls and little bars just across the road.  It's only a couple of blocks from the lovely Jungceylon shopping centre and just a bit further to the bars of Bangla Road.  The staff were lovely and the service provided was…

title: Great Stay! *****
review: From the moment we checked in we were made to feel welcome and met quickly with some much needed refreshments. The grand hallway and alfresco bar area was a beautiful sight for sore (weary and tired) eyes.  The room was lovely with a king bed, lounge area and well equipped mini bar and bathroom. All rooms overlook the pool with an option of a room with your own semi private (as it is shared with others on that level) pool. Room service and dining in house was obviously more expensive then typical street eats but delicious and plentiful. I highly reccommend any of the Pizzas, the Reuben Sandwhich and the Banana Republic Mocktail!  The room was serviced adequately and for those lazy days where leaving the room after 2pm occured, a quick phone call ensured our room was serviced…

title: Top location, great beds but lacking in too many areas !
review: Dear Meldelcic,  Thank you very much for such a detailed and wonderful review.  I am delighted to see you enjoyed everything of your stay, from the rooms to the food selection, Hotel design to its location.   It was a great pleasure to have you staying with us for (almost) 2 weeks... Hopefully we will see you again next year!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good hotel in a great location
review: We stayed for 3 nights for A$80 a night without breakfast. Pros Position - perfect - close to all the great restaurants and shops but far enough away to be fairly quiet, Beds - super comfy with great sheets, the best sleep we had in 3 weeks :) Rooms - we had the standard room and it was fairly small but quite attractive. Pool - clean and beautiful Massage - a bit more expensive than outside of hotel but really good - ask for Da - she is wonderful.  Cons Noise - the hotel is a long way from being finished and there was constant construction noise - even into the night - which is unacceptable. Unfortunately my otherwise perfect massage was spoilt by constant sanding, drilling and hammering close by There was a power  cut meaning there was no music or airconditioning available for…

title: fantastic hotel, food and service
review: Dear MickiAustralia,  Thank you for this long and very detailed review of our property. Looking at the number of reviews you have made in the past, i believe it is a very obejective one and it will certainly help us improve in various areas.   Reviews received so far, from well travelled customers or new-comers to this Tripadvisor have mostly been outstanding to-date and it looks like unfortunately in your case... lots of things went wrong. I am really sorry for that and wish to appologize on  behalf of our entire team for the lack of attentiveness shown in various areas.  As you correctly pointed out, we are at about 70% of the hotel completion, still in soft opening period and while the remaining work consists mostly in wood and deco works, the team has lately been also working on some deffects in and outside the rooms. I was not aware of work being done at night as i am living in-house myslef but have asked our Chief Engineer to investigate this matter right away. This is indeed unacceptable but i can promise you it is not a usual habit of ours and it will be corrected shortly.  I am also very concerned about comments made in regards to check-in process. If there is one thing we have entire control over is our own selves and the attitude shown towards customers. I found this as unacceptable as the few other points mentionned above and will again look into this specific matter shortly.  Spa is the perfect exemple where friendliness and great service given by K.Da are compensating the inconvenience caused by external disturbances (to certain extend i agree). I will take this opportunity to thank Da for her friendliness and dedication shown.  As for the rooms, we are adapting to humidity and condensation caused by the air-conditionned unit and i have asked our team to again check on this.  I also wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your comments about the rooms and comfort of the beds. We specifically worked on providing great nights of sleep and quality showers, hoping that dedication and attentiveness from the team would ensure a fantatic tay for all.   Once again, very sorry we could not achieve this this time around and shall you decide on giving our team and property a second chance in future, please rest assured i will be more than happy to help with making it this time, a Grand stay afterall.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good location but poor housekeeping
review: The best thing about Grand Mercure is its location which is very close to the most happening places in Patong. For Patong Beach, take right from the hotel and then left from Family Mart and right again from Hard Rock Café while for Bangla Road, take right from Family Mart and go straight. Both places are not more than 10 minutes’ walk. No need to wait for the Hotel Shuttle. We got a pool facing room which had an excellent view of the pool area. The room had everything that we could have asked for though the toiletries were just ok. The breakfast buffet spread at the hotel was very decent with plenty of options including options for Indian vegetarians like mix vegetarian curry  (which was pleasantly surprising). It will be good if they can provide some good bread options as well…

title: Wonderful hotel ~
review: We have booked 3 days 2 night room for our short gate-away.   Staffs are very nice and helpful, checked in was very fast and they serve us a nice complimentary drinks with a small desserts. It is very nice to have it after you have a long journey to reach the hotel.   We get a room at level 6, facing to the swimming pool. We're very impress for that morning and night view towards to the pool. Room is very clean and provide all necessary amenities.     Good location to stay here. It's walking distance to Hardrock cafe, Bangla street and shopping mall. So basically you can visit to those hot tourist spot at any time.   We will definitely choose to go back for this hotel again !

title: Excellent Holiday
review: Dear Sharon_lizard,  Thnak you so much for such a superb review! I am always very pleased to start the day on such a positive note and can't thank you enough for sharing your experience with the World.  Glad you loved the room comfort and design!!  See you next year hopefully, Thank you Sebastien

title: where else would you stay ? this is perfect !
review: I choose this hotel due to my friend's recommendation, The hotel is very charming, nice room, nice swimming, very good food, excellent friendly staff. All the room are very newly decorate and over looking to swimming. It locates in central of town, where you can find every thing, night market, walking street, and seafood restaurant and there is settle bus to the beach as complimentary. I really enjoy my stay for 5 days, the staff is always helpful with your excursion where you want to do every day. I will be back again for the next summer holiday.

title: Wonderful holiday
review: Dear Chumnit,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful review! I am very pleased  to note you had a great stay with us and will pass on your kindest regards to our team as well.  Our Location is indeed ideal, a few steps away from the entertainment, yet secluded enough to give everyone a chance to chill and relax.   With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Lovely hotel marred by disappointing service
review: new hotel, not open so long yet, still working on the details and more places to stay. allready perfect to stay . downstairs nice places with private terrace and two chairs at the pool you can jump right into the water ...very friendly staff giving you a warm welcome and willing to try to make this trip for you the best you ever had. relax do what you want to do and when you want to do it is giving you the freedom you want to have and makes it working for people from all places all over the world to stay in harmony together. The rooms are modern designed ...great clean bathroom with rain shower ...tv with movie channel everything is there ... cleaning staff is friendly and does a great job treat them well as well as the do it for you. Restaurant has food for all types of people…

title: Fantastic Hotel
review: My husband and I had a great time at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong. We spent 2 nights in a  room that we can ccess to pool,it is fantastic!! Room is nice ,modern and clean, service is excellent and staff are friendly.I highly recommend all travellers to stay here.

title: Fantastic choice in Phuket
review: Dear K.Patchara,  Thank you so much for sucha wonderful review of our property. I am really pleased you liked the Pool and enjoyed great service throughout your stay.  Hopefully, we will see you again soon!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic Phuket option.
review: My wife and I had the pleasure of spending 3 nights here as a quick weekend getaway. I can highly recommend this for Phuket bound travelers.  The pool access rooms provide you with a pool literally right outside your balcony. This was a nice touch and we thoroughly enjoyed this. It was definitely worth the upgrade. Sort of like having a semi private pool. The common pool is also very nice complete with a swim up bar featuring  good happy hour specials.  The breakfast buffet was wonderful. Living and traveling extensively in Asia I never know if I will find the breakfast selection appealing. We made it a point to get up each morning to enjoy it. And we aren't morning people especially on holidays! It was a pleasant surprise. Plenty of choices to keep both my wife and I very…

title: Friendly staff
review: Dear Makati,  Thank you very much not only for choosing our property but also for taking the tim of writing such a lovely review of our property.  Guest satisfaction is on top of our to-do list and i am very pleaed you both enjoyed a superb holiday with us.  I will pass on your regards to our CHef and Food & Beverage team. We have been working on the breakfast for qquite a while now and we are somehow getting there, bringing new dishes and specialties everyday almost.   Thank you for your kind words about the team atitude as well. It makes a whole difference and i am very pleased to be part of such a dedicated team.  Once again, thank you for your superb review!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Good
review: Recently spent 5 nights at the new Grand Mercure, and I would recommend the hotel to anyone looking for an above average option in Phuket.  The rooms are beautifully fitted out, c/w large flat screen TV, a well-stocked mini bar, plenty of wardrobe space, and the bed (king size) was huge, and very difficult to leave each morning! The AC worked well, hot water was plentiful, and the free of charge wifi signal was strong in the room (infact wherever we were within the confines of the hotel (a stronger/faster connection is available for a fee)).  The outdoor center piece of the hotel is a gorgeous pool with a swim up bar and there is also a separate smaller pool for the youngsters. There are plenty of sun loungers and other seating options around for poolside chilling out.  The…

title: Classy and Beautiful
review: We had a great stay at Grand Mercure Patong Phuket from 26 June to 29th June 2014. This hotel is super new. The concept of the hotel was really beautiful and modern. If you are celebrating your special one’s birthday, then this would be a great place.  You can arrange a complimentary cake to be sent to your room. There were some staff having difficulty in understanding English but they manage to accommodate.  If you are looking for quiet and peaceful sleep, then this is the place. As the hotel is not fully completed, you don’t see much human traffic in the hotel. ( maybe it’s low season). My deal did include free breakfast. However, you can pay for the breakfast which was rather steep.( 400 baht++). If you just walk out of the hotel, you can find good breakfast ranging from (…

title: Fantastic Modern Hotel
review: Dear Shaminee,  Thank you very much for posting such a superb review.  I am delighted to note you had a most pleasant stay and were able to organize a little treat for your special one's birthday too.   As we are only operating 2/3 of the inventory for the time being, it is indeed very quiet and peacefull and hopefully we will be able to keep it that way even once the hotel will be fully completed and running.   I am sorry about the taxi experience, the governement is now working on improvement for Patong area in order to standardnize the taxi services around the area. It might take a bit of time still, and we would always recommend guests to use our services instead. We will be happy to assist you next time you will be visiting us :)  Thank you once again and see you back in Grand Mercure very soon!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic Hotel with Beautiful Staff
review: We had a great time staying at this hotel. It is still new and modern and has Wifi throughout rooms, pool and lobby which makes searching for tourist areas convenient. The rooms were really spacious even for 3 adults. The kids really enjoyed playing in the pool and kids club room. All the staff were really attentive and helpful especially post stay when we found out our daughter had left her bunny rabbit in the room. The staff responded to my email / call very promptly and was able to provide a solution in sending it across to Singapore. Highly recommend this hotel to others and would definitely come back again.

title: Nice hotel and friendliness staff
review: Dear ADJ2323,  Many thanks for such a superb review of our property.  I am personally delighted to note your satisfaction and will thank our Housekeeping and front office teams who took care of the Mr. Jumbo.  Thank you once again for choosing Grand Mercure and see you again in Phuket very soon!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Nice and modern hotel, however, room for improvement
review: My husband & I stayed at Grand Mercure for 8 nights. The first 4 nights we enjoyed a Superior Room on level 5 with beautiful views of the pool & the remaining 4 nights we upgraded to a Pool Access Room. This was the better room & I would definitely recommend. I've stayed at over 6 hotels in the Patong area & by far the beds at a Grand Mercure are the best, never a restless night. The decor in the rooms are so lovely, everything is so new & fresh. Breakfast was great with enough variety of foods & delicious pastries. I would suggest that adding pancakes to the menu would be nice. The hotel is in a great location with a complimentary shuttle bus that takes you to Junceylon & the beach approx. 4 times a day.  ThAnKyOu to Sebastian for the complimentary dinner,, that was very…

title: Lovely hotel for some R & R
review: My friend and I stayed here two weeks ago for 3 nights and enjoyed our stay very much, First impression was really good as the girl that greeted us when we arrived was just so sweet and warm and friendly. She led us to a reception table, sat us down and proceeded with our check-in and offered us drinks and cool towels.The lobby was very elegant and grand. Then she showed us to our room and the bellboy followed not long after with our bags. Our room was on the second floor, overlooks the pool. We would have liked the ground floor rooms which open up to the pool, but we were okay where we are. The room was not big but I think it was refurbished recently so everything was new and the decor was very modern. There were slippers and bathrobes, and the safe was very easy to operate.…

title: Exceptional stay AND service
review: Dear Christinechin25,  Thank you so much for such a detailed and GRAND review of our property.  What a great way to end the day and rest assured i will take this opportunity to thank our entire team on your behalf, especially our young bartender who went out of his way to provide you with those drinks.   I will discuss with our Housekeeper to find out about the luggages stand, as we usually have one per room... so to make sure it gets even better next time you decide on visiting us.   Many thanks once again!!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Hotel chain that actually charges for laundry bag!
review: We (our family of 5) were very impressed with our experience staying at Grand Mecure. The staff went out of their way to provide timely and unobtrusive service. Making bookings for us, helping with new keys, super late check out...  All good. Our only surprise was that the rooms, whilst conceptually tastefully inspired, were in some areas finished with a lack of precision. This had little impact upon our time there. We very much appreciated the level of service and food provisioning as the benchmark for our world holiday.

title: Excellent service and experience
review: Dear Liam G,  Thank you so much for such a wonderful review. We are very happy to hear you and your family had a fantastic stay with us and sincerelly look forward to welcoming you back at home.  As you correctly pointed out, some of our rooms are still going through minor deffect corrections and i am glad it did not affect your holidays in any way.  Those will be completed by mid-July hopefully :)  Many thanks once again.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Excellent service all round
review: I've stayed 2 nights in grand mercure patong & I've chosen this hotel cos it's a hotel chain & it's supposedly near to everywhere in patong but it's not really true. This is my 3rd Phuket trip for this year & I've stayed at 3 different hotels. I'll rate baan lamai hotel to be the best overall in terms of service & location. The room I was assigned to is far from the lobby even though it's low peak season now. The floor in my room is literally wet 24/7 which I don't know why. The water turns from hot to cold & hot again during shower. But what upsets me most was upon checkout, I was told that I need to be charged for a laundry bag! As a frequent traveller around the world staying in hundreds of hotels, this is the first time I've been to a hotel that charge for a laundry bag!…

title: New & Chic Hotel in Patong
review: The hotel is recently opened therefore the interior of the hotel is very new and the decoration is pretty chic. Hotel staffs are friendly and resourceful. We did not try the hotel breakfast so we have nothing to share about it.   The restaurant right across the street called "You & Me" is recommended due to a wide variety of yummy selections, their staffs are able to communicate in decent English and fairly reasonable price.   If you are looking for a massage parlor, "Let's Relax" is highly recommended. Once you get out of the hotel, turn to your right and right again, keep walking for around 5mins, you will see a nice big building with a zen entrance. They have a board displaying the price list outside the massage parlor so you can see that they are charging at a very…

title: "Beautiful new hotel/resort....great location in Patong"
review: Dear Cyrena,  Thank you for your very short yet great review of our property... It is always great to receive positive feedbacks and while i do not really fancy "you &me" as much (been eating there too much probably), i have to agree "let's relax" is a very decent Massage Salon. It's only a few minutes away from us but hopefully next year, you will opt for ours called Ryn Spa. It is not entirely completed yet so i understand why you decided to go outside but i will be pleased to offer you a fantastic deal during your next visit :) Our prices are also very competitve and treatments of very high standards (we are actually creating our own Ryn fragrances).  Many thanks again,  Sebastien

title: Fantastic Hotel excellent stay
review: Our main stay in Thailand was Khao Lak but he had 2 nights in Patong. We had a handful of resorts to choose from however being Accor members this new resort/hotel stood out to us. We read the reviews & were aware that the hotel was not finished. So we expected to see workers on site, it didn't bother us at all. The rooms are bright, comfortable & modern looking. Not very big at all so if you're staying a week or so keep in mind it's more of a hotel size room rather than a resort. Beautiful pool with swim up bar. The food for room service was delish & prices were good too! The standard of the food for the buffet breakfast & dinner were of high standard, reminded us of the Sofitel. I was actually unwell during our stay but the staff we outstanding. Ms Wen & Ms Sumontha made our…

title: Hotel Excellent , Restaurant needs Improvement
review: Dear gcsv,  Thank you very much for such a great review! I am very pleased to note your satisfaction about faciliteis and services and will surely take this opportunity to thank Sumontha, Wen and the rest of the team on your behalf.  We are receiving quite a few good comments about our food and hopefully we will be able to keep on improving our quality and selection...   Please do not forget there is still a bottle of Malbec waiting for you at Bubbles... hopefully we'll have a drink together next year :)  Thank you very much and see you again very soon,  with Kind regards, Sebastien

title: Fabulous stay
review: I stayed from 2/6/2014 for 7 nights I was traveling with my 15 year daughter we had a fantastic time . From the friendly check in staff & cold drinks on arrival ,the buffet breakfast the restaurant for lunch & dinners all fantastic house keeping was also great the Hotel being only 2 months old the room was awesome only thing bad too say there still a little bit of construction noise but nothing to worry about & looking around its very close to being finished I will return to this hotel, I will recommend the hotel to family & friends

title: Great potential soon to be great
review: Stayed during their soft opening. While I was disappointed in not being able to upgrade to a pool access room as the number of rooms finished was limited, the room we had was amazing. The restaurant and room service food was fantastic. Some of the service needs a bit of polishing but this will be perfect soon. The location is great.

title: Yes, would recommend this hotel
review: Dear Graeme W,  Many thanks for this superb review of our property.   Availability of the Pool access is still very limited, I am very sorry we could not grant you the due upgrade. I am however delighted by the fact you enjoyed our Superior room so much and did also have a chance to try our Cuisine.  I will take this opportunity to pass on your compliments to the Chef!  Many thanks once again,  with Grand regards Sebastien

title: Excellent Service, 2 Thumbs Up
review: Good location. Away from the sleazy part but yet within walking distance to the main shopping area 'JunCeylong'. Staff are helpful and pleasant. Hotel is relatively new thus the whole ambience is just so so nice.

title: Service with a smile
review: Dear Seekingadvice410,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review. As you correctly mentioned, our Hotel is still very new and we are still working in many areas to make everyone's stay an even more memorable one.   Thank you once again, Sebastien

title: Wonderful hotel
review: This new Grand Mercure Patong has distinguished itself by demonstrating what service excellence should be as they will " Do All Possible " to let their hotel guests have a wonderful time during our stay.  Well done. Keep it up.👍👍

title: A warm service and a good smile
review: This was our first time visited to Phuket. Before this trip, we have done several search online and knew there is a lot of choices in different range. Finally, we made our mind to book this hotel.  Once we arrived the airport, we rent a car from "David" company for our 3 days trip. It takes around 40 minutes drive to reach this hotel if you know the exact location. BY the way, we took around 90 minutes to reach here. A good landmark to reach this hotel is a yellow building with a restaurant named "Ristorante Pizzerria Zafferano), or a sign board " No. 1 Relax Beauty Salon" or "Family Mart" at the junction. Driving from far, you can look for  a logo "M" in yellow at purple back ground.  According to the staffs, this is a 5-month-old hotel and only 2 blocks in business. We reach…

title: A very huge hotel, good location n a nice masseaur.
review: Dear Menz520,  Many thanks for this wonderful review of our property.  We are delighted to hear you both had a very pleasant stay and i also wish to take this opportunity for given our hotel a try despite the fact we only recently opened.   You seem to be very much at ease when it comes to outside recommendations and while i would have prefered you recommending our own restaurant, i have to sya "N*6" is indeed a very nice cafe. They are quite a few decent restaurant out there but next time you decide on visiting us again, i will be happy to offer you a complimentary tasting of our own specialties, especially our Phuket "mee hoon gaeng poo" (crab & noodles in yellow curry) or our homemade noodles in Chef's curry (kind of a revisited Singaporean Laksa version).  I'm glad to see we were happy to accomodate your early check-in request eithout too much troubles.. It is not always the case as occupancy is still pretty considering we only have half the inventory to-date.   Thank you very much once again for your detailed and superb review.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Amazing surrounds, friendliest caring staff.
review: I arrived n could not get to check in early.. So I immediately when over to the hotel spa for a body massage... I have to say its the best massage I ever had. This girl her name is Amy.. N she is really good. I have had many massages n this is really pulled it off to be the top!   Room is nice, rather small. It's a new hotel, with lots of rooms. Nice pool.. Just outside your room. Room rate is a bit pricey..but because its near to the town n surrounding have lots of activities, restaurant n places to visit.   Good Service by the staffs. Because the hotel is new, the finishing of the building is yet to be perfected.   Overall is a great hotel.

title: new hotel, handy to everything
review: Dear Greg_cruiser,  Thank you very much for such a nice review of our property.  I am delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay very much and will take this opportunity to thank Amy and the rest of our Spa team for their professionalism and special attention.   We are still offering great deals on all treatments, so to remain competitive and following this week training, a few new massages, including our own signature one, will be launched shortly. I am sure you will be happy to experience one of those next time you decide on visiting us again.  As for the finishing, we are currently working on 1st, 2nd and 3rd fixes as we call those and are getting ready for our Grand Opening mid July. I hope those little deffects did not bother you much and hope you will see a great improvement during your next visit.  Many thanks again!  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: The best hotel in Phuket!
review: We have booked 2 weeks at Grand Mercure Phuket and am half way through our stay.  From the minute we were welcomed in the lobby to every single day we used the resort services, we have made friends and feel totally pampered.  The amazing staff are interested in how we are feeling, where we have come from, and giving them feedback on our stay.  The breakfast has something for all nationalities and is a real treat to start the day.  The gym is also well appointed.  The bedding and pillows have resulted in beautiful sleeps and we cannot hear any noise from the main street of Patong.  We are close to everything.  The rollout of the hotel has been carried out with much thought to the visitors, as work is still being carried out but in a very discreet way.  Just love this place and…

title: New Hotel in good location
review: I stayed at the Grand Mercure and it is only about 1 month old. It was a nice hotel and was within walking distance to all the shopping and restaurants.  The room were well appointed and tastefully decorated, however the finishing off was a little poor as the sink in the bathroom was not fixed to the vanity unit if you leaned on it, it would topple & the toilet seat was not properly fitted.  The beds are firm or you could even consider them hard, which seems to be a common trait in Thailand as I stayed in 3 different resorts on my visit.  The pool was clean and well maintained with a swim up bar and plenty of sun lounges around to sit and bask on. The staff are very friendly and obliging and the breakfast which was included in my deal was with a decent range of various foods…

title: Good Value and Excellent Service
review: Dear Jeffs,  Thank you very much for choosing our property and taking the time to write such a review.  It is always important to receive feedback and rest assure we are taking yours very seriously.   Our Engineer Manager has already fixed the bathroom facilities and i've shared your comments about bacon with our Chef too.  As for the bed, it is the first time we received such comments as we specifically picked a hard base knowing all our rooms would be equipped with a 3" topper, making it firm, yet soft and comfy on top. We have always the option of adding a duvet underneath the bedsheet so to make it even softer... I will discuss with our team and see if we could eventually get 10 rooms or so, with a different kind of bedding as i know not all of them were ordered yet. This would give future guests a great alternative i guess.   Thank you for the other comments and complimentas as well, i am really happy to note you had a very pleasant stay overall. Please feel free to contact me directly at sebastien.tronchet@accor.com next time you plan on visiting Patong...   with Grand regards,

title: Great stay
review: Excellent position at Patong area of Phuket, far enough from the grotty area and 5 to 10 minutes walk to the major shopping centre and to the beach. Hotel is totally new; in fact only about 1/3 of the rooms are open for business. So there are still some work going on in some of the blocks and conference facility, etc.  But the benefit of that is that the place is not crowded; you can have the swimming pool virtually to yourself for most of the time.  But, surprisingly staff and other services are fully up and operating and because they are all very fresh and new, they are all very friendly and eager to help and the ratio of service personnel to guests seems higher than you would normally see at other hotels. Building noise level? Well, there is some during the day, but not at…

title: great service
review: Dear sksk,  Many thanks for this fantastic review of yours.  I am glad you both had a wonderful stay with us and even had a chance to experience our CHef's cuisine as well.  We have asked our Food and Beverage team to work on authentic recipes and offer good-value deals on whether local (Central, North Eastern or Southern Phuket style), Asian or European. Often, guests are afraid about Hotel's restaurant pricing and it is great you noticed we were more or less "on par" with local retaurant you can find anywhere around Patong.  We also making sure seafood are delivered daily and when it comes to meat, we are working principally with New Zealand and Australian suppliers.   Please let me know personally if you plan a new trip to Patong soon, will be very happy to help.  with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: A pleasant stay
review: We checked in on the 14th May for 10 nights and it was the most relaxing and friendly experience. We were a little worried due to construction being done while we were staying there but we were not bothered in any way. The breakfast is sensational and the staff in that area very friendly and very helpful. The omelette everyday cooked superb. The food was always clean and filled up. The pool area was always clean, towels huge and readily available with a great pool bar and  lots of modern pool chairs.   The rooms were very clean and kept clean everyday. Bed was really comfy and good size TV. Even though there wasn't a balcony the huge glass doors let you look out over the pool area.   The staff throughout the resort were extremely helpful and so very friendly. Every single time…

title: Excellent property
review: Our original room was not ready on arrival, however staff were very quick to ensure that we didn't have to wait for a room to be cleaned.  The hotel is very new, rooms are small but well appointed, and the pool is great.  All rooms face the pool, there are no balconies.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: What wonderful hospitality
review: Dear Paul R,  Many thanks for this superb review of our property.  It is always a pleasure to note guest's satisfaction and we are all very much looking forward to welcoming you back next year.   with Kind regards, Sebastien

title: Fabulous stay and service
review: Visited Phuket as treat for my Mom on Mother's day and I can't praise this property and its staff enough. Upon arrival, we were promptly guided to the check in counter, seeing that we were 2 ladies (I had booked a pool access room with king sized bed), they thought we might be more comfortable with 2 twin beds instead of 1 king bed, and proceeded to check for availability, we were told we needed to wait a little while, and the staff then let us wait at a very comfortable lounge area with a refreshing welcome drink and divine mini coffee eclairs.   When the room was ready, we were delighted to find a plate of local lychees and logans on our table for our enjoyment. The room is new and beds so very comfortable, we had no problems sleeping at night despite the occasional fireworks…

title: What a great time in Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.
review: Dear MoonJazz,  Thank you very much for choosing our property and for sharing such a Grand review. It was a pleasure to look after both of you and i am particularly happy to hear our team extended most sincere and personalined services throughout your stay.   I believe the young lady who assited you on that evening is K.Da, I have just spoke to her and thank her for taking such an initiative.  Please do let me know directly next time you and your Mother plan on visiting Patong again... will be very happy to look after your reservation personally.  With Grand regards, Sebastien

title: This place WILL be great.... When its finished
review: It was an amazing vacation. The staff was very helpful and showed a very professional approach. We got a good offer of one night free with 2 days and 2 nights stay. The location is also appropriate for tourism..it has a beautiful swimming pool with a bar.

title: Service with a "wow" factor
review: My wife and I stayed in this hotel from 8 May to 11 May this month, and all I can really said is "WOW" ! The team duly impressed us with their sincerely, and going beyond their call of duty attitude to ensure everyone feels at home. Below is a quick summary what I meant..   a) Hospitality (Service Excellence)      - GM Sebastien and his team are really dedicated and passionate people. They go all the way out to make every guest feels at home. Sebastien made his round daily to ensure the voices of the guest were heard. He will take down the feedback from the guests, offer no excuse for any shortfall, and instead share the vision and action how they’re going to tackle these issues.   b) Craft beer,       - More than 100 to choose from. However, they’re still in the midst of…

title: outstanding brand new hotel in Phuket
review: Dear FrancisCK,  It was a pleasure to have you around for a few days... i hope it was a great break from the big city. Thank you very much for this wonderful and very detailed review of our property.   You were actually our first ever guests to experience "Craft" and its beers and i'm very pleased you both enjoyed it very much. Import taxes on Liquors, Beers and wines are very high in Thailand and a few of our items can be quite pricey i admit. But in an other end, they are unique Beers as Craft boast the largest selection of draught, bottled and craft beers on the island.  I have discussed with our team about finding ways and promotions to make it more accesible to a lot more of our guests.   We have also discussed this morning with our Housekeeper so to make sure we do not face similar issues in future. Very sorry for the trouble.  I will take this opportunity to thank our entire team on your behalf, for their dedication and professionalism.  Thank you once again,  Sebastien

title: Fantastic !
review: Definitely one of the best hotels I ever stayed in .. I spent a week from 4/5/2104 to 11/5/2014 with my wide and a 4 years old girl .. Loved everything .. Location .. Pool .. Breakfast .. Room service .. Friendly staff .. Kids club .. Massage service .. Friendly smily manager Mr Tronchet Sebastien .. He always great you with a smile even on his day off .. Would definitely come back again and again .. If you travelling with kids they will love the kids club house .. Lots of activities and lots of toys with very friendly staff to look after you little one while you having lunch or relaxing on the pool especially the location of the kids club is in the middle of the hotel with glass wall so you can see your child and he can see you while you enjoying your time .. Many many thanks…

title: Nice place to stay in patong
review: Dear Michael F,  Many thanks for this superb review of our property. It is was indeed a great pleasure to have you both for a week (Our Kid's club attendant are already missing your daughter).  I will take this opportunity to thank our Chef and his team for a job well done. It is not always easy to deliver hot and tasty food in the rooms and i am glad you both enjoyed it so much.  Once again, thank you for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong.  with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Amazing- service and rooms above and beyond
review: We recently stayed at The Mercure in Patong and had the most amazing time. Great place to stay, close to everything. Everyone was very helpful. Food was great. Only downfall was the foul smell when you go out onto the street. Pool was fantastic after a long day also.

title: Complaints about the manager
review: The hotel is very nice and we stayed there for 3 days but upon check out, we had a bad experience with the manager. When we were checking out, the hotel inform us that we will be charged 590 baht for the slippers and a laundry bag. ( Usually hotel never charge ). I asked why they charge while other hotels don't. I said I'll pay since I've used the bag to keep the dirty clothes and I wouldn't want to take it out again but I told them I'm not very happy that they charge and there's no price list in the room. So the clerk went in and consult the manager Ms. Maria came out and ask me, I told her how I feel. I was very very upset when she treated me like a monkey as she defended her views saying what if every guests takes the "mattress" and the "kettle" ? I scolded her for being…

title: Brand new hotel walking distance to everything in Patong
review: Dear Klang,  Thank you for choosing our property during your last trip in Phuket. I am very sorry to hear about this unfortunate incident that ruined the mood and the overall perception you had of the team and property up to that particular moment.   I can't appologize enough for that as i personally believe there is always a solution or way out to any issues we may face. The matter could and should have be dealt with in a different fashion and the last thing we wish for, is to have you and your wife, or any other guest leaving our premisces with mixed if not bad feelings. We are continuously working on improving our standards and this unfortunate experience will surely help us manage similar situation in a better manner in future.   There was no need for "mattress" or "kettle" references i agree and i have already discussed with Marya about this specific point. However, I have to say i am the one who set up this particular policy and the one who should be blamed for it. It is a very common practise in the industry and the reason they are being given away in some properties (maybe) is simply because they are either dispensable (low quality ones), budgeted for (accounted in the room rate offered). In our case, and in order to be able to offer both quality (and re-usable) amenities and very competitive rates in  a very competitive Patong area, we need to have such policies in place to manage the assets of the property and have every other guests enjoying their stay too.   Simply because we wish to keep our standards up high, we are keeping (well trying to) tight inventory of our assets and amenities. We keep record of the towels given by the pool, give the option to guests to purchase amenities they might have liked (elephant in room, bathrobe, slippers) and always find a way to please our guests anyhow.   I wish we could simply have offered you a good discount on the overall charge or eventually allow you to take the laundry bag along and pay for the slippers only....   I understand your frustration and the fact the entire episode made you and your wife very upset.  Please feel free to contact me directly next time you plan on visiting Phuket. My email is sebastien.tronchet@accor.com.  Best Regards,  Sebastien

title: New Gem in Patong
review: This place is brand new and service is top notch.  Bed is comfortable, breakfast is wonderful, pool is outstanding.  Staff are very friendly and attentive.  The location of the hotel is walking distance to Patong Beach, Jungceylon and Bangla Rd.  Free tuktuk to Jungceylon Mall too in case you are tired to walk.  May I just add that the GM (Sebastian) is a very lovely guy.  Upon check out, I was able to bump into the GM.  We chat a little bit and when I told him we were moving to another resort, it so happened that his friends with the GM there.  He hooked us up with a free upgrade and other complimentary.

title: Sanctuary In Patong
review: Dear Annabaltzr,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review.  We are delighted to hear you both had a fantastic stay with us and wish to thank you once again for choosing our resort during your last trip to Patong.   I also send a thank you note to my colleague up North for taking such good care of you too.   Thank you and see you again very soon.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Classic resort hotel
review: Like I said its a new gem added to the elite hotels in Patong. Grand Mercure Phuket Patong is fantastic hotel. I stayed here from 1st May till 4th May, I booked deluxe double room with pool access.   During my whole stay I felt like I was t home, infact I said to my friends and family "call you once I am home" I was always referring to hotel.  The front desk staff are very helpful and cooperative. So is the room service staff. For 3 days I order breakfast on room and I have no complaint about it.  Breakfast was always more then we could eat, tasty and fresh. Specially we loved the croissant, they taste so good and melt in your mouth.  Staff is excellent, location is perfect, very new just a month old hotel, fantastic design and layout and indeed it is grand.  I am looking…

title: A brand new hotel, there's still room for improvement
review: Let's talk about some nice parts of this brand new hotel: Nice pool view from the hotel room. A wonderful location, easy to get to shopping markets, spa and massage places, restaurants...etc. Everything in loud and crowded Patong. In fact, the hotel is not totally ready for service, we saw some works were in progress when we arrived. The workers even worked in my next door, I saw them when we got up for breakfast. Talk about the breakfast, actually the "breakfast buffet" is included in my booking when I reserved it paid through this online agency.  But the staff in restaurant asked me to pay for the breakfast without calling reception for confirmation, when I told her that the breakfast should be included in my booking,she asked me to talk with the reception myself. I was…

title: Great New hotel with fantastic general manager.
review: Dear Jamie L,  Thank you very much for choosing our property and for writing a review that will i am sure, help us improve our standards and procedures in future.  We have since then contacted Booking.com and informed them about the issue. It appears they had confirmed Breakfast to yourself and a few other guests while reservations in our system were registered as room only.   We are really sorry for the inconvenience caused and have already resolve this matter internally. There is still plenty of training and fine tuning to be done and your comments are indeed very helpful.  Please let me take this opportunity to thank you for your positive and very kind comments about our team and property.   with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: Totally BELOW and BEYOND my expectations...
review: Stayed here for four days mid april.  Minor issues, staff needs more training on communication in terms of billing.  Other than that awesome location, rooms, bathroom, pool, breakfast.  Great pool and breakfast staff, excellent chamber maids.  Probably best bed i have ever had at a mercure.  Attention to detail is wonderful.  Staff when i checked in young guy with spiky hair, was execllent. Girls at breakfast were fantastic, all of them.   General manager was simoly oustanding and he is the reason why i stay loyal to the accor group.

title: Upcoming Hotel
review: Dear AK7811,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property. As you correclty mentionned, there are still plenty trainings and adjustments to be made, not only at the reception but in all areas as we wish to make it GRAND and provide authentic memories to every single guest of ours.  IThank you so much for your kind comments about the rooms and service... I will take this opportunity to thank our heads and their teams on your behalf.   As mentionned, please do not hesitate to contact us directly for further enquiries or trips to Patong.   with Grand regards,  Sebastien

title: L'hôtel de Patong - The Patong Hotel (Phuket)
review: After seeing so many "excellent" reviews for this Accor property here on Tripadvisor, I decided to spend my remaining 2 nights in Phuket at this hotel and made my reservation through an online travel agency as I found a great last minute deal online. My whole stay was encountered with so many "bumps" that I actually would have rated this hotel "terrible" if it wasn't for the hotel management that showed me true Thai hospitality and did their very best to service recover my problems.   Problem started already at check-in, as I was requested an "early check-in" and got told by the receptionist that my room would be ready within 30 minutes. As I knew that all requests could only be accommodated to "subject to availability" I showed understanding and sat down for a coffee at the…

title: supee cool
review: Just opened some weeks ago, this hotel is located around 700 meters from city centre and 10 minutes by foot from the beach. Very quiet, with a kind staff, enjoy to help you, restaurant with good international and thai food, original recipe very tasty, good wine and nice cocktails. The rooms are comfortable and clean. Some have a direct access to the swimming pool. In few words, it's a nice and quiet hotel where if possible I will come back. A proximité (moins de 3 minutes) tous les commerces (restau, family market, bars, echoppes ...) bref séjour trés agreable sans qu'il n'y ait eut de probleme.

title: Great hotel, Excellent service
review: Dear Ricfromslavutic,  Thank you very much for writing such a wonderful review of our property.  We are deligthed to see you enjoyed your stay as well as a few of our culinary delicacies. I will take this opportunity to thank our Chef and  service team on your behalf.  Once again, thank you for choosing our beautiful Resort during your last holidays in the kingdom.   with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Brand new 5 star hotel in a great location and with very friendly staff
review: Such a great hotel ever, Very nice hotel good location and great service, All Staff very friendly.. Especially front line staff we could say " All you are Excellent" We had a good memorable at your hotel during my vacation... Thanks

title: So Clean and Close to everything in Patong!
review: Dear Sara-Waree,  Thank you very much for this very kind review of our property.  We are glad to note you had a most enjoyable stay with us and are very much looking forward to welcoming you back in a near future.  Thank you very much. Sebastien

title: Best place to stay in Phuket.
review: We were extremely pleased with our 5 night stay at this beautiful hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone planning a trip to Phuket. The hotel is in a great location - a street back from the beach and a 5 minute walk to Bangla Road which makes it a quieter and safer area to stay in but close to the action in Patong. We thought about staying in Karon, or the Holiday Inn, but we are so glad we ended up staying here. The best thing about the hotel is that it only opened in March so everything is brand new, high quality and 5 stars. Even better is that not many people know the hotel is open so it was not crowded. We really enjoyed the pool (pool access rooms looked awesome), restaurant for breakfast and the free shuttle to the shopping centre. But the best thing about our stay…

title: Ultimate of Enjoyment
review: All staff were exceptional, very accommodating and friendly.  Our room was fantastic and the hotel was beautiful and brand new.  Fabulous location and the pool was so big!  The manager Sebastian is a beautiful man.

title: Good hotel in the heart of Patong
review: Dear Caitlin,  Many thanks for this short and splendid review of our Resort. I am not sure if we're talking about the same person though :)  Very much looking forward to welcoming you back next year.  with kind regards, Sebastien

title: Enjoy your vacation
review: First of all, about Patong - loud, crowded, colorful and a total party place. People who want a more relaxed, longer holiday should probably stay at Karon or Kata.  About Grand Mercure, some of the positives of this property - the location is terrific! You can literally walk down to the busy shopping market, massage places, restaurants, Bangla road, the beach (around 1 km walk) and anything and everything happening in Patong. The rooms are really nice and the pool view is pretty good. The pool is slightly small and has a funny shape but works ok. Staff at the reception is really nice and helpful. Travel desk gave us good information about the day trips/ things to do etc.  The not so good things about the hotel - Firstly, I didn't like the lobby area leading to the reception cuz…

title: Excellent!
review: Dear Tanaya,  Please allow me to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing our property during your last holidays in Phuket. It was great to see you had a lovely stay despite a few minor disappointments. I will take this opportunity to thank our Front office team for their kindness and professionalism and discuss with our Executive Housekeeper separately, in order to set proper standards and supervision from the first few weeks of opening onwards.  Our Lobby, restaurant and corridors/walk-ways are parts of a separated Interior design project and your comments, especially on seatings and lightings were passed on to the project manager accordingly. We met this past Saturday 26th of April with the entire Architect and Designer teams and they will send us the first few samples of chairs and ambiance renderings within two weeks. Our deadline remains our Grand Opening mid July but i believe those will be dealt with very shortly.    Please do not hesitate to contact us directly next time you plan on visiting the island. We will be delighted to offer similar conditions to ones given last. Constructive comments are the keys to future success and yours are indeed greatly appreciated.   Thank you very much once again.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Boutique Hotel in Patong Beach
review: I went to Phuket with my friends during Songkran. I choose to stay at this hotel coz it's located in good location near Patong Beach. Staff is helpful and very friendly. The hotel is new and modern designed. You can enjoy eating, drinking and swimming.

title: Best Place To Stay.
review: Was there with family and already love the place.Still couldn't forget the rooms we stayed with the pool right outside our patio.The staffs were tremendiously friendly and polite, especially Mr. Sebastian ( GM ) and Miss Sumontha ( EAM ). Been to Phuket a number of times but this is the best hotel, trust me.Will definately stay there again and this time will be with my golfing friends. Imagine after a round of golf in the morning and head straight back to the hotel and relax by the pool with icy cold beers. To sum it up, i've got 4 words for you guys; IMPRESSIVE,EXCELLENT and FANTASTIC TEAM. Cheers!

title: Great weekend getaway
review: Dear Hachioji,  Thank you very much for this wonderful review of our property. We really appreciate the fact you all had a Grand stay with us and canot wait to welcome back again, with family or friends as you mentionned.   Once fully completed, we will surely be able to provide you with alternatives when it comes to Beers and Beverages. Our Craft Lounge's Beer selection will be launched early May and will feature over 150 draught, craft and imported beers, ales, ciders and lagers. Plenty to taste and enjoy while relaxing by the pool!  Thank you once again Mr. Hachioji.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: the new hotel of Patong beach
review: Nice beautiful hotel with a great layout! Especially loved the pool which is right at the doorsteps of the room for easy access and enjoyment. The rooms comfortably fit both of us and is very clean, new and tidy. All of staff were very friendly and helpful as well and made sure we knew the directions of the places we wanted to visit in Phuket. The location of the hotel was good as well, just a short walk away to "Jungceylon" - a large shopping mall. Lastly, I would want to thank the staff for the wonderful assistance they provided in the course of the stay.

title: recommend hotel to stay in Patong
review: Dear Marcaman Lee,  Many thanks for this very kind review of our property. We are delighted to note you enjoyed your stay very much and wish to take this opportunity to thank you once again for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong duing your last visit in Thailand.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Brand New Fabulous Resort
review: The new hotel of Patong Beach that located between Patong Soi 2 and Patong soi 3. The location is perfect for traveling in Patong Beach. Just a block walked to Jungclelon Complex Mall. My friends and i stayed on the second night of opening day. My first impression of the hotel is the traditional thai design with functional. The grand entry hall and giant swimpool are awesome. I spent my day off in swimpool. Bubble is the resturant of hotel. Food is amazing, specially "Noodle by BoonMe chef".

title: The place to stay in Patong Beach
review: Myself, wife and baby checked in at the hotel during Songkran festival it was just amazing.  Having a 10 month old baby can be difficult to find the right hotel but Grand Mercure Pathong was beyond expectation with his oversized pool, fantastic kids club, very attentive staff,...  The hotel is brand new so the room were just fantastic with everything you need, i must say the pool  access room with the terrace are just exceptional.  We had few meals there as well and the food was very well presented and tasty.  I Highly recommend this hotel for any kind of vacation as the other important point is the location, 5 minutes walks to Jungceilon shopping center and 10 minutes’ walk to soi Bangla which is the night life happening place.  Again big thank you to the entire team and…

title: Beautiful premises and amazing staff
review: Dear Stephanebkk,  Thank you very much for choosing Grand Mercure Phuket Patong during the past Songkran holidays. We are really delighted to note your satisfaction and knowing your baby girl also had a great time really means a lot to us. There is still plenty to be achieved and improved but we are on the right path i believe. I will take this opportunity to thank our recreation Manager and her team of dedicated "baby-sisters" on your behalf and ask them to keep it going.  Thank you also for giving our Chefs a chance and trying a few of our local specialties. It is not often the case in Patong and we have been working on various cuisines and menu selection so to offer great variety of delicacies and prices for guests who would prefer spending their day by the pool or simply enjoy a lovely diner at night.   Once again, many thanks for this wonderful review. with grand regards, Sebastien

title: The best hotel in Phuket
review: We stayed at the hotel in its opening days, and had an incredible experience.  All the staff were so friendly, especially Meena and Lek who were just awesome. The premises were immaculate, and beautiful. Sumontha (the Executive assistant manager) and Sebastien (the General manager) were both friendly and welcoming, and made time to make us feel special.  While we were there it was my birthday, and they surprised us with a little happy birthday cake, which was delicious.  The restaurant was very well priced, and the food was very good.   We will look forward to visiting again if we are ever back in Phuket.

title: Beautiful looking hotel with top service
review: To our first ever "Kiwi" couple,  A Grand Thank You to you both for choosing Grand Mercure and posting such a lovely review of our property.  You were two of our very first customers and as such, you have earned lifetime VIP treatments :) You helped us make history and we are very grateful. We are very much looking forward to welcoming you back next year.  Many thanks once again, with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Very nice hotel, great location and friendly staff.
review: We spent our honeymoon from 11th to 15th April at Grand Mercure Phuket. We had a fantastic time, our room was brand new, clean with everything we need. Food was perfect; staff was extremely professional and very kind. We got nice intentions from the hotel: some decorations and flowers + a delicious wedding cake.  We also got a late check out: it was really convenient. The price of the food is very reasonable! The swimming pool was great , huge and clean. The bar in the pool is very pleasant. Sebastien, the manager is a very approachable and kind person. I highly recommend anyone to go in this hotel. We really want to come back as soon as we can.

title: Excellent service and ambiance :)
review: Although this place just is opening, they did a very good job! Thanks for your warm welcome. It fulfill my first trip at Phuket as the perfect trip ;)   See u again.....Grand Mercure Phuket Patong!!!!!!

title: Absolutely perfect place to stay
review: Dear Jean C,  Many thanks for your kind review.  We are glad we could make your first trip to Phuket a most memorable one and hope to welcome you back in a near future.  with Grand regards, Sebastien

title: Fantastic place to stay with amiable staff and excellent services!!!
review: We have had nothing but friendly service and even had the management come and personally great my partner and I during our stay. We have been privileged to be here in the first opening week (arriving 4 days after opening) and have found that nothing is too much for these guys! They have been wonderful and have even gone so far as being able to organise and get a wedding package to us to go through so that we are able to come back to have our wedding here. Sebastien and Sumontha you have both been amazing even getting us to meet with Jamnong (Executive Assistant Manager) and Aliya (Sales Executive) so that we can have everything perfect for our big day. We cannot wait to come back. Definitely recommend this hotel, their hospitality is extraordinary! - and the food was delicious!

title: Amazing new hotel with polite,professional and friendly staff
review: Dear Jenn&Jake,  Many thanks for this fantastic review.  As you correctly mentionned, we only opened a few days ago and it was really a pleasure to have you staying with us from this early stages.  The decision you took on entrusting us with the organization of what it is surely going to be the biggest day of your life is simply amazing. we will never be able to thank you enough but one thing we can promise you is that we will make this first ever wedding at Grand Mercure Phuket Patong, Your wedding, a one-of-a-king celebration, a party no other hotel in Patong have ever hosted, a holiday your friends and respective families will remember for ever.  Thank you once again and see you again very soon, Sebastien.

title: Fantastic new hotel with wonderful staff
review: Having done extensive searching and comparisons with other hotels, I picked this hotel finally and I absolutely made an excellent choice. This was my first time to bring with my 21-month baby travelling overseas and what I needed were that the hotel must be near Jungceylon as my baby can go to restuarants there to have his meals; there should be a bathtub for baby having bubble bath and should be a swimming pool for baby swimming and kids' club for him to stay and play. Grand Mercure definitely met what I required. All the staff are really really nice. They greeted and said hello to us  when we went out and came back to the hotel every time. Staff in the restuarant are friendly and helpful too. They had lovely smiles all the time. They even proactively asked your opinions about…
